Wing Commander (USA).name: 聯隊指揮官
Wing Commander (USA).original_desc:
The Confederation have been at war with the Kilrathi for the past 20 years, and you're just now joining the Vega campaign. You're a 2nd Lieutenant just out of the Academy, with some good work under your belt. You're posted to Tiger's Claw, the flagship of the Confederation Fleet.  Will you help the Confederation to victory, or go down in infamy? 

Wing Commander is a space combat simulator interspersed with shipboard dialogs. Onboard the ship, you can save/load game, visit the bar to get the latest gossip, or go on to the next mission briefing, and the 3D space combat part. 

The 3D space combat have you sitting in the cockpit, where you control the craft like roll, turn, up/down, afterburner, as well as fire guns and launch missiles. There are four different crafts on the Confed side, each with different flight characteristics and armament. You will have a wingman on each mission, and you should keep the wingman alive as the wingman will help you if you issue the right orders. You can also taunt the enemy. You'll be fighting several different types of enemy fighters and capital ships, and even combat a few Kilrathi aces. 

When the mission is complete, land back onboard the ship and get ready for the next one. The campaign tree have both winning and losing paths. 

Wing Commander featured a hybrid bitmap/3D graphics  engine that allowed even 286's to display detailed 3D graphics to an extent never before possible. With EMS available, it can display even more detailed graphics and in-cockpit animations.
Wing Commander (USA).desc:
過去 20 年來，聯邦一直與基拉提人交戰，而你現在剛剛加入織女星戰役。你是一名剛剛從學院畢業的二中尉，有著一些出色的工作。你被派往虎爪號，聯邦艦隊的旗艦。你會幫助聯邦取得勝利，還是背負惡名？

Wing Commander 是一款散佈著艦載對話的太空戰鬥模擬器。在船上，您可以保存/加載遊戲，訪問酒吧獲取最新八卦，或者繼續下一個任務簡報和 3D 太空戰鬥部分。

3D太空戰鬥讓你坐在駕駛艙裡，控制飛船的翻滾、轉彎、上/下、加力，以及開槍和發射導彈。聯邦方面有四種不同的飛行器，每種飛行器都有不同的飛行特性和武器。每次任務都會有一名僚機，你應該讓僚機活著，因為如果你發出正確的命令，僚機就會幫助你。還可以嘲諷敵人。你將與幾種不同類型的敵方戰鬥機和主力艦戰鬥，甚至與一些基拉蒂王牌戰鬥。

任務完成後，返回船上並為下一個任務做好準備。戰役樹有獲勝路徑和失敗路徑。

Wing Commander 採用混合位圖/3D 圖形引擎，即使是 286 也能以前所未有的程度顯示詳細的 3D 圖形。借助 EMS，它可以顯示更詳細的圖形和駕駛艙內動畫。

Tecmo Super Bowl III - Final Edition (US.key: Tecmo Super Bowl III - Final Edition (USA)
Tecmo Super Bowl III - Final Edition (US.original_name: Tecmo Super Bowl III : Final Edition
Tecmo Super Bowl III - Final Edition (US.name: Tecmo 超級碗 III：最終版
Tecmo Super Bowl III - Final Edition (US.original_desc: A late entry in what was once the premiere football simulation, TSB III has updated rosters and teams for the 1994-1995 season and is licensed by both the NFL and the Players group.  Features real NFLP players and photos, the real NFL schedule, and weekly standings.  You can change defensive and offensive formations, create your own Pro Bowl, fake punts and field goals, go for the two point conversion, and call audibles.  Updates to the game itself include new cinema screens, superstar mode, free agency system, improved graphics, larger field simulation, passing modes, and improved speech and music.  Horizontal scrolling.  Also features battery back-up.
Tecmo Super Bowl III - Final Edition (US.desc: TSB III 是曾經首屈一指的橄欖球模擬遊戲的較晚作品，它更新了 1994-1995 賽季的名單和球隊，並獲得了 NFL 和球員組織的許可。包含真實的 NFLP 球員和照片、真實的 NFL 賽程表和每週排名。您可以改變防守和進攻陣型，創建您自己的職業碗，假踢球和射門得分，進行兩分轉換，並呼叫聲音。遊戲本身的更新包括新的影院屏幕、超級巨星模式、自由球員系統、改進的圖形、更大的場地模擬、傳球模式以及改進的語音和音樂。水平滾動。還具有備用電池功能。

Legend of the Mystical Ninja, The (USA).key: Legend of the Mystical Ninja, The (USA)
Legend of the Mystical Ninja, The (USA).original_name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja
Legend of the Mystical Ninja, The (USA).name: 神秘忍者傳說
Legend of the Mystical Ninja, The (USA).original_desc:
Goemon (Kid Ying) and Ebisu-Maru (Dr. Yang) are enjoying themselves at home, when they hear about strange spirits sighted at the temple and taking control of the other villagers. Concerned, that a new evil has appeared, the two set out to confront it at the temple. This is just the beginning of a new adventure that will take them Goemon and his partner all across Japan; into moutain villages, amusement parks, castle fortresses and more!

Players control either Goemon or his partner Ebisu-Maru (or both, in 2 player mode). They sequentially travel through adventure-type villages and side-scrolling jump and run action stages. In the overhead-view villages, enemies must be defeated in order to earn money and other items (which include a weapon-enhancing lucky cat and mystical scrolls). The player is able to attack with their primary weapon and jump. Throwing weapons can also be used, which consume money for each one thrown. Attacking innocent villagers will cause the player to lose money. Money can also be gained (or lost) by visiting one of the numerous mini games, often in houses: which include mazes, whack-a-mole, the lottery, dice, a 3D labyrinth and a game trivia quiz show. Other businesses such as shops, resturants, inns and judo training can also be visited.

At the end of each village is an "action area" which changes the game in a complete side-scroller. One or both players can enter this place, filled with obstacles, traps, enemies and a boss creature. In addition to the regular moves used in town, players also gain the ability to unleash one of four special attacks for each character (if bought beforehand at the judo training center). These consume the scrolls collected in order to use. Additionally, in a 2 player game, characters can ride piggy-back on one another, to avoid getting stuck by a scrolling screen.
Legend of the Mystical Ninja, The (USA).desc:
五右衛門（小英飾）和惠比壽丸（楊博士飾）正在家裡玩得很開心，這時他們聽說寺廟裡出現了奇怪的靈魂並控制了其他村民。由於擔心新的邪惡出現，兩人前往寺廟對抗。這只是新冒險的開始，五右衛門和他的搭檔將穿越日本各地；進入山村、遊樂園、城堡要塞等等！

玩家控制五右衛門或他的搭檔惠比壽丸（或兩者，在雙人模式下）。他們依次穿越冒險型村莊和橫向捲軸跳躍和奔跑動作階段。在俯視村莊中，必須擊敗敵人才能賺取金錢和其他物品（包括增強武器的招財貓和神秘捲軸）。玩家可以使用主要武器進行攻擊並跳躍。也可以使用投擲武器，每投擲一次都會消耗金錢。攻擊無辜的村民會導致玩家損失金錢。玩眾多迷你游戲之一也可以獲得（或損失）金錢，這些遊戲通常是在房子裡進行的：其中包括迷宮、打地鼠、彩票、骰子、3D 迷宮和遊戲問答秀。還可以參觀商店、餐館、旅館和柔道培訓等其他企業。

每個村莊的盡頭都有一個“行動區”，它會在一個完整的橫向捲軸遊戲中改變遊戲規則。一名或兩名玩家可以進入這個充滿障礙、陷阱、敵人和頭目生物的地方。除了鎮上使用的常規動作外，玩家還能夠為每個角色發動四種特殊攻擊之一（如果事先在柔道訓練中心購買）。這些會消耗收集的捲軸以供使用。此外，在 2 人遊戲中，角色可以騎在彼此身上，以避免被滾動屏幕卡住。

Riddick Bowe Boxing (USA).name: 里迪克·鮑拳擊
Riddick Bowe Boxing (USA).original_desc:
Riddick Bowe Boxing is another one of the many boxing games released at the time, but with subtle differences. The HUD contains damage and energy meters along with a miniature ring up the top of the screen, useful to see the player's position in the ring so as not to get backed into a corner real easily.

Players can compete in the standard, 1-Player v. CPU, 1-Player v. 2-Player or even a career mode, where there are four preset fighters to choose from along with an option to create customers boxers. The career starts out at position #25 in the ranking and players slowly work up the ladder, going to the gym in between bouts to build up stats to eventually take on "Big Daddy" himself, Riddick Bowe.

The game is practically a copy of Evander Holyfield's Real Deal Boxing, save for the graphics style and the included fighters.
Riddick Bowe Boxing (USA).desc:
Riddick Bowe Boxing 是當時發布的眾多拳擊遊戲中的另一款，但有細微的差別。HUD 包含傷害計和能量計，以及屏幕頂部的微型環，有助於查看玩家在環中的位置，以免輕易退到角落。

玩家可以在標準的 1 人對 CPU、1 人對 2 人甚至職業模式中進行競爭，其中有四名預設拳擊手可供選擇，還可以選擇創建客戶拳擊手。職業生涯從排名第 25 的位置開始，球員們慢慢地爬上階梯，在比賽間隙去健身房積累統計數據，最終與“大老爹”里迪克·鮑 (Riddick Bowe) 較量。

該遊戲實際上是伊万德·霍利菲爾德（Evander Holyfield）的《真實拳擊》（Real Deal Boxing）的副本，除了圖形風格和包含的拳擊手之外。

Mobile Suit Gundam Wing - Endless Duel (.key: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing - Endless Duel (Japan) (Translated)
Mobile Suit Gundam Wing - Endless Duel (.original_name: Shin Kidou Senki Gundam W : Endless Duel
Mobile Suit Gundam Wing - Endless Duel (.name: 新機動戰記高達W :無盡的決鬥
Mobile Suit Gundam Wing - Endless Duel (.original_desc: It is the year After Colony 195, and war between the Space Colonies and Earth has begun. To give the colonies an edge, they send 5 young soldiers, trained to perfection, to earth in the most powerful of Mobile Suits-Gundams. With their arrival, the tide of the war changes as they battle against the Earth forces and the Colonies of their origin.
Mobile Suit Gundam Wing - Endless Duel (.desc: 這是《殖民地 195》之後的一年，太空殖民地和地球之間的戰爭已經開始。為了給殖民地帶來優勢，他們派遣 5 名訓練有素的年輕士兵駕駛最強大的機動戰士高達來到地球。隨著他們的到來，戰爭的潮流發生了變化，他們與地球勢力和他們的起源殖民地作戰。

Animaniacs (USA).name: 狂熱者
Animaniacs (USA).original_desc:
Animaniacs is a side-scrolling action/puzzle game based on the animated TV series of the same name.  The Warner kids, Yakko, Wakko, and Dot have escaped the water tower again and are on a quest to retrieve movie memorabilia from the Warner Bros. studio lot.  

There are 4 stages, and in each stage the Warners must work together to get past obstacles and enemies. Yakko can push or pull boxes, Wakko can use his hammer to smash things, and Dot can blow kisses to charm simple minded foes.
Animaniacs (USA).desc:
Animaniacs 是一款基於同名動畫電視劇的橫向捲軸動作/益智遊戲。華納孩子們、Yakko、Wakko 和 Dot 再次逃離了水塔，並開始從華納兄弟工作室取回電影紀念品。

有 4 個階段，在每個階段，Warners 必須齊心協力才能越過障礙和敵人。Yakko 可以推或拉箱子，Wakko 可以用他的錘子砸碎東西，Dot 可以用飛吻迷惑頭腦簡單的敵人。

Mortal Kombat II (USA) (Rev 1).name: 真人快打11
Mortal Kombat II (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
The Mortal Kombat fighters, plus several new ones, return for a tournament held by the evil Shang Tsung of the Outworld. The action is one-on-one as before, and famed for its high level of violence and blood (other than the sanitised Nintendo version). There are 5 difficulty levels and optional credits, as well as the usual two player mode including same character duels.

To win the main tournament, the player must beat each of the other human players, before taking on Shang Tsung, Kintaro and finally Shao Kahn. Players have a range of punches and kicks available, as well as flying kicks, uppercuts, roundhouses, and the special moves, which vary for each player. These include throws, uppercuts, long-distance bullets, bicycle kicks and a teleport feature.
Mortal Kombat II (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
真人快打戰士以及幾名新戰士回歸參加外星邪惡尚宗舉辦的錦標賽。該動作和以前一樣是一對一的，並以其高水平的暴力和血腥而聞名（除了經過消毒的任天堂版本）。有 5 個難度級別和可選的積分，以及通常的兩人玩家模式，包括相同的角色決鬥。

為了贏得主賽，玩家必須擊敗其他所有人類玩家，然後再對陣 Shang Tsung、Kintaro，最後是 Shao Kahn。玩家可以使用一系列的拳擊和踢腿，以及飛踢、上勾拳、迴旋拳和特殊動作，這些動作因每個玩家而異。其中包括投擲、上勾拳、遠距離子彈、自行車踢和傳送功能。

Scooby-Doo Mystery (USA).name: 史酷比之謎
Scooby-Doo Mystery (USA).original_desc:
This version is different from it's Genesis counterpart.  While the gameplay is similar (exploring levels to collect clues and solve the mystery), there are four different episodes for this version.  While visiting the Drabwell Ranch, ghost's interrupt the festivities and the gang must find out who is behind the hauntings and why.  Another adventure takes the gang to Deadman's Cove where a ghostly pirate has been scaring off tourists and it is up to Scooby and the Gang to bring it to a halt. The other two mysteries take place at a fun fair and a haunted mansion.

Players can use Scooby's unique sniffing ability to find clues. Scooby also consume Scooby Snacks to reduce the fright meter.  Additionally there are a series of mini-games that player can participate in such as "Wac-A-Monster" or "Make a Scooby Sandwich".  The graphics are faithfully recreated to resemble the long-running Hanna Barbara series.
Scooby-Doo Mystery (USA).desc:
這個版本與創世版本不同。雖然遊戲玩法相似（探索關卡以收集線索並解開謎團），但該版本有四個不同的情節。在參觀德拉威爾牧場時，鬼魂打斷了慶祝活動，夥伴們必須找出鬧鬼的幕後黑手及其原因。另一場冒險將這幫人帶到了亡靈灣，那裡有一個幽靈般的海盜一直在嚇跑遊客，史酷比和他的幫派必須阻止這一切。另外兩個謎團發生在一個遊樂場和一座鬧鬼的宅邸。

玩家可以利用史酷比獨特的嗅探能力來尋找線索。史酷比還吃史酷比零食來降低恐懼度。此外，玩家還可以參與一系列迷你游戲，例如“Wac-A-Monster”或“Make a Scooby Sandwich”。這些圖形被忠實地重新創建，類似於長期運行的漢娜芭芭拉系列。

Cacoma Knight in Bizyland (USA).name: Bizyland 的卡科馬騎士
Cacoma Knight in Bizyland (USA).original_desc:
The people of Bizyland were hard-working and prosperous. However, Wagamama, the queen of Lasyland was jealous and used the power of her magic mirror. The spell that was cast would switch the realms of Bizyland and Lasyland around. The only people left unaffected by the spell were those who were not hard-working: notably the king of Bizyland as well as two children and a robot who were playing that day. Using the king's magic chalk, they must travel over Lasyland and restore enough of a percentage of each area so as to break the spell over each region.

Cacoma Knight is a puzzle-painting game. Choosing one of the three characters, the player will begin each level only able to move around the edges. The player can start using the chalk to move away from the edges and draw a line over the darkened area and reach another edge. Once a section (always the smaller) is "chalked off" from the rest, it will be restored.
Cacoma Knight in Bizyland (USA).desc:
Bizyland 的人民勤勞且富裕。然而，萊西蘭女王瓦伽瑪瑪卻嫉妒並使用了魔鏡的力量。施展的咒語將改變比茲蘭和萊西蘭的領域。唯一不受該咒語影響的人是那些不勤奮的人：特別是比茲蘭國王以及那天正在玩耍的兩個孩子和一個機器人。他們必須使用國王的魔法粉筆穿越萊西蘭並恢復每個區域的足夠百分比，從而打破每個區域的咒語。

Cacoma Knight 是一款益智繪畫遊戲。選擇三個角色之一，玩家將開始只能在邊緣移動的每個級別。玩家可以開始使用粉筆遠離邊緣並在黑暗區域上畫一條線並到達另一個邊緣。一旦一個部分（總是較小的部分）與其餘部分“劃掉”，它將被恢復。

Toy Story (USA).name: 玩具總動員
Toy Story (USA).original_desc: This game is based on the movie "Toy Story". It sets you as the character of Woody as you jump, swing, and drive to the end of each level. Each level contains familar scenes from the movie. The gameplay consists of the platformsidescrolling kind. You use Woody's pullstring to defeat enemies like sharks, Mr. Potatohead, and Ham. After each level, you are treated to still images from the movie.
Toy Story (USA).desc: 該遊戲是根據電影“玩具總動員”改編的。當你跳躍、搖擺和駕駛到每個關卡的終點時，你將扮演伍迪的角色。每個級別都包含電影中熟悉的場景。遊戲玩法包括平台橫向捲軸類型。您可以使用伍迪的拉繩擊敗鯊魚、土豆頭先生和火腿等敵人。在每個級別之後，您都會看到電影中的靜態圖像。

Final Fantasy V (Japan) (Translated).name: 最終幻想系列
Final Fantasy V (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The Elemental Crystals are the life source of the planet. With them, gentle winds blow, the seas are active, fire burns bright, and the earth is full of life. All seems well in the world, until the wind suddenly stops, the sea begin to grow stagnant, the heat of fire becomes scarce, and the earth begins to wither. King Tycoon, sensing a premonition of evil, hurries off to check on the Wind Crystal, only to witness it destroy itself.

Meanwhile, a young traveler named Bartz is camping in a field when a giant meteor strikes the planet. When he heads out to examine the meteor, he is shocked to find a young girl named Lenna, who is the princess of Tycoon, and an old man named Galuf, who is on a critical mission. Later, joined by Faris, a pirate captain, the foursome must travel the land in search of the destroyer of the Crystals, and save the planet at any cost.
Final Fantasy V (Japan) (Translated).desc:
元素水晶是星球的生命源泉。有了它們，微風徐徐吹來，海洋活躍起來，火焰熊熊燃燒，大地充滿生機。世界上一切似乎都很好，直到風突然停止，大海開始停滯，火的熱量變得稀少，大地開始枯萎。王大亨感覺到了不祥的預感，急忙前去查看風晶，卻發現它自毀了。

與此同時，一位名叫巴茨的年輕旅行者正在田野裡露營，一顆巨大的流星撞擊了地球。當他出發去檢查流星時，他震驚地發現了一位名叫萊娜的年輕女孩，她是大亨的公主，還有一位名叫加魯夫的老人，他正在執行一項重要的任務。隨後，在海盜船長法里斯的加入下，四人必須踏上陸地尋找水晶的毀滅者，並不惜一切代價拯救地球。

Taloon's Great Adventure - Mystery Dunge.name: 塔隆的大冒險 - 神秘地牢

Cool Spot (USA).name: 酷點
Cool Spot (USA).original_desc: Cool Spot is a solid, colorful platform game featuring the 7-up mascot in the hero position. The game objective is fairly simple; you have to collect enough number of bonuses throughout each level in order to find the trapped Spots.
Cool Spot (USA).desc: Cool Spot 是一款紮實、色彩豐富的平台遊戲，以 7 人吉祥物為主角。遊戲目標相當簡單；您必須在每個級別中收集足夠數量的獎金才能找到被困的地點。

Aerobiz Supersonic (USA).name: 航空超音速
Aerobiz Supersonic (USA).original_desc:
You have just been elected as the CEO of a brand new airline company that must compete against 3 other airlines for global dominance. Set up new routes, buy businesses, and manage all your resources including planes, cashflow, and company representatives.

The basic premise of the game is the same as that of the original Aerobiz, but this time you have more planes to choose from, more city airports spanned over 7 different global regions, and 4 different time period scenarios complete with historically accurate political relationships and events.

Do you have what it takes to make your company fly high? Or will it crash and burn?
Aerobiz Supersonic (USA).desc:
您剛剛被選為一家全新航空公司的首席執行官，該公司必須與其他 3 家航空公司爭奪全球主導地位。設置新航線、收購企業並管理所有資源，包括飛機、現金流和公司代表。

遊戲的基本前提與原版 Aerobiz 相同，但這次你有更多的飛機可供選擇，更多的城市機場跨越 7 個不同的全球區域，以及 4 個不同的時間段場景，其中包含歷史準確的政治關係和事件。

您有能力讓您的公司飛得更高嗎？或者它會崩潰並燃燒嗎？

Inindo - Way of the Ninja (USA).name: 忍者之道
Inindo - Way of the Ninja (USA).original_desc: 1581, Japan. Fearing a rebellion and striving to conquer the entire country, the warlock Nobunaga orders to attack the Iga ninja clan. The ninjas bravely defend their village, but, being vastly outnumbered, are mercilessly slain by Nobunaga's men. Only one survived: you, the hero of the game. Shortly before the assault you were sent to a nearby village to warn the elder of Nobunaga's attack. However, the other village is also destroyed by Nobunaga's army. You swear to avenge his crime. But for now, you are just an inexperienced young men, and are "wanted" by Nobunaga's men and ruthless bounty hunters. Will you be able to unite Japan in the ultimate struggle against Nobunaga?nn"Inindo: Way of the Ninja" is a console-style RPG with a touch of strategy. You navigate your hero on the world map, visit towns, and descend into dungeons. The battles are turn-based and are viewed from a third-person perspective, like in Final Fantasy games.
Inindo - Way of the Ninja (USA).desc: 1581年，日本。由於擔心叛亂並努力征服整個國家，術士信長下令攻擊伊賀忍者氏族。忍者們勇敢地保衛了他們的村莊，但由於寡不敵眾，被信長的手下無情地殺死了。只有一個人倖存下來：你，遊戲的英雄。在襲擊發生前不久，你被派往附近的一個村莊，警告長老信長的襲擊。然而，另一個村莊也被信長的軍隊摧毀了。你發誓要為他的罪行報仇。但現在，你只是一個毫無經驗的年輕人，被信長的手下和無情的賞金獵人“通緝”。你能團結日本，與信長進行終極鬥爭嗎？ 《Inindo：忍者之道》是一款帶有策略色彩的遊戲機風格角色扮演遊戲。你在世界地圖上導航你的英雄，參觀城鎮，並深入地牢。戰鬥是回合製的，從第三人稱視角觀看，就像最終幻想遊戲一樣。

Super Mario World 2 - Yoshi's Island (US.name: 超級馬里奧世界 2 : 耀西島
Super Mario World 2 - Yoshi's Island (US.original_desc:
The events of Yoshi's Island take place in the past. Mario was one of two twin brothers whom the evil Magikoopa Kamek tried to kidnap. Kamek kidnapped one of the brothers, but the second, Mario, fell down on Yoshi's island, where Yoshis live. The Yoshis decided to carry baby Mario and to bring him to his parents. But Kamek has sent troops and hordes of monsters to stop the Yoshis and to kidnap Mario.

In the game, players control the differently colored Yoshis most of the time. Mario is a helpless baby unless a star that makes him invincible is collected. As a Yoshi, players can swallow enemies to make eggs; these eggs are used for attacking other enemies and activating switches. Yoshi can do a flutter jump to clear large gaps that a regular jump can't. Players can also pound the ground for attacks and also flipping certain switches. Additionally, Yoshis can transform into vehicles, such as a helicopter, submarine, or a train. If Mario is dismounted from a Yoshi, a countdown will start, and Yoshi must catch the baby before Kamek's servants kidnap it. When Mario is invincible, he doesn't ride on Yoshi and is immune to attack. While invincible, Mario can run up certain walls.
Super Mario World 2 - Yoshi's Island (US.desc:
耀西島的事件發生在過去。馬里奧是邪惡的 Magikoopa Kamek 試圖綁架的兩個雙胞胎兄弟之一。卡梅克綁架了兄弟中的一個，但第二個兄弟馬里奧卻倒在耀西的島上，那裡是耀西一家人居住的地方。耀西夫婦決定懷上嬰兒馬里奧並把他帶到他的父母身邊。但卡梅克派出了軍隊和成群的怪物來阻止耀西家族並綁架馬里奧。

在遊戲中，玩家大部分時間都控制著不同顏色的耀西。馬里奧是一個無助的嬰兒，除非收集到一顆讓他所向披靡的星星。作為耀西，玩家可以吞下敵人來製造雞蛋；這些蛋用於攻擊其他敵人並激活開關。耀西可以進行顫動跳躍來清除常規跳躍無法清除的大間隙。玩家還可以敲擊地面進行攻擊，也可以翻轉某些開關。此外，耀西還可以變身為交通工具，例如直升機、潛艇或火車。如果馬里奧從耀西身上下來，就會開始倒計時，耀西必須在卡梅克的僕人綁架嬰兒之前抓住它。當馬里奧無敵時，他不會騎在耀西身上，並且免疫攻擊。馬里奧雖然無敵，但可以跑上某些牆壁。

P.T.O. II - Pacific Theater of Operation.key: P.T.O. II - Pacific Theater of Operations (USA)
P.T.O. II - Pacific Theater of Operation.original_name: P.T.O. II : Pacific Theater of Operations
P.T.O. II - Pacific Theater of Operation.name: 取力器II：太平洋戰區
P.T.O. II - Pacific Theater of Operation.original_desc: P.T.O. II: Pacific Theater of Operations is a turn-based strategy game. The second episode of the series, this one builds on the strengths of the first, adding three big new scenarios and seven shorter ones. All battles take place once again during the Second World War conflict and more precisely in the Pacific Ocean. As in the previous episode, you will have to manage your entire army and annihilate the enemy forces. Note that once again, you can play with a second player.
P.T.O. II - Pacific Theater of Operation.desc: 取力器II：太平洋戰區是一款回合製策略遊戲。該系列的第二集建立在第一集的基礎上，添加了三個大型新場景和七個較短的場景。所有戰鬥都再次發生在第二次世界大戰期間，更確切地說是在太平洋。和上一集一樣，你必須管理你的整個軍隊並殲滅敵軍。請再次注意，您可以與第二個玩家一起玩。

Phantom 2040 (USA).name: 幻影2040
Phantom 2040 (USA).original_desc:
The cartoon mini-series: Phantom 2040, right here. It is the aforementioned year, 2040, and the city of Metropia is in total chaos. 

Crime, smuggling and terrorism are escalating. The debase company, Maximum Inc., has invented biotechnology that is threatening to mess about with nature - causing animal extinction and ecosystem adulteration. Evil company owner, Rebicca Madison, would like to rule Metropia and the world.

In comes Kit Walker, the 24th Phantom, following the proud but secret footsteps of his ancestors. This 18 year old has to fight his way to get things right, or end trying.

The game has many twist and turns in its plot, and a multitude of endings.
Phantom 2040 (USA).desc:
卡通迷你係列：幻影 2040，就在這裡。這是前面提到的 2040 年，Metropia 市陷入了徹底的混亂。

犯罪、走私和恐怖主義不斷升級。這家卑鄙的公司Maximum Inc.發明了可能擾亂自然的生物技術，導致動物滅絕和生態系統污染。邪惡的公司老闆麗比卡·麥迪遜想要統治 Metropia 和世界。

第 24 代幻影基特·沃克 (Kit Walker) 追隨其祖先驕傲而秘密的腳步，登場。這位 18 歲的年輕人必須努力奮鬥才能把事情做好，否則就結束嘗試。

遊戲的劇情有很多曲折，結局也有很多。

Brain Lord (USA).name: 大腦領主
Brain Lord (USA).original_desc:
In "Brain Lord", you play a young traveler and warrior who is searching for his long lost father. Long ago, when you were a mere child, your father told you about the great legacy of your village. Once your people were Dragon Warriors, who could control and fly on dragons. But the dragons had disappeared, and your father was determined to find the legendary Tower of Light, where, according to rumors, the last dragons might be hiding. You father went to search the Tower of Light and never came back. Years have passed, and now you finally found the Tower of Light. But your adventure doesn't end there, as you had thought - it begins there...

"Brain Lord" is an action RPG with a heavy emphasis on dungeon exploring. You fight enemies in real time, using various weapons with different ranges - swords, axes, etc. You can equip different kinds of armor and shields. On your quest you will find magical jades that summon fairies who would fight at your side. The fairies have special attacks and level up after fighting just like you, but are controlled by the AI. There are also puzzles to solve in the dungeons, and the hero has the ability to jump.
Brain Lord (USA).desc:
在《大腦領主》中，你扮演一位年輕的旅行者和戰士，正在尋找失散多年的父親。很久以前，當你還是個孩子的時候，你的父親告訴你關於你的村莊的偉大遺產。曾經你的人民是龍戰士，他們可以控制和騎龍飛行。但龍已經消失了，你的父親決心找到傳說中的光之塔，據傳言，最後的龍可能藏身在那裡。你父親去尋找光之塔就再也沒有回來。多年過去了，現在你終於找到了光之塔。但你的冒險並沒有像你想像的那樣結束——它從那裡開始......

《Brain Lord》是一款注重地下城探索的動作角色扮演遊戲。你實時與敵人戰鬥，使用不同射程的各種武器——劍、斧頭等。你可以裝備不同種類的盔甲和盾牌。在你的探索中，你會發現神奇的玉石，召喚出與你並肩作戰的仙女。仙女們和你一樣有特殊的攻擊和戰鬥後升級，但由人工智能控制。地牢裡也有謎題需要解決，英雄有跳躍的能力。

DonkeyKongClassic (Shiru).name: 經典金剛
DonkeyKongClassic (Shiru).original_desc: What's more fun than a barrel of monkeys? A Donkey Kong double feature! In DONKEY KONG you'll duck barrel bombs and flaming fireballs as you help Mario save his girlfriend Pauline from the clutches of Donkey Kong. In DONKEY KONG JR., you'll join forces with these madcap monkeys to help Donkey Kong Jr. rescue his father from Mario's prison. Are you ready for laughter? You'd better be. Because this double dose of monkey business will have you rolling in the aisles!
DonkeyKongClassic (Shiru).desc: 還有什麼比一桶猴子更有趣的呢？大金剛雙重功能！在《大金剛》中，你將躲避桶裝炸彈和燃燒的火球，幫助馬里奧從大金剛手中救出他的女朋友寶琳。在《大金剛》中，你將與這些瘋狂的猴子聯手，幫助小金剛從馬里奧監獄中營救他的父親。你準備好歡笑了嗎？你最好是這樣。因為這雙倍的猴子生意會讓你在過道上打滾！

Earthworm Jim (USA).name: 蚯蚓吉姆
Earthworm Jim (USA).original_desc:
A crow is chasing a worm named Jim while in outer space Psy-Crow is chasing a renegade ship. The ship's captain has stolen an ultra-high-tech-indestructible-super-space-cyber-suit and Queen Slug-for-a-Butt has ordered Psy-Crow to get it, since it can make her more beautiful than Princess-What's-Her-Name. Psy-Crow blasts the captain and the suit falls to Planet Earth.

Back on earth Jim wonders if he is finally safe when an ultra-high-tech-indestructible-super-space-cyber-suit lands on him. Luckily Jim rests in the neck ring of the suit. Then the space particles begin interacting with Jim, causing a light-speed evolution. Jim soon realizes he is in control of the suit.

Jim overhears the Queen's plans for the suit and decides to meet this Princess...
Earthworm Jim (USA).desc:
一隻烏鴉正在追逐一隻名叫吉姆的蠕蟲，而在外太空，心靈烏鴉正在追逐一艘叛變的飛船。船長偷了一套超高科技堅不可摧的超級太空網絡套裝，鼻涕蟲女王命令精神烏鴉去拿它，因為它可以讓她比“什麼名字的公主”更美麗。精神病烏鴉炸毀了船長，套裝落到了地球上。

回到地球後，吉姆想知道當超高科技堅不可摧的超級太空網絡服降落在他身上時，他是否終於安全了。幸運的是，吉姆靠在套裝的頸環上。然後空間粒子開始與吉姆相互作用，引起光速演化。吉姆很快意識到他掌控著這件衣服。

吉姆無意中聽到了女王的套裝計劃，並決定與這位公主見面……

Super Mario RPG - Legend of the Seven St.key: Super Mario RPG - Legend of the Seven Stars (USA)
Super Mario RPG - Legend of the Seven St.original_name: Super Mario RPG : Legend of the Seven Stars
Super Mario RPG - Legend of the Seven St.name: 超級馬里奧角色扮演遊戲：七星傳奇
Super Mario RPG - Legend of the Seven St.original_desc:
Super Mario RPG is a console RPG starring none other than Nintendo's popular character Mario. This game starts off like almost every other Mario game, with Bowser kidnapping Princess Toadstool. However, when Mario goes to Bowser's Keep to save her, a giant sword made by the evil Smithy crashes into the castle and sends Mario, the Princess, and Bowser flying to separate parts of the world.

The game plays much like a traditional RPG: Mario and the members of his party gain experience points by defeating enemies. These experience points can increase the team's maximum number of hit points and flower points (magic points). The battles are also turn-based, but this time there are timed attacks and defenses. Timed attacks allow you to inflict more harm than normal to an enemy. Timed defenses, on the other hand, allow an enemy to inflict less harm than normal. You are only allowed to have three out of five team members on your party at a time. Mario is always in your party, regardless. Your team members can also purchase more weapons and abilities, along with better armor.
Super Mario RPG - Legend of the Seven St.desc:
超級馬里奧角色扮演遊戲是一款主機角色扮演遊戲，主角正是任天堂的熱門角色馬里奧。這款遊戲的開頭與幾乎所有其他馬里奧遊戲一樣，都是鮑澤綁架了傘菌公主。然而，當馬里奧前往庫巴城堡拯救她時，邪惡鐵匠所製造的一把巨劍撞入城堡，將馬里奧、公主和庫巴飛到世界不同的地方。

該遊戲的玩法很像傳統的角色扮演遊戲：馬里奧和他的隊伍成員通過擊敗敵人來獲得經驗值。這些經驗值可以增加隊伍的最大生命值和花點（魔法點）。戰鬥也是回合製的，不過這次有定時攻擊和防禦。定時攻擊可以讓你對敵人造成比平常更多的傷害。另一方面，定時防禦可以讓敵人造成比平常更少的傷害。您的隊伍中一次只能有五分之三的團隊成員。無論如何，馬里奧總是在你的隊伍中。您的團隊成員還可以購買更多武器和能力，以及更好的盔甲。

Pinocchio (USA).name: 匹諾曹
Pinocchio (USA).original_desc:
Journey through as Geppetto, the carpenter's live wooden puppet, Pinocchio, as he did in his Disney animated film - which itself was based on a children's novel.

Have Pinocchio run, jump and twist-kick through all the familiar places, including the inside of a whale, and do good deeds enough to become the real human boy he's always wanted to be.

A standard Disney platformer.
Pinocchio (USA).desc:
扮演格培多（Geppetto），木匠的活木偶匹諾曹（Pinocchio），就像他在迪士尼動畫電影中所做的那樣——該電影本身是根據兒童小說改編的。

讓匹諾曹在所有熟悉的地方奔跑、跳躍和扭踢，包括鯨魚的內部，並做好足夠的事，成為他一直想成為的真正的人類男孩。

標準迪士尼平台遊戲。

SWAT Kats - The Radical Squadron (USA).name: 特警凱特：激進中隊
SWAT Kats - The Radical Squadron (USA).original_desc:
S.W.A.T Kats is a game based on the short lived cartoon series S.W.A.T Kats: Radical Squadron. The series would only last for 2 seasons but built a sort of cult following afterwards.

The Swat Kats are a trio of mechanics by day, but secretly also a group of superheroes defending their home, MegaKat city, from creatures and evil villians. Swat Kats is essentially a side-scrolling action game. You start off using T-Bone and Razor and guide them through 5 different worlds of action packed excitement. Game levels are based on different episodes of the show. As you progress through the game you can increase your weapon levels and gain new weapons. Mode 7 graphics are featured in some parts of the game. A unique feature to the game is the ability to start on different levels.
SWAT Kats - The Radical Squadron (USA).desc:
S.W.A.T Kats 是一款基於短命卡通系列 S.W.A.T Kats: Radical Squadron 的遊戲。該劇只持續了兩季，但之後卻贏得了一批狂熱的追隨者。

Swat Kats 白天是機械師三人組，但暗地裡也是一群超級英雄，保衛他們的家園 MegaKat 城市，免受生物和邪惡惡棍的侵害。Swat Kats 本質上是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲。您首先使用 T-Bone 和 Razor，引導他們穿越 5 個充滿刺激動作的不同世界。遊戲級別基於節目的不同劇集。隨著遊戲的進展，您可以提高武器等級並獲得新武器。遊戲的某些部分採用模式 7 圖形。該遊戲的一個獨特功能是能夠從不同的級別開始。

Mega Man X (USA) (Rev 1).name: 洛克人2 威利博士之謎
Mega Man X (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: Mega Man X is a robot designed by Dr. Light to choose his own path in life. Years after he is created, Dr. Cain finds X and mimics his design to create a race of such robots called reploids. When the sigma virus infects these reploids, causing them to commit acts of evil, it is up to Mega Man X and his partner Zero (who is quite powerful, contrary to what his name implies) to stop it.
Mega Man X (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 洛克人X是光博士設計的一款機器人，用於選擇自己的人生道路。在他被創造多年後，凱恩博士找到了 X 並模仿了他的設計，創造了一個名為 reloids 的機器人種族。當西格瑪病毒感染這些複製體並導致他們做出邪惡行為時，洛克人X和他的搭檔零（他非常強大，與他的名字所暗示的相反）需要阻止它。

Biker Mice from Mars (USA).name: 來自火星的騎自行車的老鼠
Biker Mice from Mars (USA).original_desc: Based on the cartoon of the same name, Biker Mice From Mars is a racing game very similar to Rock 'n Roll Racing. Races are shown from an isometric perspective and you can choose between six different drivers that differ in acceleration, top speed and grip. During the races, you can use weapons such as mines or missiles to slow down your opponents and pick up random bonuses ranging from money to making you temporarily invincible. After each race, you will receive money that can be spent on better tires, armor, engines or weapons. There's also a two-player mode that lets you play the main race with a friend or compete in a one on one race.
Biker Mice from Mars (USA).desc: 《Biker Mice From Mars》改編自同名漫畫，是一款與搖滾賽車非常相似的賽車遊戲。比賽以等距視角展示，您可以在加速度、最高速度和抓地力方面不同的六位不同車手中進行選擇。在比賽期間，你可以使用地雷或導彈等武器來減慢對手的速度，並獲得隨機獎勵，從金錢到讓你暫時無敵。每場比賽結束後，您都會收到金錢，可以用來購買更好的輪胎、裝甲、發動機或武器。還有兩人模式，可讓您與朋友一起參加主要比賽或參加一對一比賽。

SimCity (USA).name: 模擬城市
SimCity (USA).original_desc:
SimCity sets you as the mayor of a new municipality, with the responsibility of building and maintaining a place where citizens can move to and work and be happy. The first task is to place essentials such as housing, transport links, schools, factories and shops. There are 50 types of these, allowing for homes of all standards and different types of businesses. Make sure to consider which sites are effective for which tasks. Some power sources pollute, others don't but are more expensive. Taxes must be raised to ensure an income, and then portions allocated to public services such as policing and roads. Earthquakes, floods and fires are all emergency situations that must be dealt to contain any damage.

Successful mayoring will cause the small village to grow into a town, then a city and finally a metropolis. As the city's size grows so do it's needs. Commercial buildings may suddenly find that they need an airport to expand trade, or housing may find itself changing rapidly as vast amounts of people come and leave.

The game also includes 8 pre-defined time-limited scenarios, with specific challenges and targets. The environment varies in each game (especially if you have the Terrain Editor add on), and this should affect your choices.
SimCity (USA).desc:
《模擬城市》讓你成為一個新市鎮的市長，負責建設和維護一個讓市民可以搬遷、工作和快樂的地方。第一項任務是安置住房、交通、學校、工廠和商店等必需品。其中有 50 種類型，可容納各種標準的住宅和不同類型的企業。請務必考慮哪些站點對哪些任務有效。有些電源會造成污染，有些則不會，但價格更高。必須提高稅收以確保收入，然後將部分稅收分配給治安和道路等公共服務。地震、洪水和火災都是必須處理以遏制損失的緊急情況。

成功的市長將使小村莊發展成為城鎮，然後是城市，最後成為大都市。隨著城市規模的擴大，其需求也在增加。商業建築可能會突然發現它們需要一個機場來擴大貿易，或者住房可能會發現隨著大量人的進出而迅速發生變化。

遊戲還包括 8 個預先定義的限時場景，以及特定的挑戰和目標。每個遊戲的環境都不同（特別是如果您添加了地形編輯器），這應該會影響您的選擇。

Faceball 2000 (USA).name: 面球2000
Faceball 2000 (USA).original_desc:
Faceball 2000 is a first-person shooter.  You control a H.A.P.P.Y.F.A.C.E., or Holographically Assisted Physical Pattern Yielded For Active Computerized Embarkation. The graphics consist of flat shaded corridors. Enemies are all simple geometric shapes with smiley faces on them. Although the graphics are simple, they allow for full freedom of movement, not unlike Wolfenstein 3-D.

There are two modes of play. First there is a single player mode in which your goal is to find the exit to each level.  There are 70 mazes in this mode. The second mode is the multiplayer arena. For the Game Boy: up to 4 Game Boys can be linked together in this mode.
Faceball 2000 (USA).desc:
Faceball 2000 是一款第一人稱射擊遊戲。您可以控制 H.A.P.P.Y.F.A.C.E.，或用於主動計算機化登船的全息輔助物理圖案。圖形由平坦的陰影走廊組成。敵人都是簡單的幾何形狀，上面有笑臉。雖然圖形很簡單，但它們允許完全自由的移動，就像德軍總部 3-D 一樣。

有兩種遊戲模式。首先有一個單人遊戲模式，您的目標是找到每個級別的出口。該模式中有70個迷宮。第二種模式是多人競技場。對於 Game Boy：在此模式下最多可以將 4 個 Game Boy 連接在一起。

Star Fox 2 (USA, Europe).name: 星際火狐2
Star Fox 2 (USA, Europe).original_desc: After his defeat in the original Star Fox, the game's antagonist, Andross, returns to the Lylat system and launches an all-out attack against Corneria, using his new fleet of battleships and giant missiles launched from hidden bases to destroy the planet. General Pepper again calls upon the Star Fox team for help. Armed with new custom Arwings, a Mothership, and two new recruits (Miyu, a lynx, and Fay, a dog), the Star Fox team sets out to defend Corneria by destroying Andross's forces before they can inflict critical damage on the planet. Along the way, Star Fox must also combat giant boss enemies, bases on planets throughout the Lylat system, members of the Star Wolf team and finally Andross himself.
Star Fox 2 (USA, Europe).desc: 在原版《星際火狐》中失敗後，遊戲中的反派安德羅斯返回萊拉特星系，利用他的新戰列艦艦隊和從隱藏基地發射的巨型導彈對科尼亞發動全面攻擊，摧毀了這顆星球。佩珀將軍再次向星際火狐小隊尋求幫助。配備了新定制的 Arwings、一艘母艦和兩名新兵（山貓 Miyu 和狗 Fay），星際火狐小隊開始保衛科尼亞，在安德羅斯的軍隊對地球造成嚴重損害之前消滅他們。一路上，星狐還必須與巨大的頭目敵人、遍布萊拉特星系的行星基地、星狼團隊的成員以及最後安德羅斯本人作戰。

New Horizons (USA).name: 神秘海域2:新地平線
New Horizons (USA).original_desc: In the first Uncharted Waters game, it was the 15th century and the New World was discovered. Now in New Horizons, it is the early 16th century and the age of exploration and sea trade is underway. Players choose from any one of six adventurers (scenarios), each with their own distinctive but intertwining plot, to embark on a quest of sailing, seamanship and exploration.
New Horizons (USA).desc: 在第一款《神秘海域》遊戲中，時間是 15 世紀，新大陸被發現。現在，新視野號正值 16 世紀初，探險和海上貿易的時代正在進行。玩家可以從六名冒險家（場景）中選擇任意一位，每個冒險家都有自己獨特但相互交織的情節，開始航海、航海和探索的旅程。

Paladin's Quest (USA).name: 聖騎士的任務
Paladin's Quest (USA).original_desc: Paladin's Quest throws you into the mysterious world of Lennus, whose two continents have lived in tension since an ancient disaster. Thirteen years after the event, you grow up as Chezni in a magic school built upon the ruins of a sealed evil. You want to master the elements – but one reckless dare changes everything. You enter the forbidden tower, awaken the machine Dal Gren after ten thousand years of sleep and unleash a force far beyond your control. With the power-hungry Zaygos already ruling the southern continent, you quickly realize that your choice may shift the fate of the entire world – and that you're the one who now has to deal with the consequences.
Paladin's Quest (USA).desc: 《聖騎士的任務》將你帶入倫努斯的神秘世界，自一場遠古災難以來，這片大陸的兩個大陸一直處於緊張狀態。事件發生十三年後，你以切茲尼的身份在一所建立在被封印的邪惡廢墟上的魔法學校中長大。您想要掌握各種元素，但一次魯莽的冒險會改變一切。你進入禁塔，喚醒沉睡一萬年的機器達爾格倫，並釋放出遠遠超出你控制的力量。由於渴望權力的紮伊戈斯已經統治了南部大陸，你很快意識到你的選擇可能會改變整個世界的命運 - 而你現在必須承擔後果。

Kid Klown in Crazy Chase (USA).name: 瘋狂追逐中的小丑小孩
Kid Klown in Crazy Chase (USA).original_desc:
You play as a clown, trying to finish the level while avoiding Blackjack's booby traps.

To successfully finish each level, you'll need to beat the fuse. What is the fuse? At the start of each level, there is a bomb fuse at the same location as you are, you must get to the end of the level faster than it does in order to prevent the big bomb from going off. In addition, you'll also need to find all 4 card symbols before you can finish. If you don't, you'll get to go to the beginning of the level and have another try.
Kid Klown in Crazy Chase (USA).desc:
你扮演一個小丑，試圖完成關卡，同時避開二十一點的陷阱。

要成功完成每個關卡，您需要擊中導火線。保險絲是什麼？在每個關卡開始時，與你相同的位置都有一個炸彈引信，你必須比它更快地到達關卡末尾，以防止大炸彈爆炸。此外，您還需要找到所有 4 個卡片符號才能完成。如果不這樣做，您將可以轉到關卡的開頭並再次嘗試。

Putty Squad (Europe).name: 膩子小隊
Putty Squad (Europe).original_desc:
In this sequel to Putty, the Wizard's peoples have invaded Putty land, and it's up to you to head to the Wizard city of Klud and free your many POWs. The gameplay has less of a puzzle element than the original, and is more of a standard platform game - to whatever extent a game in which you can become an all-conquering Terminator Putty, must face pups throwing grenades at you, and can use Uncle Ted to play a tune to distract enemies can be seen as a 'standard' example of anything.

You take control of the same amorphous blob as before, which has the ability to 'stretch' left and right (using this as a weapon which kills on contact) and to stretch upwards to make jumping easier. He can also explode himself and absorb other objects, even becoming them physically to gain an advantage.

There are stars littered around the level, and collecting these upgrades Putty's abilities, starting with a super punch for 10 stars, going up to the Terminator ability for 40. 

The pups from the previous game are no longer on your side, and are out to get you. These have all manner of abilities - shooting mortar bombs at you, paradropping towards you, and even flying a helicopter.
Putty Squad (Europe).desc:
在《普蒂》的這部續集中，巫師的人民入侵了普蒂的土地，你需要前往巫師城市克魯德並釋放你的許多戰俘。遊戲玩法比原版少了一些解謎元素，更像是一個標準的平台遊戲——無論在何種程度上，一款你能成為無堅不摧的終結者膩子、必鬚麵對向你投擲手榴彈的小狗、能用泰德叔叔演奏一首曲子來分散敵人注意力的遊戲，都可以被視為任何事物的“標準”例子。

你像以前一樣控制著同樣的無定形斑點，它有能力向左和向右“拉伸”（使用它作為接觸時殺死的武器）並向上拉伸以使跳躍更容易。他還可以爆炸自己並吸收其他物體，甚至在身體上變成它們以獲得優勢。

關卡周圍散佈著星星，收集這些星星可以升級 Putty 的能力，從 10 顆星的超級拳頭開始，到 40 顆星的終結者能力。

上一場比賽中的小狗不再站在你這邊，而是出來攻擊你。它們擁有各種各樣的能力——向你發射迫擊砲彈、向你空降，甚至駕駛直升機。

Harvest Moon (USA).name: 豐收之月
Harvest Moon (USA).original_desc:
Ever wanted to live life on a farm, with nothing but the sun, the fresh scent of your crops, the muddy fields underneath, and cows and chickens to keep you company? Well, you're in luck, because you have just inherited your grandfather's ranch, but it's in a terrible state of disrepair! What ever can you do?

You're going to do like the farmers do; roll up your sleeves, get down in that dirt, fix that farm up and make it the best farm anyone has ever seen! It sure gets lonely on that farm...but not to worry! There are plenty of girls in the village, and if you treat them right and manage to win their love, you've got yourself a wife!

So let's go, farmer! You've got 2 years to make a name for yourself on that farm! Work hard, and the rewards will be great!
Harvest Moon (USA).desc:
您是否曾經想過在農場生活，除了陽光、莊稼的新鮮香味、下面泥濘的田地以及牛和雞的陪伴之外，什麼都沒有？好吧，你很幸運，因為你剛剛繼承了你祖父的牧場，但它年久失修，狀況嚴重！你能做什麼？

你要像農民那樣做；捲起袖子，深入泥土，修復農場，使其成為任何人見過的最好的農場！那個農場肯定會很孤獨……但不用擔心！村子里女孩子很多，只要你善待她們，贏得她們的芳心，你就有老婆了！

所以，我們走吧，農民！你有兩年的時間在那個農場里揚名立萬！努力工作，回報將會是豐厚的！

Super Adventure Island (USA).name: 超級冒險島
Super Adventure Island (USA).original_desc:
You are a caveman named Master Higgins. You have a beautiful girlfriend, and you like spending time sunbathing together on high trees and other places on the tropic island Waku-Waku. But all of a sudden, an evil magician turns your wife into a stone! As you begin to realize what happened, a bird grasps you and throws down somewhere on the island. You have to find your way back and to save your girl from the grim reality of petrification...

This emotional drama turns out to be a rather simple platform game. The short, linear levels are all timed, so you have to hurry up and not to get delayed by the many treasures you might find on your way. You will have a weapon, your old trusty boomerang, which you will be able to upgrade during the game. After a series on levels, you will be invited to a boss battle. The sooner you complete a level, the more bonus points you get.
Super Adventure Island (USA).desc:
你是一個名叫希金斯大師的穴居人。你有一個漂亮的女朋友，並且喜歡在熱帶島嶼 Waku-Waku 的高樹上和其他地方一起享受日光浴。但突然間，一個邪惡的魔術師把你的妻子變成了一塊石頭！當你開始意識到發生了什麼時，一隻鳥抓住了你並扔到了島上的某個地方。你必須找到回來的路，並將你的女孩從石化的殘酷現實中拯救出來......

這部情感劇其實是一個相當簡單的平台遊戲。簡短的線性關卡都是定時的，所以你必須快點，不要被途中可能發現的許多寶藏耽誤了時間。你將擁有一件武器，你的舊的值得信賴的迴旋鏢，你可以在遊戲過程中升級它。經過一系列關卡後，您將被邀請參加一場 Boss 戰。越早完成關卡，獲得的獎勵積分就越多。

Ogre Battle - The March of the Black Que.key: Ogre Battle - The March of the Black Queen (USA)
Ogre Battle - The March of the Black Que.original_name: Ogre Battle : The March of the Black Queen
Ogre Battle - The March of the Black Que.name: 食人魔之戰：黑皇后的進行曲
Ogre Battle - The March of the Black Que.original_desc: Lead the rebellion and lead your army to reclaim your land from the evil Zenobian Empire in this real-time strategy game. Free towns and collect items and tarot cards to increase your strength, as well as recruit allies to join you in your crusade. But when you finally win the day, will you be a benevolent leader, or an become an evil despot yourself? You must decide.
Ogre Battle - The March of the Black Que.desc: 在這款即時戰略遊戲中，領導叛亂並帶領你的軍隊從邪惡的芝諾比安帝國手中奪回你的土地。釋放城鎮並收集物品和塔羅牌以增強你的力量，並招募盟友加入你的遠征。但當你最終贏得勝利時，你會成為一個仁慈的領導者，還是成為一個邪惡的暴君？你必須做出決定。

Super Buster Bros. (USA) (Rev 1).name: 超級巴斯特兄弟
Super Buster Bros. (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: The world has come under attack and it is up to you as a Super Buster Brother to ensure that the world is cleared of all bouncing bubbles. Every time you shoot a bubble, it breaks into two smaller ones. But be careful! If a bubble touches you, you're history! Whether you play in the Panic Mode or the Tour Mode, the challenges will keep you on your toes! In the Panic Mode, bubbles large and small pour down for 99 levels of exhilaration. In the Tour Mode, you will travel the world in search of new and explosive bubble bottles. Enjoy the action, but be alert! As you progress through the levels, the game becomes more exciting as the bubbles bounce faster and faster.
Super Buster Bros. (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 世界已受到攻擊，作為超級剋星兄弟的你有責任確保世界上所有彈跳的氣泡被清除。每次你射出一個泡泡，它就會分裂成兩個更小的泡泡。但要小心！如果一個氣泡碰到了你，你就成為歷史了！無論您玩的是恐慌模式還是巡迴模式，挑戰都會讓您保持警惕！在恐慌模式下，大大小小的氣泡傾瀉而下，帶來 99 級的興奮感。在遊覽模式中，您將環遊世界尋找新的爆炸性氣泡瓶。享受這個動作，但要保持警惕！隨著您在關卡中不斷前進，氣泡彈跳得越來越快，遊戲也會變得更加刺激。

Dragon View (USA).name: 龍觀
Dragon View (USA).original_desc:
Solve puzzles and fight monsters in order to save your love.  She's been taken by Giza an evil sorcerror bent on destroying all life in the world.  You'll journey through different lands in search of clues and powerful items and magic.

This game is a 3D side scroller.  You fight in real time.
Dragon View (USA).desc:
解決謎題並與怪物戰鬥以拯救你的愛情。她被邪惡的巫師吉薩帶走，一心要毀滅世界上的所有生命。你將穿越不同的土地尋找線索、強大的物品和魔法。

該遊戲是一款 3D 橫向捲軸遊戲。你們實時戰鬥。

Yoshi's Cookie (USA).name: 耀西的餅乾
Yoshi's Cookie (USA).original_desc: Yoshi's Cookie is a tile-matching video game in which the player is given a playing field populated with cookies of several types, arranged in a rectangular grid. The main objective of each level is to clear the playing field of all the cookies. The player mixes and matches the cookies such that entire rows or columns consist only of cookies of the same type. The player controls a cursor on the grid that is used to rotate individual lines in a manner similar to a Rubik's Cube. When a single row or column contains all matching cookies, the row is cleared from the grid. The grid grows in size from cookies entering from the top and right sides of the playing field and a game over occurs when the grid overflows. A sixth cookie type, shaped like Yoshi's head, occasionally appears that acts as a wild card, used to help clear lines of any other cookie.
Yoshi's Cookie (USA).desc: Yoshi's Cookie 是一款方塊匹配視頻遊戲，其中玩家將獲得一個充滿多種類型餅乾的遊戲場地，這些餅乾排列成矩形網格。每個級別的主要目標是清除比賽場地上的所有餅乾。玩家混合併匹配餅乾，使得整行或整列僅包含相同類型的餅乾。玩家控製網格上的光標，用於以類似於魔方的方式旋轉各個線。當單個行或列包含所有匹配的 cookie 時，該行將從網格中清除。網格的大小會隨著從比賽場地的頂部和右側進入的餅乾而增大，當網格溢出時，遊戲就結束了。第六種餅乾類型，形狀像耀西的頭，偶爾會出現，充當通配符，用於幫助清除任何其他餅乾的線條。

Dragon Quest V (Japan) (Translated).original_name: Dragon Quest V : Tenkuu no Hanayome
Dragon Quest V (Japan) (Translated).name: D 勇者鬥惡龍 V 天空之花嫁
Dragon Quest V (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
You are the son of the brave warrior, Lord Papas. It appears that your mother died just after giving birth to you, and your father took you on a long journey when you were a little baby, and all you know is that he was searching for something. Now you are six years old, and Lord Papas brings you to your home village. After some time, you learn that His Highness Prince Henry was kidnapped by bandits. Your father attempts to rescue him, and during this action you discover that perhaps your mother is still alive... The game follows the story of Papas' son, and this story is stretched over years, as the hero grows and becomes a man of courage and virtue. During the game, the hero will discover the truth about his mother, and will have to make some crucial decisions, such as which girl to marry (the decisions affect the course of the game and its ending).

"Dragon Quest V" is a party RPG with turn-based combat, and battles viewed from 1st person perspective, just like all its predecessors. Your party roams about the world, fighting random enemies, performing quests, and defeating bosses. The novelty is in the game's unusual story, which spans almost a lifetime of the hero. 

"Dragon Quest V" was not available outside of Japan until 2009, when the DS version was released in the United States.
Dragon Quest V (Japan) (Translated).desc:
你是勇敢的戰士帕帕斯勳爵的兒子。看來你的母親剛生下你就去世了，而你的父親在你還是個小嬰兒的時候就帶著你長途跋涉，你只知道他在尋找什麼。現在你六歲了，帕帕斯勳爵帶你回到你的家鄉。一段時間後，你得知亨利王子殿下被強盜綁架了。你的父親試圖營救他，在這個行動中你發現也許你的母親還活著……遊戲講述了帕帕斯兒子的故事，隨著英雄的成長，成為一個有勇氣和美德的人，這個故事被延伸了很多年。在遊戲中，英雄會發現有關他母親的真相，並必須做出一些關鍵的決定，例如與哪個女孩結婚（這些決定會影響遊戲的進程及其結局）。

《勇者鬥惡龍 V》是一款回合製角色扮演遊戲，與所有前作一樣，以第一人稱視角進行戰鬥。你的隊伍在世界各地漫遊，與隨機的敵人戰鬥，執行任務並擊敗老闆。遊戲的新穎之處在於不尋常的故事，它幾乎涵蓋了英雄的一生。

《勇者鬥惡龍 V》直到 2009 年才在日本以外地區發售，當時 DS 版本在美國發行。

NBA Jam - Tournament Edition (USA).name: NBA Jam 錦標賽版
NBA Jam - Tournament Edition (USA).original_desc: "NBA Jam: Tournament Edition" is a fast-paced two-on-two arcade basketball game featuring players from all NBA teams. There are hardly any rules, no fouls, and spectacular dunks. Players are rated across eight categories, including steals, blocks, and three-pointers. Up to four players can join, each controlling a single athlete. The Tournament Edition expands each team to three players and allows substitutions between quarters. Collisions now cause injuries that lower player stats, making strategic switches essential. New features like "Hot Spots" for bonus points, power-ups for arcade-style advantages, "Juice Mode" for faster gameplay, and "Tournament Mode" for challenging matches with unlockable players add extra excitement.
NBA Jam - Tournament Edition (USA).desc: “NBA Jam：錦標賽版”是一款快節奏的二對二街機籃球遊戲，玩家來自所有 NBA 球隊的球員。幾乎沒有任何規則，沒有犯規，還有精彩的扣籃。球員的評分分為八個類別，包括搶斷、蓋帽和三分球。最多四名玩家可以加入，每人控制一名運動員。錦標賽版將每支球隊擴大到三名球員，並允許在季度之間進行換人。碰撞現在會造成傷害，從而降低玩家的統計數據，因此戰略切換至關重要。新功能包括用於獎勵積分的“熱點”、用於街機風格優勢的能量提升、用於更快遊戲的“果汁模式”以及用於與可解鎖玩家進行具有挑戰性的比賽的“錦標賽模式”，這些都增添了額外的興奮感。

Wizardry V - Heart of the Maelstrom (USA.key: Wizardry V - Heart of the Maelstrom (USA)
Wizardry V - Heart of the Maelstrom (USA.original_name: Wizardry V : Heart of the Maelstrom
Wizardry V - Heart of the Maelstrom (USA.name: 魔法 V : 漩渦之心
Wizardry V - Heart of the Maelstrom (USA.original_desc:
Despite the defeat of Trebor, Werdna, and L'kbreth, dark times once again threaten the kingdom of Llylgamyn.  So once again a party of adventurers must venture forth to vanquish the evil.

Wizardry V represents a complete revision of the gaming system used in the first four installments, with larger mazes, new spells and character classes, and an expanded system for combatting and interacting with creatures.  It is also the first game in the series that allows, but does not require characters imported from a previous scenario.
Wizardry V - Heart of the Maelstrom (USA.desc:
儘管特雷博爾、韋爾德納和勒克布雷斯被擊敗，黑暗時代再次威脅著利爾加明王國。因此，一隊冒險家必須再次冒險戰勝邪惡。

《Wizardry V》代表了前四部分中使用的遊戲系統的完整修訂版，具有更大的迷宮、新的咒語和角色類別，以及用於與生物戰鬥和互動的擴展系統。這也是該系列中第一款允許但不要求從先前場景導入角色的遊戲。

Run Saber (USA).name: 奔跑軍刀
Run Saber (USA).original_desc:
In the year 2998, the brilliant Dr. Bruford is experimenting with genetic structures and radiation. He hopes to create new functions in nature that will remove the pollution from the Earth before it is too late. Unfortunately Dr. Bruford's experiments go wrong and genetic monsters are unleashed upon the world. The only thing that can stop these creatures are Dr. Bruford's previous achievement: Genetically enhanced warriors known as the Run Sabers. Two of the Run Sabers, Sheena and Allen are ready to activate.

Run Saber is a side-scrolling platform game similar in gameplay to Strider. Players assume the role of one or both of the Run Saber characters. Choosing either Sheena with her Ice powers or Allen with his Thunder powers, players must defeat mutant monsters. The Run Sabers can move side to side, jump in the air, attack with a sword, climb along walls or roofs, slide across the ground and drop-kick. Additionally, each character has a special move, which damages everything on the screen with either Ice or Lightning, and which can be activated by collecting orb power-ups. Other power-ups include small health, large health, extra life and a larger sword. Players progress through 5 different levels, often encountering powerful boss and miniboss mutant creatures.
Run Saber (USA).desc:
2998 年，才華橫溢的布魯福德博士正在試驗基因結構和輻射。他希望在自然界中創造新的功能，在為時已晚之前消除地球上的污染。不幸的是，布魯福德博士的實驗出了問題，基因怪物被釋放到世界上。唯一能阻止這些生物的是布魯福德博士之前的成就：被稱為“奔跑軍刀”的基因增強戰士。兩名“奔跑軍刀”希娜和艾倫已準備好啟動。

Run Saber 是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，其玩法與 Strider 類似。玩家扮演一名或兩名 Run Saber 角色。選擇擁有冰之力量的希娜或擁有雷霆力量的艾倫，玩家必須擊敗變异怪物。奔跑軍刀可以左右移動、空中跳躍、用劍攻擊、沿著牆壁或屋頂攀爬、在地面上滑行以及踢腿。此外，每個角色都有一個特殊的動作，可以用冰或閃電損壞屏幕上的所有東西，並且可以通過收集球體能量來激活。其他能力提升包括小生命值、大生命值、額外生命和更大的劍。玩家通過 5 個不同的關卡，經常會遇到強大的 Boss 和小 Boss 變異生物。

Firemen, The (Europe) (En,Fr,De).name: 消防員
Firemen, The (Europe) (En,Fr,De).original_desc:
You play as a firefighter, together, you and your squad are sent in into a big building which is on fire.
Your mission is to rescue the people inside the building and also put out the fire.

Use your watercannon to put out fire or use your waterbomb to put out bigger flames.

Be sure to listen to every word your squadmate tells you, or you may be toast.
Firemen, The (Europe) (En,Fr,De).desc:
你扮演一名消防員，你和你的小隊一起被派往一座著火的大樓。
你的任務是營救大樓內的人並撲滅大火。

使用水砲來滅火或使用水彈來撲滅更大的火焰。

一定要聽清你的隊友告訴你的每一句話，否則你可能會完蛋。

Rocky Rodent (USA).name: 洛基囓齒動物
Rocky Rodent (USA).original_desc:
Mafia member Don Garcia has kidnapped Melody, the daughter of the owner of the Rose Restaurant. Rocky Rodent agrees to rescue her in exchange for an all-you-can-eat meal.

In order to find Melody, Rocky Rodent has to complete a number of fast-paced, side-scrolling platformer levels. While he can also defeat enemies by jumping on them, his most important weapons are four different hairstyles: His first hairstyle allows him to skewer and throw his enemies, destroy porous blocks as well as cling to and jump up certain ledges. A mohawk can be thrown at enemies like a boomerang or thrown into certain walls, from where it serves as a trampoline. Braids can be used as a grappling hook and a corkscrew-like haircut lets him bounce on his head to jump higher than normal. When Rocky is attacked by an enemy, he looses his current haircut. If he is attacked while not wearing any special haircut, he looses a live.
Rocky Rodent (USA).desc:
黑手黨成員唐·加西亞綁架了玫瑰餐廳老闆的女兒梅洛迪。洛基·囓齒動物同意營救她，以換取一頓無限量的大餐。

為了找到 Melody，Rocky Rodent 必須完成多個快節奏的橫向捲軸平台遊戲關卡。雖然他也可以通過跳到敵人身上來擊敗敵人，但他最重要的武器是四種不同的髮型：他的第一種髮型可以讓他刺穿和投擲敵人，摧毀多孔方塊以及抓住並跳上某些壁架。莫霍克髮型可以像迴旋鏢一樣扔向敵人，也可以扔到某些牆壁上，作為蹦床。辮子可以用作抓鉤，螺旋狀的髮型可以讓他在頭上彈跳，比平常跳得更高。當洛基受到敵人攻擊時，他會失去當前的髮型。如果他在沒有留任何特殊髮型的情況下受到攻擊，他就會失去生命。

Castlevania - Dracula X (USA).name: 惡魔城 : 德古拉 X
Castlevania - Dracula X (USA).original_desc:
In Transylvania, people lived in fear of the evil Count Dracula. The ultimate embodiment of evil, Dracula swept his dark hand over the land, making the people mere sheep for his thirst for blood. But when a young woman named Sonia Belmont came forth to confront him, he made a horrible mistake: he underestimated her. Thus, the battle between Dracula and the Belmont family began.

Now, in the late 18th century, the battle still rages on...

Dracula has been resurrected by a cult of black magic to cast his shadow of fear and terror over the land once again. But now, Dracula takes his fight to those the Belmonts are close to. He kidnaps two girls, Annette and Maria Renard, to bring forth the latest Belmont, so that he may destroy the bloodline for good.

Richter Belmont, Annette's lover, has no choice now, but to take up the legendary Vampire Killer and follow his destiny: to battle Dracula and save Annette and Maria.
Castlevania - Dracula X (USA).desc:
在特蘭西瓦尼亞，人們生活在對邪惡德古拉伯爵的恐懼之中。德古拉是邪惡的終極化身，他用黑暗之手橫掃大地，讓人們成為他嗜血的羔羊。但當一位名叫索尼婭·貝爾蒙特的年輕女子站出來與他對質時，他犯了一個可怕的錯誤：他低估了她。於是，德古拉與貝爾蒙特家族的戰鬥開始了。

如今，18世紀末，戰爭仍在繼續……

德古拉被黑魔法邪教復活，再次將恐懼和恐懼的陰影籠罩在這片土地上。但現在，德古拉向貝爾蒙特家族的親朋好友發起了戰鬥。他綁架了兩個女孩安妮特和瑪麗亞·雷納德，以生出最新的貝爾蒙特，這樣他就可以永遠摧毀血統。

安妮特的情人里克特·貝爾蒙特現在別無選擇，只能接受傳說中的吸血鬼殺手並追隨他的命運：與德古拉戰鬥並拯救安妮特和瑪麗亞。

Super Ninja Boy (USA).name: 超級忍者男孩
Super Ninja Boy (USA).original_desc:
One day a spaceship came down from the heavens and into the skies of Chinaland. It began broadcasting an image of peace. Soon Emperor Chin was holding a peace conference with the space ship's leader, Rub-A-Doc. Rub-A-Doc visited with some of the other places in the world before departing to the heavens and leaving the world. All seemed peaceful however there seems to be trouble starting up, strange monsters have been seen throughout Chinaland. Could the increase in monsters be somehow related to the recent visit from Rub-A-Doc? The ninja masters of Mount Edin, Jack and Ryu are sent to investigate...

Super Ninja Boy is an action RPG for one or two players. In a two player game, each player controls either Jack or Ryu. In a one player game, only Jack appears.A second player may join at any time by visiting a convenience store.

As mentioned, this game is an RPG and contains familiar RPG elements such as equipping differing kinds of weapons, equipment and gaining levels. The Ninja Boys are treated as a single entity and so these statistics are shared between Jack and Ryu with equal values. Battles with the enemy, either through random encounters or visible on the map is where the action starts. The characters enter a side-scrolling 'battle mode' where they may jump, fight, use their special techniques, items and spells... as well as activate various 'bonuses' on the battlefield by breaking open the bonus boxes. A battle is over and experience points awarded when a pre-determined number of enemies are defeated or the Ninja Boys are defeated.

When bosses are encountered, the gameplay changes to a turn-based system. Each turn, commands are given to Jack & Ryu, which include usage of special items and skills accuired during the game, who then perform actions based on those commands. The enemy's turn takes place the same way. The battle ends when one side of the conflict runs out of hitpoints.
Super Ninja Boy (USA).desc:
有一天，一艘宇宙飛船從天而降，飛向中國大陸的上空。它開始傳播和平的形象。不久，金皇帝與宇宙飛船的領袖魯布-阿-多克舉行了一次和平會議。Rub-A-Doc 在前往天堂並離開人世之前訪問了世界上的其他一些地方。一切看似平靜，但似乎開始出現麻煩，整個中國大陸都出現了奇怪的怪物。怪物的增加是否與最近 Rub-A-Doc 的來訪有關？愛丁山的忍者大師傑克和龍被派去調查……

Super Ninja Boy 是一款適合一到兩名玩家的動作角色扮演遊戲。在兩人遊戲中，每個玩家控制 Jack 或 Ryu。在單人遊戲中，只有傑克出現。第二名玩家可以通過訪問便利店隨時加入。

如前所述，該遊戲是一款角色扮演遊戲，包含熟悉的角色扮演遊戲元素，例如裝備不同種類的武器、裝備和提升等級。忍者男孩被視為一個實體，因此這些統計數據在 Jack 和 Ryu 之間共享，具有相同的值。與敵人的戰鬥，無論是通過隨機遭遇還是在地圖上可見都是行動開始的地方。角色進入橫向捲軸“戰鬥模式”，他們可以跳躍、戰鬥、使用他們的特殊技術、物品和咒語……以及通過打開獎勵箱來激活戰場上的各種“獎勵”。當擊敗預定數量的敵人或擊敗忍者男孩時，戰鬥結束，並獲得經驗值。

當遇到頭目時，遊戲玩法將變為回合製。每個回合，都會向 Jack 和 Ryu 發出命令，其中包括使用遊戲中獲得的特殊物品和技能，然後他們根據這些命令執行操作。敵人的回合也以同樣的方式進行。當衝突一方生命值耗盡時，戰鬥結束。

First Samurai (USA).name: 第一武士
First Samurai (USA).original_desc:
"The Demon King descends from his mountain domain to you, the First Samurai and your master. Defenceless against the Demon's magic, you succumb to his powers, leaving the your Master to fight the Demon King alone. Your master falls in combat, dying. But, with his last breath, he summons the Wizard Mage. The Demon King fearing defeat, escapes to the future. Tormented, the young samurai seeks the teachings of the Wizard Mage in the ways of magic. Boiled with revenge and armed with a magical sword, the young samurai follows the Demon King into the future and the unknown..."

The First Samurai is a platform action game very much similar to other platform games, but with a medieval oriental touch to it in addition to various unique features.

Arriving in the new unknown land, you are defenceless hence your fists and kicks. But as you journey forth, you'll find your trusty magical sword as well as throwing weapons such as knives and axes. With your martial art skills, your enemy best beware with those sudden moves that may prove fatal!

The First Samurai offers a wide array of weapons, special items and other objects. Combat is usually melee, either relying on your punch or kicks or using the magical sword to slash some pretty skillful blows in whatever direction possible.

Monsters are forever regenerating but food for health is plentiful. It actually takes an effort to be killed...
First Samurai (USA).desc:
“魔王從他的山地降臨到你，第一武士和你的主人身邊。你對魔王的魔法毫無抵抗能力，屈服於他的力量，留下你的主人獨自對抗魔王。你的主人在戰鬥中倒下，垂死。但是，他用最後一口氣召喚了巫師。魔王害怕失敗，逃到了未來。年輕的武士飽受折磨，在魔法方面尋求巫師的教誨。煮沸了帶著復仇的心，手持魔劍的年輕武士跟隨魔王走向未來和未知……”

《第一武士》是一款平台動作遊戲，與其他平台遊戲非常相似，但除了各種獨特功能外，還具有中世紀東方風格。

來到新的未知之地，你毫無防備，只能拳打腳踢。但當你繼續前行時，你會發現你值得信賴的魔法劍以及投擲武器，如刀和斧頭。憑藉你的武術技巧，你的敵人最好小心那些可能致命的突然舉動！

第一武士提供了各種各樣的武器、特殊物品和其他物品。戰鬥通常是近戰，要么依靠你的拳擊或踢腿，要么使用魔法劍向任何可能的方向進行一些相當熟練的打擊。

怪物會永遠再生，但健康的食物卻很充足。確實需要費點力氣才能殺死……

Boxing Legends of the Ring (USA).name: 拳擊台傳奇
Boxing Legends of the Ring (USA).original_desc: In Boxing Legends of the Ring, you step into the ring with eight middleweight legends — including Roberto Durán, Jake LaMotta, Sugar Ray Leonard, Marvin Hagler, and James Toney. You can fight in exhibition matches or rise through the ranks in career mode to become the greatest of all time. Use jabs, hooks, uppercuts, and even the occasional illegal low blow to wear down your opponent. Every knockdown earns you a Super Punch — a devastating strike that can end the fight if it connects but is lost if you miss. Two indicators track the action: glove-shaped hit meters and a damage display showing fighters' faces bruising and bleeding over time. A neat twist is that the camera alternates each round, switching between your view and your opponent's shoulder for a more cinematic experience.
Boxing Legends of the Ring (USA).desc: 在《拳擊場傳奇》中，您將與八位中量級傳奇人物一起踏入拳擊場，其中包括羅伯托·杜蘭、傑克·拉莫塔、舒格·雷·倫納德、馬文·哈格勒和詹姆斯·托尼。你可以參加表演賽，也可以在職業模式中晉級，成為史上最偉大的球員。使用刺拳、勾拳、上勾拳，甚至偶爾使用非法的低擊來削弱對手。每一次擊倒都會讓你獲得超級重拳——這是一種毀滅性的打擊，如果擊中了，就可以結束戰鬥，但如果擊中失敗，就會失敗。兩個指示器跟踪動作：手套形狀的命中計和傷害顯示，顯示戰士的面部隨著時間的推移瘀傷和流血。一個巧妙的變化是，攝像機每輪交替，在你的視角和對手的肩膀之間切換，以獲得更具電影感的體驗。

Chuck Rock (USA).name: 查克·洛克
Chuck Rock (USA).original_desc:
Chuck Rock is your typical average cave man.  He likes to spend his Sunday afternoons watching football and drinking beer.  Unfortunately, his peaceful existence is interrupted one day when his wife, Ophelia Rock, is kidnapped by the village wierdo, Gary Gritter.  So, Chuck is rather upset about this whole situation and you have to help him make things right.

The game is a side-scrolling platformer.  Chuck fights of a variety of dinosaurs using his belly-buster attack and a jump kick.  Occasionally he has to pick up and throw rocks to defeat enemies and allow him to jump to greater heights.
Chuck Rock (USA).desc:
查克·洛克是典型的普通穴居人。他喜歡在周日下午看足球比賽和喝啤酒。不幸的是，有一天，他的妻子奧菲莉亞·洛克（Ophelia Rock）被村里的怪人加里·格里特（Gary Gritter）綁架，他平靜的生活被打破了。所以，查克對整個情況感到相當不安，你必須幫助他糾正錯誤。

該遊戲是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲。查克使用他的腹部破壞攻擊和跳踢與各種恐龍戰鬥。有時他必須撿起並扔石頭來擊敗敵人並讓他跳到更高的高度。

Liberty or Death (USA).name: 自由還是死亡
Liberty or Death (USA).original_desc:
STORY
The European Wars against Spain and France have been costly to the British Empire. In order to gain additional funds for the war effort, the Crown raise taxes from the New World colonies without representation. This act compels the New World colonies to protest and boycott against British rule. By 1775, the Crown alarmed by the protests, boycotts and politically instability in the New World sends troops to subdue any rebellious efforts by the New World colonists. This threatening approach provokes the Thirteen Colonies to revolt. Thus starts the War for Independence in the New World (American Revolutionary War).

GAMEPLAY
Choosing Sides
In Liberty or Death, you partake in the American Revolutionary War, either as the "rebels" - the American Continental Army or as the "Crown" - the British Royal Army.

Choosing either one of the nations will prompt you to choose the leading Commander-in-Chief:

The Continental Army: Charles Lee, Artemas Ward or George Washington.
The British Royal Army: Henry Clinton, Thomas Gage or William Howe.

Revolutionary Politics
Each turn you will have to balance your treasury for the war effort. Money is provided by each state. The more states that support your cause, the more money will flow in your coffers. Money is spent in paying wages, strengthening the fleet and recruiting new regiments.

Here, if you have a sufficient fleet, you can also command your Navy officer to "control the seas" which is conducting a blockade and privateering against enemy ships. This may result in seized goods that will be added to your treasury. 

The American Revolutionary War in Liberty or Death included everyone except the American Indians: [1] Revolutionary Militia: American supporters but not yet fully supportive of Continental Army (not under your full control) [2] Loyalist Militia: Militia supportive to the Crown [3] French Army: The French will support the American cause after a formal alliance is held. [4] Spanish Army: The Spaniards will support the American cause after a formal alliance is held.

Revolutionary Combat
The Top-down turned based combat introduces units available in the Revolutionary War: Infantry, Guerrilla, Cavalry and Artillery (Engineers). Combat near shores may also be joined by Naval units: Fleet and Fires Ships.
Liberty or Death (USA).desc:
故事
針對西班牙和法國的歐洲戰爭讓大英帝國付出了高昂的代價。為了獲得額外的戰爭資金，國王在沒有代表的情況下向新世界殖民地徵稅。這一行為迫使新世界殖民地抗議和抵制英國的統治。到了 1775 年，英國王室對新大陸的抗議、抵制和政治不穩定感到震驚，派遣軍隊鎮壓新大陸殖民者的任何叛亂活動。這種威脅性的做法激起了十三殖民地的反抗。新世界獨立戰爭（美國獨立戰爭）由此開始。

遊戲玩法
選擇立場
在《自由或死亡》中，你可以作為“叛軍”——美國大陸軍，或者“皇冠”——英國皇家軍隊，參與美國獨立戰爭。

選擇其中一個國家將提示您選擇主要的總司令：

大陸軍：查爾斯·李、阿特馬斯·沃德或喬治·華盛頓。
英國皇家陸軍：亨利·克林頓、托馬斯·蓋奇或威廉·豪。

革命政治
每回合你都必須平衡你的國庫以用於戰爭。錢是由每個州提供的。支持你的事業的州越多，你金庫裡的錢就會越多。錢被花在支付工資、加強艦隊和招募新軍團上。

在這裡，如果你擁有足夠的艦隊，你還可以指揮你的海軍軍官“制海”，對敵方船隻進行封鎖和私掠。這可能會導致被扣押的貨物被添加到您的金庫中。

自由或死亡的美國革命戰爭包括除美國印第安人之外的所有人： [1] 革命民兵：美國支持者，但尚未完全支持大陸軍（不在你的完全控制之下） [2] 忠誠民兵：支持王室的民兵 [3] 法國軍隊：在正式結盟後，法國將支持美國事業。[4] 西班牙陸軍：正式結盟後，西班牙人將支持美國事業。

革命戰鬥
自上而下的回合製戰鬥引入了獨立戰爭中可用的單位：步兵、游擊隊、騎兵和砲兵（工兵）。海軍部隊也可能加入近岸戰鬥：艦隊和火力艦艇。

Tiny Toon Adventures - Buster Busts Loos.key: Tiny Toon Adventures - Buster Busts Loose! (USA)
Tiny Toon Adventures - Buster Busts Loos.original_name: Tiny Toon Adventures : Buster Busts Loose!
Tiny Toon Adventures - Buster Busts Loos.name: 小卡通歷險記：巴斯特半身像鬆了！
Tiny Toon Adventures - Buster Busts Loos.original_desc:
You play Buster Bunny, in a series of levels, featuring characters from the Tiny Toon Adventures cartoon.

Most of the six levels are platform levels, where Buster has a number of attacks to defeat the enemies he faces.  These include kicks and jumps, and a dash ability that lets you slide into enemies to defeat them, and also climb walls.

The fourth level is an exception, and consists of a game of (American) football, played with a simplified version of the rules.  The idea is simply to get a touchdown, while as usual progressing at least ten yards in four downs.  There are two plays: a running play, where you simply run as far as possible while avoiding the opposing team; and a passing play that starts with a pass that can gain you extra yards, but must be caught.

Between levels there are bonus games.  You spin a wheel to determine what game you play out of five available.
Tiny Toon Adventures - Buster Busts Loos.desc:
您在一系列關卡中扮演巴斯特兔，以《小卡通歷險記》卡通人物為主角。

六個關卡中的大部分都是平台關卡，巴斯特可以通過多種攻擊來擊敗他所面對的敵人。其中包括踢腿和跳躍，以及沖刺能力，讓你可以滑入敵人並擊敗他們，還可以爬牆。

第四級是一個例外，由一場（美式）橄欖球比賽組成，比賽規則採用簡化版本。這個想法很簡單，就是獲得達陣，同時像往常一樣，在四次擊球中至少推進十碼。有兩種玩法：一種是跑動玩法，你只需跑得盡可能遠，同時避開對方球隊；一種以傳球開始的傳球戰術，可以讓你獲得額外的碼數，但必須被接住。

關卡之間有獎勵遊戲。您旋轉輪盤來決定您玩五種遊戲中的哪一種。

WWF Raw (USA).name: 世界自然基金會原始數據
WWF Raw (USA).original_desc:
WWF Raw is a professional wrestling game featuring 10 superstars from the World Wrestling Federation.  The wrestlers you can choose from include Bret "Hit Man" Hart, Bam Bam Bigelow, 1-2-3 Kid, Diesel, Doink, Lex Luger, Luna Vachon, Owen Hart, Razor Ramon, Shawn Michaels, Undertaker, and Yokozuna.

In this game, you attempt to pin your opponent to the mat by reducing his power meter until he can fight no more.  There is a large number of moves to perform, including turnbuckle maneuvers and "illegal" acts such as hitting your opponent with a metal folding chair.

This game supports up to 4 simultaneous players, and has the following game modes: One-on-One, Tag Team, Bedlam, Survivor Series, Royal Rumble, Raw Endurance Match, and Rematch.
WWF Raw (USA).desc:
WWF Raw 是一款職業摔跤遊戲，擁有來自世界摔跤聯合會的 10 名超級巨星。您可以選擇的摔跤手包括 Bret“Hit Man”Hart、Bam Bam Bigelow、1-2-3 Kid、Diesel、Doink、Lex Luger、Luna Vachon、Owen Hart、Razor Ramon、Shawn Michaels、Undertaker 和 Yokozuna。

在這個遊戲中，你試圖通過降低對手的功率計將他固定在墊子上，直到他無法再戰鬥。 有大量的動作需要執行，包括螺絲扣動作和“非法”行為，例如用金屬折疊椅擊打對手。

該遊戲最多支持 4 名玩家同時進行，並具有以下游戲模式：一對一、雙打、Bedlam、Survivor Series、Royal Rumble、Raw Endurance Match 和 Rematch。

Magical Pop'n (Japan) (Translated).name: 神奇流行音樂
Magical Pop'n (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The kingdom of Toaru prosperous and peaceful place that's famous for its magic.  Within Toaru castle lies the Magic Gem which legend says can give the person who holds it great magical powers.  Because of this, it is sealed inside the castle to prevent the gem from landing in the wrong hands. 

One night, a dark figure and his army of monsters invades the castle and steals the gem.  Armed with a sword and her magic powers, the Princess Toaru sets off to retrieve the gem and save the world.

Magical Pop'n let's you play a young, energetic little princess who is simply called...Princess.  The game starts off with Princess chasing after a floating bad guy off a balcony and into town. 

Princess has two type of weapons: her sword and  her magic powers. 

When using magic, Princess will consume star powers.  Different types of magic requires a different number of stars.  Stars can be collected throughout the game and you can also get stars after defeating a foe.  In the first stage you will only have access to Princess' magic beam powers which shoots small beams of laser at enemies.  Later, you will receive the ice, fire and other powers.

The sword can only be used to perform close range slashing against enemies. But it does not cost any stars.

In each stage, Princess will be confronted with a number of enemies that she must fight off to advance.  There are many mini-bosses and at the end of a stage, you will have to fight the main boss.

Princess' health is indicated by the number of hearts she has in her health meter.  There are various items that will help refill the meter: Candy refills half a heart, A slice of cake refills a whole heart and a birthday cake will refill the entire meter.

You will be taken to the game over screen if you lose all your lives.   But, no worries, there's an unlimited number of continues. There is no save feature in the game.
Magical Pop'n (Japan) (Translated).desc:
托魯王國繁榮而和平，以魔法而聞名。托魯城堡內藏有魔法寶石，傳說持有它的人可以擁有強大的魔力。因此，它被密封在城堡內，以防止寶石落入壞人之手。

一天晚上，一個黑暗人物和他的怪物大軍入侵城堡並偷走了寶石。托魯公主帶著劍和魔法力量，出發去取回寶石並拯救世界。

Magical Pop'n 讓您扮演一位年輕、充滿活力的小公主，簡稱為……公主。遊戲一開始，公主追趕一個漂浮在陽台上的壞人並進入城鎮。

公主有兩種武器：她的劍和她的魔法力量。

公主使用魔法時會消耗星力。不同類型的魔法需要不同數量的星星。星星可以在整個遊戲過程中收集，您也可以在擊敗敵人後獲得星星。在第一階段，您只能使用公主的魔法光束力量，向敵人發射小激光束。之後，你將獲得冰、火等力量。

劍只能用來對敵人進行近距離砍殺。但這並不花費任何星星。

在每個階段，公主都會遇到許多敵人，她必須擊退這些敵人才能前進。有很多小老闆，在一個階段結束時，你將不得不與主要老闆戰鬥。

公主的健康狀況由她的健康表中的紅心數量來表示。有多種物品可以幫助填充儀表：糖果可以填充半顆心，一片蛋糕可以填充整顆心，生日蛋糕可以填充整個儀表。

如果你失去了所有的生命，你將被帶到遊戲結束屏幕。但是，不用擔心，繼續的次數是無限的。遊戲中沒有保存功能。

Sparkster (USA).name: 火花者
Sparkster (USA).original_desc:
Sparkster is a 2D side-scrolling platformer starring the eponymous hero who previously appeared in Rocket Knight Adventures. It is very different from the contemporary Genesis title Sparkster, as it does not continue the story from the first game and has completely different levels, enemies and gameplay mechanics. In that way it can be considered a spin-off in the series. The introduction merely shows how an elderly man captures a girl and takes her into his airship. At that point Sparkster appears and he decides to chase them.

Sparkster is a rodent carrying a rocket pack on his back. He can move around, duck, jump and hang from branches or rails. His regular attack is a sword slash that sends out a circular projectile. Through the L and R buttons he can dash left and right in a circle of fire. Keeping the attack button pressed powers up a rocket meter. When full, different types or actions can be performed: dashing left, right or up to cover a large distance, ricocheting off walls in a diagonal motion, or a stationary attack.

The game consists of nine levels of which the last two can only be accessed on higher difficulty levels. Sparkster collects diamonds for points, defeats all types of robot enemies and collects apples to restore his heart meter near the top of the screen. Most of the game consists of regular platforming gameplay, with a few diversions where Sparkster rides a robot bird, or is shown from a top-down view flying in the air like a vertically-scrolling shooter. All levels have a level boss along with a large number of mid-level bosses. The game supports a password system.
Sparkster (USA).desc:
Sparkster 是一款 2D 橫向捲軸平台遊戲，由曾出現在《火箭騎士歷險記》中的同名英雄主演。它與當代的 Genesis 遊戲 Sparkster 有很大不同，因為它沒有延續第一款遊戲的故事，並且具有完全不同的關卡、敵人和遊戲機制。這樣一來，它就可以被視為該系列的衍生作品。簡介只是講述了一個老人如何抓住一個女孩並把她帶進他的飛艇。這時斯帕克斯特出現了，他決定追趕他們。

Sparkster 是一種背著火箭包的囓齒動物。他可以四處走動、躲避、跳躍以及掛在樹枝或欄杆上。他的常規攻擊是劍斬，發射出圓形彈丸。通過L和R按鈕，他可以在火圈中左右衝刺。按住攻擊按鈕可以啟動火箭計。滿後，可以執行不同的類型或動作：向左、向右或向上沖刺以覆蓋很長的距離，以對角線運動從牆壁上彈跳，或進行靜止攻擊。

該遊戲由九個級別組成，其中最後兩個級別只能在較高難度級別下訪問。Sparkster 收集鑽石以獲得積分，擊敗所有類型的機器人敵人，並收集蘋果以恢復屏幕頂部附近的心率表。遊戲的大部分內容都是常規的平台遊戲，還有一些讓 Sparkster 騎著機器鳥的遊戲，或者像垂直滾動射擊遊戲一樣從自上而下的視角在空中飛行。所有級別都有一個級別老闆以及大量的中級老闆。遊戲支持密碼系統。

Tales of Phantasia (Japan) (Translated).name: 奇幻故事
Tales of Phantasia (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: In "Tales of Phantasia", you play a young boy named Cless, who lives together with his parents in a quiet village. It was a day like all the others when Cless decided to go hunting with his best friend Chester. Chasing a wild boar, Cless discovered a strange talking tree in the forest who was pleading him for help. But as soon as it stopped speaking, the two friends heard the sound of an alarm. They returned to the village and found it burnt down, and all its inhabitants murdered. Before Cless' mother died in his arms, she told him this terrible massacre had something to do with the pendant she and her husband gave Cless for his birthday... what connection could there be? Cless decides to visit his uncle who lives in another town, but he doesn't realize his journey will take him to much more remote places than that!
Tales of Phantasia (Japan) (Translated).desc: 在《幻想故事》中，你扮演一個名叫克萊斯的小男孩，他和父母一起住在一個安靜的村莊里。和其他日子一樣，這一天克萊斯決定和他最好的朋友切斯特一起去打獵。在追逐一頭野豬時，克萊斯在森林裡發現了一棵會說話的奇怪樹，它正在向他求助。但它剛停止說話，兩個朋友就听到了警報聲。他們回到村莊，發現村莊被燒毀，所有居民都被殺害。克萊斯的母親死在他懷里之前，告訴他這場可怕的屠殺與她和她丈夫送給克萊斯的生日吊墜有關……這能有什麼聯繫呢？克萊斯決定去拜訪住在另一個城鎮的叔叔，但他沒有意識到他的旅程會帶他去更偏遠的地方！

Fatal Fury Special (USA).name: 餓狼傳說特別版
Fatal Fury Special (USA).original_desc:
Fatal Fury Special is an improved version of SNK's 2D one-on-one fighter Fatal Fury 2. It's a conversion of the 1993 arcade game of the same name. The objective is still to win the tournament by defeating all other fighters including end boss Wolfgang Krauser. Fatal Fury Special features a fairly large selection of fighters that includes:

1. The eight regular fighters from Fatal Fury 2: Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi, Kim Kaphwan, Jubei Yamada, Cheng Sinzan, Mai Shiranui and Big Bear.The four bosses from Fatal Fury 2: Billy Kane, Axel Hawk, Lawrence Blood and Wolfgang Krauser (this time they're all immediately playable).Three characters returning from the first Fatal Fury: Duck King, Tung Fu Rue and Geese Howard (the end boss from Fatal Fury).
Other improvements include:

1. A new Count Down mode (defeat as many opponents as possible in 3 minutes).Extra color schemes for every character.New & improved background graphics.Dolby Surround Sound support.
Fatal Fury Special still features the series' trademark pseudo-3D movement along two planes.
Fatal Fury Special (USA).desc:
《Fatal Fury Special》是 SNK 的 2D 一對一格鬥遊戲《Fatal Fury 2》的改進版本。它是 1993 年同名街機遊戲的轉換版。目標仍然是通過擊敗包括最終老闆沃爾夫岡·克勞瑟在內的所有其他戰士來贏得比賽。《餓狼傳說》特別版擁有相當多的戰士選擇，其中包括：

1. 《餓狼傳說 2》中的八位常規戰士：特里·博加德、安迪·博加德、東喬、金·卡夫萬、山田十兵衛、程信山、不知火舞和大熊。 《餓狼傳說 2》的四個 Boss：比利·凱恩、阿克塞爾·霍克、勞倫斯·布拉德和沃爾夫岡·克勞瑟（這次他們都可以立即玩）。從第一部《餓狼傳說》中回歸的三個角色：鴨王，東富路和吉斯·霍華德（《餓狼傳說》的最終boss）。
其他改進包括：

1. 新的倒計時模式（在 3 分鐘內擊敗盡可能多的對手）。每個角色都有額外的配色方案。新的和改進的背景圖形。杜比環繞聲支持。
《Fatal Fury Special》仍然採用該系列標誌性的沿兩個平面的偽 3D 運動。

Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.key: Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & Minnie, The (USA)
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.original_name: The Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & Minnie
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.name: 米奇和米妮主演的大馬戲團之謎
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.original_desc: Starring Mickey and Minnie Mouse, the two plan to spend the day at the Circus only to find that it's deserted. Believing that someone is responsible, you must dress up in different outfits such as Safari and Western, as you try to find clues to solve the mystery behind the disappereance of the performers, including your pals Donald Duck and Pluto.
Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey & M.desc: 由米奇和米妮主演的兩人計劃在馬戲團度過一天，卻發現這裡空無一人。相信有人對此負有責任，你必須穿上不同的服裝，如狩獵裝和西部裝，嘗試尋找線索來解開表演者（包括你的好朋友唐老鴨和冥王星）失踪背後的謎團。

Ganpuru - Gunman's Proof (Japan) (Transl.name: 甘普魯：槍手的證據
Ganpuru - Gunman's Proof (Japan) (Transl.original_desc:
The year is 1880. Two meteors fell on Earth on a small island near North American Pacific Coast. In the middle of the island there is a small town governed by a sheriff. At first, the town's inhabitants didn't pay attention to the meteors. But then, strange things started happening. Monsters attacked people, and left on the victims' bodies a mysterious crest with one word: demiseed. One day you, a young boy who lives in the town, are contacted by two aliens who came in a miniature space ship. One of the aliens introduces himself as Zero, the Space Sheriff, and explains that an intergalactic criminal named Demi has escaped from justice and is hiding somewhere on the island, being the cause of all the troubles lately. Zero then possesses your body, lends you his powers, and commands you on the quest to destroy Demi and to bring peace to your island and to the alien world alike!

The game is an action/adventure with slight RPG elements (buying and upgrading weapons, etc.) set in Wild West. While featuring traditional dungeon-crawling and many enemies to dispose of in real time combat, the game doesn't equip you with standard medieval swords, but with pistols, shotgun, machine gun, and even a flamethrower. Your weapons have infinite ammo. You can duck to avoid the alien monsters' fire, and perform special attacks with various types of weapons.
Ganpuru - Gunman's Proof (Japan) (Transl.desc:
1880年，兩顆流星落在地球上北美太平洋海岸附近的一個小島上。島中央有一個由治安官管轄的小鎮。起初，鎮上的居民並沒有註意到流星。但隨後，奇怪的事情開始發生。怪物襲擊人類，並在受害者身上留下神秘紋章，上面寫著一個字：死亡。有一天，你，一個住在鎮上的小男孩，被兩名乘坐微型太空飛船而來的外星人聯繫。其中一名外星人介紹自己為太空警長零，並解釋說，一位名叫黛米的星際罪犯逃脫了正義，躲藏在島上的某個地方，是最近所有麻煩的根源。然後零佔據了你的身體，借給你他的力量，並命令你去摧毀黛米並為你的島嶼和外星世界帶來和平！

該遊戲是一款動作/冒險遊戲，帶有輕微的角色扮演元素（購買和升級武器等），背景設定在狂野西部。雖然遊戲以傳統的地下城探索和實時戰鬥中需要消滅的許多敵人為特色，但遊戲並沒有為你配備標準的中世紀劍，而是配備了手槍、霰彈槍、機槍，甚至火焰噴射器。你的武器有無限的彈藥。你可以躲避外星怪物的火力，並使用各種類型的武器進行特殊攻擊。

Gokujou Parodius (Japan).name: 最好的帕羅吉雨
Gokujou Parodius (Japan).original_desc:
Konami's Gradius and space-shooter parody series continues with this second installment.  Gameplay is similar to the Gradius series in that you control a ship that can move anywhere on the screen while the screen itself scrolls from left to right. Enemies appear in waves and destroying all the fighters in a single wave releases power-ups which may be used to choose your ships upgrade. The Upgrade bar too is lifted from Gradius, however each character has different names and functions for their upgrades.

In Gokujyou Parodius, you are now able to now choose from 11 different characters... many of whom appear from other Konami games. They include:

1. Vic Viper: a ship from Gradius

2. Takosuke: the "octopus" of the previous Parodius game, and also seen in at least one Goemon

3. Twinbee: making his appearance from the Twinbee side scrolling games, Twinbee is a squat round robot with a jetpack and a disproportionately big punching glove

4. Pentaro: the original "joke character", Pentaro made an appearence in a previous Gradius title as a flying penguin. However he does star in his own games as well, Konami's Penguin Adventure

5. Hikaru: Hikaru is a girl in a tight fighting "bunny suit" who is riding on top of a missile

6. Mambo: Mambo is a strange looking fish with two horns on the top of his head and on his underside

7. Michael: some kind of fat angel pig. He has wings and a golden halo over his head

8. Koitsu: A blue stick man riding on a surfboard. He's probably one of the more 'normal' characters

9. Goemon: star of the Goemon series of games. Goemon is a ninja warrior equipped with wooden pipes. He flies around in a superman pose for his appearance in Parodius

10. Dracula: star of Konami's Kid Dracula, this white haired squat character retains his vampiric abilities including that of being able to change into a bat

11. Upa: a flying baby. Upa is actually from a Konami game by the name of  Bokutte Upa but is probably just more recognizable as "the flying baby" of this crazy shooter

In addition to your player-character, the levels themselves will be full of a strange mix of Konami references, bright colors and the just plain zany. it's not uncommon to have to fly your ship underneath a woman's legs for example or chased by a giant walrus or having enemies shooting cute pink hearts at you.
Gokujou Parodius (Japan).desc:
Konami 的《Gradius》和太空射擊遊戲模仿系列在第二部分中繼續。遊戲玩法與《Gradius》系列類似，你控制一艘可以在屏幕上任意位置移動的飛船，同時屏幕本身從左向右滾動。敵人一波一波地出現，一波摧毀所有戰鬥機會釋放能量提升，可用於選擇你的船隻升級。升級欄也從 Gradius 中取消，但是每個角色的升級都有不同的名稱和功能。

在 Gokujyou Parodius 中，您現在可以從 11 個不同的角色中進行選擇……其中許多角色出現在其他 Konami 遊戲中。它們包括：

1. Vic Viper：Gradius 的一艘船

2. Takosuke：前作《Parodius》遊戲中的“章魚”，至少在一部五右衛門中也出現過

3. Twinbee：Twinbee 出現在 Twinbee 橫向捲軸遊戲中，Twinbee 是一個蹲著的圓形機器人，配有噴氣背包和不成比例的大拳擊手套

4. Pentaro：最初的“玩笑角色”，Pentaro 在之前的 Gradius 遊戲中以一隻會飛的企鵝的身份出現。不過，他也在自己的遊戲《科樂美的企鵝冒險》中擔任主角。

5. Hikaru：Hikaru是一個穿著緊身格鬥“兔子服”的女孩，騎在導彈上

6.曼波：曼波是一種看起來很奇怪的魚，頭頂和底下有兩個角

7. 邁克爾：某種胖天使豬。他有翅膀，頭上有金色光環

8. Koitsu：騎在衝浪板上的藍色棍子人。他可能是比較“正常”的角色之一

9. 五右衛門：五右衛門系列遊戲的明星。五右衛門是一名裝備木管的忍者武士。他在《Parodius》中以超人姿勢飛來飛去

10.德古拉：科樂美《德古拉小子》中的明星，這個白髮矮胖的角色保留了他的吸血鬼能力，包括能夠變成蝙蝠的能力

11. Upa：會飛的嬰兒。Upa 實際上來自 Konami 的一款遊戲，名為 Bokutte Upa，但可能只是這款瘋狂射擊遊戲中的“飛翔的嬰兒”更容易被認出

除了你的玩家角色之外，關卡本身也充滿了 Konami 參考、明亮的色彩和簡單滑稽的奇怪組合。例如，你的飛船必須在女人的腿下飛行，或者被巨大的海象追趕，或者讓敵人向你發射可愛的粉紅心形，這種情況並不少見。

F-Zero (USA).name: F-Zero
F-Zero (USA).original_desc:
F-Zero is a futuristic racing game, set in the year 2560. The player chooses one of the four available hovercars and then can race with other hovercars in one of the gameplay modes - "Practice" or "Grand Prix".

In "Practice" mode, the player chooses one track where he competes with one other hovercar to win the race (or there can be no rival at all, if you so wish). In "Grand Prix", the player must complete a series of races with several competitors. Each race consists of five laps.
F-Zero (USA).desc:
F-Zero 是一款未來派賽車遊戲，背景設定在 2560 年。玩家從四輛可用的懸浮汽車中選擇一輛，然後可以在其中一種遊戲模式（“練習”或“大獎賽”）中與其他懸浮汽車比賽。

在“練習”模式中，玩家選擇一條賽道，與另一輛氣墊車競爭以贏得比賽（或者如果您願意，可以根本沒有對手）。在“大獎賽”中，玩家必須與多名參賽者一起完成一系列比賽。每場比賽由五圈組成。

Genghis Khan II - Clan of the Gray Wolf.key: Genghis Khan II - Clan of the Gray Wolf (USA)
Genghis Khan II - Clan of the Gray Wolf.original_name: Genghis Khan II : Clan of the Gray Wolf
Genghis Khan II - Clan of the Gray Wolf.name: 成吉思汗二世:灰狼家族
