Genghis Khan II - Clan of the Gray Wolf.original_desc: As in the first part you could participate in two conquests: Mongol conquest and world conquest. In the first you must unite all the little tribes of the country. The world conquest is more complex: You must use all your senses to make the world as you wish.
Genghis Khan II - Clan of the Gray Wolf.desc: 與第一部分一樣，您可以參與兩種征服：蒙古征服和世界征服。首先，你必須團結該國所有的小部落。征服世界則更為複雜：你必須運用你所有的感官來按照你的意願創造世界。

Tiny Toon Adventures - Wacky Sports Chal.key: Tiny Toon Adventures - Wacky Sports Challenge (USA)
Tiny Toon Adventures - Wacky Sports Chal.original_name: Tiny Toon Adventures : Wacky Sports Challenge
Tiny Toon Adventures - Wacky Sports Chal.name: 小小卡通歷險記：古怪的運動挑戰
Tiny Toon Adventures - Wacky Sports Chal.original_desc:
Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports Challenge has the player take control of either Buster Bunny, Babs Bunny, Dizzy Devil, or Plucky Duck in a variety of Olympic-type events: ice cream throw, weightlifting, saucer throw, obstacle course, a flying contest called the birdman contest among more.  There are four difficulty settings to choose from (Easy, Normal, Hard and Super) each unlockable through passwords which are represented by Tiny Toons characters.

Players can utilize the multitap, which allows four human opponents to face off against each other. The game also features graphics and animations from the TV show, but does not feature any voice overs from the characters.
Tiny Toon Adventures - Wacky Sports Chal.desc:
小卡通歷險記：古怪運動挑戰賽讓玩家控制巴斯特兔、巴布斯兔、頭暈魔鬼或勇敢鴨子參加各種奧運會類型的比賽：扔冰淇淋、舉重、扔碟子、障礙訓練、稱為鳥人比賽的飛行比賽等等。有四種難度設置可供選擇（簡單、普通、困難和超級），每種都可以通過由 Tiny Toons 字符代表的密碼解鎖。

玩家可以利用多重點擊，讓四個人類對手相互對抗。該遊戲還具有電視節目中的圖形和動畫，但不包含任何角色的配音。

Hammer Lock Wrestling (USA).name: 錘鎖摔跤
Hammer Lock Wrestling (USA).original_desc:
Hammerlock Wrestling is Jaleco's take on wrestling with a style geared towards Saturday Night Slam Masters.  The player can choose from 12 fictional wrestlers and compete in four different modes of play.  There is also 60 different moves to choose from as well as unique finishers for each wrestler.

The Exhibition mode allows up to four different players to compete either against each other in singles match or in tag team format.  Champion League Match is a round robin-type tournament with six different wrestlers competing for the league championship.  Tournament is the standard tournament format with eight different wrestlers involved and Top Ranking Match where the player must battle through the other eleven wrestlers and defeat each one to become champion.

The game is divided into three different screens at times.  The middle part shows the current action happening in the ring while the top and bottom parts of the screen are used for close-ups of action sequences such as power moves, illegal moves and finishing maneuvers.
Hammer Lock Wrestling (USA).desc:
Hammerlock 摔跤是 Jaleco 對摔跤的詮釋，其風格適合週六晚大滿貫大師賽。玩家可以從 12 名虛構摔跤手中進行選擇，並以四種不同的比賽模式進行比賽。還有 60 種不同的動作可供選擇，每位摔跤手都有獨特的終結技。

表演賽模式允許最多四名不同的玩家以單打比賽或雙打形式相互競爭。冠軍聯賽是一種循環賽形式的比賽，六名不同的摔跤手爭奪聯賽冠軍。錦標賽是標準的錦標賽形式，有八名不同的摔跤手參加，而頂級排名賽則要求玩家必須與其他十一名摔跤手進行戰鬥並擊敗每一位摔跤手才能成為冠軍。

遊戲有時分為三個不同的屏幕。中間部分顯示拳擊台上當前發生的動作，而屏幕的頂部和底部則用於特寫動作序列，例如強力動作、非法動作和終結動作。

Mega Man 7 (USA).name: 洛克人2 威利博士之謎
Mega Man 7 (USA).original_desc:
At long last, Mega Man had finally manage to beat the evil Dr. Wily! With this defeat, Wily was thrown in jail, seemingly for good. The world would no longer be subject to his madness.

But remember, Dr. Wily is mad, but he's not stupid. He had a backup plan...and all he had to do was just wait...

6 months had passed, and somewhere from deep within Wily's abandoned lab, 4 hidden capsules activated and opened. His backup plan was in action...he had hidden 4 new Wily Robots that would spring him out of jail so he could continue his mad reign.

When Mega Man hears the word that Wily was busting out of prison, he rushes onto the scene, only to encounter a strange robot he had never seen before named Bass. Bass tells Mega Man to back off, that he would stop Wily, and that Mega Man was no longer needed.

Think that's gonna stop Mega Man? No way! Mega Man takes off to put a stop to Dr. Wily and find out exactly whose side Bass is on...
Mega Man 7 (USA).desc:
洛克人終於打敗了邪惡的威利博士！這次失敗後，威利被關進了監獄，似乎永遠了。世界將不再受制於他的瘋狂。

但請記住，威利博士很生氣，但他並不愚蠢。他有一個備用計劃……他所要做的就是等待……

6 個月過去了，在 Wily 廢棄的實驗室深處的某個地方，4 個隱藏的膠囊被激活並打開。他的後備計劃正在實施……他隱藏了 4 個新的 Wily 機器人，這些機器人可以讓他出獄，這樣他就可以繼續他的瘋狂統治。

當《洛克人》聽到威利要越獄的消息時，他趕到了現場，卻遇到了一個他從未見過的奇怪機器人，名叫巴斯。巴斯告訴《洛克人》後退一步，他會阻止威利，並且不再需要《洛克人》了。

你認為這會阻止《洛克人》嗎？決不！《洛克人》出發去阻止威利博士，並查明巴斯究竟站在哪一邊……

Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow (USA).name: 冷影中的毛伊綠頭鴨
Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow (USA).original_desc: Maui Mallard dives headfirst into a chaotic island adventure: the sacred statue of the god Shabum Shabum has vanished, and the island teeters on the brink of destruction. As a sharp-witted detective, Maui is assigned to the case and soon finds himself exploring a haunted mansion, encountering a native tribe, and plunging into the fiery depths of a volcano. After surviving a sacrificial ritual and passing the “Test of Duckhood,” he's tasked with bringing Shabum Shabum back from the land of the dead – but accidentally unleashes an evil sorcerer instead. With courage, agility, and his ability to transform into a ninja, Maui battles through perilous levels filled with enemies, traps, and mysteries until he restores peace and becomes a legend himself.
Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow (USA).desc: 毛伊野鴨一頭扎進了一場混亂的島嶼冒險中：沙布姆沙布姆神的神聖雕像消失了，島嶼瀕臨毀滅。作為一名機智敏銳的偵探，毛伊被指派處理此案，很快他就發現自己正在探索一座鬧鬼的宅邸，遇到了一個土著部落，並陷入了火山的熾熱深處。在完成祭祀儀式並通過“鴨子考驗”後，他的任務是將沙布姆·沙布姆從亡靈之地帶回來，但卻意外地釋放了一個邪惡的巫師。憑藉勇氣、敏捷和變身忍者的能力，毛伊在充滿敵人、陷阱和神秘的危險關卡中戰鬥，直到他恢復和平並成為傳奇。

Super Bomberman (USA).name: 超級炸彈人
Super Bomberman (USA).original_desc:
Super Bomberman is the first Bomberman game on the Super NES.  Like most games in the Bomberman series, Super Bomberman features a normal game as well as the famous battle mode.

In the normal game, Mr. Karat and Dr. Mukk have been terrorizing Diamond City.  You must go from board to board, defeating the bad guys and solving puzzles to move to the next board.

In battle mode, up to four players go head to head in a battle to the death.  Players can be computer controlled or human controlled via the Super MultiTap.
Super Bomberman (USA).desc:
《超級炸彈人》是 Super NES 上的第一款《炸彈人》遊戲。與炸彈人系列中的大多數遊戲一樣，超級炸彈人具有普通遊戲以及著名的戰鬥模式。

正常遊戲中，卡拉特先生和穆克博士一直在恐嚇鑽石城。你必須從一個棋盤走到另一個棋盤，擊敗壞人並解決謎題才能進入下一個棋盤。

在戰鬥模式中，最多四名玩家將展開殊死的戰鬥。玩家可以通過 Super MultiTap 進行計算機控製或人工控制。

Knights of the Round (USA).name: 圓桌騎士
Knights of the Round (USA).original_desc:
In Knights of the Round, play the role of one of three knights from the Arthurian legends. The three characters are Sir Lancelot, Sir Percival, and of course King Arthur. 

The story tells of a man who pulled the mighty sword Excalibur from a rock which no one else could achieve. This feat signified that he should be king of the Britons and lead them to peace. The trouble is there is mass chaos in the land and the only way Arthur can stop it is to find the holy grail which has been hidden for over a thousand years. Aurthur is joined by Percival and Lancelot on his quest to find the grail. 

The gameplay involves the player to scroll along the screen fighting of enemies with a sword or axe depending on the character. The player can also block and parry with opponents which is done by a simple button press. There are also character development elements in the game where collecting points by killing enemies and picking up gold increase the character's attack and speed.  Character's armour and weapons also change when they gain experience.
Knights of the Round (USA).desc:
在《圓桌騎士》中，扮演亞瑟王傳奇中三名騎士之一。這三個角色是蘭斯洛特爵士、珀西瓦爾爵士，當然還有亞瑟王。

故事講述了一名男子從岩石中拔出無人能及的強大劍Excalibur。這一壯舉標誌著他應該成為不列顛人的國王並帶領他們走向和平。問題是這片土地上發生了大規模的混亂，亞瑟阻止混亂的唯一方法就是找到隱藏了一千多年的聖杯。亞瑟與珀西瓦爾和蘭斯洛特一起踏上尋找聖杯的旅程。

遊戲玩法包括玩家沿著屏幕滾動，根據角色使用劍或斧頭與敵人戰鬥。玩家還可以通過簡單地按下按鈕來阻止和招架對手。遊戲中還有角色發展元素，通過殺死敵人和拾取黃金來收集積分，從而增加角色的攻擊力和速度。當角色獲得經驗時，他們的盔甲和武器也會發生變化。

Metal Combat - Falcon's Revenge (USA).name: 金屬戰鬥：獵鷹的複仇
Metal Combat - Falcon's Revenge (USA).original_desc:
Following the events of Battle Clash, the Battle Game Chiefs had been defeated. But the world did not return to peace and instead new Chiefs and new machines rose up to rule the world. Like before, the Chiefs use giant robots known as Standing Tanks (STs). Seeing the world in trouble, the hero pilots who had defeated the Battle Chiefs decide to once again enter the Battle Game using an improved version of their ST, the Falcon. The truth behind the Battle Game will take the Falcon deep into space...

Metal Combat: Falcon's Revenge is a first person shooter designed for the Super Scope Light Gun. Gameplay is identical to Battle Clash. The player takes the role of the gunner of the giant robot, movement is handled automatically by the game, scrolling the screen. Players must keep the enemy robot in the gunsights and blast away at different parts of it, while also intercepting enemy missiles and counter-attacks. All robots have a weak point that will increase the damage done to them. Power-ups such as Neutron Beams and Plasma Bombs can be picked up following the completion of certain stages, and equipped at the beginning of combat.
Metal Combat - Falcon's Revenge (USA).desc:
在Battle Clash事件之後，Battle Game Chiefs被擊敗了。但世界並沒有恢復和平，相反，新的酋長和新機器崛起來統治世界。和以前一樣，酋長隊使用稱為“站立坦克”(ST) 的巨型機器人。看到世界陷入困境，擊敗了戰鬥酋長的英雄飛行員決定使用他們的 ST 的改進版“獵鷹”再次參加戰鬥遊戲。戰鬥遊戲背後的真相將帶領獵鷹深入太空……

Metal Combat: Falcon's Revenge 是一款專為 Super Scope Light Gun 設計的第一人稱射擊遊戲。遊戲玩法與《Battle Clash》相同。玩家扮演巨型機器人的砲手，移動由遊戲自動處理，滾動屏幕。玩家必須讓敵方機器人保持在瞄準鏡內並對其不同部位進行爆炸，同時攔截敵方導彈並進行反擊。所有機器人都有一個弱點，這會增加對它們造成的傷害。中子束和等離子炸彈等能量提升裝置可以在完成某些階段後拾取，並在戰鬥開始時裝備。

Breath of Fire II (USA).name: 火焰之息II
Breath of Fire II (USA).original_desc:
Ryu was a young boy who has memories of a strange village far away and a magical doorway which sucked him through. However those are only distant memories. Ryu and his best friend Bow are apprentices in the Ranger's Guild. As adventurers they take on posted jobs needed by the townspeople. However it isn't long before one job goes awry and Bow is accused of stealing a valuable item. In order to clear his friend's name and find the meaning of his dreams, Ryu will explore the world, eventually discovering the meaning of his dreams and hidden abilities inside himself.

Breath of Fire II is a role playing game. The majority of game is played from a top-down map, however battles are seen from an isometric view. Ryu will form parties from among 8 other characters, each with their own set of skills and powers that will help him discover the truth behind the mystery.
Breath of Fire II (USA).desc:
龍是一個小男孩，他對一個遙遠的陌生村莊和一扇吸引他的神奇門口有記憶。然而那些都只是遙遠的記憶。龍和他最好的朋友鮑是遊俠公會的學徒。作為冒險家，他們承擔城鎮居民所需的工作。然而沒過多久，鮑的一項工作就出了差錯，他被指控偷竊了一件貴重物品。為了為朋友洗清罪名並找到夢想的意義，Ryu 將探索世界，最終發現夢想的意義和隱藏在自己內心的能力。

火焰之息II是一款角色扮演遊戲。大部分遊戲都是從自上而下的地圖上進行的，但戰鬥是從等軸測視圖中看到的。Ryu 將與其他 8 個角色組成隊伍，每個角色都有自己的一套技能和力量，這將幫助他發現謎團背後的真相。

Might and Magic III - Isles of Terra (US.key: Might and Magic III - Isles of Terra (USA)
Might and Magic III - Isles of Terra (US.original_name: Might and Magic III : Isles of Terra
Might and Magic III - Isles of Terra (US.name: 魔法門 III : 泰拉群島
Might and Magic III - Isles of Terra (US.original_desc:
The third installment of the roleplaying series, with a multi-faceted plot full of twists and turns. Ease of  use was central to the gameplay and interface, and the plot included piles of new twists and turns.

Lead a party of adventurers to rendezvous with the legendary wizard Corak. From dark moldy dungeons, through corridors of hewn stone and timber, and onward to the lofty frozen peaks of Terra you will uncover the mysteries that surround the exotic islands in the Great Sea.
Might and Magic III - Isles of Terra (US.desc:
角色扮演系列的第三部，劇情多面、曲折。易用性是遊戲玩法和界面的核心，情節包含大量新的曲折。

帶領一隊冒險家與傳奇巫師科拉克會合。從黑暗發霉的地牢，穿過鑿成的石頭和木材的走廊，一直到泰拉高聳的冰凍山峰，你將揭開圍繞著大海中異國島嶼的神秘面紗。

Front Mission Series - Gun Hazard (Japan.name: 前線任務系列：槍支危機
Front Mission Series - Gun Hazard (Japan.original_desc:
The year is 2064, when the great solar power satellite, ATLAS is overshadowed by the invention of fusion power. The government alliance that had supported the building of ATLAS now find themselves facing economic crisis as the balance of power shifts. In this world of conflict and change, the Walking Panzer, or Wanzer, (a form of mecha) becomes the standard armored unit for wars and petty battles across the globe. For the small nation of Bergen, a coup d'etat is underway, staged by Colonel Ark. Seeking to establish complete control over the government and the NORAD units stationed there, Ark's first step involves the capture of President Orwen. Tipped off to the rebellion, Orwen seeks to flee from Bergen, looking for safe passage out of the seaport of Port Ertothal. A young Wanzer pilot, Albert Grabner, is assigned escort duty to the president by loyal elements of the army stationed there...

Gun Hazard is a side-scrolling version of the Front Mission series. Gameplay is more than a little similar to Cybernator or Metal Warriors. The player moves between different stages on an area map. Once inside a level, the player controls Albert and his wanzer as it moves left, right across the screen. The wanzer is able to jump, and attack with a primary and a special weapon. At any time during a level, Albert can eject from his heavily armed wanzer to explore. Although vulnerable when outside, Albert is able to reach areas the wanzer cannot, in addition to being a smaller target and being able to jetpack indefinitely.

Additionally, Albert can recruit other characters through the normal course of the story, some of whom can be designated to support roles. These support characters when set can provide a variety of different cover fire abilities for Albert during his missions. They too gain experience and levels. Different weapons and armor can be found or bought. Essential components include the Booster ability which allows the wanzer to hover and increase it's jumps, as well as the Dash ability which allows quick left-right movement by the wanzer. Money and experience are earned through the completion of level objectives as well as the kill count of enemy wanzers.
Front Mission Series - Gun Hazard (Japan.desc:
2064年，偉大的太陽能衛星ATLAS因聚變能的發明而黯然失色。隨著權力平衡的變化，曾經支持ATLAS建設的政府聯盟現在發現自己面臨著經濟危機。在這個充滿衝突和變化的世界中，步行裝甲車或 Wanzer（機甲的一種形式）成為全球戰爭和小型戰鬥的標準裝甲單位。對於卑爾根這個小國來說，一場由阿克上校策劃的政變正在進行中。為了建立對政府和駐紮在那裡的北美防空司令部部隊的完全控制，阿克的第一步就是抓捕歐文總統。得知叛亂的消息後，歐文試圖逃離卑爾根，尋找離開埃托塔爾港海港的安全通道。年輕的万澤飛行員阿爾伯特·格拉布納 (Albert Grabner) 被駐紮在那裡的忠誠部隊指派為總統護送任務……

《Gun Hazard》是《前線任務》系列的橫向捲軸版本。遊戲玩法與 Cybernator 或 Metal Warriors 非常相似。玩家在區域地圖上的不同階段之間移動。一旦進入關卡，玩家就可以控制阿爾伯特和他的機體在屏幕上左右移動。機體能夠跳躍並使用主要武器和特殊武器進行攻擊。在關卡中的任何時候，阿爾伯特都可以從他全副武裝的機體中彈射出去探索。儘管在外面很容易受到攻擊，但阿爾伯特能夠到達機體無法到達的區域，而且目標較小並且能夠無限期地使用噴氣背包。

此外，阿爾伯特可以通過故事的正常進程招募其他角色，其中一些可以被指定為配角。這些支持角色設置後可以為阿爾伯特在執行任務期間提供各種不同的掩護火力能力。他們也獲得經驗和水平。可以找到或購買不同的武器和盔甲。基本組件包括助推器能力（允許機體懸停並增加其跳躍）以及沖刺能力（允許機體快速左右移動）。金錢和經驗是通過完成關卡目標以及殺死敵方機體來獲得的。

International Superstar Soccer Deluxe (U.name: 國際巨星足球豪華版
International Superstar Soccer Deluxe (U.original_desc:
This is the sequel to International Superstar Soccer, Konami's saga of soccer games. This Deluxe version was published first to the SNES, then the Mega Drive and Playstation.

ISS Deluxe has realistic animations and player sprites. You can compete with 36 national teams with recognizable celebrity players (like Valderrama, Baggio, Ravanelli, Petkov...), but their names are fictitious. You can choose too from 16 formations and 8 strategies to win.

The competitions available are: International Cup, World Series (League), Scenario Mode and customizable mini-cups/leagues.
International Superstar Soccer Deluxe (U.desc:
這是科樂美足球傳奇《國際超級明星足球》的續作。該豪華版首先發佈到 SNES，然後發佈到 Mega Drive 和 Playstation。

ISS Deluxe 擁有逼真的動畫和玩家精靈。您可以與 36 個國家隊的知名明星球員（如瓦爾德拉馬、巴喬、拉瓦內利、佩特科夫……）競爭，但他們的名字都是虛構的。您還可以從 16 種陣型和 8 種策略中進行選擇來獲勝。

可用的比賽有：國際盃、世界大賽（聯賽）、場景模式和可定制的迷你杯/聯賽。

Sunset Riders (USA).name: 日落騎士
Sunset Riders (USA).original_desc:
The Wild West...full of the criminal element. Sir Richard Rose, the most despicable face in the criminal lot, has enough power to control the mining facilities, cattle ranches, and trading communities and turn everything to his favor. With that much power, he could literally buy himself the Wild West and control everything!

The people need help, desperately. And just as things were looking grim, who should ride into town but 4 men who have made a pact: to put down Sir Richard Rose and make the Wild West a free and peaceful place to live.

Steve, Bob, Billy, and Cormano are the Sunset Riders, and they're about to live out the wildest shootout the Wild West has ever seen...
Sunset Riders (USA).desc:
狂野的西部……充滿犯罪元素。理查德·羅斯爵士是犯罪界最卑鄙的面孔，他擁有足夠的權力來控制採礦設施、牧場和貿易社區，並讓一切都對他有利。有了這麼大的權力，他真的可以給自己買下狂野西部並控制一切！

人們迫切需要幫助。就在事情看起來很嚴峻的時候，除了 4 個人之外，他們應該騎馬進城，他們已經達成了一項協議：鎮壓理查德·羅斯爵士，讓狂野的西部成為一個自由、和平的居住地。

史蒂夫、鮑勃、比利和科馬諾是日落騎士，他們即將經歷狂野西部有史以來最瘋狂的槍戰……

Choplifter III - Rescue-Survive (USA).name: 劈砍者 III
Choplifter III - Rescue-Survive (USA).original_desc:
Choplifter III for the SNES features entirely different levels from the Game Gear and GameBoy versions, and plays slightly different than other Choplifter games. While the controls and basic gameplay haven't changed significantly, and the main goal of each level is still rescuing a certain number of hostages, Choplifter III is faster and more action-oriented than earlier Choplifter games.

Enemies appear in larger variety and numbers now. They reappear more often and some levels feature fights against large bosses. To compensate for this, there are more power-ups (such as missiles, bombs, invisibility, etc.) available, and it is possible to have the helicopter repaired at certain points in a level.
Choplifter III - Rescue-Survive (USA).desc:
SNES 版 Choplifter III 的關卡與 Game Gear 和 GameBoy 版本完全不同，玩法也與其他 Choplifter 遊戲略有不同。雖然控制和基本遊戲玩法沒有顯著變化，並且每個關卡的主要目標仍然是營救一定數量的人質，但 Choplifter III 比早期的 Choplifter 遊戲更快、更注重動作。

現在敵人的種類和數量都更加豐富。它們會更頻繁地出現，並且某些關卡會與大頭目進行戰鬥。為了彌補這一點，有更多的能量提升（例如導彈、炸彈、隱形等）可用，並且可以在關卡中的某些點修復直升機。

Robotrek (USA).name: 羅博特里克
Robotrek (USA).original_desc:
There exists a prosperous town named Rococo built on all the latest modern conveniences. Living in Rococo is a famous inventor, Dr. Akihabara and his son. All is peaceful until suddenly a group known as "Hackers" appear and begin causing trouble. The Hackers and their robotic monsters take part in robberies, vandalism and destruction around the world. Dr. Akihabara leaves on a voyage determined to thwart the Hackers plan, leaving his son behind in Rococo. As strange things begin to happen in and around Rococo, Akihabara's son decides to investigate.  Idolizing his father and also wishing to grow up to be an inventor, he builds himself a robotic fighting machine and sets out on his Robotrek...

Robotrek a fantasy RPG with sci-fi and steampunk elements. Player's take the role of Akihabara's son, living in his lab at Rococo. The majority of the game is an overhead view, traveling through areas, talking to people and using items. Early on in the game, the player will learn how to create a robot in the laboratory and will use this this robot in a side-view battle mode to combat monsters and gain experience. The robots can be upgraded and equipped with different types of weapons, both found and invented. The player can have a total of three different robots to choose to send to battle, which allows customization strategies for certain situations and enemies.

Akihabara's son will also need to think up new inventions to thwart the challenges in front of him. He gets the ideas for these inventions from talking to people or witnessing events which cause a lightbulb to go off above his head. New items then become available for production in the lab. Also, many existing items including his own inventions can be combined properly in the lab to create new items and weapons. Items no longer wanted can often be turned into scrap which sometimes is also able to be combined.
Robotrek (USA).desc:
有一個名為洛可可的繁榮小鎮，建立在所有最新的現代便利設施之上。住在洛可可的是著名發明家秋葉原博士和他的兒子。一切都很平靜，直到一個被稱為“黑客”的組織突然出現並開始製造麻煩。黑客和他們的機器人怪物在世界各地參與搶劫、破壞和破壞活動。秋葉原博士踏上旅程，決心挫敗黑客計劃，將兒子留在洛可可。隨著洛可可及其周邊地區開始發生奇怪的事情，秋葉原的兒子決定進行調查。他崇拜他的父親，也希望長大後成為一名發明家，他為自己建造了一台機器人戰鬥機器，並開始了他的機器人之旅……

Robotrek 是一款帶有科幻和蒸汽朋克元素的奇幻角色扮演遊戲。玩家扮演秋葉原的兒子，住在洛可可實驗室裡。遊戲的大部分內容都是俯視圖，穿越區域、與人交談和使用物品。在遊戲的早期，玩家將學習如何在實驗室中創建機器人，並在側視戰鬥模式中使用這個機器人來對抗怪物並獲得經驗。機器人可以升級並配備不同類型的武器，包括發現的和發明的。玩家總共可以選擇三種不同的機器人進行戰鬥，這允許針對特定情況和敵人定制策略。

秋葉原的兒子還需要想出新的發明來應對他面前的挑戰。他從與人交談或目睹導致燈泡在他頭頂上熄滅的事件中獲得了這些發明的想法。然後新產品即可在實驗室進行生產。此外，包括他自己的發明在內的許多現有物品都可以在實驗室中正確組合以創造新的物品和武器。不再需要的物品通常會變成廢料，有時也可以組合起來。

Donkey Kong Country 3 - Dixie Kong's Dou.key: Donkey Kong Country 3 - Dixie Kong's Double Trouble! (USA) (En,Fr)
Donkey Kong Country 3 - Dixie Kong's Dou.original_name: Donkey Kong Country 3 : Dixie Kong's Double Trouble!
Donkey Kong Country 3 - Dixie Kong's Dou.name: 大金剛國度3：迪克西·孔的雙重麻煩！
Donkey Kong Country 3 - Dixie Kong's Dou.original_desc:
This time both Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong have been kong-napped by a mysterious new leader of the Kremlings, and it's up to Dixie and new team mate Kiddy Kong to save the day.

New elements to the series includes the Brother Bears, thirteen Bears who, if you pay them with Bear Coins found in each level, will aid you in your quest by building certain items. Also, new bonus mission have you playing a 1st/3rd person shooter style party game. Plus a host of new enemies, the usual huge end of world bosses and a collection of the Kong family who will help you out as best they can.
Donkey Kong Country 3 - Dixie Kong's Dou.desc:
這一次，大金剛和迪迪金剛都被克里姆林家族的神秘新領袖打倒了，迪克西和新隊友金剛基迪要拯救世界。

該系列的新元素包括熊兄弟，十三隻熊，如果你用每個關卡中找到的熊幣支付給他們，他們將通過建造某些物品來幫助你完成任務。此外，新的獎勵任務讓您玩第一人稱/第三人稱射擊風格的派對遊戲。還有許多新的敵人、常見的世界末日大佬和孔家族的成員，他們將盡最大努力幫助你。

Pop'n TwinBee (Europe).name: Pop'n TwinBee
Pop'n TwinBee (Europe).original_desc:
As the other games in the series Pop'n Twinbee is a vertically-scrolling arcade shooter in which you and a friend get behind the controls of Twinbee and Winbee, the cutest starfighters ever created, and try to clear stage after stage of enemies with your weapons. Being a console original instead of a port, Pop'n features a number of additions to the gameplay mechanics, including an energy bar, eight difficulty levels and a handicap feature when playing with a friend (which makes most enemies target one fighter instead of the other).

The upgrade system remains consistent with the series's: you shoot colored bells which give different power-ups when collected, including multiple shots, "options" and shield energy. Also when correctly powered-up both fighters can join and perform powerful team-up moves.
Pop'n TwinBee (Europe).desc:
與該系列中的其他遊戲一樣，Pop'n Twinbee 是一款垂直捲軸街機射擊遊戲，您和朋友可以控制有史以來最可愛的星際戰鬥機 Twinbee 和 Winbee，並嘗試用武器清除一個又一個的敵人。作為主機原創而非移植，Pop'n 在遊戲機制上添加了許多附加功能，包括能量條、八個難度級別以及與朋友一起玩時的障礙功能（這使得大多數敵人瞄準一名戰士而不是另一名戰士）。

升級系統與系列保持一致：你發射彩色鈴鐺，收集後會提供不同的能量提升，包括多次射擊、“選項”和護盾能量。此外，當正確啟動時，兩名戰士都可以加入並執行強大的團隊動作。

Ninjawarriors (USA).name: 忍者武士
Ninjawarriors (USA).original_desc: In “Ninja Warriors,” you fight as one of three cybernetic ninja warriors — Ninja, Kunoichi, or Kamaitachi — against the tyrant Benglar, who controls the land with his brainwashed forces. Each character has unique abilities, but all can attack, jump, grab enemies, block attacks, and unleash a special screen-wide attack that charges during combat. Your mission is to battle through side-scrolling levels, overcome obstacles, and eliminate Benglar to liberate the land.
Ninjawarriors (USA).desc: 在《忍者武士》中，你將扮演三位控制論忍者武士（忍者、女忍者或釜橘）之一，對抗暴君班格拉爾，後者用洗腦的軍隊控制著這片土地。每個角色都有獨特的能力，但所有人都可以攻擊、跳躍、抓住敵人、格擋攻擊，並在戰鬥中發動特殊的全屏攻擊。你的任務是在橫向捲軸關卡中戰鬥，克服障礙，消滅班格拉爾以解放土地。

Donkey Kong Country (USA) (Rev 2).name: 大金剛國度
Donkey Kong Country (USA) (Rev 2).original_desc: Help Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong get back those stolen bananas!After a dark and stormy night, Donkey Kong finds all of his bananas stolen by K. Rool and his reptilian crew of Kremlings! Armed with chest-pounding muscle, mighty barrel rolls, and awesome vine-swinging skills, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong set out to face their adversaries! Play solo, compete with a friend, or play cooperatively with a friend in over 100 levels filled with collectibles and hidden bonus levels. With the help of Donkey Kong's quirky family, animal friends, and your fast reflexes, our dynamic duo will prove to be an unstoppable force. Time to save those bananas!
Donkey Kong Country (USA) (Rev 2).desc: 幫助大金剛和迪迪金剛找回那些被盜的香蕉！經過一個漆黑的暴風雨之夜後，大金剛發現他所有的香蕉都被 K. Rool 和他的克雷姆林爬虫族偷走了！憑藉令人震撼的胸部肌肉、強大的桶滾和令人驚嘆的藤蔓擺動技巧，大金剛和吹迪金剛開始迎戰他們的對手！在 100 多個充滿收藏品和隱藏獎勵關卡的關卡中，單獨玩、與朋友競爭或與朋友合作玩。在大金剛古怪的家人、動物朋友和你的快速反應的幫助下，我們充滿活力的二人組將成為一支不可阻擋的力量。是時候拯救那些香蕉了！

Tactics Ogre - Let Us Cling Together (Ja.key: Tactics Ogre - Let Us Cling Together (Japan) (Rev 2) (Translated)
Tactics Ogre - Let Us Cling Together (Ja.original_name: Tactics Ogre : Let Us Cling Together
Tactics Ogre - Let Us Cling Together (Ja.name: 戰術食人魔：讓我們緊緊團結在一起
Tactics Ogre - Let Us Cling Together (Ja.original_desc:
Tactics Ogre is a very detailed 3-D isometric turn based war / rpg sim. You start out with a band of troops and build a small army and fight many battles with choices to make in between battles that will determine which one of the 8 possible endings in a non-linear storyline. 

You have the option to recruit characters, control individual equipment of each character, with over 6 male character classes, 6 female character classes, 3 demi-human classes, and more. You can also train at safe locations to advance your army before the next battle / storyline advancement.
Tactics Ogre - Let Us Cling Together (Ja.desc:
Tactics Ogre 是一款非常詳細的 3D 等距回合製戰爭/角色扮演模擬遊戲。你從一支部隊開始，組建一支小軍隊，進行許多場戰鬥，在戰鬥之間做出的選擇將決定非線性故事情節中 8 種可能結局中的哪一個。

你可以選擇招募角色，控制每個角色的個人裝備，有超過 6 個男性角色類別、6 個女性角色類別、3 個半人類角色類別等等。您還可以在安全的地點進行訓練，以便在下一場戰鬥/故事情節推進之前推進您的軍隊。

HyperZone (USA).name: 超地帶
HyperZone (USA).original_desc: A 3D shooter similar to Space Harrier. Control different futuristic flying vehicles and blast your way through numerous enemies and obstacles. If your ship is getting too fast, you can use the brakes, however flying too slow damages your ship. Apart from the standard weapons, most ships have a special attack that can be charged by holding down the fire button. The action takes place on set tracks; leaving those tacks will cause heavy damage to your ship. You can repair your ship by flying over certain areas. At the end of end of each level, a boss has to be defeated.
HyperZone (USA).desc: 一款類似於《太空鷂》的3D射擊遊戲。控制不同的未來飛行器，衝破無數的敵人和障礙。如果你的船太快，你可以使用剎車，但是飛行太慢會損壞你的船。除了標準武器外，大多數艦艇都具有特殊攻擊功能，可以通過按住開火按鈕進行蓄力。動作發生在既定軌道上；留下這些釘子會對你的船造成嚴重損壞。你可以通過飛越某些區域來修理你的飛船。在每個關卡的最後，都必須擊敗老闆。

Magic Sword (USA).name: 魔劍
Magic Sword (USA).original_desc:
As the hero, you must climb up a monster-ridden tower to defeat Drokkmar, master of the Blackorb. To do this, you must defeat his army that stands in your way with whatever weapon you are carrying. Health is decreased by coming into contact with various monsters, attacks, traps, and the passage of time. It is increased by finding food. Every certain amount of points, a "Food Fairy" appears and drops off food as well.

Throughout your journey, you can smash open chests to find treasure and artifacts. Some of these artifacts can be recovered that alter gameplay, such as providing more damage or increased magical power. Also throughout your journey, you can collect keys, which are used to free imprisoned allies, who not only help you defeat monsters, but also leave you an item that will help you on your quest. Only one person can join you at a time.

As you progress through the tower, you will be granted new magical weapons after each boss you defeat. The weapons are affected by a "magic bar" that charges over time. When this bar is fully charged, the weapon has a powerful ranged attack, but when not charged only a close attack is produced. A magical staff will grant increased range attack ability. A magical blast may be generated by jumping and attacking, but doing this costs health.

There are multiple paths in the game, and two separate endings. Hidden doors can be used to skip levels when found - usually by attacking a wall or a particular spot.
Magic Sword (USA).desc:
作為英雄，你必須爬上一座怪物橫行的塔樓，打敗黑球之主卓克瑪。要做到這一點，你必須擊敗使用你攜帶的任何武器阻擋你的軍隊。生命值會因接觸各種怪物、攻擊、陷阱和時間的流逝而減少。它通過尋找食物而增加。每達到一定的分數，就會出現一個“美食仙子”並掉落食物。

在整個旅程中，您可以砸開箱子來尋找寶藏和文物。其中一些文物可以被恢復，從而改變遊戲玩法，例如提供更多傷害或增加魔法力量。在你的整個旅程中，你還可以收集鑰匙，這些鑰匙可以用來釋放被監禁的盟友，他們不僅可以幫助你擊敗怪物，還可以為你留下一個可以幫助你完成任務的物品。一次只有一個人可以加入您。

當你在塔中前進時，在擊敗每個 Boss 後，你將獲得新的魔法武器。這些武器會受到“魔法棒”的影響，隨著時間的推移會產生能量。當該條充滿電時，該武器具有強大的遠程攻擊力，但未蓄電時僅產生近距離攻擊。魔法杖將增加範圍攻擊能力。跳躍和攻擊可能會產生魔法爆炸，但這樣做會消耗生命值。

遊戲中有多條路徑，以及兩個不同的結局。隱藏的門可用於在被發現時跳過關卡——通常是通過攻擊牆壁或特定地點。

Joe & Mac (USA).name: 喬和麥克
Joe & Mac (USA).original_desc:
Back in the distant past (way back - like when "rock and roll" was just rock and fast food was dinner you couldn't catch), lived two cave dudes named Joe and Mac. Whether it was dinosaur demolition or pterodactyl hang-glidin', life for the boys was pretty cool.

Cool, that is, until a bogus bunch of neanderthal nerds crashed their village and scared off all the cave-babes. Now the cave-babes are out there - SOMEWHERE, lost and reeeeally lonely... so what are you waitin' for? It's up to Joe and Mac to get 'em back.
Joe & Mac (USA).desc:
回到遙遠的過去（很久以前——就像“搖滾樂”只是搖滾樂而快餐只是你吃不到的晚餐一樣），住著兩個名叫喬和麥克的穴居人。無論是拆除恐龍還是翼手龍滑翔，男孩們的生活都非常酷。

很酷，也就是說，直到一群虛假的尼安德特書呆子闖入了他們的村莊並嚇跑了所有的洞穴寶貝。現在洞穴寶貝們就在那裡——在某個地方，迷失了方向，而且非常孤獨……所以你還在等什麼？喬和麥克要把他們救回來。

Super Bonk (USA).name: 超級邦克
Super Bonk (USA).original_desc:
The fourth game in the regular "Bonk" caveman series, Bonk is back on his first Super Nintendo outing.

In this side-scrolling platformer adventure, the gameplay is similar to Bonk 3. Super Bonk allows Bonk to travel through time from his prehistoric levels, the insides of a dinosaur, a version of modern Chinatown, and even the moon!  Along the way, Bonk can find power-ups that can change his form to creatures such as a shooting Bonk crab, a dinosaur form called "Big Kronk", find candies that change his size from tiny to huge, travel through transportation tubes, and find multiple bonus levels.

Bonk still uses his head to smash his enemies, propeller seeds that allow Bonk to fly, and for the first time, can carry spring flowers on his head in his continuing battle against his arch nemesis, King Drool!
Super Bonk (USA).desc:
作為常規“Bonk”穴居人系列的第四款遊戲，Bonk 再次回歸他的首次超級任天堂之旅。

在這款橫向捲軸平台冒險遊戲中，遊戲玩法與 Bonk 3 類似。 Super Bonk 可以讓 Bonk 穿越時空，從史前關卡、恐龍內部、現代唐人街，甚至月球！一路上，邦克可以找到可以將他的形態改變為生物的能量提升，例如射擊邦克蟹，一種名為“大克朗克”的恐龍形態，找到可以將他的尺寸從小到大改變的糖果，穿過運輸管道，並找到多個獎勵級別。

邦克仍然用他的頭來粉碎他的敵人，螺旋槳種子讓邦克能夠飛翔，並且第一次可以在頭上頂著春天的花朵，繼續與他的宿敵口水王戰鬥！

Super Bowling (USA).name: 超級保齡球
Super Bowling (USA).original_desc:
Super Bowling is a third-person bowling game. Players may bowl in several different environments, which range from ice ponds to neon-lit Chinese temples. Players can face-off against characters in their home stages, much like a fighting game. If the player wins they can then play on these stages in other play modes.

Multi-player modes are also available, with a number of different variations.
Super Bowling (USA).desc:
超級保齡球是一款第三人稱保齡球遊戲。玩家可以在幾種不同的環境中打球，從冰池到霓虹燈照亮的中國寺廟。玩家可以在自己的主場與角色對峙，就像格鬥遊戲一樣。如果玩家獲勝，他們就可以在這些階段以其他遊戲模式進行遊戲。

多人遊戲模式也可用，有許多不同的變化。

Lost Vikings 2 (USA).name: 失落的維京人2
Lost Vikings 2 (USA).original_desc:
Their lost is your game.

The lost boys are back: Erik the Swift, Baelog the Fierce and Olaf the Stout. This action strategy is not for the lame of brain. In their last adventure, the trio was trying to escape the evil alien captor Tomator. Now, armed with all new high tech weaponry the boys heisted from Tomator, they set out to find the time machine that will land them back home. The vikes escape together or not at all. So, it's your challenge to complete each of the levels with all three characters alive an kick'n! Plug in, boot up and fight! Norse by Norsewest.
Lost Vikings 2 (USA).desc:
他們輸了就是你的遊戲。

失踪的男孩們回來了：迅捷的埃里克、兇猛的巴洛格和粗壯的奧拉夫。這種行動策略不適合大腦遲鈍的人。在他們的最後一次冒險中，三人試圖逃離邪惡的外星俘虜番茄。現在，男孩們配備了從番茄手中搶來的所有新型高科技武器，開始尋找時間機器，讓他們回家。維京人要么一起逃跑，要么根本不逃跑。所以，你的挑戰是在所有三個角色都活著的情況下完成每個關卡！插上電源，啟動並戰鬥！Norse by Norsewest。

FireStriker (USA).name: 火力前鋒
FireStriker (USA).original_desc:
A long time ago the kingdoms of wind, fire, earth and water
competed for the Trialight, a weapon created by the Arch Mage Wylde that can only be used by a Firestriker. The kingdom of wind won and united the four kingdoms. Wylde however, was not satisfied with peace and conjured four monsters to overthrow the united world. Now, only the kingdom of wind remains and the player takes control over the last Firestriker to free the other kingdoms and defeat the monsters.

Even though Firestriker looks like a typical SNES RPG, it is in fact an action game that has more in common with a pinball-game than with any other genre. The Trialight is a ball of fire that basically behaves like a pinball. The player controls the Firestriker who can freely walk across the screen and strike at the Trialight to control its movement. Levels are filled with obstacles, destroyable block and monsters. Monsters and blocks can only be destroyed by the Trialight. The goal of each level is to maneuver the Trialight towards the exit of the screen. The exit is usually blocked by destroyable obstacles and sometimes certain conditions (such as killing all monsters or destroying certain objects) have to be fulfilled before a level can be completed. If the Firestriker is killed or the Trialight falls off the screen, the player loses a life. Additionally to the Firestriker, the player can use the shoulder buttons to control a magician who (in single player mode) stays at the bottom of the screen. The levels consist of several screens and are entered from a world map. As the game progresses, the player will also fight several bosses and free other Firestrikers whose special abilities are necessary to complete the game.

Firestriker also features a two-player cooperative mode as well as a duel-mode for up to four players.
FireStriker (USA).desc:
很久以前，風、火、土、水的王國
爭奪 Trialight，這是一種由大法師 Wylde 創建的武器，只能由 Firestrider 使用。風之國獲勝並統一了四個王國。然而，維爾德並不滿足於和平，他召喚了四個怪物來推翻統一的世界。現在，只剩下風之國了，玩家控制著最後一個火襲者來解放其他王國並擊敗怪物。

儘管 Firestriker 看起來像一款典型的 SNES RPG，但它實際上是一款動作遊戲，與彈球遊戲的共同點比任何其他類型的遊戲都多。Trialight 是一個火球，其行為基本上類似於彈球。玩家控制Firestriker，它可以在屏幕上自由行走並攻擊Trialight以控制其移動。關卡充滿了障礙物、可破壞的方塊和怪物。怪物和方塊只能被 Trialight 摧毀。每個級別的目標是操縱 Trialight 朝屏幕出口移動。出口通常被可摧毀的障礙物擋住，有時必須滿足某些條件（例如殺死所有怪物或摧毀某些物體）才能完成關卡。如果Firestriker被殺死或者Trialight從屏幕上掉下來，玩家就會失去生命。除了Firestriker之外，玩家還可以使用肩部按鈕來控制魔術師（在單人遊戲模式下）停留在屏幕底部。關卡由多個屏幕組成，並從世界地圖輸入。隨著遊戲的進行，玩家還將與幾個頭目戰鬥並釋放其他完成遊戲所必需的特殊能力的火襲者。

《Firestriker》還具有兩人合作模式以及最多四名玩家的決鬥模式。

King of Demons (Japan) (Translated).name: 高歐
King of Demons (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Abel's daughter has been kidnapped by his former friend, Bayer.  Bayer has sold his soul to the devil, and sacrificed Abel's wife, in an attempt to resurrect the King of Demons.  With no other choice, Abel vows to save his daughter, no matter what the cost - even if it is his own humanity...

Majyuuou is a side-scrolling platformer for the Super Nintendo, taking influences from Castlevania and Contra.  You play as Abel, intent on rescuing his daughter from the depths of Hell.  As you defeat certain bosses, they will drop large, color changing gems.  Pick up the gem, and you'll transform into either a red Harpy, a blue Dragon, or a green Lizard, depending on what color it is when you pick it up.  Each demon type has its own special attacks.
King of Demons (Japan) (Translated).desc:
阿貝爾的女兒被他以前的朋友拜爾綁架了。拜爾將自己的靈魂出賣給了惡魔，並犧牲了亞伯的妻子，試圖復活魔王。在別無選擇的情況下，亞伯發誓要拯救他的女兒，無論付出什麼代價——即使這是他自己的人性……

Majyuuou 是超級任天堂的橫向捲軸平台遊戲，受到《惡魔城》和《魂斗羅》的影響。你扮演亞伯，一心想從地獄深處拯救他的女兒。當你擊敗某些 Boss 時，他們會掉落巨大的變色寶石。拿起寶石，你就會變成紅色哈比、藍色龍或綠色蜥蜴，具體取決於你拿起它時的顏色。每種惡魔類型都有自己的特殊攻擊。

BASS Masters Classic - Pro Edition (USA).name: 貝斯大師經典：專業版
BASS Masters Classic - Pro Edition (USA).original_desc: This game is basically an update to Bass Masters Classic. Updates involve adding 6 pro fishermen, five different lakes instead of four, an expanded lineup of different fishing equipment, 2 difficulty level settings, a zoom function, larger lakes, and new music tracks.
BASS Masters Classic - Pro Edition (USA).desc: 該遊戲基本上是 Bass Masters Classic 的更新。更新包括添加 6 名專業漁民、五個不同的湖泊（而不是四個）、擴大了不同釣魚設備的陣容、2 個難度級別設置、縮放功能、更大的湖泊和新的音樂曲目。

Mega Man Soccer (USA).name: 洛克人足球
Mega Man Soccer (USA).original_desc:
Dr. Wily, angered at being foiled once again decides to send his robots to the soccer field. Dr. Light immediately responds by forming a soccer team of Mega Mans to counter Dr. Wily's latest scheme.

Mega Man Soccer is an overhead view soccer game featuring characters from the Mega Man series. Players begin by selecting either Exhibition, Tournament, League or Capcom Championship modes. Depending on the mode, a team must be formed using either all of one type of robot, or a mixture of different types assigned to different positions on the field. In any case, each soccer team has 8 players on the field including the goalie. The goal of each team is to score on the net of the opposing team, earning points to win the game. The action follows the ball as it is tossed around the field from player to player. Once a player's team member has the ball they can choose to pass it to another teammate, shoot the ball straight ahead or perform a clearing kick (if the goalie). If the player does not have the ball, they are given control of the nearest player to the ball and can slide tackles or shoulder tackles to try to gain possession. Each type of robot has a special move that can be initiated.
Mega Man Soccer (USA).desc:
威利博士因再次失敗而感到憤怒，決定將他的機器人送到足球場。萊特博士立即做出回應，組建了一支洛克人足球隊來對抗威利博士的最新計劃。

《洛克人足球》是一款俯視足球遊戲，以《洛克人》系列中的角色為主角。玩家首先選擇表演賽、錦標賽、聯賽或 Capcom 錦標賽模式。根據模式的不同，必須使用所有一種類型的機器人或分配到場上不同位置的不同類型的混合機器人來組建團隊。無論如何，每支足球隊在場上有 8 名球員，包括守門員。每支球隊的目標都是擊中對方球隊的網得分，贏得比賽的勝利。當球在球場上從一個球員拋到另一個球員時，動作就會隨之發生。一旦球員的球隊成員拿到球，他們可以選擇將球傳給另一名隊友、直接向前射門或執行解圍球（如果是守門員）。如果球員沒有球，他們將控制距離球最近的球員，並可以滑鏟或肩鏟以嘗試獲得控球權。每種類型的機器人都有一個可以啟動的特殊動作。

Killer Instinct (USA) (Rev 1).name: 殺手本能
Killer Instinct (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
In the distant future, a monopolistic and technological corporation called Ultratech organizes a fighting tournament known as "Killer Instinct". Many fighters answer the challenge to participate, including several of Ultratech's experimental warriors.  To increase the tournament's challenge, Ultratech utilizes a technology that can create bridges between alternate dimensions, releasing a creature known as Eyedol.  Eyedol is a two-headed ancient warrior that was imprisoned along with his bitter rival, Gargos. Some warriors enter the tournament to seek glory or escape.  Other fighters are attempting to bring an end to Ultratech's corruption.  

Killer Instinct is a Rare developed fighting game published by Nintendo (and distributed in the arcades by Midway).  Killer Instinct (or "KI" among its fanbase) is a 2D fighting game that features 3D rendered sprite based graphics. Players choose from 10 characters: Orchid, Cinder, Jago, Glacius, Fulgore, Riptor, Sabrewulf, Spinal, T.J. Combo, and Thunder.  

Killer Instinct is known for its heavy combo based fighting system, allowing players to pull off moves that land an insane number of hits on their opponent, the highest being the "Ultra Combo".  The gameplay is also known for its use of combo breakers, finishing moves and stage fatalities, double energy bars, and dance-music inspired techno soundtrack.
Killer Instinct (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
在遙遠的未來，一家名為 Ultratech 的壟斷科技公司組織了一場名為“殺手本能”的格鬥錦標賽。許多戰士響應挑戰參加，其中包括幾名 Ultratech 的實驗戰士。為了增加比賽的挑戰性，Ultratech 利用了一種可以在不同維度之間建立橋樑的技術，釋放了一種名為 Eyedol 的生物。Eyedol 是一位雙頭古代戰士，與他的宿敵 Gargos 一起被囚禁。有些戰士參加錦標賽是為了尋求榮耀或逃脫。其他戰士正試圖結束 Ultratech 的腐敗行為。

《殺手本能》是一款由任天堂發行的 Rare 開發格鬥遊戲（由 Midway 在街機廳發行）。《殺手本能》（Killer Instinct，在其粉絲群中稱為“KI”）是一款 2D 格鬥遊戲，具有基於 3D 渲染精靈的圖形。玩家可以從 10 個角色中進行選擇：Orchid、Cinder、Jago、Glacius、Fulgore、Riptor、Sabrewulf、Spinal、T.J.組合，還有雷霆。

《殺手本能》以其基於連擊的戰鬥系統而聞名，允許玩家完成對對手造成瘋狂數量打擊的動作，其中最高的是“超級連擊”。遊戲玩法還因其使用連擊、終結技、舞台死亡、雙能量條以及受舞曲啟發的科技配樂而聞名。

Super Smash T.V. (USA).name: 超級史克魯爾人
Super Smash T.V. (USA).original_desc:
The year is 1999. The world's most popular television show is Smash T.V., an ultra-violent contest between two armed-to-the-teeth combatants, set loose in a series of deadly arenas that are filled to bursting with hordes of mindless beasts and killer robots. The aim of the game is to blast everything in sight and try to grab more cash and prizes than the other guy. Toaster ovens, VCRs, fancy cars and luxury holidays are there for the taking... for anyone who can survive long enough to enjoy them.

Smash T.V. is an insane shoot-em-up from the brain of Eugene Jarvis, creator of Robotron: 2084. It retains that game's frantic style of play and two-joystick control method, but adds plenty of gore, violence, a hint of satire and that all-important two player mode.
Super Smash T.V. (USA).desc:
時間是 1999 年。世界上最受歡迎的電視節目是《Smash T.V.》，這是一場兩名全副武裝的戰鬥人員之間的極端暴力競賽，在一系列致命的競技場中展開，競技場中充滿了成群結隊的無意識野獸和殺手機器人。遊戲的目的是炸毀眼前的一切，並嘗試比其他人搶到更多的現金和獎品。烤麵包機、錄像機、豪華汽車和豪華假期都可供您享用……任何能活得足夠久的人都可以享受它們。

Smash T.V. 是一款由《Robotron: 2084》的創造者尤金·賈維斯 (Eugene Jarvis) 創作的瘋狂射擊遊戲。它保留了該遊戲的瘋狂遊戲風格和兩操縱桿控制方法，但添加了大量血腥、暴力、諷刺意味以及最重要的兩人模式。

Illusion of Gaia (USA).name: 蓋亞幻象
Illusion of Gaia (USA).original_desc:
Will is a young boy whose father disappeared long time ago. Now Will lives in a small town with his grandparents. He possesses unusual abilities of pushing and pulling things without touching them. One day, he finds in his house a girl, who soon turns out to be the princess Kara. Kara's father, king Edward, wants her to marry a mysterious person called the Jackal. Kara asks Will to help her to escape the palace, and soon they both get involved in a string of mystery and conspiracies...

The game is somewhat similar to the famous Legend of Zelda games, also having a "save the princess" story, and employing real-time combat. Will can also use his special abilities to solve simple environmental puzzles.
Illusion of Gaia (USA).desc:
威爾是一個小男孩，他的父親很久以前就失踪了。現在威爾和他的祖父母住在一個小鎮上。他擁有在不接觸物體的情況下推拉物體的非凡能力。有一天，他在家裡發現了一個女孩，很快她就是卡拉公主。卡拉的父親愛德華國王希望她嫁給一個名叫豺狼的神秘人。卡拉請求威爾幫助她逃離宮殿，很快他們倆就捲入了一連串的謎團和陰謀之中……

該遊戲有點類似於著名的塞爾達傳說遊戲，同樣有“拯救公主”的故事，並採用即時戰鬥。威爾還可以利用他的特殊能力來解決簡單的環境難題。

Inspector Gadget (USA).name: 檢查員小工具
Inspector Gadget (USA).original_desc:
Inspector Gadget is on yet another mission against the evil Doctor Claw and his army of M.A.D. (Mean And Dirty) agents.  This time it's personal because Doctor Claw has captured Gadget's niece, Penny.  With the help of his trusty dog, Brain, and his suit full of special gadgets, Inspector Gadget must save Penny and defeat Doctor Claw and his minions!

Gadget will start in a haunted castle in England, and from there, he will travel to many places around the world while pursuing Doctor Claw. On the way, he will be confronted by Doctor Claw's agents, and the only way to get by them is to use his gadgets and items against them.

Gadget can attack his enemies by using his punch (up, left right) and kicks which he is already equipped with.  

Several items he picked up can be used as weapons: 

Bombs - throw at enemies

Red Propellers - to be used against aerial enemies 

Offensive Arrow - shoot at enemies 

Little Inspector Gadgets - little robots that will run at and damage enemies.

If Gadget gets hit, he will lose his overcoat, leaving him in his boxers! In this state, he will lose a life if he gets hit again.  To prevent this from happening, pick up an extra overcoat that he can change into.

Other items include: 

Hands - comes up from Gadget's hat and will grasp onto rings

Suction cups - shoot at walls and have Gadget climb up them

Hats - used as energy source for certain gadgets
Inspector Gadget (USA).desc:
加吉特督察正在執行另一項任務，對抗邪惡的爪博士和他的 M.A.D 軍隊。（卑鄙骯髒的）特工。這次是私人恩怨，因為克勞博士抓走了加吉特的侄女佩妮。在他值得信賴的狗 Brain 和他裝滿特殊裝置的套裝的幫助下，Gadget 督察必須拯救 Penny 並擊敗 Claw 博士和他的爪牙！

加吉特將從英國一座鬧鬼的城堡開始，從那裡開始，他將在世界各地尋找克洛博士。在路上，他會遇到克勞博士的特工，擺脫他們的唯一方法就是使用他的小工具和物品來對付他們。

Gadget可以使用他已經裝備的拳（上、左、右）和踢來攻擊他的敵人。

他撿到的一些物品可以用作武器：

炸彈——扔向敵人

紅色螺旋槳 - 用於對抗空中敵人

進攻箭 - 向敵人射擊

小督察小工具 - 會跑向敵人並傷害敵人的小機器人。

如果加吉特被擊中，他會失去大衣，只穿著四角褲！這種狀態下，再被擊中，他就會丟掉性命。為了防止這種情況發生，請多買一件大衣供他更換。

其他項目包括：

手 - 從 Gadget 的帽子中伸出並抓住戒指

吸盤 - 向牆壁射擊並讓 Gadget 爬上去

帽子 - 用作某些小工具的能源

Final Fantasy II (USA) (Rev 1).name: 最終幻想系列
Final Fantasy II (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
This is the fourth entry in the  Final Fantasy series. It was known as Final Fantasy II internationally, because the  second and third games were never released outside of Japan.

The military country of Baron is one of the strongest in the land, with a proud army and a majestic air force known as the Red Wings. But, while their armies are kind and loyal, the recent actions of the King are anything but. The young Captain of the Red Wings, Cecil, is ordered to steal a crystal from a village of innocent magicians, and when he questions the actions of his King, Cecil is immediately thrown out of the country and sent off to kill strange monsters. Little does he realize the price the King's actions will pay, and what the true secret of the crystals, and their powers, truly is...

This is the first Final Fantasy game that introduced the famous ATB (active-time battle) system: during the battles, you have a time indicator for each party member that tells you when this character is able to act. If it takes you too long to select a command for this character, the enemy will act without waiting for your turn. The game abandons the job system that was implemented in the  first and the  third game in favor of pre-set character classes (paladin, white mage, ninja, etc.) assigned to each party member.

The PlayStation version adds a new rendered intro and ending.
Final Fantasy II (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
這是《最終幻想》系列的第四部作品。它在國際上被稱為《最終幻想 II》，因為第二部和第三部遊戲從未在日本以外地區發行。

男爵的軍事國家是這片土地上最強大的國家之一，擁有一支驕傲的軍隊和一支被稱為紅翼的雄偉空軍。但是，儘管他們的軍隊友善而忠誠，但國王最近的舉動卻絕非如此。年輕的紅翼隊長塞西爾奉命從一個無辜魔法師的村莊偷走一塊水晶，當他質疑國王的行為時，塞西爾立即被趕出了這個國家，並被派去殺死奇怪的怪物。他幾乎沒有意識到國王的行為將付出的代價，以及水晶的真正秘密及其力量到底是什麼......

這是第一款引入著名的 ATB（實時戰鬥）系統的《最終幻想》遊戲：在戰鬥中，每個隊伍成員都有一個時間指示器，告訴您該角色何時能夠行動。如果你花了太長時間為這個角色選擇命令，敵人就會不等你的回合就採取行動。遊戲放棄了第一款和第三款遊戲中實施的工作系統，轉而為每個黨員分配預設的角色類別（聖騎士、白法師、忍者等）。

PlayStation 版本添加了新渲染的介紹和結局。

Street Fighter II Turbo (USA) (Rev 1).name: 街頭霸王 II 渦輪增壓
Street Fighter II Turbo (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Choose from twelve street fighters from around the world, skilled in a variety of martial arts -- for instance, a character named E.Honda is a sumo wrestler from Japan, while Ken is a master of Tae Kwon Do from the United States. Journey to different countries to defeat other fighters, eventually leading up to a battle with evil man M.Bison. Besides the standard punches and kicks, each character can also execute special moves, such as energy projectiles or lightning-fast kicks, for more damage or to create a chain of hit combos. 

This home version is a re-release of the original Street Fighter 2 game with several major improvements: the 'boss' characters (Vega, Balrog, Sagat, and M. Bison) are automatically unlocked for you to play, each character receives some new or upgraded moves and costume colors, and you can select a Turbo speed level which lets you play at a faster speed. It is based on the arcade re-release by the same name which also contained the subtitle "Hyper Fighting."
Street Fighter II Turbo (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
從來自世界各地、精通各種武術的 12 名街頭霸王中進行選擇 - 例如，名為 E.Honda 的角色是來自日本的相撲選手，而 Ken 是來自美國的跆拳道大師。前往不同國家擊敗其他戰士，最終與邪惡之徒 M.Bison 展開戰鬥。除了標準的拳打腳踢之外，每個角色還可以執行特殊動作，例如能量射彈或閃電般的快速踢腿，以造成更多傷害或創造一系列連擊。

這個家庭版是原版《街頭霸王 2》遊戲的重新發布，有幾項重大改進：“Boss”角色（Vega、Balrog、Sagat 和 M.Bison）會自動解鎖供您玩，每個角色都會收到一些新的或升級的動作和服裝顏色，並且您可以選擇 Turbo 速度級別，讓您以更快的速度玩。它基於同名街機重新發行，其中還包含副標題“超級格鬥”。

Spanky's Quest (USA).name: 斯潘奇的任務
Spanky's Quest (USA).original_desc:
Spanky's Quest is a game about a monkey who decides to go on a picnic.  While on his way through the forest he see's a witch in the sky and out of nowhere bricks begin to make a tower around the area Spanky is in.  The witch challenges Spanky to come to the final tower and she will free him but before she flies away she turns the fruits in his knapsack into living fruit monsters.  Unknowingly, she drops a magic ball which agrees to help Spanky out on his quest.

The object of the game is to get through all six of the towers which consist of 10 levels as well as a boss battle.  In order to proceed to the next level, you must acquire the amount of keys the locked door requires.  Keys are found lying around until a monster picks them up in which case you must use your ball on them to get it.  The ball has for different attacks: baseball, soccer ball, volleyball and basketball.  In order to attain a stronger ball, the ball must be bounced on Spankey's head.  Spanky also gets different hats which give him a specific power until he loses it or the level ends.
Spanky's Quest (USA).desc:
Spanky's Quest 是一款關於一隻猴子決定去野餐的遊戲。在穿過森林的路上，他看到空中有一個女巫，不知從什麼地方冒出來的磚塊開始在 Spanky 所在的區域周圍建造一座塔。女巫向 Spanky 發起挑戰，要求他來到最後一座塔，她會釋放他，但在她飛走之前，她將他背包裡的水果變成了活生生的水果怪物。不知不覺中，她掉落了一個魔法球，魔法球同意幫助斯潘基完成他的任務。

遊戲的目標是通過所有六座塔樓，共 10 個關卡以及一場 Boss 戰。為了進入下一關，您必須獲得鎖著的門所需的鑰匙數量。鑰匙被發現躺在周圍，直到怪物撿起它們，在這種情況下，你必須使用你的球來獲取它。球有不同的攻擊方式：棒球、足球、排球和籃球。為了獲得更強的球，球必須彈到斯潘基的頭上。Spanky 還獲得了不同的帽子，這些帽子賦予他特定的力量，直到他失去它或關卡結束。

Fire Emblem - Seisen no Keifu (Japan) (T.name: 文件嵌入：《聖戰紀夫》
Fire Emblem - Seisen no Keifu (Japan) (T.original_desc: The fourth installment in the popular strategy series, set in the continent of Jugdral, southeast of Akaneia. The game's first fifth chapters follow the Prince of Chalphy, Sigurd -- from there, his son Celis becomes the protagonist. The game uses the same turn-based strategy gameplay as its predecessors, but changes up the promotion system by making it entirely level-based, adds RPG-style status effects, and introduces the concept of the weapons triangle, in that a sword is strong against an axe, spear against the sword, and axe against the spear. Seisen no Keifu also featured much larger maps than previous titles (though a lower number of them -- 12 in all) and a handful of new units, such as the Troubadour, Dragon Master, and Falcon Knight. The game was released late in the Super Famicom's lifecycle in Japan and never published internationally.
Fire Emblem - Seisen no Keifu (Japan) (T.desc: 廣受歡迎的策略系列的第四部，以阿卡內亞東南部的朱格德拉大陸為背景。遊戲的前第五章講述了查爾菲王子西格德的故事——從那裡開始，他的兒子塞利斯成為主角。遊戲採用了與前作相同的回合製策略玩法，但改變了升級系統，使其完全基於關卡，增加了RPG風格的狀態效果，並引入了武器三角的概念，即劍對斧，矛對劍，斧對矛。《聖戰記風》的地圖也比之前的遊戲大得多（儘管地圖數量較少——總共 12 個）和一些新單位，例如游吟詩人、龍大師和獵鷹騎士。該遊戲是在超級任天堂的生命週期後期在日本發行的，並且從未在國際上發行。

EarthBound (USA).name: 地球之旅
EarthBound (USA).original_desc: EarthBound begins in the quiet town of Onett, where a meteor crash shatters young Ness's ordinary life. A strange being named Buzz Buzz warns him of Giygas, a monstrous alien set to destroy the world, and reveals that only four children can stop him. Ness must find Paula, Jeff, and Poo to battle bizarre enemies in this turn-based RPG. Travel through quirky locations, gain experience, use psychic powers, and survive heavy hits thanks to the rolling HP meter. Weaker enemies flee from strong heroes, and saving is done by phoning Ness's dad. A heartfelt, humorous, and deeply imaginative adventure awaits.
EarthBound (USA).desc: EarthBound 開始於安靜的奧內特小鎮，一場流星墜落打破了年輕尼斯的平凡生活。一個名叫巴茲巴茲的奇怪生物警告他吉加斯，一個即將毀滅世界的可怕外星人，並透露只有四個孩子可以阻止他。在這款回合製角色扮演遊戲中，尼斯必須找到寶拉、傑夫和普，與奇異的敵人作戰。穿越奇怪的地點，獲得經驗，使用心靈力量，並通過滾動的生命值計在重擊中倖存下來。較弱的敵人逃離強大的英雄，通過給內斯的父親打電話來拯救。一場真摯、幽默、富有想像力的冒險等待著您。

Zombies Ate My Neighbors (USA).name: 殭屍吃了我的鄰居
Zombies Ate My Neighbors (USA).original_desc: In the game you are a male or female protagonist (Zeke or Julia), fighting the vampires, mummies, zombies, etc. on over 50 levels (not including secrets) and saving all of the people you find. There are defined number of neighbors you save on every level. When they are free then "Exit" door opens and you jump on next level.The levels differ from mall and grocery store to beaches and football fields. Using different weapons such as bazooka or water gun you have to kill the bosses such as huge babies, dragons or ants at the end of levels. You can play the game with two players cooperatively.
Zombies Ate My Neighbors (USA).desc: 在遊戲中，您是男性或女性主角（Zeke 或 Julia），在 50 多個關卡（不包括秘密）中與吸血鬼、木乃伊、殭屍等作戰，並拯救所有您找到的人。您在每個級別上保存的鄰居數量都是固定的。當他們有空時，“出口”門就會打開，你就會跳到下一層。這些級別從購物中心和雜貨店到海灘和足球場都有所不同。使用不同的武器，如火箭筒或水槍，你必須在關卡結束時殺死頭目，如巨大的嬰兒、龍或螞蟻。您可以與兩名玩家合作玩遊戲。

Hagane - The Final Conflict (USA).name: 哈根：最後的衝突
Hagane - The Final Conflict (USA).original_desc: Hagane: The Final Conflict pulls you into a hidden war between two ancient ninja clans whose power goes far beyond the human. The Fuma clan has long guarded the Holy Grail – an artifact capable of wiping out the entire world. When the rival Koma clan steals it and destroys an entire Fuma faction, only one warrior survives: Hagane. His body is gone, but a mysterious master saves his brain and rebuilds him as a near-superhuman cyborg. Armed with incredible strength, blistering speed, and a vow of vengeance, you hunt the Koma clan to reclaim the Grail and prevent the world from falling into ruin.
Hagane - The Final Conflict (USA).desc: Hagane：最後的衝突將你帶入兩個古老忍者部落之間的隱藏戰爭，他們的力量遠遠超出了人類。風魔族長久以來守護著聖杯——一件能夠消滅整個世界的神器。當對手 Koma 氏族偷走它並摧毀整個 Fuma 派係時，只有一名戰士倖存：Hagane。他的身體消失了，但一位神秘的大師拯救了他的大腦，並將他重建為近乎超人的機器人。憑藉令人難以置信的力量、驚人的速度和復仇的誓言，你將追捕科馬氏族，奪回聖杯並阻止世界陷入毀滅。

Bassin's Black Bass (USA).name: 巴森黑鱸
Bassin's Black Bass (USA).original_desc:
Bassin's Black Bass is a fishing game endorsed by the professional fishing champion Hank Parker. It is another entry in Hot-B's long line of fishing games. Players aim to become a professional fisherman and can travel by themselves or along with Hank.

There are four different fishing areas players advance to as they win each round of the tournament. Players travel by boat on the water, select a fishing spot and then select lure and cast fish. Certain types of fish are only available at specific spots. There is also a fish radar that makes a sound when there is fish nearby. Players need to select the correct type of lure (there are about 20), keep track of weather conditions and the limited time available in tournaments. Some fish fight back hard and need to be reeled in with careful timing.

The four tournaments are Local Amateur Tournament, Amateur Bass Championship, Pro Bass Tournament and Bassin' World Championship. About eight types of fish can be caught.
Bassin's Black Bass (USA).desc:
Bassin's Black Bass 是一款由職業釣魚冠軍 Hank Parker 代言的釣魚游戲。這是 Hot-B 眾多釣魚游戲中的又一款作品。玩家的目標是成為一名職業漁夫，可以獨自或與漢克一起旅行。

當玩家贏得每一輪比賽時，他們會進入四個不同的釣魚區域。玩家乘船在水面上行駛，選擇釣魚地點，然後選擇誘餌和拋魚。某些類型的魚只能在特定地點獲得。還有一個魚雷達，當附近有魚時會發出聲音。玩家需要選擇正確的魚餌類型（大約有 20 種），跟踪天氣狀況和比賽中的有限時間。有些魚會奮力反擊，需要謹慎選擇時機。

這四項賽事分別是本地業餘錦標賽、業餘貝斯錦標賽、職業貝斯錦標賽和貝斯世界錦標賽。大約可以捕獲八種魚。

Super Turrican (USA).name: 超級巨蜥
Super Turrican (USA).original_desc:
Super Turrican is the next generation installment of the famous Turrican Series. Once again it is up to the U.S.S. Freedom Forces to get into their Turrican Assault Suits and drive back the forces of "The Machine".

Similar to it's predecessors, Super Turican features large levels that are crammed with secrets and can be explored freely and in any direction. To get rid of the numerous enemies, Turrican can use three upgradeable shots: A spreadshot, a powerful laser and a rebound that bounces off of walls. Additionally, there is a Freeze-Beam that can be used to temporarily freeze enemies. It is fully rotatable, and therefor also a great help in discovering secret capsules. These capsules contain powerups and can often be used to reach secret areas. Last but not least, Turrican has the ability to transform into an energy wheel (as long as he has enough special energy), which enables him to lay mines and even makes him invincible.
Super Turrican (USA).desc:
Super Turrican 是著名的 Turrican 系列的下一代產品。再次取決於美國。自由力量穿上他們的 Turrican 突擊服並擊退“機器”的力量。

與前作類似，《Super Turican》的關卡很大，充滿了秘密，可以從任何方向自由探索。為了消滅眾多的敵人，圖里坎可以使用三種可升級的射擊：散佈射擊、強大的激光和從牆壁上反彈的反彈。此外，還有一個冰凍光束可以用來暫時凍結敵人。它是完全可旋轉的，因此對於發現秘密膠囊也有很大幫助。這些膠囊包含能量道具，通常可用於到達秘密區域。最後但並非最不重要的一點是，圖里坎擁有變身能量輪的能力（只要他有足夠的特殊能量），這使得他能夠佈設地雷，甚至讓他所向無敵。

Legend (USA).name: 薩爾達傳說 智慧的再現
Legend (USA).original_desc:
Legend is a side-scrolling Beat' em Up set in a fantasy world. You have to rid the kingdom of Sellech of the king's evil son Clovius, who wants to conquer the kingdom by harnessing the power of the imprisoned soul of Beldor, who once ruled over Sellech as a despot.

To complete your quest, you must fight your way through numerous enemies using different combinations of slashes and kicks. You cannot perform any throws, but there are different magic attacks and a special attack. The special attack is a ranged attack that consumes a certain amount of energy, whereas the different spells use up magic bags that can be found throughout the game and damage every enemy on screen. Defeated enemies drop different kinds of items such as magic bags , food to replenish your health, money and keys that are used to open treasure chests in some of the bonus-games that take place in-between battles. Naturally, at the end of each stage, a powerful boss is waiting to be defeated.
Legend (USA).desc:
Legend 是一款以奇幻世界為背景的橫向捲軸清版動作遊戲。你必須在塞萊赫王國中消滅國王邪惡的兒子克洛維烏斯，他想利用曾經以暴君身份統治塞萊赫的貝爾多被囚禁的靈魂的力量來征服這個王國。

為了完成你的任務，你必須使用不同的砍擊和踢擊組合，打敗眾多敵人。你不能執行任何投擲，但有不同的魔法攻擊和特殊攻擊。特殊攻擊是一種遠程攻擊，會消耗一定的能量，而不同的法術會消耗整個遊戲中隨處可見的魔法袋，並對屏幕上的每個敵人造成傷害。被擊敗的敵人會掉落不同種類的物品，例如魔法袋、補充生命值的食物、金錢和鑰匙，這些物品可用於在戰鬥之間進行的一些獎勵遊戲中打開寶箱。當然，在每個階段的最後，都有一個強大的boss等待著被擊敗。

E.V.O. - Search for Eden (USA).name: E.V.O. ：尋找伊甸園
E.V.O. - Search for Eden (USA).original_desc:
The storyline of E.V.O.: Search for Eden follows the same patterns as modern Evolution theories. The players first controls a prehistoric sea organism, and fights to gain evolution points with which he can improve his fish's body parts and upgrade his attack/defense abilities. The gameplay is not completely linear, which means that certain choices of paths and stages will affect the player's success.
The game is composed of a series of stages, in which the sea organism slowly evolves into an amphibian, and later a land-only creature. The physical changes are fairly scientifically accurate which gives the game a semi-educational purpose as well.
E.V.O. - Search for Eden (USA).desc:
《E.V.O.：尋找伊甸園》的故事情節遵循與現代進化論相同的模式。玩家首先控制史前海洋生物，通過戰鬥獲得進化點，通過進化點可以改善魚的身體部位，提升攻擊/防禦能力。遊戲玩法並不完全是線性的，這意味著某些路徑和階段的選擇會影響玩家的成功。
遊戲由一系列階段組成，其中海洋生物慢慢進化為兩棲動物，後來又進化為陸地生物。物理變化在科學上相當準確，這也賦予了遊戲半教育目的。

Gemfire (USA).name: 寶石火
Gemfire (USA).original_desc:
Koei made an incursion into the fantasy worlds of magic with this game.

Six magicians, each trapped inside a magical gem, are liberated from the crown Gemfire by Princess Robyn, daughter of the tyrannical ruler of Ishmeria, King Eselred.  Fleeing across the length and breadth of the island nation, they each choose a leader from the greatest noble houses as their champion to topple Eselred and bring peace to Ishmeria. 

Players select one of these noblemen and seek to unite all the provinces under their banner through a combination of warfare and diplomacy.
Gemfire (USA).desc:
Koei 通過這款遊戲闖入了魔法的奇幻世界。

六名魔法師被困在魔法寶石中，被伊什梅里亞暴虐統治者埃塞爾雷德國王的女兒羅賓公主從寶石之火王冠中解救出來。他們逃離了這個島國的四面八方，各自從最偉大的貴族家族中選出了一位領袖作為他們的冠軍，以推翻埃塞爾雷德並為伊什梅里亞帶來和平。

玩家選擇其中一位貴族，並尋求通過戰爭和外交的結合將所有省份統一在他們的旗幟下。

Rampart (USA).name: 壁壘
Rampart (USA).original_desc: Tetris meets shoot-'em-up, Rampart was originally a one or two-player arcade game combining strategy and artillery action. Build your castle from Tetris-style pieces, place your cannons, bombard the enemy, try to repair, do it all over again. Later arcade revisions incorporated 3-player,  and the PC conversion does as well, making it a faithful, entertaining classic for multiple players on the same PC.

Secret of Evermore (USA).name: 永遠的秘密
Secret of Evermore (USA).original_desc:
You start out as a nameless boy and his dog, literally from the town of Podunk.  You chase the dog into an old abandoned mansion, where a scientist lived 30 years ago.  Some of his equipment is still operational, and when your dog chews on it, you're both sent to the strange world of Evermore.  Now you must try to get back.
The action-RPG gameplay is very much like Secret of Mana, with a few key changes.  Multiplayer is out.  Rather than three characters, there are just the two.  The equivalent of magic is alchemy, where each effect requires several base ingredients which you gather as you go along.
Secret of Evermore (USA).desc:
你一開始是一個來自波敦克鎮的無名男孩和他的狗。你把狗追進一座廢棄的老宅邸，那裡是 30 年前一位科學家住過的地方。他的一些設備仍然可以使用，當你的狗咀嚼這些設備時，你們倆都會被送到陌生的永莫世界。現在你必須努力回來。
動作角色扮演遊戲的玩法與《聖劍傳說聖劍傳說》非常相似，但有一些關鍵的變化。多人遊戲已經出來了。不是三個字符，而是兩個字符。魔法相當於煉金術，每種效果都需要幾種基本成分，你可以在進行過程中收集這些成分。

Terranigma (Europe).name: 泰拉尼格瑪
Terranigma (Europe).original_desc: Terranigma tells the story of Ark, a boy growing up in a remote village cut off from the outside world by lava. When he opens a forbidden door and releases a strange creature from a box, he disrupts the balance between two worlds and turns all villagers into stone. To save them, Ark must seek out five towers, uncover the secrets of both worlds, and confront dark forces. The game combines fast-paced combat with weapons and techniques such as dash and leap attacks, with RPG elements where Ark grows stronger after each quest. With its high level of detail, mix of action and RPG, and a branching story shaped by the player's choices, Terranigma stands out as a truly unique adventure.
Terranigma (Europe).desc: 《Terranigma》講述了男孩方舟的故事，他在一個被熔岩與外界隔絕的偏遠村莊長大。當他打開一扇禁門並從盒子中釋放出一種奇怪的生物時，他破壞了兩個世界之間的平衡，並將所有村民變成了石頭。為了拯救他們，方舟必須尋找五座塔，揭開兩個世界的秘密，並對抗黑暗勢力。該遊戲將快節奏的戰鬥與衝刺和跳躍攻擊等武器和技術相結合，並帶有角色扮演元素，方舟在每次任務後都會變得更強。Terranigma 憑藉其高水平的細節、動作和角色扮演遊戲的結合以及由玩家選擇塑造的分支故事，成為一款真正獨特的冒險遊戲。

Front Mission (Japan) (Translated).name: 前線任務
Front Mission (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
In the future, many military forces are dependent on huge mech robots, called Wanzers (Walking Panzers) for combat. At Huffman Island, located in the the pacific ocean, wanzers are deployed by both the USN (United States of the New Continent) and the OCU (Oceana Community Union), who dispute ownership over the island.  One night, the OCU forces stage a covert recon mission on a facility located in Larcus, a USN-held territory and weapons facility. Lead by a soldier named Roid, this mission was entirely unofficial and violated the peace treaty. During the mission, USN forces lead by Commander Driscoll appeared and ambushed the OCU soldiers. During the combat, Roid's fiance, Karen is killed and the USN facility is blown up; placing the blame on the OCU. This became known as the "Larcus Incident" and the OCU denied all knowledge of it's soldiers actions. Ultimately it would be a leading cause to the second Huffman War. 

One year later, the war is underway and Huffman island is under provisional control of the OCU, but with a weakened military unable to defend against USN attacks. The soldiers involved involved in the Larcus Incident have all been discharged and disgraced. Roid spends his time fighting as a gladiator in the Wanzer fighting arena before being approached by a mysterious man. Colonel Olson has found out about Roid's history and wants him to command a mercenary unit he is assembling on behalf of the OCU, dubbed "Carrion Crow". Convincing Roid that Driscoll is still out there on the island, Roid agrees.

Front Mission is a turn-based strategy RPG played from an isometric perspective. Players progress in the story through large strategic battles involving multiple units and cutscenes between them. At certain places, usually towns, the player can visit multiple locations including bars and shops, and talk to people. Shops are also found to purchase new weaponry, parts and make repairs. In combat, each Wanzer robot is a seperate unit and, has a large variety of weapons and attack styles depending on what's equipped. Units get experience for defeating enemies and also for using various techniques. The more an attack is used, the more powerful it becomes.
Front Mission (Japan) (Translated).desc:
未來，許多軍隊都依賴於被稱為“步行裝甲車”的巨型機甲機器人進行戰鬥。在位於太平洋的霍夫曼島，美國海軍（新大陸合眾國）和大洋共同體聯盟（OCU）都部署了機體，雙方對該島的所有權存在爭議。一天晚上，OCU 部隊對位於拉庫斯（美國海軍控制的領土和武器設施）的一處設施執行秘密偵察任務。這次任務由一名名叫羅伊德的士兵領導，完全是非官方的，並且違反了和平條約。執行任務期間，德里斯科爾中校率領的美國海軍部隊出現並伏擊了 OCU 士兵。在戰鬥中，羅伊德的未婚夫凱倫被殺，美國海軍設施被炸毀；將責任歸咎於OCU。這被稱為“拉庫斯事件”，OCU 否認對其士兵的行為有任何了解。最終，這將成為第二次霍夫曼戰爭的主要原因。

一年後，戰爭一觸即發，霍夫曼島暫時由 OCU 控制，但軍隊力量薄弱，無法抵禦美國海軍的攻擊。參與拉克斯事件的士兵已全部被退伍並受辱。羅伊德（Roid）在旺澤（Wanzer）競技場上以角斗士的身份戰鬥，然後被一名神秘男子接近。奧爾森上校了解了羅伊德的歷史，並希望他指揮一支他代表 OCU 組建的僱傭兵部隊，名為“腐肉烏鴉”。羅伊德讓羅伊德相信德里斯科爾仍在島上，羅伊德同意了。

《前線任務》是一款以等距視角進行的回合製策略角色扮演遊戲。玩家通過涉及多個單位的大型戰略戰鬥和它們之間的過場動畫來推進故事的發展。在某些地方（通常是城鎮），玩家可以訪問多個地點，包括酒吧和商店，並與人們交談。商店還可以購買新武器、零件並進行修理。在戰鬥中，每個 Wanzer 機器人都是一個獨立的單位，並且根據裝備的不同，擁有多種武器和攻擊方式。單位通過擊敗敵人以及使用各種技術獲得經驗。攻擊使用的次數越多，威力就越強。

Prehistorik Man (USA) (En,Fr,Es).name: 部分人
Prehistorik Man (USA) (En,Fr,Es).original_desc:
In Prehistorik Man, the player takes control of a neanderthal who is on a quest to travel through various levels, collecting food items to get his village ready for the fast approaching fall feast.  Along the way, the player will encounter an assortment of enemies ranging from spiders, giant rats and even the mighty T-Rex.

There are five levels in all and the player can upgrade their weapons to axes and mallets throughout the game as well as acquire a hang glider, giving the player the advantage of flight and covering long distances.  The main goal of the game is to vanquish enemies, collect food items, and face a boss at the end of each level.
Prehistorik Man (USA) (En,Fr,Es).desc:
在《史前人類》中，玩家控制一名尼安德特人，他正在探索各個關卡，收集食物，讓他的村莊為即將到來的秋季盛宴做好準備。一路上，玩家會遇到各種各樣的敵人，從蜘蛛、巨型老鼠，甚至強大的霸王龍。

總共有五個級別，玩家可以在整個遊戲中將武器升級為斧頭和木槌，並獲得懸掛式滑翔機，讓玩家獲得飛行和長距離的優勢。遊戲的主要目標是擊敗敵人、收集食物並在每個關卡結束時面對頭目。

Phalanx (USA).name: 方陣
Phalanx (USA).original_desc:
A futuristic shooter, Phalanx is the name of the prototype starfighter flown by Wink Baufield, a genetically enhanced pilot. It is sent to protect and reclaim Delia IV, a planet in the Andromeda galaxy, which has been colonized by humans for interstellar research purposes. However, an unknown and powerful alien force has overtaken the planet, the military defenses have been completely overwhelmed, and all hope rests on the Phalanx.

You fly through eight levels, first through various locations in Delia IV, and then you invade the aliens themselves. Like most shooters, you can upgrade your weapons by picking up bonus items dropped by enemy craft.
Phalanx (USA).desc:
《方陣》是一款未來派射擊遊戲，是由基因增強飛行員溫克·鮑菲爾德 (Wink Baufield) 駕駛的原型星際戰鬥機的名稱。它被派去保護和奪回仙女座星系中的一顆行星迪莉婭四號，該行星已被人類出於星際研究目的而殖民。然而，一股未知而強大的外星勢力已經佔領了這個星球，軍事防禦被徹底擊垮，所有的希望都寄託在方陣上。

你飛過八個關卡，首先穿過迪莉婭四號的各個地點，然後入侵外星人本身。與大多數射擊遊戲一樣，您可以通過拾取敵方飛船掉落的獎勵物品來升級您的武器。

Might and Magic II (Europe).name: 魔法門II
Might and Magic II (Europe).original_desc:
The Sequel to the successful Might and Magic I, it boasted better graphics, a larger world, but still pretty much the same game engine and presentation. Embark on a glorious journey then save the world of CRON and yourself.

A balanced party is a necessity in this game. There are several locations and items that are restricted to certain genders, alignments, or races. A party made up of Good Human Males won't get you very far. Time plays a large role in this game. Time travel is a part of it, but on a more basic level, you will find that characters age as the game goes on. If you wait too long, your characters' statistics will change to reflect their aging.
Might and Magic II (Europe).desc:
作為成功的《魔法門 I》的續作，它擁有更好的圖形、更大的世界，但仍然幾乎相同的遊戲引擎和演示。踏上光榮的旅程，然後拯救 CRON 的世界和你自己。

在這個遊戲中，一個平衡的政黨是必要的。有幾個地點和物品僅限於某些性別、陣營或種族。一個由善良人類男性組成的隊伍不會讓你走得太遠。時間在這個遊戲中起著很大的作用。時間旅行是其中的一部分，但在更基本的層面上，你會發現角色隨著遊戲的進行而老化。如果你等待太久，你的角色的統計數據將會改變以反映他們的年齡。

Super Double Dragon (USA).name: 超級雙龍
Super Double Dragon (USA).original_desc:
Billy and Jimmy Lee return for another adventure. This time, fellow martial arts instructor and narcotics investigator, Marian, has disappeared while attempting to infiltrate the ruthless criminal mob known as the Black Shadow Warriors.

Once again it is up to you (and a friend) to battle your way through a selection of side-scrolling beat 'em up levels to defeat the Shadow Warriors and their leader Duke, and save Marian.
Super Double Dragon (USA).desc:
比利和吉米·李回歸，開始另一場冒險。這一次，武術教練兼毒品調查員瑪麗安在試圖滲透到被稱為“黑影武士”的殘酷犯罪團伙時失踪了。

再次由你（和你的朋友）在一系列橫向捲軸清版關卡中奮戰，打敗暗影戰士和他們的領袖杜克，並拯救瑪麗安。

Smash Tennis (Europe).name: 粉碎網球
Smash Tennis (Europe).original_desc: The controls of Smash Tennis work similar to other tennis games and especially Namco's previous tennis game World Court Tennis: the player moves the athlete over the court and presses buttons with the correct timing in order to win the match. This time there is no story mode, but a tournament mode instead. Here the goal is to win the Grand Slam by playing various tournament matches. However. a match only has a single set. There are 20 athletes (both male and female) to choose from which have different advantages and drawbacks.
Smash Tennis (Europe).desc: Smash Tennis 的操控方式與其他網球遊戲類似，尤其是 Namco 之前的網球遊戲 World Court Tennis：玩家在球場上移動運動員並在正確的時機按下按鈕以贏得比賽。這次沒有故事模式，而是錦標賽模式。這裡的目標是通過參加各種錦標賽比賽來贏得大滿貫。然而。一場比賽只有一組。有20名運動員（男女）可供選擇，他們各有優缺點。

Violinist of Hameln, The (Japan) (Transl.name: 哈梅林沒有小提琴可以
Violinist of Hameln, The (Japan) (Transl.original_desc:
In Violinist of Hameln you play the role of Hamel, a sort of wanderer / adventurer whose weapon is… a violin. His music can cover enemies in fear, or even control their minds. Hamel and his mascot Oboe arrives at Staccato, a small town attacked by monsters, and drives them away with his power. Impressed, a cute little girl named Flute decides to go with Hamel in order to find and destroy the evil power behind the attacks.

The game is typical platform. You play as Hamel, and with your violin can shoot musical notes to beat your enemies. However, you count with Flute’s aid. Flute follows you (although you can order her to stop and stay), but also can be grabbed and thrown at the enemies (yes, thrown at the enemies). Flute can also collect through all the stages some costumes that, when worn, give her special abilities, such as flying, leaping, breaking walls or even explode and kill all in screen. At the end of each stage, of course, you’ll find the typical boss, all named as musical instruments.
Violinist of Hameln, The (Japan) (Transl.desc:
在哈默爾恩的小提琴家中，你扮演哈默爾的角色，一位流浪者/冒險家，他的武器是……一把小提琴。他的音樂可以讓敵人陷入恐懼，甚至控制他們的思想。哈梅爾和他的吉祥物雙簧管來到了被怪物襲擊的小鎮斯塔卡托，並用自己的力量將怪物趕走了。可愛的小女孩笛子深受感動，決定與哈梅爾一起尋找並摧毀襲擊背後的邪惡力量。

該遊戲是典型的平台遊戲。你扮演哈梅爾，用你的小提琴可以發出音符來擊敗你的敵人。然而，你需要藉助長笛的幫助。笛子會跟著你（雖然你可以命令她停下來並留下來），但也可以抓住並扔向敵人（是的，扔向敵人）。長笛還可以在所有關卡中收集一些服裝，穿上這些服裝後，可以賦予她特殊的能力，例如飛行、跳躍、破牆，甚至爆炸並殺死屏幕上的所有人。當然，在每個階段的最後，你都會找到典型的 Boss，它們都以樂器的形式命名。

SimAnt - The Electronic Ant Colony (USA).original_name: Sim Ant: The Electronic Ant Colony
SimAnt - The Electronic Ant Colony (USA).name: Sim Ant：電子蟻群
SimAnt - The Electronic Ant Colony (USA).original_desc: SimAnt explores the detail of the lives of ants, as you take full control of an ant colony. Build up your colony to conquer the other colonies in the yard. Foes include spiders and humans - make their lives a misery by invading their homes. A Quick Game option focuses on battles with other groups of ants, and a full Tutorial mode is provided. Biological detail of real ants is provided, to help make the package more educational.
SimAnt - The Electronic Ant Colony (USA).desc: 當您完全控制蟻群時，SimAnt 會探索螞蟻生活的細節。建立你的殖民地來征服院子裡的其他殖民地。敵人包括蜘蛛和人類——入侵他們的家園，讓他們的生活變得痛苦。快速遊戲選項側重於與其他螞蟻群的戰鬥，並提供完整的教程模式。提供了真實螞蟻的生物學細節，以幫助使包裝更具教育意義。

Romance of the Three Kingdoms III - Drag.key: Romance of the Three Kingdoms III - Dragon of Destiny (USA)
Romance of the Three Kingdoms III - Drag.original_name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms III : Dragon of Destiny
Romance of the Three Kingdoms III - Drag.name: 三國演義III：命運之龍
Romance of the Three Kingdoms III - Drag.original_desc:
Romance of the Three Kingdoms III: Dragon of Destiny is another strategy game by Koei. The concept is the same here as in Koei's other wargames: conquer all you can!

In this case the historical setting is ancient China. The country is under the control of one Emperor, but all of the faction leaders want to be the emperor themselves. You begin with one territory and you must conquer more to win the game.
Romance of the Three Kingdoms III - Drag.desc:
《三國演義3：命運之龍》是光榮製作的另一款策略遊戲。這裡的概念與 Koei 的其他戰爭遊戲相同：征服一切！

在這種情況下，歷史背景是古代中國。國家由一位皇帝控制，但所有派系領袖都想自己當皇帝。你從一個領土開始，必須征服更多領土才能贏得比賽。

Vegas Stakes (USA).name: 維加斯錦標賽
Vegas Stakes (USA).original_desc: Stake your claim in Vegas and beat the house! Let your inner high roller go wild as you try your luck at five different casino games—black jack, slots, poker, craps, and roulette. Start with $1,000 in your pocket and play your way through five casinos, each with a different theme and varying limits. Choose one of four friends to tag along and offer advice when you need it. Further enhancing the experience is the fact that you'll be presented with a slew of interactions with random casino patrons. Be careful though, your choices in these situations could either get you closer to the millions of dollars you're after, or cost you a pile of that hard-earned cash.
Vegas Stakes (USA).desc: 在維加斯宣誓並贏得勝利！在五種不同的賭場遊戲（黑傑克、老虎機、撲克、擲骰子和輪盤賭）中試試運氣，讓您內心的豪客狂野起來。從口袋裡的 1,000 美元開始，在五個賭場中暢玩，每個賭場都有不同的主題和不同的限額。選擇四位朋友中的一位進行陪伴，並在您需要時提供建議。進一步增強體驗的是，您將與隨機的賭場顧客進行大量互動。但要小心，你在這些情況下的選擇要么會讓你更接近你所追求的數百萬美元，要么讓你花掉一大堆來之不易的現金。

Super Morph (Europe).name: 超級變形
Super Morph (Europe).original_desc:
Young Morris Rolph has been trapped in limbo due to a malfunction on Dr Krankenpot's new teleport machine (how come characters with German-sounding names in computer games and films are always evil or stupid? Even Darth Vader sounds German.). Now he's been split into his 4 component parts, represented by liquid, gas, a hard ball and a bouncy ball, and he must get through 24 levels (36 on the special A1200 version - mirroring the game's plot-line of improved technology causing more problems for Morris) to retrieve the parts of the machine so it can be rebuilt to bring him back to life.

The gameplay is vaguely influenced by Lemmings, as the levels are populated by lots of points which can't be crossed in all forms - walls, fires, gaps, thornbushes and suchlike. You get a set number of transformations on each level, although extra ones can be picked up at times, and there are heaters and freezers dotted around which cause transformations in some states. All this is done against a time limit. Like Lemmings 2, you can take on the next level in each of the worlds at any time, so you have to be stuck 4 times before you can't progress.
Super Morph (Europe).desc:
由於克蘭肯波特博士的新型傳送機出現故障，年輕的莫里斯·羅爾夫陷入了困境（為什麼電腦遊戲和電影中名字聽起來像德國的角色總是邪惡或愚蠢？甚至連達斯·維德聽起來都是德國人。）。現在他被分成了 4 個組成部分，分別為液體、氣體、硬球和彈力球，他必須通過 24 個關卡（特殊 A1200 版本為 36 個關卡 - 反映了遊戲的改進技術的情節，給莫里斯帶來了更多問題）來取回機器的部件，以便可以重建機器以使他復活。

遊戲玩法隱約受到了旅鼠的影響，因為關卡中充滿了許多無法以任何形式跨越的點——牆壁、火、間隙、荊棘叢等等。您在每個級別上都會獲得一定數量的轉變，儘管有時可以拾取額外的轉變，並且周圍散佈著加熱器和冰櫃，這會在某些州引起轉變。所有這些都是在時間限制內完成的。與《旅鼠 2》一樣，你可以隨時在每個世界中進入下一關，因此你必須被卡住 4 次才能前進。

Super Punch-Out!! (USA).name: 超級一拳出擊！ ！
Super Punch-Out!! (USA).original_desc:
Your dreams are finally going to come true! All the years of training...all for that day where you'd finally step into the ring, amidst the roar of the excited crowd, to square off against the best of the best...you tighten your fist and hear your gloves tighten with them...you take a step foward...the door opens before you...and the boxing ring beckons your name!

16 world champs are here, with the same dream as you: to win the WVBA Championship! Welcome to the world of boxing, kid! Give 'em an uppercut or two for your fans!
Super Punch-Out!! (USA).desc:
你的夢想終於要實現了！經過多年的訓練...一切都是為了那一天，在興奮的人群的歡呼聲中，您終於踏入拳擊場，與最優秀的選手對決...您握緊拳頭，聽到手套隨之收緊...您向前邁出一步...門在您面前打開...拳擊台正在召喚您的名字！

16位世界冠軍齊聚，與你有著同樣的夢想：奪得WVBA冠軍！歡迎來到拳擊世界，孩子！給他們一兩個上勾拳，送給你的粉絲！

Top Gear 2 (USA).name: 寂静岭2 重制版
Top Gear 2 (USA).original_desc:
This third-person racing game resembles Gremlin's earlier Lotus series, in terms of its general look and feel, right down to the text font used in the game. Your task is to race through 16 countries, each of which features four races, with many real-world circuits recreated in incongruous locations (such as the Monza layout in Ayers Rock, and the old Hockenheim in Vancouver). 

These four-race blocks each represent their own mini-championship, in which you race against 19 cars, needing to finish in the top 10 to continue, and with the top 6 scoring points 10-6-4-3-2-1, and the respective amount of money in thousands. This can be spent on various upgrades, ranging from engine to tires (wet and dry) and from shocks (front, side and rear) to gearboxes. The ideal approach is to buy the more expensive versions ASAP, as you get no saving when upgrading. If you win the four-race championship, you get the next password. 

You get a set amount of nitro boost to use during each race, although bonus nitros, money and instant speed-up token appear on many tracks. Hazards such as puddles, barriers and ramps are also frequent.
Top Gear 2 (USA).desc:
這款第三人稱賽車遊戲與 Gremlin 早期的 Lotus 系列類似，無論是外觀還是感覺，甚至遊戲中使用的文本字體。你的任務是穿越 16 個國家，每個國家都有四場比賽，許多現實世界的賽道在不協調的地點重建（例如艾爾斯岩的蒙扎佈局和溫哥華的舊霍根海姆）。

這四個賽車塊各自代表自己的迷你錦標賽，其中您將與 19 輛賽車比賽，需要進入前 10 名才能繼續比賽，前 6 名得分為 10-6-4-3-2-1，以及各自的獎金金額（以千為單位）。這可用於各種升級，從發動機到輪胎（濕式和乾式），從減震器（前、側、後）到變速箱。理想的方法是盡快購買更昂貴的版本，因為升級時不會節省任何費用。如果你贏得了四場比賽的冠軍，你就會得到下一個密碼。

儘管許多賽道上都會出現獎勵硝基、金錢和即時加速令牌，但您在每場比賽中都會獲得一定量的硝基助推器。水坑、障礙物和坡道等危險也經常發生。

Stunt Race FX (USA) (Rev 1).name: 特技賽車FX
Stunt Race FX (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Thanks to an improved version of the SuperFX Chip, Stunt Race FX was the first racing game for the SNES to feature fully polygonal cars and levels, which made it possible for the game to include gradients and obstacles that could not be realized in earlier, "flat" racing games.

The game features four modes of play: 
Speed Trax is basically an arcade mode where the player has to qualify for each upcoming race by reaching checkpoints while collecting items to restore his damage- and boost-bar. It is divided into a Novice-, Expert-, and Master class, with each class featuring four unique tracks.
In Stunt Trax the player has to complete courses filled with obstacles within a certain time limit while trying to collect as many stars as possible.
Battle Trax is a two player mode taking place on special tracks without any CPU-controlled opponents.
Finally, Test Run let's the player practice all tracks that have been unlocked.
Stunt Race FX (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
得益於 SuperFX 芯片的改進版本，Stunt Race FX 是 SNES 上第一款具有全多邊形汽車和關卡的賽車遊戲，這使得遊戲能夠包含早期“平坦”賽車遊戲中無法實現的梯度和障礙物。

該遊戲有四種遊戲模式：
Speed Trax 基本上是一種街機模式，玩家必須通過到達檢查點來獲得參加每場即將到來的比賽的資格，同時收集物品以恢復他的傷害和提升條。它分為新手班、專家班和大師班，每個班都有四個獨特的曲目。
在 Stunt Trax 中，玩家必須在一定的時間內完成充滿障礙的路線，同時嘗試收集盡可能多的星星。
Battle Trax 是一種兩人模式，在特殊賽道上進行，沒有任何 CPU 控制的對手。
最後，測試運行讓玩家練習所有已解鎖的曲目。

Super Castlevania IV (USA).name: 超級惡魔城 IV
Super Castlevania IV (USA).original_desc:
Simon Belmont returns in the first Castlevania title to grace the SNES.  The console may be different, but the setup is very familiar: The place is Transylvania.  The villain is Count Dracula.

Belmont has the classic Castlevania assortment of weapons (the famous whip, daggers, axes, fire bombs, boomerangs) at his disposal, and he gains strength and points by collecting various-sized hearts, coin purses, and pork chops. 

Like most Castlevania games, Super Castlevania IV is a 2D side-scrolling action game. However, it is 2D with more depth than ever before. Parallax scrolling and rotating chambers are some of the "Mode 7" effects made possible by the SNES hardware.
Super Castlevania IV (USA).desc:
西蒙·貝爾蒙特 (Simon Belmont) 在首款《惡魔城》遊戲中回歸，為 SNES 增光添彩。控制台可能有所不同，但設置非常熟悉：地點是特蘭西瓦尼亞。反派是德古拉伯爵。

貝爾蒙特擁有經典的惡魔城各種武器（著名的鞭子、匕首、斧頭、燃燒彈、迴旋鏢）可供他使用，他通過收集各種大小的心、零錢包和豬排來獲得力量和分數。

與大多數惡魔城遊戲一樣，《超級惡魔城 IV》是一款 2D 橫向捲軸動作遊戲。然而，它是二維的，比以往任何時候都更有深度。視差滾動和旋轉室是 SNES 硬件實現的“模式 7”效果的一部分。

American Tail, An - Fievel Goes West (US.key: American Tail, An - Fievel Goes West (USA)
American Tail, An - Fievel Goes West (US.original_name: An American Tail : Fievel Goes West
American Tail, An - Fievel Goes West (US.name: 美國尾巴：菲維爾西行
American Tail, An - Fievel Goes West (US.original_desc:
Based on the movie by the same name, Fievel Goes West is a platform game featuring the young mouse Fievel Mousekewitz.
