After immigrating to overseas to America in the 1800s(?), the Mousekewitz family has moved out onto the open frontier of the wild west. With dreams of being a cowboy, Fievel soon makes friends and plays on the dusty streets imagining himself a great gunslinger. But all is not well as the villainous Cat R. Waul and his gang of cats (as well as other creatures) has plans to turn this place into an all-you-can-eat mouse buffet. It's up to Fievel to get in the way of Cat's plans with the help of the canine sheriff, Wylie Burp and his non-mouse eating cat pal, Tiger

Fievel Goes West is a platform game. Fievel can jump and fire a pop-gun as he ventures through each level, collecting coins. The pop-gun can be powered-up to fire more powerful projectiles.
American Tail, An - Fievel Goes West (US.desc:
《Fievel Goes West》改編自同名電影，是一款以小老鼠 Fievel Mousekewitz 為主角的平台遊戲。Mousekewitz 家族於 1800 年代（？）移居海外美國後，搬到了狂野西部的開放邊境。菲維爾夢想成為一名牛仔，很快就結交了朋友，並在塵土飛揚的街道上玩耍，想像自己是一名偉大的槍手。但一切並不順利，邪惡的貓 R. 沃爾和他的一群貓（以及其他生物）計劃將這個地方變成老鼠自助餐。菲維爾必須在警犬警長威利·伯普和他的不吃老鼠的貓朋友老虎的幫助下阻礙貓的計劃

《菲維爾西行》是一款平台遊戲。菲維爾在冒險通過每個關卡時可以跳躍並發射流行槍，收集金幣。爆彈槍可以通電以發射更強大的射彈。

Shanghai II - Dragon's Eye (USA).name: 上海II：龍眼
Shanghai II - Dragon's Eye (USA).original_desc:
Shanghai II is Activison's follow-up to their first tile matching game.  Players try to remove Mah Jong tiles in pairs from a set pattern.  Shanghai II has 8 different tile sets, 12 patterns based on the animals of the Chinese zodiac, and a layout editor for creating patterns.

In addition to the standard game, Shanghai II also features "Dragon's eye" a 2-player Shanghai varriant.  Players take turns adding and removing tiles from a small field with one player attempting to remove all the tiles and the other trying to position tiles to make this impossible.
Shanghai II - Dragon's Eye (USA).desc:
《上海II》是Activison 首款方塊消除遊戲的後續作品。玩家嘗試從設定的模式中成對地消除麻將牌。上海 II 擁有 8 種不同的圖塊組、12 種基於十二生肖的圖案，以及用於創建圖案的佈局編輯器。

除了標準遊戲外，《上海 II》還推出了 2 人上海版本的“龍之眼”。玩家輪流在一個小區域中添加和移除瓷磚，其中一名玩家嘗試移除所有瓷磚，另一名玩家嘗試定位瓷磚以使其不可能。

Super Street Fighter II (USA) (Rev 1).name: 超級街頭霸王2
Super Street Fighter II (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: This is the sequel to the super hit Street Fighter II Turbo and Street Fighter II Championship games for the SNES and Genesis. This port of the arcade game featured all 4 new characters and stages making a total of 16 playable. The game was packed into massive 32Meg and 40Meg cartridges for the SNES and Genesis. Featured many multiplayer modes in addition to the single player mode. There was the returning elimination group battle where you and a group of people played until one person was the champ. The Point Battle where the person with the most points wins. Newer modes included Tournament where you had an 8 man double elimination tournament. Finally the Challenge mode, where you tried to get the most points on a CPU opponent or beat them real fast trying to surpass records.
Super Street Fighter II (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 這是 SNES 和 Genesis 上超級熱門的《街頭霸王 II Turbo》和《街頭霸王 II 錦標賽》遊戲的續作。該街機遊戲的移植版包含全部 4 個新角色和關卡，總共 16 個可玩關卡。該遊戲被裝入 SNES 和 Genesis 的 32Meg 和 40Meg 大型卡帶中。除了單人遊戲模式外，還具有多種多人遊戲模式。還有一場回歸的淘汰賽，你和一群人一起比賽，直到一個人成為冠軍。積分戰，積分最多的人獲勝。較新的模式包括錦標賽，其中有 8 人雙敗淘汰賽。最後是挑戰模式，您試圖在 CPU 對手身上獲得最高分，或者快速擊敗他們，嘗試超越記錄。

Lion King, The (USA).name: 獅子王系列
Lion King, The (USA).original_desc:
Young Simba just can't wait to be king. His father is the current King of the Savannah and the young prince is able to frolic the lands at will; jumping on and around other subjects of this animal kingdom. When Simba's father, King Mufasa, is killed and his evil brother Scar takes over the kingdom, Simba is banished from the lands of his birthright and has to grow up fast, honing his skills, for the day of his return.

The Lion King, based on the famous Disney movie, is a platform game where you control Simba - initially as a young cub, and later as an adult lion. The plot of the game follows the plot of the movie. Each of the levels represents a part of the movie. 

As young Simba, you can fight various beasts, such as lizards, by jumping on them. You can also roar to scare some creatures into submission, though every time you roar, you have to wait for your "roar meter" to charge. 

As an adult lion, you can still roar and jump, but now you fight enemies by slashing at them with your claws (if you're skillful enough, you can also grab them and toss them off the screen). 

The game features no in-game save function, and it needs to be replayed from the beginning every time.
Lion King, The (USA).desc:
年輕的辛巴迫不及待地想成為國王。他的父親是薩凡納的現任國王，年輕的王子能夠隨心所欲地在這片土地上嬉戲。在這個動物王國的其他主題上跳躍。當辛巴的父親木法沙國王被殺，他邪惡的兄弟刀疤接管了王國時，辛巴被從他與生俱來的權利的土地上放逐，他必須快速成長，磨練自己的技能，等待他回來的那一天。

《獅子王》是一款平台遊戲，改編自著名的迪士尼電影，您可以在其中控制辛巴 - 最初是幼崽，後來是成年獅子。遊戲的劇情遵循電影的情節。每個級別代表電影的一部分。

作為年輕的辛巴，你可以通過跳躍來對抗各種野獸，例如蜥蜴。你也可以咆哮來嚇唬一些生物，讓它們屈服，不過每次你咆哮時，你都必須等待你的“咆哮表”充電。

作為一隻成年獅子，你仍然可以咆哮和跳躍，但現在你可以通過用爪子猛擊敵人來與敵人戰鬥（如果你足夠熟練，你也可以抓住他們並將他們扔出屏幕）。

遊戲沒有遊戲內保存功能，每次都需要從頭開始重玩。

Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse, The.key: Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse, The (USA) (Rev 1)
Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse, The.original_name: The Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse
Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse, The.name: 米奇老鼠主演的魔法探索
Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse, The.original_desc:
This was the first Mickey Mouse game for Super NES, featuring a traditional platform gameplay and colorful Disney-like graphics.

Mickey's mission is to save his dog Pluto, who's been kidnapped and kept inside emperor Pete's castle, in a magical land, guarded by mysterious creatures. 

The originality of the game lies on the possibility of wearing different costumes to incorporate different characters, all taken from old Disney cartoons. Each one has a special ability. As a wizard, Mickey has magical powers; as a fireman, the mouse can deal with fire; and, as a climber, he can reach the top of high platforms.
Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse, The.desc:
這是 Super NES 的第一款米老鼠遊戲，具有傳統的平台遊戲玩法和豐富多彩的迪士尼般的圖形。

米奇的任務是拯救他的狗普魯托，它被綁架並被關在皮特皇帝的城堡裡，在一片神奇的土地上，由神秘生物看守。

遊戲的獨創性在於可以穿著不同的服裝來融入不同的角色，所有這些都取自古老的迪士尼卡通。每個人都有一種特殊的能力。作為一名巫師，米奇擁有神奇的力量；作為一名消防員，老鼠可以對付火；而且，作為一名登山者，他可以到達高平台的頂部。

Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV - Wall.key: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV - Wall of Fire (USA)
Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV - Wall.original_name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV : Wall of Fire
Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV - Wall.name: 三國演義 IV : 火牆
Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV - Wall.original_desc: The Three Kingdoms era of Chinese history is the setting for this strategic war game. Select one of 38 leaders and guide your people to power by military or diplomatic means in an isometrically viewed world. Military tactics such as well-placed taunts and deliberate enemy confusion are on offer. Weaponry includes catapults and automatic-firing crossbows.
Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV - Wall.desc: 中國歷史上的三國時代是這場戰略戰爭遊戲的背景。從 38 位領導人中選擇一位，並在等軸測世界中通過軍事或外交手段引導您的人民掌權。提供適當的嘲諷和故意迷惑敵人等軍事戰術。武器裝備包括彈射器和自動發射弩。

Saturday Night Slam Masters (USA).name: 週六晚大滿貫大師賽
Saturday Night Slam Masters (USA).original_desc:
Slam Masters is an arcade conversion of Capcom's wrestling game of the same name.

Ten wrestlers with different fighting styles and individual special attacks are available. They are controlled with three buttons; one for jumping, one for attacking and one for pinning. When close to your opponents, you can grab them to perform various moves ranging from ordinary attacks to body slams to throws. Since the action takes place in a ring, it is also possible to climb the turnbuckle or use the ropes to your advantage. You can also leave the ring for a limited amount of time to fight with different weapons that can be found outside the ring.

Apart from a standard Single Match mode, the SNES version also features a Battle Royal mode for up to four players. This mode is not available in the Genesis version, which features a Death Match mode that can not be found in the SNES version. A Death Match is a no rules match in which weapons can be used used and the rope is replaced with barbed wire.
Saturday Night Slam Masters (USA).desc:
Slam Masters 是 Capcom 的同名摔跤遊戲的街機轉換版。

十名具有不同戰鬥風格和個人特殊攻擊的摔跤手可供選擇。它們由三個按鈕控制；一種用於跳躍，一種用於攻擊，一種用於壓制。當靠近你的對手時，你可以抓住他們來執行各種動作，從普通攻擊到身體猛擊到投擲。由於動作是在環中進行的，因此您也可以爬上螺絲扣或使用繩索來獲得優勢。您還可以離開擂台一段有限的時間，使用擂台外找到的不同武器進行戰鬥。

除了標準的單人比賽模式外，SNES 版本還具有最多可容納 4 名玩家的大逃殺模式。Genesis 版本中沒有此模式，該版本具有 SNES 版本中沒有的死亡競賽模式。死亡競賽是一種無規則的比賽，可以使用武器，繩索被鐵絲網代替。

Super Star Wars (USA) (Rev 1).name: 超級星球大戰
Super Star Wars (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
The story of this game is based on Episode IV: A New Hope, the first of the original Star Wars movie trilogy. The player initially controls the movie's main hero, Luke Skywalker, but two more controllable characters join later: the careless captain Han Solo and his Wookie side-kick, Chewbacca. The game generally follows the movie plot, allowing the player to experience some of the most important sequences, such as the search for Obi-Wan Kenobi, rescuing princess Leia, and the final confrontation against Death Star and its TIE Fighters, led by the mysterious Darth Vader.

Most of the game levels follow traditional platform gameplay style. As Luke, Han, or Chewbacca, the player makes his way through the linear levels, fighting enemies, jumping over obstacles, and collecting power-ups. The power-ups include standard health-restoring items, upgrades for the blaster gun , as well as special items that can be used for massive destruction of the enemies.
Super Star Wars (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
《機動戰士鋼彈》（機動戦士ガンダム）或簡稱鋼彈（ガンダム），是由富野由悠季與矢立肇為日升工作室創作的日本動畫系列，始於1979年。作為機甲題材作品，它包含太空戰爭、科技先進世界等科幻經典元素，但通過敘事與技術細節追求現實主義而實現創新。這一系列首次將巨型機器人——機甲題材的核心——降格為大規模量產武器。這一革新理念反映了動畫傳統受眾向成年群體的拓展，由此誕生了日本科幻的子類型「真實系機器人」。

儘管起步艱難，鋼彈在1980年代初取得成功並持續至今；該系列已推出約30部動畫、OVA及電影，另有數十部漫畫、小說、電子遊戲乃至通過SD鋼彈衍生的惡搞作品。雖視聽作品構成系列核心，但鋼彈系列實際依託衍生產品（特別是鋼普拉）作為第二支柱。從經濟角度看，該系列是萬代南夢宮最盈利的IP，年收入約5000億日元。多數批評聚焦於擔憂經濟需求可能壓倒創作需求。
鋼彈系列的成功首要體現在文化層面：鋼彈在中文文化圈裡有一定的知名度，在法語區幾近無名，但在日本卻是一個深刻的社會現象。多數學術研究者明確認定鋼彈系列對日本動畫與流行文化影響重大，常將系列與西方的《星球大戰》相比。這種影響具象化於日本日常生活的方方面面，無論是廣告、專賣店、藝術展覽，還是在東京附近建造的18米高立像。然而鋼彈系列未能稱霸全球，海外推廣有限且常與超時空要塞系列、新世紀福音戰士系列等作品競爭。

Shadowrun (USA).name: 暗影狂奔
Shadowrun (USA).original_desc: The SNES version of Shadowrun appeared earlier than the Genesis one, and it is an entirely different game, with different story and gameplay, although it is also based on a pen-and-paper RPG of the same name. Your hero, Jake, is attacked by assassins, and appears to be dead. However, a mysterious dog approaches his lifeless body, transforms into a woman, and casts a spell on him... After that Jake wakes up in the morgue. He doesn't know what happened to him, he doesn't even remember his own name. Wandering through the futuristic city, where monorails, computers, and street gangs armed with automatic weapons co-exist with orcs, dwarves, and vampires, you begin to discover the mystery and to learn about the dangers awaiting you around every corner.
Shadowrun (USA).desc: SNES 版本的 Shadowrun 比 Genesis 出現得更早，雖然也是基於同名紙筆 RPG，但它是一款完全不同的遊戲，具有不同的故事和玩法。你的英雄傑克遭到刺客襲擊，看起來已經死了。然而，一隻神秘的狗接近了他毫無生氣的身體，變成了一個女人，並對他施了咒語……之後傑克在太平間醒來。他不知道自己發生了什麼，甚至不記得自己的名字。漫步在這座未來城市中，單軌鐵路、電腦、配備自動武器的街頭幫派與獸人、矮人和吸血鬼共存，你開始發現謎團，並了解每個角落等待著你的危險。

Turn and Burn - No-Fly Zone (USA).name: 轉彎並燃燒：禁飛區
Turn and Burn - No-Fly Zone (USA).original_desc: In Turn and Burn: No-Fly Zone the player gets in the cockpit of the famed F-14 Tomcat and launches into a series of sorties on enemy fighters.  The game is a simulation with real instruments and gauges and authentic weapons such as Sidewinders, Phoenix missiles and the M61A1 Vulcan Cannon to shoot down enemy fighters scattered throughout the stages.  Players also land on their carrier in both daytime and night time missions. The game also features Mode 7 scaling.
Turn and Burn - No-Fly Zone (USA).desc: 在《Turn and Burn: No-Fly Zone》中，玩家進入著名的 F-14 Tomcat 的駕駛艙，對敵方戰鬥機發起一系列攻擊。該遊戲是一款模擬遊戲，使用真實的儀器和儀表以及真實的武器，如響尾蛇、鳳凰導彈和 M61A1 火神大砲，用於擊落分散在各個階段的敵方戰鬥機。玩家還可以在白天和夜間任務中降落在他們的航母上。遊戲還具有模式 7 縮放功能。

Mortal Kombat (USA) (Rev 1).name: 真人快打11
Mortal Kombat (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Five Hundred years ago, an ancient and well respected Shaolin fighting tournament, held every 50 years, was corrupted by an evil and elderly sorcerer by the name of Shang Tsung.  Shang was accompanied by Prince Goro, a warrior of the Shokan race (a four armed half-human/half-dragon). Knowing that if ten tournaments in a row were won by the Outworld champion, the Earth Realm would be conquered by evil and fall into darkness, Shang entered Goro in the tournament and had him defeat the great Kung Lao. Goro has been  reigning supreme as the undefeated fighting champion for five hundred years now. As the last tournament required draws near, Raiden, Thunder God and protector of the Earth Realm, enacts a plan to tip the scales in the humans favor, Seven fighters step into the arena on Shang Tsung's mysterious island: Shaolin warrior Liu Kang, Special Forces operative Sonya Blade, the mercenary thug Kano, fame-seeking actor Johnny Cage, the ice wielding Lin Kuei warrior Sub-Zero and his undead adversary Scorpion, and Raiden himself.

Mortal Kombat is a side-scrolling 1 on 1 fighting game. Fighting is set as one on one kombat, allowing each player to perform a variety of punches, kicks, and special moves in order to defeat their opponent.  When the opponent faces their second round loss, the winner can perform a finishing move called a "Fatality" on the loser.  The Fatality is a move unique to each fighter that graphically kills the loser in a blood-soaked finale.

Mortal Kombat began its life as a 2-player arcade title. It is notable for its use of digitized actors to represent the game's fighters, as well as its use of copious amounts of blood during gameplay.
Mortal Kombat (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
五百年前，每五十年舉行一次的古老而受人尊敬的少林格鬥比賽被一位名叫尚宗的邪惡年長巫師所腐蝕。尚由五郎王子陪同，他是一名 Shokan 種族的戰士（四臂半人/半龍）。商知道如果外星冠軍連續贏得十場比賽，地球王國就會被邪惡征服並陷入黑暗，於是讓戈羅參加比賽並讓他擊敗了偉大的空佬。五郎作為五百年來不敗的格鬥冠軍一直統治著至高無上的地位。隨著最後一場比賽的臨近，雷神和地界的保護者雷電制定了一項計劃，讓天平向人類有利的方向傾斜。七名戰士踏入尚宗神秘島嶼的競技場：少林武士劉康、特種部隊特工索尼婭·刀片、僱傭兵暴徒卡諾、追名逐利的演員約翰尼·凱奇、揮舞冰霜的林鬼武士零號和他的不死對手蝎子，還有雷登本人。

《真人快打》是一款橫向捲軸 1 對 1 格鬥遊戲。戰鬥設置為一對一的格鬥，允許每個玩家執行各種拳、踢和特殊動作以擊敗對手。當對手面臨第二輪失利時，勝者可以對敗者施展名為“致命”的終結技。致命一擊是每位戰士獨有的招式，在血腥的結局中生動地殺死了失敗者。

《真人快打》最初是一款 2 人街機遊戲。值得注意的是它使用數字化演員來代表遊戲中的戰士，以及在遊戲過程中使用大量的血液。

Earthworm Jim 2 (USA).name: 蚯蚓吉姆2
Earthworm Jim 2 (USA).original_desc:
An ordinary average earthworm named Jim goes about his normal daily life, cruising around avoiding crows and doing other general worm-like things. Jim is suddenly struck by a very large ultra- high- tech- indestructible- super- space- cyber- suit. Through sheer luck, Jim rests safely in the neck ring of the suit. 

Suddenly, the ultra-high-tech space particles of the suit begin interacting with Jim's soft wormy flesh. A radical light-speed evolution takes place.

Jim soon realizes he is in control of the suit.

Gameplay is similar to the first game, with Jim jumping and running through the levels. There are 5 weapons more than the original game to collect. Characters like Princess Whats-Her-Name and Psy-Crow appear.
Earthworm Jim 2 (USA).desc:
一隻名叫吉姆的普通蚯蚓過著正常的日常生活，四處遊蕩，躲避烏鴉，並做其他類似蠕蟲的事情。吉姆突然被一件巨大的超高科技、堅不可摧的超級太空賽博服所震驚。純粹是運氣好，吉姆安全地靠在套裝的頸環上。

突然，宇航服中的超高科技太空粒子開始與吉姆柔軟的蠕蟲肉體相互作用。一場激進的光速進化正在發生。

吉姆很快意識到他掌控著這件衣服。

遊戲玩法與第一款遊戲類似，吉姆在關卡中跳躍和奔跑。比原版遊戲多了 5 種可供收集的武器。諸如“什麼名字的公主”和“精神病烏鴉”等角色出現。

Skyblazer (USA).name: 天空開拓者
Skyblazer (USA).original_desc:
Arianna, a young sorceress, has been kidnapped by Ashura. Sky has pledged his life to rescuing her. Sky must venture through many colorful stages and nice background effects.

Skyblazer is a blend of side-scrolling fighting with magical skills. Locating potions to recover energy and gaining magic points to thrash the enemies becomes a major part of the gameplay. Sky can also stick to and climb vertically up walls.
Skyblazer (USA).desc:
年輕女巫阿里安娜被阿修羅綁架。斯凱發誓要救她。天空必須冒險經歷許多色彩繽紛的舞台和漂亮的背景效果。

《Skyblazer》是橫向捲軸戰鬥與魔法技能的結合。找到藥水來恢復能量並獲得魔法點來擊敗敵人成為遊戲玩法的主要部分。天空還可以粘附並垂直爬上牆壁。

Mask, The (USA).name: 面具
Mask, The (USA).original_desc:
The Mask is based on the movie with the same name. The story follows poor guy Stanley Ipkiss who finds a mysterious mask and is given mysterious powers from it..

As in the movie, Stanley (aka The Mask) has some funny weapons, like the Guns, the Horn, the Hammer and the ability to transform into a big Tornado. He battles through levels inspired by the movie, including his apartment, the city streets, the bank, the park, the jail, and the night club for the final showdown.
Mask, The (USA).desc:
《面具》改編自同名電影。故事講述可憐的斯坦利·伊普基斯發現了一個神秘的面具，並從中獲得了神秘的力量。

正如電影中一樣，斯坦利（又名“面具”）擁有一些有趣的武器，例如槍、號角、錘子以及變身為大型龍捲風的能力。他在受電影啟發的關卡中戰鬥，包括他的公寓、城市街道、銀行、公園、監獄和夜總會，進行最後的決戰。

Breath of Fire (USA).name: 火之呼吸
Breath of Fire (USA).original_desc:
In a distant land, peace was maintained for thousands of years by a fearful dragon clan who could transform into powerful monsters. One day they discovered a goddess who could fulfill their every wish. Greed split the clan into Dark and Light Dragons, each battling the other to win her magic.

One member of the Light Dragons, along with seven of his companions, emerged to keep the opposing forces from destroying their world. Using six magical keys, they sealed the goddess into another realm.

Centuries have passed. The Dark Dragons are destroying the land in search of the keys. When they find the keys, they will once again release the magic goddess. Light Dragon... the time has come to draw your sword and fight for the future of your people.
Breath of Fire (USA).desc:
在遙遠的土地上，有一個可怕的龍族，可以化身為強大的怪物，維持了數千年的和平。有一天，他們發現了一位可以滿足他們每一個願望的女神。貪婪將氏族分裂成黑暗龍和光明龍，雙方互相爭鬥以贏得她的魔法。

一名光龍成員和他的七名同伴出現，阻止敵對勢力毀滅他們的世界。他們用六把魔法鑰匙將女神封印到了另一個領域。

幾個世紀過去了。黑暗之龍正在摧毀這片土地來尋找鑰匙。當他們找到鑰匙時，他們將再次釋放魔法女神。光龍……是時候拔出你的劍，為你人民的未來而戰了。

Ardy Lightfoot (USA).name: 阿迪·萊特富特
Ardy Lightfoot (USA).original_desc:
A Zelda-like game with a twist.

Here you are some sort of a dog with oversized bird which you use to defeat your enemies. Your goal is to find seven pieces of powers. Each piece is spread throughout a colorful world with funny enemies and weird bosses.

It´s like a Zelda-clone, Ardy and Link are not twins but they have same goal, to find pieces which then have to be puzzled together to find the greater evil.
Ardy Lightfoot (USA).desc:
一款類似塞爾達的遊戲，但又有所不同。

在這裡，你是一隻帶著超大鳥的狗，你可以用它來擊敗你的敵人。你的目標是找到七件力量。每件作品都分佈在一個豐富多彩的世界中，有有趣的敵人和奇怪的老闆。

就像塞爾達的克隆體一樣，阿迪和林克不是雙胞胎，但他們有相同的目標，找到碎片，然後將它們拼湊在一起，以找到更大的邪惡。

Fatal Fury (USA).name: 致命狂怒
Fatal Fury (USA).original_desc:
Southtown City plays host to the King of Fighters Tournament. Andy & Terry Bogard take part in the tournament cause winning the tournament is the only way they can defeat Geese Howard. Geese Howard controls Southtown City and killed their father several years ago. Also taking part is Joe Higashi, a Japanese kickboxer. Select either Joe, Andy or Terry, visit several locations in Southtown City and win that tournament!

Fatal Fury is a 2D fighter and is the first game in a series of one-on-one fighting games by SNK. It's a conversion of the original Fatal Fury arcade game. This first game does not yet feature the series' trademark pseudo 3D mode (which allows you to move between the foreground & background while fighting). Includes a two-player vs. mode.
Fatal Fury (USA).desc:
南鎮市舉辦拳皇錦標賽。安迪·博加德和特里·博加德參加比賽，因為贏得比賽是他們擊敗吉斯·霍華德的唯一途徑。吉斯·霍華德控制了南鎮市，並在幾年前殺死了他們的父親。參加比賽的還有日本跆拳道運動員東喬。選擇喬、安迪或特里，參觀南鎮市的多個地點並贏得錦標賽！

《餓狼傳說》是一款 2D 格鬥遊戲，也是 SNK 推出的一系列一對一格鬥遊戲中的第一款遊戲。它是原始《餓狼傳說》街機遊戲的轉換版。第一款遊戲尚未採用該系列標誌性的偽 3D 模式（允許您在戰鬥時在前景和背景之間移動）。包括兩人對戰模式。

Bust-A-Move (USA).name: 胸圍動作
Bust-A-Move (USA).original_desc:
Bust-A-Move (also known as Puzzle Bobble) is a real-time puzzle game in which the player controls a device called "pointer" at the bottom of the screen, aiming and releasing randomly colored bubbles upwards. Depending on the aiming, the bubbles may float up directly or bounce off the walls, changing their trajectory. The goal is to aim the bubbles in such a way that they will touch identically colored ones. When such bubbles form a group of three or more, they pop and disappear from the screen.

If the ceiling of the area is covered by too many bubbles, it will gradually descend; the game is over when it nearly reaches the player-controlled pointer. Should the player fail to release the bubbles within a specific time limit, they will be released automatically, unaffected by the pointer's aiming.

A two-player mode is included as well. Each player competes on an area occupying half of the screen, dealing with identically generated bubbles. Whenever a player successfully disposes of a bubble group, a part of it is transferred onto the opponent's part of the screen.

The game features the two dinosaur protagonists (Bob and Bub) as well as other characters from Bubble Bobble, even though the two games have distinctly different gameplay.
Bust-A-Move (USA).desc:
Bust-A-Move（也稱為 Puzzle Bobble）是一款實時益智遊戲，玩家控制屏幕底部的一個名為“指針”的設備，瞄準並向上釋放隨機顏色的泡泡。根據瞄準的不同，氣泡可能會直接漂浮起來或從牆壁上反彈，從而改變其軌跡。目標是瞄準氣泡，使它們接觸到相同顏色的氣泡。當這些氣泡形成三個或更多氣泡時，它們就會破裂並從屏幕上消失。

如果該區域的天花板被過多的氣泡覆蓋，它會逐漸下降；當它接近玩家控制的指針時遊戲結束。如果玩家未能在規定的時間內釋放氣泡，氣泡將自動釋放，不受指針瞄準的影響。

還包括兩人模式。每個玩家在佔據屏幕一半的區域上競爭，處理相同生成的氣泡。每當玩家成功消除氣泡組時，它的一部分就會轉移到屏幕上對手的部分。

該遊戲以兩位恐龍主角（鮑勃和巴布）以及《泡泡龍》中的其他角色為特色，儘管這兩款遊戲的遊戲玩法截然不同。

Lost Vikings, The (USA).name: 失落的維京人
Lost Vikings, The (USA).original_desc:
Three Vikings, Eric the Swift, Olaf the Stout and Baleog the Fierce, were kidnapped by the alien Tomator, the evil Croutonian ruler, who is collecting unique life forms to display in his gallery. The three Vikings will have to combine their unique skills to defeat Tomator, as well as a vast array of aliens, robots, giant snails, big lizards and more.

The Lost Vikings is a side-scrolling platform puzzle game with a twist. Instead of one character who can jump, run, shoot, collect items, flip switches and so on, there are three different characters, each with his own skills. Eric the Swift can jump, run and bash through walls with his tough helmet. Olaf the Stout has a shield which can block attacks, function as an air glider or as a step to stand on. Baleog the Fierce can shoot things with his arrows (including switches) or kill things with his sword. The player has to use the three Vikings as a team if he wants to get past the increasingly difficult levels and puzzles.

The player controls one Viking at a time, but can switch between them at any point. The Vikings have limited space in their inventory which they can use to keep various items. Each Viking has three health points, and if he loses them all from confrontations with dangers, he dies (some threats kill instantly), and the level must be restarted.
Lost Vikings, The (USA).desc:
三個維京人：迅捷的埃里克、粗壯的奧拉夫和兇猛的巴萊奧格，被邪惡的克魯頓統治者外星番茄綁架了，番茄正在收集獨特的生命形式並在他的畫廊中展示。三個維京人必須結合他們獨特的技能來擊敗番茄，以及大量的外星人、機器人、巨型蝸牛、大蜥蜴等等。

《失落的維京人》是一款帶有特色的橫向捲軸平台益智遊戲。不再是一個可以跳躍、奔跑、射擊、收集物品、翻轉開關等的角色，而是三個不同的角色，每個角色都有自己的技能。迅捷的埃里克可以跳躍、奔跑，還可以戴著堅固的頭盔衝破牆壁。粗壯奧拉夫擁有一面盾牌，可以阻擋攻擊，可以用作空中滑翔機或站立的台階。兇猛的巴雷奧格可以用他的箭（包括開關）射擊物體或用他的劍殺死物體。如果玩家想要通過越來越困難的關卡和謎題，就必須將三個維京人作為一個團隊。

玩家一次控制一名維京人，但可以隨時在他們之間切換。維京人的庫存空間有限，可用來存放各種物品。每個維京人都有三個生命值，如果他因與危險的對抗而失去所有生命值，他就會死亡（某些威脅會立即殺死），並且必須重新開始關卡。

Chrono Trigger (USA).name: 計時觸發器
Chrono Trigger (USA).original_desc:
What begins as a carefree day at the Millennial Fair for a young man named Crono turns into a huge adventure. He will be thrusted into the ultimate trip through time and space, encountering new friends, defeating the forces of evil, and encountering the one who would destroy the flow of time.
Chrono Trigger is a role-playing game, with the usual game mechanics fare. As the characters grow in power, not only their ability scores increase, but they also learn new "Techs".
The game utilizes the ATB (active time battle) combat system from Final Fantasy game. Apart from normal Techs, it is possible to use Double and Triple Techniques.There are no random battles in the game, as all the enemies are visible on screen, and it's even possible to just pass by them entirely.
The game allows you to face your ultimate adversary at different points of time, which leads to several different endings.
Chrono Trigger (USA).desc:
對於一個名叫克羅諾的年輕人來說，在千禧年博覽會上度過的無憂無慮的一天變成了一場巨大的冒險。他將被推入一場穿越時空的終極之旅，結識新朋友，擊敗邪惡勢力，並遇到破壞時間流動的人。
《時空之輪》是一款角色扮演遊戲，具有常見的遊戲機制。隨著角色力量的增強，他們不僅能力得分會增加，而且還會學習新的“技術”。
該遊戲採用了《最終幻想》遊戲中的ATB（主動時間戰鬥）戰鬥系統。除了普通科技外，還可以使用雙重和三重技術。遊戲中沒有隨機戰鬥，因為所有敵人都在屏幕上可見，甚至可以完全繞過他們。
遊戲讓你在不同的時間點面對你的終極對手，這會導致幾個不同的結局。

Pilotwings (USA).name: 領航翼
Pilotwings (USA).original_desc: Fly a selection of aircraft (including training vehicles, fighter planes and helicopters) through a range of training programs and missions. The more training you complete, the better the chance that you will complete the even bigger missions. Try your hand at landing, taking off, party tricks, fly through bad weather and shoot down targets.
Pilotwings (USA).desc: 通過一系列訓練計劃和任務駕駛精選飛機（包括訓練車、戰鬥機和直升機）。您完成的訓練越多，完成更大任務的機會就越大。嘗試著陸、起飛、派對技巧、在惡劣天氣中飛行並擊落目標。

Speed Racer (USA).original_name: Speed Racer in My Most Dangerous Adventures
Speed Racer (USA).name: 我最危險的冒險中的極速賽車手
Speed Racer (USA).original_desc:
This game is a take on the classic Anime cartoon series, Speed Racer.  You play as Speed, an aspiring race car driver with his trusty car, The Mach 5, along with his GO team, out to travel the world and win every international grand prix on the circuit.

Along the way, you fight off the infamous villains of the series, out to stop Speed by any means necessary, even capturing his girlfriend, Trixie.  There are seven levels in all and in between racing levels you'll be on foot in a side-scroll style adventure, fighting off thugs and gangsters, collecting power ups to help you out, including green flags in order to keep your health up (not kidding about that).
Speed Racer (USA).desc:
該遊戲是經典動漫系列《極速賽車》的改編版。你扮演 Speed，一位有抱負的賽車手，駕駛著他值得信賴的賽車 The Mach 5，以及他的 GO 團隊，環遊世界並贏得賽道上的每一次國際大獎賽。

一路上，你與系列中臭名昭著的惡棍戰鬥，不擇手段地阻止速度，甚至抓住了他的女朋友特里克西。總共有七個級別，在賽車級別之間，您將徒步進行橫向捲軸風格的冒險，與暴徒和歹徒戰鬥，收集能量來幫助您，包括綠色旗幟以保持您的健康（不是開玩笑）。

Whizz (USA).name: 呼嘯
Whizz (USA).original_desc: Whizz is one of the few 3D platformers to use an isometric viewpoint. The controls reflect this, with moving the controller to the right actually moving the character down and right, moving it down and right moving the character down directly, and so on. Each level is played out against a time limit, and the paths through the level aren’t always clear-cut. There are four different types of doors, each of which needs a particular icon to pass (the icons represent the door type, such as ice or bricks, rather than hot water or a key, or anything you’d logically expect to clear the path). You can avoid the baddies, which may be the best option, as killing them costs you some energy –this reduces the significance of the points system.
Whizz (USA).desc: Whiz 是少數使用等距視角的 3D 平台遊戲之一。控件反映了這一點，將控制器向右移動實際上使角色向下和向右移動，向下移動並向右移動則直接向下移動角色，等等。每個級別都有時間限制，並且通過級別的路徑並不總是明確的。有四種不同類型的門，每種類型都需要特定的圖標才能通過（圖標代表門類型，例如冰或磚，而不是熱水或鑰匙，或任何您邏輯上期望清理路徑的東西）。你可以避開壞人，這可能是最好的選擇，因為殺死他們會花費你一些能量——這會降低積分系統的重要性。

Super Adventure Island II (USA).name: 超級冒險島2
Super Adventure Island II (USA).original_desc:
Master Higgins finally marries his lovely girlfriend Tina. But out of nowhere, a powerful tropical cyclone destroyed the idyllic mood of their honeymoon. And not only this: it separated the ardent lovers again. After the winds stopped blowing, Tina found herself somewhere on a tropical coast. As for Master Higgins, he went to the king of Waku-Waku and, along with his main quest to save his brand new wife, got an assignment to save also a princess, whom the king was about to marry. Is there a connection between those two events?..

No, this is not a detective/mystery game, but platform arcade action. What distinguish the game clearly not only from ordinary platformers, but also from the first Super Adventure Island, are its light role-playing and puzzle-solving flavors. You don't have a time limit, but huge levels with many secret sub-levels to find, puzzles to solve, and treasure chests to unlock. You also can have equipment, such as swords, shields, etc. By defeating enemies, you gain health items, money, etc. Your HP is measured by hearts, and it can increase during the game if you find appropriate items. You also encounter random enemies while traveling on a world map.
Super Adventure Island II (USA).desc:
希金斯大師終於與他可愛的女友蒂娜結婚了。但突然，一場強大的熱帶氣旋破壞了他們蜜月的田園詩般的心情。不僅如此：這對熱心的戀人再次分開。風停後，蒂娜發現自己身處熱帶海岸的某個地方。至於希金斯大師，他去找了瓦庫瓦庫國王，除了拯救他的新妻子之外，他還接到了拯救國王即將娶的公主的任務。這兩起事件之間有聯繫嗎？

不，這不是偵探/懸疑遊戲，而是平台街機動作遊戲。該遊戲與普通平台遊戲以及第一部《超級冒險島》的明顯區別在於其輕鬆的角色扮演和解謎風格。你沒有時間限制，但有巨大的關卡，有許多秘密的子關卡等你去發現，謎題等你解決，還有寶箱等你解鎖。你還可以擁有裝備，比如劍、盾牌等。通過擊敗敵人，你可以獲得生命值、金錢等。你的生命值是用心來衡量的，如果你找到合適的物品，它會在遊戲過程中增加。在世界地圖上旅行時，您還會遇到隨機的敵人。

Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego (U.key: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego (U.original_name: Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego?
Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego (U.name: 卡門·桑迪戈在世界的哪個地方？
Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego (U.original_desc:
You start out as a rookie detective whose job is to track down a crop of thieves stealing the world's most precious treasures. After each assignment briefing, you'll be given a deadline to capture the thief that stole the artifact using clues dealing with your knowledge of geography. 

Remake of the original Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego?. Features enhanced VGA graphics, sound effects, and joystick support.
Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego (U.desc:
你一開始是一名菜鳥偵探，其工作是追捕一群偷竊世界上最珍貴寶藏的小偷。每次任務簡報結束後，你都會有一個截止日期，利用你的地理知識線索抓捕偷竊文物的小偷。

翻拍原版《卡門·桑迪戈在世界哪裡？ 》。具有增強的 VGA 圖形、聲音效果和操縱桿支持。

Ultima - Runes of Virtue II (USA).name: 創世紀 : 美德符文 II
Ultima - Runes of Virtue II (USA).original_desc:
Runes Of Virtue 2 is the sequel to Runes Of Virtue for the Game Boy.  Released on the Super NES as well as the Game Boy, Runes Of Virtue 2 maintains the action-RPG gameplay as the original.  In this game, the Black Knight kidnaps Lord Tholden, simply out of boredom.  Lord British sends you, the Avatar, out to recover Tholden and return peace to Brittania.

As in the first Runes Of Virtue game you have the choice of selecting one of four characters.  And again, there are three modes of difficulty.
Ultima - Runes of Virtue II (USA).desc:
Runes Of Virtue 2 是 Game Boy 版 Runes Of Virtue 的續作。Runes Of Virtue 2 在 Super NES 和 Game Boy 上發布，保留了原作的動作角色扮演遊戲玩法。在這款遊戲中，黑騎士只是出於無聊而綁架了托頓勳爵。英國勳爵派遣你，阿凡達，前去追回托爾頓，並為不列顛尼亞恢復和平。

與第一款 Runes Of Virtue 遊戲一樣，您可以選擇四個角色之一。再次強調，難度分為三種模式。

Wario's Woods (USA).name: 瓦里奧的森林
Wario's Woods (USA).original_desc:
Wario's Woods is a puzzle game similar to Tetris or Columns, but with a twist. Instead of directly controlling the monsters and bombs that are falling down, the player controls Toad who has to carry around stacks of monsters and bombs and to combine them in the right way. One bomb plus at least two monsters of the same color have to be combined to make them disappear. If five or more objects are cleared at the same time, a diamond will appear. Destroying the diamond will clear all monsters of the diamond's color.
There are four different ways to pick up objects. The A button lets Toad pick up the whole stack that is in front of him, the B button lets him only pick up one object, even if it's in the middle of a stack, the Y button lets him kick a monster or bomb that's in front of him and the X button places him on top of the stack that he is carrying. He can also run up walls and stacks to catch falling objects out of the air or to pick up certain parts of a stack.
Wario's Woods (USA).desc:
瓦里奧森林是一款類似於俄羅斯方塊或方塊的益智遊戲，但有所不同。玩家不是直接控制掉落的怪物和炸彈，而是控制蟾蜍，蟾蜍必須攜帶成堆的怪物和炸彈，並以正確的方式將它們組合起來。一枚炸彈加上至少兩個相同顏色的怪物必須組合才能使它們消失。如果同時清除五個或更多物體，則會出現菱形。摧毀鑽石將會清除所有與鑽石顏色相同的怪物。
有四種不同的方式來拾取物體。A 按鈕讓蟾蜍撿起他面前的整堆物體，B 按鈕讓他只撿起一個物體，即使它位於一堆物體的中間，Y 按鈕讓他踢他面前的怪物或炸彈，X 按鈕讓他站在他攜帶的物體堆的頂部。他還可以跑上牆壁和堆垛來接住從空中掉落的物體或撿起堆垛中的某些部分。

King of the Monsters 2 (USA).name: 怪獸之王2
King of the Monsters 2 (USA).original_desc: The object of King of the Monsters 2 is similar to its predecessor. Choose from three monsters which include a large lizard, a large robotic ape, and a huge mutant human. Then walk through each city, making sure to destroy everything in site, including planes, buildings, and other creatures. When smashed, some buildings reveal power-ups that make your character more powerful. At the end of each city, you go head-to-head with the boss creature. There are small stages in between where you fight a second monster for bonus points, or you fall from the sky and land underwater where you try to collect points and power-ups while falling.
King of the Monsters 2 (USA).desc: 《怪獸之王2》的目標與其前作相似。從三種怪物中進行選擇，其中包括一隻大蜥蜴、一隻大型機器猿和一個巨大的變異人類。然後穿過每個城市，確保摧毀現場的一切，包括飛機、建築物和其他生物。當被砸碎時，一些建築物會釋放出能量，讓你的角色變得更加強大。在每個城市的盡頭，你都會與頭目生物正面交鋒。中間有一些小階段，你可以與第二個怪物戰鬥以獲得獎勵積分，或者你從天上掉下來並降落在水下，在掉落時嘗試收集積分和能量提升。

Musya - The Classic Japanese Tale of Hor.key: Musya - The Classic Japanese Tale of Horror (USA)
Musya - The Classic Japanese Tale of Hor.original_name: Musya : The Classic Japanese Tale of Horror
Musya - The Classic Japanese Tale of Hor.name: Musya：日本經典恐怖故事
Musya - The Classic Japanese Tale of Hor.original_desc:
Shizuka holds a talisman that has locked away the Evil One in the Abyss. Recently, a guard of the Evil One has taken Shizuka away from her village along with her talisman. Now it is up to the pikeman, Imoto, to save her and seal away the Evil One.

Gameplay has Imoto going through various stages defeating enemies and stage bosses with his spear. Imoto can both thrust and spin his spear to attack enemies. He can also use 5 different magic spells, such as Thunder and Flame, which kill all the enemies on the screen.  Imoto may hold up to four scrolls of each of the five spells. Used spells can be replenished by finding items throughout each stage.

The stages included are Tengumura Cavern, Catacombs, Palace of Hate, Cave of Darkness, Catacombs of Akuma, Cursed Palace, and the Watery Prison.
Musya - The Classic Japanese Tale of Hor.desc:
靜香持有一張將惡人鎖在深淵的護身符。最近，惡人的一名守衛將靜香連同她的護身符一起帶離了她的村莊。現在輪到長槍手井本來拯救她並封印邪惡者了。

遊戲玩法讓井本經歷各個階段，用他的長矛擊敗敵人和階段老闆。井本可以刺擊和旋轉他的長矛來攻擊敵人。他還可以使用雷霆和火焰等 5 種不同的魔法咒語，殺死屏幕上的所有敵人。井本最多可以持有五個法術中每個法術的四個捲軸。使用過的法術可以通過在每個階段尋找物品來補充。

包括的關卡有天狗村洞穴、地下墓穴、仇恨宮殿、黑暗洞穴、惡熊地下墓穴、詛咒宮殿和水牢。

Operation Logic Bomb - The Ultimate Sear.key: Operation Logic Bomb - The Ultimate Search & Destroy (USA)
Operation Logic Bomb - The Ultimate Sear.original_name: Operation Logic Bomb : The Ultimate Search & Destroy
Operation Logic Bomb - The Ultimate Sear.name: 操作邏輯炸彈：終極搜索與摧毀
Operation Logic Bomb - The Ultimate Sear.original_desc:
At a secret lab developing technology in interdimensional physics, some kind of accident has occurred. Suddenly all contact is lost with the facility and the power shut down. The dimensional fabric surrounding the facility seems weak and strange monsters have been sighted. Concerned, an unknown agency preps a cybernetic soldier and his weapons to investigate...

Playing as the bionic soldier, this game is a top-down shooter. The player must blast their way through enemy forces and the activate various switches to progress. Accessing computer memory banks throughout the facility will reveal footage of the accident and give some idea of all it happened. Additionally, dimensional holes have opened up all around the levels allowing monsters to appear and making certain paths, walls and technologies inaccessible until the area has been stabilized.

The soldier uses a main weapon and a secondary weapon to progress, both of which can be cycled at any time and upgraded to new weapons found in the area.
Operation Logic Bomb - The Ultimate Sear.desc:
在一個開發跨維度物理技術的秘密實驗室裡，發生了某種事故。突然間，與該設施的所有聯繫都中斷了，電源也關閉了。該設施周圍的空間結構似乎很脆弱，並且發現了奇怪的怪物。一個未知機構擔心地準備一名控制論士兵和他的武器來調查......

該遊戲扮演仿生士兵，是一款自上而下的射擊遊戲。玩家必須炸開敵軍並激活各種開關才能前進。訪問整個設施的計算機內存庫將顯示事故的錄像並提供對所發生的一切的一些了解。此外，各個關卡周圍都出現了維度洞，允許怪物出現，並使某些路徑、牆壁和技術無法進入，直到該區域穩定下來。

士兵使用主武器和副武器來前進，這兩種武器都可以隨時循環併升級為該地區發現的新武器。

Nobunaga's Ambition (USA).name: 信長的野心
Nobunaga's Ambition (USA).original_desc:
In the 16th century, Japan's Sengoku period divided the nation into numerous feudal states, each ruled by a daimyo. Many dreamt of conquering the land, becoming the Shogun and ruling the entire country. One of those daimyos was the ambitious Nobunaga Oda, a merciless ruler and a renowned strategist. Players take on the role of Nobunaga Oda or one of many other daimyos to try to conquer Japan.

Nobunaga's Ambition is a turn-based strategy game which can be played in different modes.  Players begin by selecting either a 17 regions scenario or a larger 50 scenario. Then, the player must select a daimyo, each of which is rated attributes in several categories; Age, Health, Ambition, Luck, Charm and IQ. As the game progresses, these values change depending on events in the game. The age value represents a time limit of sorts, as an elderly daimyo becomes increasingly likely to die of old age or sickness.
Nobunaga's Ambition (USA).desc:
16 世紀，日本戰國時代將國家劃分為眾多封建國家，每個國家都由一位大名統治。許多人夢想征服這片土地，成為幕府將軍並統治整個國家。其中一位大名是野心勃勃的織田信長，他是一位無情的統治者和著名的戰略家。玩家扮演織田信長或其他眾多大名之一，試圖征服日本。

《信長的野心》是一款回合製策略遊戲，可以以不同的模式進行。玩家首先選擇 17 個區域場景或更大的 50 個場景。然後，玩家必須選擇一個大名，每個大名都有多個類別的屬性評級；年齡、健康、野心、運氣、魅力和智商。隨著遊戲的進行，這些值會根據遊戲中的事件而變化。年齡值代表了某種時間限制，因為年老的大名越來越有可能死於年老或疾病。

Mickey's Ultimate Challenge (USA).name: 米奇的終極挑戰
Mickey's Ultimate Challenge (USA).original_desc:
One night, as Mickey (or Minnie) lay in bed reading a book of fairy tales, he started to wonder how it would be to live in a far off land, in a magic castle. As he fell asleep, he woke up in the Kingdom of Beanwick, which is constantly tormented by earthquakes. Then, he offers his help to solve the mystery behind those earthquakes.

Mickey's Ultimate Challenge is a puzzle game in which the player chooses either Mickey or Minnie to play with. They'll find five characters from the Disney's universe in the kingdom, and will be prompted to help them in several tasks.

Each task is a different puzzle, given by a specific character. Daisy, for instance, will ask help to clean the castle's paintings hanging on a wall. The task is in fact a memory game, where Mickey or Minnie must clean the pictures matching pairs. After completing one task, they'll receive a gift.

After completing all tasks, Mickey or Minnie must trade the gifts they won with the right characters. For instance, after finishing Goofy's task, they will receive his hammer. The player must then guess who among the other characters would like to receive that hammer.

Giving the right items to the right characters will allow Mickey or Minnie access to the last puzzle and character.
Mickey's Ultimate Challenge (USA).desc:
一天晚上，當米奇（或米妮）躺在床上讀一本童話書時，他開始想知道生活在遙遠的土地上的一座魔法城堡裡會是什麼樣子。當他睡著時，他在比威克王國醒來，這裡經常遭受地震的折磨。然後，他提供幫助來解開這些地震背後的謎團。

米奇的終極挑戰是一款益智遊戲，玩家可以選擇米奇或米妮來玩。他們將在王國中找到來自迪士尼宇宙的五個角色，並會被提示幫助他們完成多項任務。

每個任務都是一個不同的謎題，由特定的角色給出。例如，黛西會請求幫助清理城堡牆上掛的畫。該任務實際上是一個記憶遊戲，米奇或米妮必須清理配對的圖片。完成一項任務後，他們將收到一份禮物。

完成所有任務後，米奇或米妮必須與正確的角色交換他們贏得的禮物。例如，完成高飛的任務後，他們將收到他的錘子。然後玩家必須猜測其他角色中誰想要收到那把錘子。

將正確的物品交給正確的角色將允許米奇或米妮訪問最後一個謎題和角色。

Mystery Dungeon 2 - Shiren the Wanderer.name: 神秘迷宮2 - 流浪者石仁

Kirby's Dream Course (USA).name: 卡比的夢想球場
Kirby's Dream Course (USA).original_desc:
Kirby's Dream Course is an innovative SNES game featuring everyone's favourite pink blob, Kirby. After his adventures in Dream Land we find him in this mini golf game where Kirby himself is the ball, and you must guide him around each hole using the sort of bar system that you see in most golf games. Where this game differs, however, is in the fact that you need to eliminate all on-screen enemies before you can guide Kirby into the hole and complete it. As per usual in golf games, the more strokes it takes you to complete the whole, the lower your score - so make sure you aim Kirby just right!

You'll find eight courses and a total of sixty-four holes in the game, not including the final showdown with King Dedede, as well as an action-packed two-player mode.
Kirby's Dream Course (USA).desc:
卡比的夢想球場是一款創新的 SNES 遊戲，以大家最喜歡的粉色斑點卡比為特色。在他在夢幻之地的冒險之後，我們在這款迷你高爾夫遊戲中找到了他，卡比本人就是球，你必須使用大多數高爾夫遊戲中看到的那種桿系統引導他繞過每個洞。然而，這款遊戲的不同之處在於，你需要消滅屏幕上的所有敵人，然後才能引導卡比進入洞中並完成任務。與高爾夫遊戲中的慣例一樣，您完成整個比賽所需的擊球次數越多，您的分數就越低 - 所以請確保您瞄準卡比正確！

遊戲中有 8 個球場和總共 64 個洞，不包括與帝帝帝王的最後對決，以及充滿動感的兩人遊戲模式。

Utopia - The Creation of a Nation (USA).key: Utopia - The Creation of a Nation (USA)
Utopia - The Creation of a Nation (USA).original_name: Utopia : The Creation of a Nation
Utopia - The Creation of a Nation (USA).name: 烏托邦:一個國家的創建
Utopia - The Creation of a Nation (USA).original_desc:
Utopia takes the Sim City gameplay concept and adds a military element to it. The game is set in the distant future, where your job is nothing less than Colony Administrator for a new settlement on some far-flung planet. Your aim is to provide the highest Quality of Life rating for the colonists. 

You do so by ensuring that there is enough life support, power, housing, employment, police and entertainment to keep the citizens of your colony happy. Hindering your goal are random events such as solar eclipses (which can render your solar panels inactive) and also a different, hostile alien race that inhabits the planets in the many scenarios at offer. 

Not only do you have to be a good mayor but you also have to be a good general. Resources must not only be attributed to civilian research but into weapons research, intelligence and the building of tanks and spaceships, if you wish to survive long enough to see your colony flourish into a metropolis. As a rule, you will have built a strong colony before the aliens come, but the final push towards a QOL of 80% or higher can only be achieved once there is no outside threat.
Utopia - The Creation of a Nation (USA).desc:
烏托邦採用了模擬城市的遊戲概念，並添加了軍事元素。遊戲背景設定在遙遠的未來，你的工作就是某個遙遠星球上新定居點的殖民地管理員。您的目標是為殖民者提供最高的生活質量評級。

你可以通過確保有足夠的生命支持、電力、住房、就業、警察和娛樂來讓你的殖民地的公民感到高興來做到這一點。阻礙你實現目標的是隨機事件，例如日食（這可能會使你的太陽能電池板失效），以及在許多場景中居住在行星上的不同的、敵對的外星種族。

你不僅要當一個好市長，還要當一個好將軍。如果你希望生存足夠長的時間，看到你的殖民地蓬勃發展成為一個大都市，那麼資源不僅必須用於民用研究，還必須用於武器研究、情報以及坦克和宇宙飛船的建造。一般來說，你會在外星人到來之前建立一個強大的殖民地，但只有在沒有外部威脅的情況下才能實現生活質量達到 80% 或更高的最終目標。

Wild Guns (USA).name: 野槍
Wild Guns (USA).original_desc:
Annie & Clint, two gunslingers, arrive at Carson City and get caught up in a gunfight. It's raining bullets and there are explosions everywhere. After an intense battle they enter the saloon where they dispose of every cowboy in sight while redecorating the interior. Our heroes flee the scene by climbing on the roof, but what's that sound? ... it's a HUGE robot!
Wild Guns is a shooter with a western & Sci Fi theme. Gameplay is somewhat similar to the Time Crisis & House of the Dead games, with the exception that the game isn't played from a first-person perspective but from a third-person perspective. You control your on-screen character as well as the aiming crosshair. Select either Clint or Annie and shoot down tons of enemies while dodging bullets and jumping over incoming rockets.
After the Carson City level, the action continues in Desolation Canyon, an ammunition depot, a gold mine and a armored train . Finally there's a showdown with the big bad guy.
Wild Guns (USA).desc:
安妮和克林特，兩名槍手，抵達卡森城並陷入槍戰。槍林彈雨，到處都是爆炸聲。經過一場激烈的戰鬥，他們進入了酒吧，在那裡他們處理掉了看到的所有牛仔，同時重新裝修了內部。我們的英雄爬上屋頂逃離現場，但那是什麼聲音？...這是一個巨大的機器人！
Wild Guns 是一款西部科幻主題的射擊遊戲。遊戲玩法有點類似於《時間危機》和《死亡之屋》遊戲，不同之處在於遊戲不是從第一人稱視角而是從第三人稱視角進行。您可以控制屏幕上的角色以及瞄準十字線。選擇克林特或安妮，擊落大量敵人，同時躲避子彈並跳過來襲的火箭。
卡森城關卡後，行動繼續在荒涼峽谷、彈藥庫、金礦和裝甲列車。終於要和大壞蛋一決勝負了。

Blackthorne (USA).name: 布萊克索恩
Blackthorne (USA).original_desc:
Blackthorne is an action-adventure game that takes place on the planet Tuul. Tuul was a peaceful place, until the evil warrior Sarlac used the power of the Darkstone to take control.  Blackthorne's father, the good King Vlaros, sent him to Earth just as his kingdom crumbled around him.  Now, 20 years later, Blackthorne is grown and must return to Tuul to free it from the clutches of Sarlac.

This game is played from a side-view with non-scrolling backgrounds. It has strong similarities to Prince of Persia, except you battle your foes using guns and bombs instead of a sword.
Blackthorne (USA).desc:
Blackthorne 是一款發生在 Tuul 星球的動作冒險遊戲。圖爾是一個和平的地方，直到邪惡的戰士薩拉克使用黑石的力量來控制。布萊克索恩的父親，善良的弗拉羅斯國王，在他的王國在他周圍崩潰時把他送到了地球。20 年後的今天，黑刺李已經長大，必須返回圖爾，將其從沙拉克的魔掌中解放出來。

該遊戲是從具有非滾動背景的側視圖進行的。它與波斯王子有很強的相似之處，只不過你用槍和炸彈而不是劍與敵人戰鬥。

Zoop (USA).name: 祖普
Zoop (USA).original_desc:
Fast-paced action-puzzle game where the player eliminates colored shapes that are approaching his alter ego, another colored shape, before they reach the top, ala Tetris.

In order to eliminate the other shapes, you must point your piece at it and 'fire'. If the shape is the same color as your piece, the shape is eliminated, as well as all of the shapes of the same color behind it, until your piece hits a piece of a different color. If the shape is of a different color, or it is hit when collecting a line of similar shapes, your piece exchanges colors with the shape.
Zoop (USA).desc:
快節奏的動作益智遊戲，玩家在到達頂部（俄羅斯方塊）之前消除正在接近他的另一個自我（另一個彩色形狀）的彩色形狀。

為了消除其他形狀，您必須將棋子指向它並“開火”。如果該形狀與您的棋子顏色相同，則該形狀以及其後面的所有相同顏色的形狀都會被消除，直到您的棋子擊中不同顏色的棋子。如果形狀具有不同的顏色，或者在收集相似形狀的線時被擊中，則您的作品會與形狀交換顏色。

Young Merlin (USA).name: 年輕的梅林
Young Merlin (USA).original_desc: After trying to rescue a drowning young woman, the the hero of Young Merlin is drawn into a fantasy world which is threatened by the evil Shadow King. Naturally, it is your job to save this world and also to rescue the aforementioned woman who has been kidnapped by the Shadow King. This is done in typical action adventure fashion: you have to fight enemies using spells that are gathered during the progress of the game as well as solve puzzles and use several objects. What sets Young Merlin apart from other action adventures is the fact that there is no text in the entire game, instead, icons are used to represent conversations, furthermore, the game uses passwords,instead of a battery to record the players progress.
Young Merlin (USA).desc: 《少年梅林》的主人公在試圖營救一名溺水的年輕女子後，被捲入了一個受到邪惡暗影王威脅的奇幻世界。當然，你的任務就是拯救這個世界，並拯救前面提到的被暗影之王綁架的女人。這是以典型的動作冒險方式完成的：你必須使用遊戲過程中收集的咒語與敵人戰鬥，以及解決謎題並使用多個物體。《少年梅林》與其他動作冒險遊戲的不同之處在於，整個遊戲中沒有文字，而是用圖標來代表對話，而且遊戲使用密碼而不是電池來記錄玩家的進度。

Batman Returns (USA).name: 蝙蝠俠歸來
Batman Returns (USA).original_desc:
The successful movie sequel Batman Returns spawned many different game adaptations. The SNES version presents the story of Batman's encounter with the Penguin and Catwoman as a side-scrolling beat'em'up, with one Batmobile driving sequence thrown in.

There are two varieties of the beat'em'up levels. One plays like Final Fight and similar games: Batman can move in two dimensions, beating up his enemies with various punches, kicks, combos and special moves.
Special gadgets to be used include the famous Batarang to take out enemies from a distance and "Test Tubes" filled with chemical explosives which will damage all enemies on the screen.

In the second type of side-scrolling level, Batman can only move in one dimension, left or right. The Batarang is the standard weapon here, with punches only being used when the enemy gets close. Also in these levels, Batman can use a grappling hook to cross dangerous areas unharmed.

Enemies in the beat'em'up levels usually belong to the Penguin's Red Triangle Circus Gang - clowns in all varieties: thin clowns, fat clowns, clowns on bikes, clowns armed with bazookas, and more. At the end of each level there is a boss fight, including several encounters with Catwoman and the Penguin.

In the Batmobile driving level, the action is viewed from behind. Batman has to evade clowns on bikes and shoot them down when he gets the chance. At the end of the road, another boss fight awaits.

Digitized images from the film illustrate the storyline.
Batman Returns (USA).desc:
成功的電影續集《蝙蝠俠歸來》催生了許多不同的遊戲改編。SNES 版本將蝙蝠俠與企鵝人和貓女相遇的故事呈現為一款橫向捲軸清版遊戲，並加入了蝙蝠車駕駛場景。

清版遊戲關卡有兩種。其玩法類似於《Final Fight》和類似遊戲：蝙蝠俠可以在二維空間中移動，用各種拳、踢、連擊和特殊動作擊敗敵人。
使用的特殊小工具包括著名的蝙蝠鏢，可以從遠處消滅敵人，以及充滿化學炸藥的“試管”，它會傷害屏幕上的所有敵人。

在第二種類型的橫向捲軸關卡中，蝙蝠俠只能在一個維度上移動，向左或向右。蝙蝠鏢是這裡的標準武器，只有當敵人靠近時才會使用拳頭。同樣在這些關卡中，蝙蝠俠可以使用抓鉤毫髮無損地穿越危險區域。

清版關卡中的敵人通常屬於企鵝紅三角馬戲團 - 各種小丑：瘦小丑、胖小丑、騎自行車的小丑、手持火箭筒的小丑等等。每個關卡的最後都會有一場 Boss 戰，其中包括與貓女和企鵝的幾次遭遇。

在蝙蝠車駕駛關卡中，動作是從後面觀看的。蝙蝠俠必須躲避騎自行車的小丑，並在有機會時將其擊落。在路的盡頭，另一場 Boss 戰正在等待著。

電影中的數字化圖像說明了故事情節。

Super Star Wars - The Empire Strikes Bac.key: Super Star Wars - The Empire Strikes Back (USA) (Rev 1)
Super Star Wars - The Empire Strikes Bac.original_name: Super Star Wars : The Empire Strikes Back
Super Star Wars - The Empire Strikes Bac.name: 超級星球大戰：帝國反擊戰
Super Star Wars - The Empire Strikes Bac.original_desc:
The sequel to  Super Star Wars is, as the name implies, based on Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back, the second of the original  Star Wars movie trilogy. The game features familiar locations and events from the film, such as the ice planet Hoth, the search for Yoda on the jungle planet Dagobah, and the fight against Darth Vader. Several locations are expanded, adding places and boss enemies that did not exist in the movie, and certain key events in the story are omitted or changed. 

As in the previous game, the player is able to control three characters: Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Chewbacca. Unlike the first, each character has been given a distinct special move. Chewie spins a path of destruction through enemies, Han has grenades and a powerful slide, and Luke can switch to his lightsaber and block oncoming fire. Gameplay is very similar to the first game, mostly focusing on platforming elements. As before, there are Mode-7 vehicle levels, during which the player is able to pilot a snowspeeder against encroaching Imperial walkers, pilot the Millennium Falcon through the asteroid field, and break through Cloud City's defenses in Luke's X-Wing fighter. 

The game's other major addition is the inclusion of a suite of Force powers for Luke. They are learned by collecting hidden orbs on the Dagobah level, and add a second special bar that depletes with each usage of a Force power. Power-ups include health items, weapon upgrades, screen-clearing detonators, and orbs that restore Luke's Force power. Passwords have also been added, and are given upon completion of each of the game's 25 stages.
Super Star Wars - The Empire Strikes Bac.desc:
顧名思義，《超級星球大戰》的續集是根據原星球大戰電影三部曲的第二部《第五集：帝國反擊戰》改編的。該遊戲以電影中熟悉的地點和事件為特色，例如冰雪星球霍斯、在叢林星球達戈巴尋找尤達以及與達斯維德的戰鬥。擴展了多個地點，添加了電影中不存在的地點和頭目敵人，並且故事中的某些關鍵事件被省略或改變。

與前作一樣，玩家能夠控制三個角色：盧克·天行者、漢·索羅和丘巴卡。與第一個不同的是，每個角色都被賦予了獨特的特殊動作。楚伊（Chewie）在敵人中旋轉出一條毀滅之路，漢（Han）擁有手榴彈和強大的滑梯，而盧克（Luke）可以切換到他的光劍並阻擋迎面而來的火力。遊戲玩法與第一款遊戲非常相似，主要側重於平台元素。和以前一樣，有模式 7 車輛關卡，在此期間，玩家可以駕駛雪地飛行器對抗入侵的帝國步行者，駕駛千年隼穿過小行星帶，並駕駛盧克的 X 翼戰鬥機突破雲城的防禦。

遊戲的另一個主要補充是為盧克添加了一套原力能力。它們是通過收集達戈巴關卡中隱藏的球體來學習的，並添加第二個特殊條，該條會隨著每次使用原力而耗盡。強化道具包括生命值物品、武器升級、清屏雷管以及恢復盧克原力力量的球體。還添加了密碼，並在遊戲 25 個階段完成後給出。

Metal Warriors (USA).name: 金屬戰士
Metal Warriors (USA).original_desc:
Get deployed in your own giant mech and battle through nine linear levels against the evil Dark Axis forces. Eject and switch robots, piloting one of the six "Battledroid" suits; but watch out because there are no save games and no continue codes.

For the best of Metal Warriors, grab a friend for some head-to-head combat in the PvP mode. The variety of robots and levels means the matchups stay surprising and interesting.
Metal Warriors (USA).desc:
部署在你自己的巨型機甲中，通過九個線性關卡對抗邪惡的黑暗軸心軍。彈出並切換機器人，駕駛六套“Battledroid”套裝中的一套；但要小心，因為沒有保存遊戲，也沒有繼續代碼。

想要獲得最出色的《金屬戰士》的體驗，請與好友在 PvP 模式中進行正面交鋒。機器人和關卡的多樣性意味著比賽總是令人驚訝和有趣。

Clock Tower (Japan) (Translated).name: 鐘樓
Clock Tower (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Jennifer and her friends are adopted by a nice lady named Mary one day. They expect to be going to a wonderful new home, at the Barrows Mansion. There they will live with Mary and Mr. Barrows. Unfortunately, something goes terribly wrong and Jennifer's friends are showing up dead one by one.  While this is happening, Mary is missing and Jennifer ends up being chased by a crazed psychopath known only as...Scissorman. 

Now she must survive and get out of the mansion in this point-and-click horror adventure... Being a teenage girl, you have no special abilities at all, just your wits and your will to survive, there are a few enemies that can kill you instantly, but Scissorman is the true horror that will give you trouble.
Clock Tower (Japan) (Translated).desc:
有一天，詹妮弗和她的朋友們被一位名叫瑪麗的好女士收養。他們期待著去一個美好的新家，巴羅斯大廈。他們將在那裡與瑪麗和巴羅斯先生住在一起。不幸的是，事情發生了嚴重的問題，詹妮弗的朋友們一一死去。當這一切發生時，瑪麗失踪了，詹妮弗最終被一個只被稱為……剪刀人的瘋狂精神病患者追趕。

現在她必須在這場點擊式恐怖冒險中生存並離開豪宅……作為一個十幾歲的女孩，你根本沒有任何特殊能力，只有你的智慧和求生的意志，有一些敵人可以立即殺死你，但剪刀人是真正的恐怖，會給你帶來麻煩。

Cannon Fodder (Europe).name: 炮灰
Cannon Fodder (Europe).original_desc:
Guide a team of up to four soldiers through 72 levels of combat in this innovative top-down action/strategy hybrid, best thought of as Lemmings crossed with Commando crossed with Dune 2. The characters are controlled indirectly using the mouse, as you activate each soldier or group of them by highlighting them, click the left button to move them to a particular spot, and the right button for them to fire guns at an enemy. You can also pick up grenades, which can be used to destroy groups of enemies or buildings (by pressing both buttons at once). 

Each mission has a specific objective, and some feature vehicles such as tanks to make things easier. Your troops can cross water but can't shoot within it, so finding and controlling bridges is often crucial. You can use the arrangement of trees to find hiding places to shoot from, and should watch out for CPU soldiers also doing so.
Cannon Fodder (Europe).desc:
在這款創新的自上而下的動作/策略混合遊戲中，引導一支最多四名士兵的團隊完成 72 個關卡的戰鬥，最好將其視為《旅鼠》、《突擊隊》和《沙丘 2》的結合。使用鼠標間接控制角色，通過突出顯示每個士兵或一組士兵來激活他們，單擊左側按鈕將他們移動到特定位置，單擊右側按鈕讓他們向敵人開槍。你還可以拿起手榴彈，它可以用來摧毀一群敵人或建築物（通過同時按下兩個按鈕）。

每個任務都有一個特定的目標，有些任務還配有坦克等車輛，讓任務變得更容易。你的部隊可以穿過水域，但不能在水中射擊，因此尋找和控制橋樑通常至關重要。你可以利用樹木的排列來尋找隱藏的地方進行射擊，並且應該注意CPU士兵也這樣做。

NHL '94 (USA).name: 國家冰球聯盟'94
NHL '94 (USA).original_desc:
After establishing themselves in the virtual rinks, EA combined both NHL and NHLPA licenses in NHL '94, allowing them to feature all 26 real teams (including both expansion teams) and players of the new NHL season for the first time in the series.

Aside from the licenses, the gameplay for this edition sees for the first time the inclusion of the devastating one-timer shot, but to keep forwards (literally) in check, defenders also feature harder body checks, with new animations. For an additional challenge, players can also choose to control the goalkeeper manually. A popular feature in previous editions, fighting is completely removed from the game. Game modes include exhibition games (or "regular season" in-game), playoffs (best of one or best of seven) and an all new shoot-out mode. The main options remain basically the same couple since the establishment of the series - period length (5, 10 or 20 minutes), line changes (off, manual or the new automatic mode) and penalties. (off, on, on but no offsides). 

While there are some minor differences between platforms (Genesis  features record keeping for users and the MegaCD version has more stat screens, CD quality audio backdrops and the usual highlight clips here and there), only the PC version released at the same time features complete season action.
NHL '94 (USA).desc:
在虛擬冰場上站穩腳跟後，EA 在 NHL '94 中合併了 NHL 和 NHLPA 許可，使他們能夠在該系列中首次展示所有 26 支真實球隊（包括兩個擴展球隊）和新 NHL 賽季的球員。

除了許可之外，這個版本的遊戲玩法首次包含了毀滅性的一次性射門，但為了控制前鋒（字面意思），防守者還採用了更嚴格的身體檢查，並配有新的動畫。對於額外的挑戰，玩家還可以選擇手動控制守門員。之前版本中的一個流行功能，戰鬥已從遊戲中完全刪除。遊戲模式包括表演賽（或遊戲中的“常規賽季”）、季后賽（一場三勝或七場三勝）和全新的點球大戰模式。自該系列賽成立以來，主要選項基本上保持不變 - 時段長度（5、10 或 20 分鐘）、線路變化（關閉、手動或新的自動模式）和處罰。（關，開，開，但沒有越位）。

雖然平台之間存在一些細微的差異（Genesis 為用戶保留記錄，MegaCD 版本有更多的統計屏幕、CD 質量的音頻背景和常見的精彩片段），但只有同時發布的 PC 版本具有完整的賽季動作。

Indiana Jones' Greatest Adventures (USA).name: 印第安納瓊斯最偉大的冒險
Indiana Jones' Greatest Adventures (USA).original_desc:
Indiana Jones gets the Super Star Wars treatment for SNES. The title consists of platform levels from the first three Indy films: Raiders of the Lost Ark, Temple of Doom, and Last Crusade. Players get to use Indy's trademark whip, as well as guns, grenades, and his fists to get through the game. 

Indiana Jones Greatest Adventures also features special levels such as running from the giant boulder (Raiders), the Mine Cart chase (Temple of Doom), flying a biplane (Last Crusade), and fighting a Nazi commander on a tank heading off a cliff (Last Crusade). 

The game is highlighted by selections from the John Williams score, and includes sound effects, digitized speech, and image captures during cutscenes.
Indiana Jones' Greatest Adventures (USA).desc:
印第安納瓊斯在 SNES 上獲得了超級星球大戰的待遇。該遊戲包含前三部印地電影的平台關卡：《奪寶奇兵》、《末日神殿》和《最後的十字軍》。玩家可以使用印地標誌性的鞭子、槍支、手榴彈和拳頭來完成遊戲。

《奪寶奇兵》還設有特殊關卡，例如逃離巨石（突襲者）、礦車追逐（末日神殿）、駕駛雙翼飛機（最後的十字軍）以及駕駛坦克衝下懸崖與納粹指揮官作戰（最後的十字軍）。

遊戲的亮點是約翰·威廉姆斯的配樂精選，包括聲音效果、數字化語音和過場動畫中的圖像捕捉。

Shin Megami Tensei (Japan) (Translated).name: 新女神轉世
Shin Megami Tensei (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
A young man lives together with his mother in Kichijoji, a district in modern Tokyo. One day, he has a strange dream: he is being sucked into another dimension, a strange maze-like structure. A spirit appears in front of him and asks him his name. As he proceeds further, he meets a man who is hanging on a cross, another one who is being tormented by a demon, and a mysterious young woman who is bathing in a pool...

"Wake up!" - the voice of his mother cuts through the dream. The young man wakes up and checks his computer. Suddenly, a message arrives: the world is headed towards destruction. Only he who can summon demons through a virtual space will be able to prevent a disaster. What could that mean? The young man goes outside and finds out a murder has occurred in the nearby park. The district must be cut off from the rest of the city until the murderer is found. This was the beginning of the demon summoner's story...

"Shin Megami Tensei" is a first-person RPG set in modern-day and futuristic Tokyo. The hero of the game can summon demons, who use a mysterious energy called Magnetite. The demons can fight for you and perform other useful tasks. The first-person combat is turn-based. In the beginning of the game, you can set the statistics of your party members, determining their strength, stamina, intelligence, etc. You'll need to make some crucial decisions during the game, that will also influence the outcome of its events.
Shin Megami Tensei (Japan) (Translated).desc:
一名年輕人和他的母親住在現代東京吉祥寺區。有一天，他做了一個奇怪的夢：他被吸入另一個維度，一個奇怪的迷宮般的結構。一個靈魂出現在他面前並詢問他的名字。當他繼續前行時，他遇到了一個被掛在十字架上的男人，另一個被惡魔折磨的男人，還有一個在水池裡沐浴的神秘年輕女子……

“醒醒！” ——他母親的聲音劃破了夢境。年輕人醒來並檢查他的電腦。突然，一條消息傳來：世界正走向毀滅。只有能夠通過虛擬空間召喚惡魔的人，才能阻止災難的發生。這意味著什麼？年輕人走到外面，發現附近的公園發生了一起謀殺案。在找到兇手之前，必須將該地區與城市其他地區隔離。這就是惡魔召喚師故事的開始……

《真女神轉生》是一款以現代和未來東京為背景的第一人稱角色扮演遊戲。遊戲的英雄可以召喚惡魔，惡魔使用一種叫做磁鐵礦的神秘能量。惡魔可以為你戰鬥並執行其他有用的任務。第一人稱戰鬥是回合製的。在遊戲開始時，你可以設置你的隊伍成員的統計數據，確定他們的力量、耐力、智力等。你需要在遊戲過程中做出一些關鍵的決定，這也會影響事件的結果。

Aerobiz (USA).name: 航空航天公司
Aerobiz (USA).original_desc: You are the CEO of an airline company. Your goal is to become the most successful airline in the world by connecting all 22 cities with air routes, maintain a profit, and meet the required quota of passengers. If you cannot turn a profit for a year or meet the victory conditions in 32 years you lose. Some strategic decisions you must make include negotiating for open air routes, purchasing or selling aircraft, invest in branch offices and hotels, advertise your airline and set budgets. You must also pay attention to statistics like quarterly and annual sales reports, as well as city data. World events also affect your airline, from natural disasters to war and even the Olympic games, all of which will affect how many passengers you get. All the planes in the game are based on real-life aircraft, such as the Boeing 747 and the Concorde.
Aerobiz (USA).desc: 你是一家航空公司的首席執行官。您的目標是通過航線連接所有 22 個城市，成為世界上最成功的航空公司，保持利潤並滿足所需的乘客配額。如果您一年內無法盈利或 32 年內無法滿足勝利條件，您就輸了。您必須做出的一些戰略決策包括談判露天航線、購買或銷售飛機、投資分支機構和酒店、宣傳您的航空公司並製定預算。您還必須關注季度和年度銷售報告以及城市數據等統計數據。世界事件也會影響您的航空公司，從自然災害到戰爭甚至奧運會，所有這些都會影響您的乘客數量。遊戲中的所有飛機均基於現實飛機，例如波音 747 和協和式飛機。

Soul Blazer (USA).name: 靈魂西裝外套
Soul Blazer (USA).original_desc: "Soul Blazer" is a fantasy adventure in which a celestial hero works to liberate a world depopulated by Deathtoll. The hero rescues the souls of humans, animals, and plants, who then return to the world and unlock new paths and items. The game is presented in a top-down perspective, with real-time combat. Freed souls grant the hero special abilities, enhancing their powers as the journey unfolds.
Soul Blazer (USA).desc: 《Soul Blazer》是一款奇幻冒險遊戲，其中一位天界英雄致力於解放一個因死亡而人口減少的世界。英雄拯救人類、動物和植物的靈魂，然後他們返回世界並解鎖新的道路和物品。遊戲以自上而下的視角呈現，並帶有實時戰鬥。解放的靈魂賦予英雄特殊能力，隨著旅程的展開增強他們的力量。

Wing Commander - The Secret Missions (US.name: 聯隊指揮官:秘密任務
Wing Commander - The Secret Missions (US.original_desc:
In the first Secret Missions add-on to Wing Commander, the TCS Tiger's Claw responds to a distress call from the Terran colony in the Goddard System. Once they arrive, they find that the colony has been completely destroyed by a new Kilrathi secret weapon, with no survivors. The Tiger's Claw is then ordered to pursue the Kilrathi fleet into their own space and destroy this new weapon - without reinforcements or the ability to resupply...

The Secret Missions campaign adds 16 new missions to fly. Unlike the main game, there is no branching mission tree - progress is linear. There are also several new ships: a Confederation corvette, Kilrathi and Confederation freighters and of course the Kilrathi dreadnought with the secret weapon itself.

Characters from the main game can be transferred into the add-on, which also includes a "Mission Selector" to fly any of the missions from the original game.
Wing Commander - The Secret Missions (US.desc:
在 Wing Commander 的第一個秘密任務附加組件中，TCS 虎爪響應來自戈達德星系中人族殖民地的求救信號。當他們到達時，他們發現這個殖民地已經被一種新的基拉提秘密武器徹底摧毀，無一倖存。隨後，虎爪號奉命追擊基拉提艦隊進入他們自己的空間並摧毀這種新武器——沒有增援或補給能力……

秘密任務活動增加了 16 個新的飛行任務。與主遊戲不同，沒有分支任務樹 - 進度是線性的。還有幾艘新船：一艘聯邦護衛艦、基拉蒂號和聯邦貨輪，當然還有帶有秘密武器的基拉蒂無畏艦。

主遊戲中的角色可以轉移到附加組件中，其中還包括一個“任務選擇器”來執行原始遊戲中的任何任務。

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Fight.key: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Fighting Edition (USA)
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Fight.original_name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Fighting Edition
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Fight.name: 強大的嗎啡恐龍戰隊：戰鬥版
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Fight.original_desc:
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Fighting Edition is a game directly based on the world-known television series. In this game, you can choice among 8 playable characters: the Power Rangers' Zords (Thunder Megazord, Mega Tigerzord, Ninja Megazord, Shogun Megazord) or some of their known villains (Lipsyncher, Silver Horns, Goldar, Lord Zedd). The title offers 3 game modes: Story Mode (1-Player only), Fighting Mode (2-Player) and Trial Mode (a survival mode for 1-Player only).

During Story Mode, the goal is to defeat all the 4 Zords, the 4 villains up to Lord Zedd and last, but not least, Ivan Ooze. In this mode, you can opt by the Thunder Megazord (formed by the 5 original Rangers) or by the Mega Tigerzord (formed in conjunction with the White Ranger). The Fighting Mode is an traditional 2-Player head-to-head combat, where you can choose any of the 4 Zords or even the 4 villains. Trial Mode is a Endurance-like option, and the main goal is to win as many battles as possible using only 1 health bar (that will be partially replenished after each battle).

As well as many fighting games, you can take advantage of a Power Bar (here, it fills automatically): if you execute a Super Move when this bar is flashing, it will be cause more damage, besides increasing 1 level. Once you having reached its maximum status, it's possible to execute power-up versions of Special Moves or even unleash high-damage blows (Super Moves).
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Fight.desc:
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Fighting Edition 是一款直接根據世界知名電視連續劇改編的遊戲。在這款遊戲中，您可以在 8 個可玩角色中進行選擇：Power Rangers 的 Zords（Thunder Megazord、Mega Tigerzord、Ninja Megazord、Shogun Megazord）或一些已知的惡棍（Lipsyncher、Silver Horns、Goldar、Lord Zedd）。該遊戲提供 3 種遊戲模式：故事模式（僅限 1 名玩家）、戰鬥模式（2 名玩家）和試用模式（僅限 1 名玩家的生存模式）。

在故事模式中，目標是擊敗所有 4 個佐德，包括 4 個惡棍，一直到佐德勳爵，以及最後但並非最不重要的伊万·軟泥。在此模式下，您可以選擇雷霆巨型佐德（由 5 名原始遊俠組成）或巨型虎佐德（與白色遊俠聯合組成）。戰鬥模式是傳統的 2 人肉搏戰，您可以選擇 4 個 Zord 中的任何一個，甚至是 4 個惡棍。試煉模式是一種類似耐力的選項，主要目標是僅使用 1 個生命條（每場戰鬥後都會部分補充）贏得盡可能多的戰鬥。

和許多格鬥遊戲一樣，你可以利用能量條（在這裡，它會自動填充）：如果你在能量條閃爍時執行超級動作，除了增加 1 級之外，還會造成更多傷害。一旦達到最大狀態，就可以執行特殊動作的強化版本，甚至釋放高傷害打擊（超級動作）。

Troddlers (USA).name: 踐踏者
Troddlers (USA).original_desc: Troddlers is a puzzle game in the vein of Lemmings. The player takes control of an animal-like wizard who can create and remove blocks; these blocks are useful for both jumping onto and redirecting the path of the little Troddlers that you have to direct towards the exit. The tricky bit is that the Troddlers can climb walls and ceilings, following the edge of the world and the exit is often in the middle of the screen or with an obstacle in the way.
Troddlers (USA).desc: Troddlers 是一款具有 Lemmings 風格的益智遊戲。玩家控制一個類似動物的巫師，他可以創造和移除方塊；這些方塊對於跳躍和重定向小步行者的路徑很有用，你必須引導它們走向出口。棘手的一點是，蹣跚學步者可以沿著世界的邊緣攀爬牆壁和天花板，而出口通常位於屏幕中間或路上有障礙物。

Mega Man X2 (USA).name: 洛克人2 威利博士之謎
Mega Man X2 (USA).original_desc:
Sigma, the leader of the Maverick army, was destroyed when he underestimated his opponent: a lone warrior, awakened into a time he never knew...X.

6 months had passed, and X rose to the rank of leader of the Maverick Hunters. His first task was to eliminate the last of the Mavericks. But as he began his assignment, a mysterious group of Reploids calling themselves the X-Hunters appeared with a message to X: the remains of his fallen comrade, Zero, were in the hands of the X-Hunters, and they planned on resurrecting Zero to fight alongside them and for their fallen leader, Sigma.

X must now stop the X-Hunters and rescue Zero, and once again prevent Sigma from rising back into ultimate power.
Mega Man X2 (USA).desc:
西格瑪，特立獨行軍隊的領袖，因為低估了他的對手而被摧毀：一個孤獨的戰士，覺醒到一個他從未知道的時代......X。

6個月過去了，X晉升為特立獨行獵人隊的隊長。他的首要任務就是消滅最後的小牛隊。但當他開始執行任務時，一群自稱為 X 獵人的神秘機器人出現，並向 X 傳達了一條信息：他陣亡戰友零的遺體在 X 獵人手中，他們計劃復活零，與他們並肩作戰，並為他們陣亡的領袖西格瑪而戰。

X現在必須阻止X獵人並拯救零，並再次阻止西格瑪重新獲得終極力量。

Final Fantasy - Mystic Quest (USA) (Rev.name: 最终幻想战略版 狮子战争
Final Fantasy - Mystic Quest (USA) (Rev.original_desc: Focus Tower is the center of the world and balances the forces of the world. However 4 monsters have taken the 4 elemental crystals (Earth, Water, Fire, Wind) for their own use, and also taken the 4 keys that for doors inside of Focus Tower. With the balance disrupted, disasters befall the world. A young boy by the name of Benjamin finds his home village destroyed. Meeting a mysterious old man while trying to escape from earthquakes, he soon learns that he is the prophesized hero and the only one who can save the world. Benjamin must recover the 4 crystals, unlock Focus Tower and defeat the ultimate monster before the 5th crystal, the Crystal of Life is corrupted.
Final Fantasy - Mystic Quest (USA) (Rev.desc: 焦點塔是世界的中心，平衡著世界的力量。然而4個怪物卻將4個元素水晶（土、水、火、風）據為己用，並且還拿走了Focus Tower內部門的4把鑰匙。平衡被打破，災難降臨到世界。一個名叫本傑明的小男孩發現他的家鄉被毀了。在試圖逃離地震時遇到了一位神秘老人，他很快得知他就是預言中的英雄，也是唯一能夠拯救世界的人。本傑明必須在第五顆水晶（生命水晶）被腐蝕之前收回 4 顆水晶，解鎖焦點塔並擊敗終極怪物。

Dragon Ball Z - La Legende Saien (France.key: Dragon Ball Z - La Legende Saien (France)
Dragon Ball Z - La Legende Saien (France.original_name: Dragon Ball Z : La Légende Saien
Dragon Ball Z - La Legende Saien (France.name: 龍珠Z：彩苑傳說
Dragon Ball Z - La Legende Saien (France.original_desc:
Dragon Ball Z: Super Butouden 2 is a fighting game that chronicles the events that take place during the battle against Perfect Cell, and includes a side story about Bojack and his henchmen (who Gohan, Trunks, Piccolo and Vegita fought in the "Bojack Unbound" movie), and Broli, the Legendary Super Saiyan. You can play as SSJ2 Gohan, Piccolo, Vegeta, Future Trunks, Perfect Cell, Cell Jr., Bojack or Zangya. Goku and Broli will be also available after you enter a secret code.

Some basic elements from Super Butouden have remained, such as the split screen system or the special attacks (which now are executed by a shorter button combination). However, now you will also count with the Meteo combos, which allow attacks with multiple hits. You can also hold down buttons in order to quickly recharge your energy. Special moves can be also fired back in retaliation to your rival's attack, marking then the beginning of a button smashing duel.

There are 3 game modes, including a story mode that lets you choose different paths and changes depending on the outcome of battles; a 1 vs 1 mode, where you can battle against another player or the CPU; and a martial arts tournament mode with an eliminatory system in which you and other players (or the CPU) choose a character to become the winner.
Dragon Ball Z - La Legende Saien (France.desc:
《龍珠 Z：超級武鬥傳 2》是一款格鬥遊戲，記錄了與 Perfect Cell 的戰鬥中發生的事件，並包括有關波傑克和他的追隨者（悟飯、特蘭克斯、短笛和貝吉塔在電影《波傑克解綁》中與他們戰鬥）以及傳奇超級賽亞人布羅利的支線故事。您可以扮演 SSJ2 Gohan、Piccolo、Vegeta、Future Trunks、Perfect Cell、Cell Jr.、Bojack 或 Zangya。輸入密碼後，悟空和布羅利也將可用。

Super Butouden 的一些基本元素仍然存在，例如分屏系統或特殊攻擊（現在通過更短的按鈕組合執行）。然而，現在您還可以使用 Meteo 連擊，它允許多次攻擊。您還可以按住按鈕來快速補充能量。特殊動作也可以被反擊，以報復對手的攻擊，這標誌著一場按鈕粉碎決鬥的開始。

有3種遊戲模式，包括故事模式，讓你選擇不同的路徑並根據戰鬥結果而變化； 1 對 1 模式，您可以與其他玩家或 CPU 進行戰鬥；以及帶有淘汰系統的武術錦標賽模式，您和其他玩家（或CPU）選擇一個角色成為獲勝者。

U.N. Squadron (USA).name: 聯合國中隊
U.N. Squadron (USA).original_desc:
In U.N. Squadron, the aim is to eliminate the enemy, who have gathered around the Allied airspace of "Area 88", in a series of scenarios based on military aircraft.
You choose one of three pilots, each with different abilities in damage repair, weapons handling and piloting, and take on the enemy in a series of challenging missions. The player starts with the weakest aircraft, the F8E Crusader, which can only be armed with a very basic range of weapons. But by completing various missions, it is possible to amass enough money to buy better planes that can be equipped with more powerful weapons.
U.N. Squadron (USA).desc:
在《聯合國中隊》中，目標是在一系列基於軍用飛機的場景中消滅聚集在“88區”盟軍空域周圍的敵人。
你可以從三名飛行員中選擇一名，每名飛行員在傷害修復、武器處理和駕駛方面都有不同的能力，並在一系列具有挑戰性的任務中與敵人作戰。玩家從最弱的飛機 F8E Crusader 開始，它只能裝備非常基本的武器。但通過完成各種任務，可以積累足夠的錢來購買更好的飛機，並配備更強大的武器。

Aladdin (USA).name: 迪士尼的阿拉丁
Aladdin (USA).original_desc:
For years, Jafar, the Sultan's evil advisor has sought a magic treasure - a single lamp that holds the key to the greatest power in the world. With this goal in sight, Jafar learns that only one person in the world can claim the magic lamp from the dreaded Cave of Wonders - one whose rags hide a heart that is pure - a diamond in the rough!
Join Aladdin and his pet monkey Abu, as they race through the marketplace toward their date with destiny. Watch as Jafar tricks our hero and his friend into retrieving the lamp from the dangerous Cave of Wonders. But Aladding and Abu outwit Jafar, releading the power of a wacky blue Genie! Aladding will have the chance to spoil Jafar's devious plans and win the hand of the beautiful princess Jasmine. But it will take more than magic to make his wishes come true...
Aladdin (USA).desc:
多年來，蘇丹的邪惡顧問賈法爾一直在尋找一件魔法寶藏——一盞掌握著世界上最強大力量鑰匙的燈。有了這個目標，賈法爾得知世界上只有一個人可以從可怕的奇蹟洞穴中獲得神燈——他的破爛衣服裡藏著一顆純潔的心——一顆未經加工的鑽石！
加入阿拉丁和他的寵物猴子阿布，他們在市場中奔跑，奔向命運的約會。觀看賈法爾欺騙我們的英雄和他的朋友從危險的奇蹟洞穴取回神燈。但阿拉丁和阿布以智取勝，重新發揮了古怪藍色精靈的力量！阿拉丁將有機會破壞賈法爾的邪惡計劃並贏得美麗的茉莉公主的芳心。但要實現他的願望，需要的不僅僅是魔法……

Lord of Darkness (USA).name: 黑暗之主
Lord of Darkness (USA).original_desc:
Lord of Darkness, known in Japan as Busho Fuun Roku, is the fourth game in the Nobunaga series (but only the third one to have been localized in English). The story of Nobunaga takes place during the Japanese civil war of the 16th century. In a wartime strategy game, 15 different warlords are represented across several territories.

One to eight human players can play, controlling different leaders and factions. Gameplay is done in one of two scenarios; the beginning of the civil war in 1555 or Nobunaga surrounded by his enemies in 1571. Management of population, supplies and military are the gameplay and successful manipulation of these numbers in the right combination to attack and defend against hostile intentions is what will bring your forces to victory.
Lord of Darkness (USA).desc:
《黑暗之王》在日本被稱為“武將風雲六”，是《信長》系列的第四款遊戲（但只是第三款被本地化為英語的遊戲）。信長的故事發生在16世紀的日本內戰時期。在戰時戰略遊戲中，15 個不同的軍閥分佈在多個領土上。

一到八名人類玩家可以玩，控制不同的領導人和派系。遊戲玩法是在以下兩種場景之一中完成的： 1555 年內戰開始或 1571 年信長被敵人包圍。遊戲玩法是管理人口、補給和軍事，成功地操縱這些數字以正確的組合來攻擊和防禦敵對意圖，這將使您的軍隊取得勝利。

Cybernator (USA).name: 控制者
Cybernator (USA).original_desc:
In the year 2065 AD, the nations of Earth have split into two major powers: the Axis and the Federation. These governing bodies are constantly at war for land, which has even extended into the frontiers of space.

Jake is a soldier for the Pacific States' Marine Corp and pilots his own Assault Suit for the Federation. He has been assigned to lead a covert strike team to confront the Axis troops head-on. Your Assault Suit is ready for battle and can jump, shoot, and hover over small distances. Battle through seven war zones, and capture power-ups for upgrades and new weapons. Complete your mission objectives as the fight takes you through Earth's fragile ecosystem, to the moon, and across the vast expanse of space!
Cybernator (USA).desc:
公元 2065 年，地球國家分裂為兩大勢力：軸心國和聯邦。這些管理機構不斷地爭奪土地，甚至延伸到了太空邊界。

傑克是太平洋國家海軍陸戰隊的一名士兵，並為聯邦駕駛著自己的突擊服。他被指派率領一支秘密突擊隊與軸心國軍隊正面對抗。您的突擊服已做好戰鬥準備，可以在短距離內跳躍、射擊和懸停。穿越七個戰區，獲取升級道具和新武器。戰鬥將帶你穿過地球脆弱的生態系統，到達月球，並穿越廣闊的太空，完成你的任務目標！

BlaZeon - The Bio-Cyborg Challenge (USA).name: BlaZeon：生物機器人挑戰
BlaZeon - The Bio-Cyborg Challenge (USA).original_desc: BlaZeon is a space shooter and direct conversion of the arcade game. The player travels in a spaceship from the left side of the screen to the right while swarms of enemy spaceships appear. The player is able to fire at them with his cannon (which can be fired normally or rapid fire) and special missile weapon. After the defeat of certain enemies they will leave behind their husk. Touching this former enemy will allow the player to upgrade their spaceship into more powerful forms.
BlaZeon - The Bio-Cyborg Challenge (USA).desc: BlaZeon是一款太空射擊遊戲和街機遊戲的直接轉換。玩家乘坐宇宙飛船從屏幕左側移動到右側，同時出現大量敵方宇宙飛船。玩家可以用他的大砲（可以正常發射或快速發射）和特殊的導彈武器向他們開火。擊敗某些敵人後，他們會留下外殼。觸摸這個以前的敵人將使玩家能夠將他們的宇宙飛船升級為更強大的形式。

Madden NFL '94 (USA).name: 麥登 NFL '94
Madden NFL '94 (USA).original_desc: Madden NFL '94 is the third in the Madden series of football games for the SNES. It features 80 teams -- 28 teams from the 1993 season, 38 Super Bowl teams from 1966-1991, 12 All Star franchise teams since 1950, and two "All-Madden" teams: one for the 1993 season and one from a 20-year time span. You can play these teams in a regular exhibition game or sudden death overtime game, or take the 1993 teams through an entire season. You can also enter the playoffs with the 1993 teams, the Super Bowl champions, or the All Star franchise teams. Unlike many other sports games, saving a season is done by password rather than by storing the data into a saved game.
Madden NFL '94 (USA).desc: 《Madden NFL '94》是 SNES 上《Madden NFL '94》系列橄欖球遊戲的第三部。它包含 80 支球隊，其中 28 支來自 1993 賽季，38 支來自 1966-1991 年超級碗球隊，12 支自 1950 年以來的全明星球隊，以及兩支“All-Madden”球隊：一支來自 1993 賽季，一支來自 20 年時間跨度。您可以與這些球隊進行常規表演賽或突然死亡加時賽，或者帶領 1993 支球隊進行整個賽季的比賽。您還可以與 1993 年球隊、超級碗冠軍隊或全明星球隊一起進入季后賽。與許多其他體育遊戲不同，保存賽季是通過密碼完成的，而不是將數據存儲到已保存的遊戲中。

Soldiers of Fortune (USA).name: 財富戰士
Soldiers of Fortune (USA).original_desc:
Sixteen levels (in four groups of four) await you in this long-developed Bitmap Brothers title. The basic gameplay is similar to Gauntlet, but in an open air setting, with bridges across rivers and such in the maps. The visuals are in the 'metallic and blue' style the Bitmaps appeared to favor.

There were 6 characters available in the game, each with different strengths and weaknesses, and different starting prices. In 2-player mode you each chose a character and played co-operatively, but in one-player games you also choose a character for the computer to control, with its Artificial Intelligence allowing it to open doors, pick up power-ups and take on baddies away from the ones occupying your character.
Soldiers of Fortune (USA).desc:
在這款長期開發的 Bitmap Brothers 遊戲中，有十六個關卡（四組，每組四個）等待著您。基本遊戲玩法與《Gauntlet》類似，但在露天環境中，地圖上有橫跨河流的橋樑等。視覺效果採用位圖似乎喜歡的“金屬和藍色”風格。

遊戲中有 6 個角色，每個角色都有不同的優點和缺點，並且起始價格也不同。在兩人遊戲模式中，你們每個人都選擇一個角色並合作玩遊戲，但在單人遊戲中，您還可以選擇一個角色供計算機控制，計算機的人工智能可以讓計算機打開門、獲得能量並與占據角色的壞人作戰。

Top Gear 3000 (USA).name: 頂級裝備 3000
Top Gear 3000 (USA).original_desc: The last game of the Top Gear series for the SNES exceeds ordinary dimensions and goes into outer space. Face the challenges found in 48 exciting tracks and become the best pilot in the entire galaxy! Just like the previous games, Top Gear 3000 comes with a password system that allows the player to continue a game in progress. The upgrade system of Top Gear 2 gained new breath and now comes with newly designed parts: ranging from tires to engines up to atomic turbos! As players travel from one planet to another via spacecraft, they race on various planets in different systems, getting progressively harder. The prize money earned in each race increases as does the price of new car parts... Moreover, the game comes with a versus mode which allows up to 4 players to race simultaneously via splitscreen.
Top Gear 3000 (USA).desc: SNES 的《Top Gear》系列的最後一款遊戲超出了普通尺寸，進入了外太空。面對 48 條激動人心的賽道中的挑戰，成為整個銀河系中最好的飛行員！就像之前的遊戲一樣，Top Gear 3000 配備了密碼系統，允許玩家繼續正在進行的遊戲。《Top Gear 2》的升級系統煥然一新，現在配備了全新設計的部件：從輪胎到發動機，再到原子渦輪！當玩家乘坐宇宙飛船從一個星球前往另一個星球時，他們會在不同系統中的各個星球上進行比賽，難度逐漸加大。每場比賽獲得的獎金隨著新車零件價格的增加而增加...此外，遊戲還帶有對戰模式，允許最多 4 名玩家通過分屏同時比賽。

Nosferatu (USA).name: 諾斯費拉圖
Nosferatu (USA).original_desc:
Nosferatu, a feared vampire; no one have ever seen him and survived to tell.
At night, he awakens to suck blood from his poor victims.

The evil has to be stopped! A young man rides to the dungeon to kill Nosferatu and rescue his loved one.

If you have played Prince of Persia you will easily learn the rules for this game.
Nosferatu (USA).desc:
諾斯費拉圖 (Nosferatu)，一個令人畏懼的吸血鬼；沒有人見過他，也沒有人倖存下來講述他的故事。
晚上，他醒來從可憐的受害者身上吸血。

邪惡必須被制止！一名年輕人騎馬前往地牢殺死諾斯費拉圖並營救他所愛的人。

如果您玩過《波斯王子》，您將輕鬆學習該遊戲的規則。

Shin Megami Tensei II (Japan) (Translate.name: 新女神轉世好
Shin Megami Tensei II (Japan) (Translate.original_desc:
Shin Megami Tensei II is a direct sequel to the  first game. The events of this game take place 20 or 30 years after the hero of the first game followed the neutral path, defeated the Asura Lord and the seraph Michael at the Cathedral, and founded a state where followers of both Law and Chaos ideals could live freely. But his reign of freedom doesn't last long. The Mesia faith gains power, expanding the Cathedral into a new enclosed environment named Millenium. The Gaians rise up, but their rebellion is repressed by the Mesians' elite warrior class, the Temple Knights. Some years later, a retired arena fighter Okamoto discovers a man fighting for his life against a demon. He rescues the man, who doesn't even remember his own name, and trains him to fight in the arena so they might both go on to a better living in one of the upper-class areas of Millenium. And thus the new battle for a better future begins...

"Shin Megami Tensei II" features all the gameplay innovations of the previous game. You can summon demons, fuse them, make them battle for you, talk to random enemies and receive information from them, etc. The combat is turn-based, and you explore the dungeons from a first-person perspective view.
Shin Megami Tensei II (Japan) (Translate.desc:
《真女神轉生 II》是第一款遊戲的直接續作。這款遊戲的事件發生在第一款遊戲的英雄走上中立道路，在大教堂擊敗阿修羅領主和六翼天使邁克爾，並建立了一個讓法律和混沌理想的追隨者可以自由生活的國家之後的 20 或 30 年後。但他的自由統治並沒有持續多久。彌賽亞信仰獲得力量，將大教堂擴展到一個名為千禧年的新封閉環境。蓋亞人崛起，但他們的叛亂遭到彌賽亞精英戰士階層聖殿騎士的鎮壓。幾年後，一名退休的競技場鬥士岡本發現一名男子正在與惡魔戰鬥以求生存。他救了那個連自己名字都不記得的人，並訓練他在競技場上戰鬥，這樣他們就可以在千禧年的上流社會之一繼續過上更好的生活。於是，為了更美好未來的新的戰鬥開始了……

《真女神轉生II》保留了前作的所有遊戲玩法創新。你可以召喚惡魔，融合它們，讓它們為你戰鬥，與隨機敵人交談並從他們那裡接收信息等等。戰鬥是回合製的，你以第一人稱視角探索地下城。

Dragon Ball Z - Super Saiya Densetsu (Ja.key: Dragon Ball Z - Super Saiya Densetsu (Japan) (Rev 1) (Translated)
Dragon Ball Z - Super Saiya Densetsu (Ja.original_name: Dragon Ball Z : Super Saiya Densetsu
Dragon Ball Z - Super Saiya Densetsu (Ja.name: D 龍珠Z：超級賽亞傳說
Dragon Ball Z - Super Saiya Densetsu (Ja.original_desc:
Cho Saiya Densetsu is based on the popular manga/animé series Dragon Ball.
