It follows the events described in the beginning of Dragon Ball Z, the second story block, which tells about the connection of the hero Son Goku with a powerful alien race, and new mighty foes from far away planets. The game starts just where the tale of Dragon Ball begins. Son Goku goes to meet his friends, but is stopped by a mysterious stranger named Raditz who tells Son Goku they are relatives. Raditz demands from him to destroy humanity, and as Son Goku refuses, takes his son Son Gohan hostage. To rescue his son, Son Goku joins forces with his arch-rival, the Demon King Piccolo, who obviously has his own plans concerning Raditz. And thus begins the story during which Son Goku will learn of his true origin...

The game is a RPG similar to the card-based Dragon Ball Z RPGs for NES. During battles, you choose cards from your card inventory, which determine the nature and the strength of your characters' attacks. You can also train your characters in training houses and upgrade their special Ki power. Unlike early DBZ RPGs, you can move around freely in Cho Saiya Densetsu, and your movements are not determined by cards. You can also fly around the world and use your special Dragon Radar to discover location of magical Dragon Balls.
Dragon Ball Z - Super Saiya Densetsu (Ja.desc:
《超賽亞傳說》改編自流行的漫畫/動畫系列《龍珠》。它遵循第二個故事塊《龍珠 Z》開頭描述的事件，講述了英雄孫悟空與強大的外星種族以及來自遙遠星球的新強大敵人的聯繫。遊戲從龍珠故事開始的地方開始。孫悟空去見他的朋友，但被一個名叫拉蒂茲的神秘陌生人攔住，他告訴孫悟空他們是親戚。拉蒂茲要求他消滅人類，孫悟空拒絕了，並把他的兒子孫悟飯扣為人質。為了拯救自己的兒子，孫悟空與他的宿敵比克魔王聯手，魔王比克顯然對拉蒂茲有著自己的計劃。故事就這樣開始了，孫悟空將了解他的真實出身……

該遊戲是一款類似於 NES 的卡牌《龍珠 Z 角色扮演遊戲》的角色扮演遊戲。在戰鬥中，您從卡牌庫存中選擇卡牌，這決定了角色攻擊的性質和強度。你還可以在訓練屋訓練你的角色併升級他們的特殊氣力。與早期的 DBZ RPG 不同，在《超賽亞傳說》中你可以自由走動，並且你的行動不是由卡牌決定的。您還可以飛往世界各地，並使用特殊的龍雷達來發現神奇龍珠的位置。

Pocky & Rocky (USA).name: 百奇&洛奇
Pocky & Rocky (USA).original_desc:
This is a single player or two player simultaneous game.  It has wonderful "Super Deformed" type graphics set in ancient Japan and an above average difficulty.

You play as the Princess Pocky and her Racoon Rocky.  Run through each level beating the enemies and you'll face a goofy boss at the end.  Beat him and you're on to the next level.

You fight and shoot your way through numerous levels based on temples and shrines.  Pocky shoot playing cards and Rocky shoot leaves for long range attacks.  For short range Pocky uses a rod and Rocky his tail.

Pocky also has a spin attack and Rocky can freeze into a invulnerable statue. (Think Tanuki Mario)
Pocky & Rocky (USA).desc:
這是單人或兩人同時進行的遊戲。它具有以古代日本為背景的精彩“超級變形”類型圖形和高於平均水平的難度。

您扮演 Pocky 公主和她的 Racoon Rocky。擊敗敵人闖過每個關卡，最後你將面對一個愚蠢的老闆。打敗他，你就進入了一個新的水平。

你通過戰鬥和射擊通過基於寺廟和神社的眾多關卡。Pocky 射擊撲克牌和 Rocky 射擊葉子可進行遠距離攻擊。對於短距離，Pocky 使用桿，Rocky 使用尾巴。

百奇還具有旋轉攻擊能力，洛奇可以凍結成無敵的雕像。（想想狸貓馬里奧）

Harley's Humongous Adventure (USA).name: 哈雷的巨大冒險
Harley's Humongous Adventure (USA).original_desc: Harley is a hip, young scientist who happens to have an IQ the size of Mt. Rushmore. While experimenting with a shrinking machine, something goes terribly wrong--the machine explodes and Harley is now the size of a bug! Harley has to find the missing pieces of his machine and reassemble it in order to return to his regular size. You'll guide him through all kinds of crazy capers, commandeering a tank, parachuting, using a jet pack, and fighting a giant rat, that will lead him to the parts he needs. When you're the size of an insect everything looks humongous, but even normal-sized people will agree that Harley's adventure is humongous.
Harley's Humongous Adventure (USA).desc: 哈利是一位時髦的年輕科學家，他的智商恰好與拉什莫爾山一樣高。在嘗試縮小機器時，出了嚴重的問題——機器爆炸了，哈雷現在變成了蟲子那麼大！哈雷必須找到他的機器丟失的部件並重新組裝，才能恢復到正常尺寸。你將引導他完成各種瘋狂的動作，徵用坦克、跳傘、使用噴氣背包以及與巨型老鼠戰鬥，這將引導他找到他需要的零件。當你只有昆蟲大小時，一切看起來都很巨大，但即使是正常體型的人也會同意哈雷的冒險是巨大的。

Firepower 2000 (USA).name: 火力2000
Firepower 2000 (USA).original_desc: A secret "underground race" on an island in the mid-Atlantic ocean has stolen top military vehicles and equipment from around the world and have rebuilt powerful war machines from them. They are even piloted by robots with one mission: to destroy. Military and intelligence officials of major countries have detected them, but they are afraid that they will be unable to prepare against an assault by this underground race. Their plan is to send you in to infiltrate their base and destroy them before they have a chance to unleash the war upon the rest of the world. You can choose to control either the Helicoptor or the Jeep, which have different advantages -- for instance, the Helicoptor is not obstructed by obstacles but the Jeep can fire in any direction. There are nine weapons (five permanent, four short-lasting specials) you can pick up along the way to help you destroy the enemy.
Firepower 2000 (USA).desc: 大西洋中部一座島嶼上的一場秘密“地下競賽”竊取了世界各地的頂級軍用車輛和裝備，並用它們重建了強大的戰爭機器。它們甚至由機器人駕駛，其任務只有一個：摧毀。各大國家的軍事和情報官員都發現了他們，但他們擔心自己無力應對這個地下種族的襲擊。他們的計劃是派你滲透他們的基地並在他們有機會向世界其他地方發動戰爭之前摧毀他們。你可以選擇控制直升機或吉普車，它們有不同的優勢——例如，直升機不會被障礙物阻擋，但吉普車可以向任何方向開火。您可以沿途拾取九種武器（五種永久武器，四種短期特殊武器）來幫助您消滅敵人。

Push-Over (USA).name: 推倒
Push-Over (USA).original_desc:
You're playing a small ant that is willing to help a friend in rather inconvenient situation. Apparently, your friend, doggie, likes to eat cookies that has his picture on their box, and he got himself so carried away that he lost the balance, and a bag of cookies fell deep down into an ant-hill. Now, you're goin' in, in a mission of solving puzzles, and retrieving the cookies for your friend.

Now, this ant-hill is a bit different from the ones you saw, and especially from the one you live in. It's path is filled up with boulders, and all the gates, and you must travel the quest to find the cookies. After each different place inside, you'll fins a small bag of cookie, and bring it back to your friend doggie.
Push-Over (USA).desc:
你扮演一隻小螞蟻，願意在朋友遇到困難時幫助他。顯然，你的朋友小狗喜歡吃盒子上印有他照片的餅乾，他一時失去了平衡，一袋餅乾掉進了蟻丘深處。現在，你要進去，執行解決謎題並為你的朋友取回餅乾的任務。

現在，這個蟻丘與你所看到的有點不同，尤其是與你居住的蟻丘有所不同。它的路徑充滿了巨石和所有的大門，你必須繼續尋找餅乾。在進入每個不同的地方後，你都會找到一小袋餅乾，然後把它帶回給你的朋友小狗。

Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).name: 終極真人快打3
Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).original_desc:
Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 combines the best of all the Mortal Kombats into a single cartridge. 23 playable characters are immediately available, such as Reptile, Cyrax, Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Jax, Katana, Sonya, and more. There are two bosses that are unlockable, as well as additional characters.

There is a variety of new levels, some of which are interactive. Characters can uppercut someone, causing them to hit the ground hard and crash through to the bottom floor, or they can knocked someone off a bridge, landing in a pit of spikes.

Players can go against the computer one-on-one, two-on-two, or take part in the 8-fighter tournament.

The DS version has a wireless one-one-one multiplayer mode and includes the Puzzle Kombat mini-game from Mortal Kombat: Deception.
Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 (USA).desc:
《終極真人快打 3》將所有真人快打中最好的部分整合到一個卡帶中。23 個可玩角色立即可用，如 Reptile、Cyrax、Scorpion、Sub-Zero、Jax、Katana、Sonya 等。有兩個可解鎖的頭目以及其他角色。

有多種新關卡，其中一些是交互式的。角色可以用上勾拳攻擊某人，使他們重重地撞到地面並墜落到底層，或者他們可以將某人從橋上撞下來，落在尖刺坑中。

玩家可以與電腦進行一對一、二對二的對抗，或者參加八人錦標賽。

DS 版本具有無線一對一多人遊戲模式，並包括《真人快打：欺騙》中的 Puzzle Kombat 迷你游戲。

Fire Emblem - Mystery of the Emblem (Jap.key: Fire Emblem - Mystery of the Emblem (Japan) (Translated)
Fire Emblem - Mystery of the Emblem (Jap.name: 火焰之纹章系列
Fire Emblem - Mystery of the Emblem (Jap.original_desc:
A remake and expansion of the first NES/Famicom Fire Emblem, Marth must face the betrayal if Hardin and an old enemy he thought long vanquished, the Dragon King Medeus.

Book 1 of the game is essentially a remake of the first NES game. Book 2 continues the story with the same characters.

This game expands the series, however it drops explorable towns and the navigation through a world map which was introduced in Fire Emblem: Gaiden. New features include the ability to dismount the horse and pegasus mounted units, to allow the riders to fight indoors if needed.
Fire Emblem - Mystery of the Emblem (Jap.desc:
《火焰之紋章》是第一部紅白機/紅白機《火焰之紋章》的重製版和資料片，馬爾斯必鬚麵對哈丁的背叛和他認為早已被征服的宿敵龍王梅迪烏斯。

該遊戲的第一冊本質上是第一部 NES 遊戲的重製版。第二卷繼續講述同樣的角色的故事。

該遊戲擴展了該系列，但它放棄了《火焰之紋章：外傳》中引入的可探索城鎮和世界地圖導航。新功能包括能夠卸下馬匹和飛馬座裝置，以便騎手在需要時在室內戰鬥。

Super Mario All-Stars (USA).name: 超級馬里奧全明星
Super Mario All-Stars (USA).original_desc: Super Mario All-Stars is a compilation on Super Nintendo of all the platform games featuring Mario released for Nintendo. It includes : Super Mario Bros. 1, 2 and 3 as well as Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels, which was never released in Europe before. More than a simple compilation, the game brings improved graphics and the possibility to save your progress. Nostalgic fans of the first Nintendo console will be pleased.
Super Mario All-Stars (USA).desc: 《超級馬里奧全明星》是超級任天堂上為任天堂發行的所有以馬里奧為主角的平台遊戲的合集。它包括：《超級馬里奧兄弟1》、《超級馬里奧兄弟2》和《超級馬里奧兄弟3》以及《超級馬里奧兄弟：失落關卡》，此前從未在歐洲發行過。該遊戲不僅僅是簡單的編譯，還帶來了改進的圖形和保存進度的可能性。第一代任天堂遊戲機的懷舊粉絲將會很高興。

Super Famicom Wars (Japan) (NP) (Transla.name: 超級任天堂戰爭
Super Famicom Wars (Japan) (NP) (Transla.original_desc: Super Famicom Wars is a strategy game where two players each control an army with the goal of destroying one another. Each city controlled by the player generates money which can be used to purchase new units. Each individual unit has unique statistics and is often best used against certain types of enemy units.
Super Famicom Wars (Japan) (NP) (Transla.desc: Super Famicom Wars 是一款策略遊戲，兩名玩家各自控制一支軍隊，目標是消滅對方。玩家控制的每個城市都會產生金錢，可用於購買新單位。每個單位都有獨特的統計數據，通常最適合用來對抗某些類型的敵方單位。

Jim Lee's WildC.A.T.S - Covert-Action-Te.name: 吉姆·李的 WildC.A.T.S ：秘密行動小組
Jim Lee's WildC.A.T.S - Covert-Action-Te.original_desc: The only thing stopping the immortal Helspont from taking over the earth is a group of high-powered heroes known as the WILDC.A.T.S! Each member of the team wields incredible power-when united, the results are spectacular! Players assume the roles of: Spartan, cyborg and team leader, Maul, massive cross-breed warrior, and Warblade, metamorphosing hand-to-hand combat expert! If mankind has one hope, it's the WILDC.A.T.S!
Jim Lee's WildC.A.T.S - Covert-Action-Te.desc: 唯一能阻止不朽的赫爾斯彭特佔領地球的是一群被稱為 WILDC.A.T.S 的強大英雄！團隊的每個成員都擁有令人難以置信的力量——團結起來，結果是驚人的！玩家扮演的角色包括：斯巴達人、機器人和團隊領袖、摩爾、大型跨種族戰士、戰刃、變形肉搏戰專家！如果人類有一個希望，那就是 WILDC.A.T.S！

On the Ball (USA).name: 在球上
On the Ball (USA).original_desc:
There's a kind of knick-knack you may find in dusty games rooms, a maze through which you navigate a marble by subtly tilting the board, dancing with gravity and momentum, deftly rolling your sphere out of dead ends and around the obstacles posed by holes in the board. Marble Madness explores this theme in a fudged 3-D perspective, Cloud Kingdoms in a flat 2-D one -- both by directly influencing the actions of the ball.  The game takes a different approach toward a similar end; instead of moving the ball around the board, you move the board around the ball.

That's right; from the get-go, gravity pulls ever down, down, down on your ball toward the bottom of your screen regardless of board orientation; the task of the player is to rotate the board now clockwise, now counter-clockwise, to further a timely and unobstructed path beneath the ball in its progress toward each level's goal before the timer ticks down to zero.  The game might as well have been named "inertia."  Many obstacles can be avoided, but some must be engaged head-on: a certain momentum, if not terminal velocity, must be achieved to break through crumbling brick barriers; other obstacles toggle on and off like traffic lights, demanding not only speed but timing.  Some influence the ball's direction, and in addition to merely delaying the ball's progress, touching some impediments incurs an additional time penalty -- conversely, some blocks bestow time bonuses, if you can afford the ever-diminishing time needed to take the scenic detour and collect them.

It may seem like a transparent attempt to cobble together a game around a technical demo of the SNES' Mode 7 on-the-fly graphics-rotation capabilities, but Taito actually cooked up this kooky game interface two years earlier for an arcade release of this game.

(Now if only someone could explain the "Camel" part - referencing the Japanese title.)
On the Ball (USA).desc:
在佈滿灰塵的遊戲室裡，你可能會發現一種小竅門，在迷宮中，你可以通過巧妙地傾斜棋盤來導航彈珠，隨著重力和動量跳舞，巧妙地將你的球體滾出死胡同，繞過棋盤上的孔所造成的障礙。《Marble Madness》以捏造的 3D 視角探索這一主題，《Cloud Kingdoms》以平面 2D 視角探索這一主題 - 兩者都通過直接影響球的動作。遊戲採用了不同的方法來達到相似的目的。您不是圍繞板移動球，而是圍繞球移動板。

這是正確的;從一開始，無論板的方向如何，重力都會將你的球不斷向下拉，向屏幕底部拉；玩家的任務是時時順時針、時而逆時針旋轉棋盤，以便在計時器倒計時至零之前，在球下方形成一條及時且暢通無阻的路徑，以實現每個級別的目標。這款遊戲不妨命名為“慣性”。許多障礙是可以避免的，但有些障礙必須迎頭對付：必須達到一定的動量（如果不是最終速度）才能突破搖搖欲墜的磚塊障礙；其他障礙物就像交通燈一樣開關，不僅要求速度，還要求時間。有些會影響球的方向，除了僅僅延遲球的前進之外，接觸一些障礙物還會導致額外的時間懲罰——相反，如果你能承受繞道風景並收集它們所需的不斷減少的時間，有些障礙會給予時間獎勵。

這似乎是圍繞 SNES 模式 7 即時圖形旋轉功能的技術演示拼湊出一款遊戲的明顯嘗試，但 Taito 實際上在兩年前為這款遊戲的街機版本製作了這個古怪的遊戲界面。

（現在如果有人能解釋“駱駝”部分 - 引用日語標題就好了。）

Sid Meier's Civilization (USA).name: 席德梅爾的文明
Sid Meier's Civilization (USA).original_desc: Sid Meier's Civilization is a turn-based  strategy game.  The game begins in 4000 BC. The player takes on the role of the ruler of a civilization, starting with only one settler unit and one warrior, and attempts to build an empire in competition with one to eleven other civilizations. The game requires a fair amount of micromanagement (although less than any of the simulation games). Along with the larger tasks of exploration, warfare and diplomacy, the player has to make decisions about where to build new cities, which improvements or units to build in each city, which advances in knowledge should be sought (and at what rate), and how to transform the land surrounding the cities for maximum benefit. From time to time the player's towns may be harassed by barbarians, units with no specific nationality and no named leader. These threats only come from unclaimed land or sea, so that over time there are fewer and fewer places from which barbarians will emanate.
Sid Meier's Civilization (USA).desc: 《席德·梅爾的文明》是一款回合製策略遊戲。遊戲開始於公元前4000年。玩家扮演一個文明統治者的角色，從只有一個定居者單位和一名戰士開始，並嘗試建立一個帝國，與一到十一個其他文明競爭。該遊戲需要大量的微觀管理（儘管比任何模擬遊戲都要少）。除了探索、戰爭和外交等更大的任務外，玩家還必須做出決定：在哪裡建造新城市，在每個城市中建造哪些改進或單位，應該尋求哪些知識進步（以及以什麼速度），以及如何改造城市周圍的土地以獲得最大利益。有時，玩家的城鎮可能會受到野蠻人、沒有特定國籍且沒有指定領導者的單位的騷擾。這些威脅僅來自無人認領的陸地或海洋，因此隨著時間的推移，野蠻人發出的地方越來越少。

Plok (USA).name: 普洛克
Plok (USA).original_desc:
At one day, Plok awakes to find out that his flag has been stolen. He spots it on a neighboring island and travels there to get it back. However, as he returns to his home, he realizes that all flags on his island have been replaced with flea-flags. This is only the beginning of his problems though, and he has to face many more challenges before the end of the game.

Plok has to jump and fight his way through numerous levels, trying to find the exit or fulfilling certain missions such as killing a set number of fleas. Plok can perform two different jumps, a normal jump and a higher spinning jump. He can attack his enemies by throwing his limbs at them. Collecting presents will temporarily equip him with different weapons, or transform him into all sorts of vehicles such as a helicopter or a U.F.O.
Plok (USA).desc:
有一天，普洛克醒來發現他的旗幟被偷了。他在鄰近的一個島嶼上發現了它，並前往那裡將其取回。然而，當他回到家時，他意識到島上的所有旗幟都已被跳蚤旗幟取代。但這只是他問題的開始，在比賽結束之前他還要面對更多的挑戰。

普洛克必須跳躍並戰鬥通過多個關卡，試圖找到出口或完成某些任務，例如殺死一定數量的跳蚤。Plok 可以執行兩種不同的跳躍，即普通跳躍和更高的旋轉跳躍。他可以通過向敵人投擲四肢來攻擊他們。收集禮物可以暫時為他配備不同的武器，或者將他變成各種交通工具，例如直升機或U.F.O。

Dragon Quest III (Japan) (Translated).name: 勇者鬥惡龍系列
Dragon Quest III (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
This is a remake of two classic NES RPGs - an exclusively Japanese release of the two first Dragon Quest titles on one cartridge.

In Dragon Quest (known as Dragon Warrior in the US), you play as the descendant of the legendary warrior Erdrick, and your goal is to recover the magical Ball of Light from Erdrick's and the humanity's arch-enemy, the Dragon Lord. In Dragon Quest II, you assume the role of the descendant of the hero of the first game, and must join forces with two other characters in order to defeat a demon lord who destroyed a nearby city and killed its inhabitants. 

Both RPGs feature random battles and turn-based combat viewed from first-person perspective. In Dragon Quest you fight alone, while in the sequel two other characters can join your party, and you also fight against multiple enemies at once.

The remake includes updated graphics (although they still retain the original NES look), sound of SNES quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world. Certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as "Stairs") are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items.
Dragon Quest III (Japan) (Translated).desc:
這是兩款經典 NES RPG 的重製版 - 前兩款《勇者鬥惡龍》系列遊戲在一個卡帶上的日本獨家發行。

在《勇者鬥惡龍》（美國稱為《勇者鬥惡龍》）中，你扮演傳奇戰士艾德里克的後裔，你的目標是從艾德里克和人類的宿敵龍王手中奪回神奇的光球。在《勇者鬥惡龍 II》中，你扮演第一款遊戲中英雄的後裔，必須與另外兩個角色聯手，才能擊敗摧毀了附近城市並殺死其居民的惡魔領主。

這兩款角色扮演遊戲都以第一人稱視角呈現隨機戰鬥和回合製戰鬥。在勇者鬥惡龍中，你獨自戰鬥，而在續集中，另外兩個角色可以加入你的隊伍，你也可以同時對抗多個敵人。

重製版包括更新的圖形（儘管它們仍然保留原來的 NES 外觀）、SNES 品質的聲音以及遊戲玩法和遊戲世界的一些變化。某些位置較大，省略了某些菜單命令（例如“樓梯”），並且項目種類較多。

BioMetal (USA).name: 生物金屬
BioMetal (USA).original_desc:
BioMetal is a side-scrolling shooter game. Their are two pairs, one for lasers and the other for missiles, of three upgrades for your weapons. 

The war that divided the galaxy and used all it's resources has ended. A fleet was sent on a mission to find more natural resources. They never returned. Their last transmission reveals that the enemy' created one last experiment. This experiment is a combination of the aggressive nature of animals combined with the efficiency of machines. These creatures were named BioMetal.

The MF-92GX Halbard mothership has been assigned to destroy the threat before they can not be stopped. You are piloting the MF-92GX Halbard fighter that is equipped with the experimental Gel Analog Mutant weapon. The Gel is charged up on the ship and can be used to surround the ship as a protective shield or be thrown at the enemy forces.
BioMetal (USA).desc:
BioMetal 是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。它們是兩對，一對用於激光，另一對用於導彈，三種武器升級。

分裂銀河係並耗盡銀河系所有資源的戰爭已經結束。一支艦隊被派去執行尋找更多自然資源的任務。他們再也沒有回來。他們的最後一次傳輸表明敵人製造了最後一個實驗。該實驗結合了動物的攻擊性和機器的效率。這些生物被命名為BioMetal。

MF-92GX Halbard 母艦已被指派在威脅無法被阻止之前消滅它們。您正在駕駛配備實驗性凝膠模擬突變武器的 MF-92GX Halbard 戰鬥機。凝膠在船上充電，可以用來包圍船隻作為防護罩或扔向敵軍。

Final Fantasy III (USA) (Rev 1).name: 最终幻想XIV
Final Fantasy III (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
1,000 years ago, the War of the Magi occurred. People remember it as one of the most horrible tragedies in history. Since the War of the Magi, magic has been all but forgotten, technology began to grow, and people returned to seemingly normal lives. The only true worry people had was the Empire, whose leaders were looking to revive the great force once known as "magic".

But then...something happened that would change the course of history forever...

The Empire had heard word of the remains of a mystical being, known as an "Esper", being found in the mining town of Narshe. Quickly, three soldiers were dispatched to find this Esper and bring it to the Emperor. One of the soldiers, a young girl, triggers a power in the Esper that will begin one of the most dangerous series of events ever. And the only ones who can help her are a rag-tag band of rebels and heroes, whose very hearts and souls are the only ones that can save the world from the mad plans of the Empire.
Final Fantasy III (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
1000年前，發生了魔法師戰爭。人們將其視為歷史上最可怕的悲劇之一。自賢士之戰以來，魔法幾乎被遺忘，科技開始發展，人們恢復了看似正常的生活。人們唯一真正擔心的是帝國，其領導人正在尋求復興曾經被稱為“魔法”的強大力量。

但後來……發生了一些永遠改變歷史進程的事情……

帝國聽說了在採礦小鎮納什發現了一個被稱為“超能力者”的神秘生物遺骸的消息。很快，三名士兵被派去尋找這個異能，並將其帶到皇帝面前。其中一名年輕女孩士兵觸發了超能者的力量，這將引發有史以來最危險的一系列事件之一。唯一能幫助她的是一群由叛軍和英雄組成的烏合之眾，他們的心靈和靈魂是唯一能夠將世界從帝國的瘋狂計劃中拯救出來的人。

Super Star Wars - Return of the Jedi (US.key: Super Star Wars - Return of the Jedi (USA) (Rev 1)
Super Star Wars - Return of the Jedi (US.original_name: Super Star Wars : Return of the Jedi
Super Star Wars - Return of the Jedi (US.name: 星際爭霸戰：畢凱
Super Star Wars - Return of the Jedi (US.original_desc:
You select your character from the movie (Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Princess Leia, or Chewbacca) before each level, as each one has different abilities, and go try to beat levels based on the movie's scenes brandishing lightsabers, blasters or crossbows, etc. depending on your choice of character.

Gameplay consists of standard platform action spiced up with some slightly different (gameplay-wise) sequences. Race to Jabba the Hutt's palace in a speeder, fight your way through Jabba the Hutt's minions before killing Jabba himself, control speeder bikes and the Millennium Falcon, and much more.
Super Star Wars - Return of the Jedi (US.desc:
在每個關卡之前，你可以從電影中選擇你的角色（盧克·天行者、漢·索羅、萊婭公主或楚巴卡），因為每個角色都有不同的能力，然後根據你選擇的角色，根據電影中揮舞光劍、爆能槍或弩等的場景嘗試通關。

遊戲玩法由標準平台動作和一些略有不同（遊戲玩法方面）的序列組成。駕駛飛艇沖向赫特人賈巴的宮殿，在殺死賈巴本人之前擊敗赫特人賈巴的爪牙，控制飛艇和千年隼等等。

Joe & Mac 2 - Lost in the Tropics (USA).key: Joe & Mac 2 - Lost in the Tropics (USA)
Joe & Mac 2 - Lost in the Tropics (USA).original_name: Joe & Mac 2 : Lost in the Tropics
Joe & Mac 2 - Lost in the Tropics (USA).name: 喬與麥克 2 : 迷失熱帶
Joe & Mac 2 - Lost in the Tropics (USA).original_desc:
This sequel puts you back into the roles of the cavemen, Joe and Mac. This time, a caveman named Gork has stolen the crown belonging to the Chief of Kali Village, and it's up to you to retrieve it by using the 7 Rainbow Stones you will collect on your journey.

Along the way, you will fight dinosaurs, cavemen, and other prehistoric enemies as your travel through the jungle, or through the ice and snow, or even through a volcanic wasteland. Along the way, you can pick up upgrades for your club, or pick up projectiles from eating certain health-recovery items. In some levels, you'll ride in a stone cart, trying to hope over gaps and avoid enemies as you try to reach the end.

Improving on the original's platformer/brawler co-op gameplay, this game adds adventure and role-playing game elements that create a more involving experience compared to the first game. You can now collect coins in the levels to purchase items from Tiki Village, such as meat to recover your health, or even remodel your hut back at your home village. The game also uses a password system to track your progress. The game also shifts to an overhead map so you can wander to whichever level you wish, and return to completed levels to earn more money or power-ups.
Joe & Mac 2 - Lost in the Tropics (USA).desc:
這部續集讓您重新扮演穴居人喬和麥克的角色。這次，一個名叫戈爾克的穴居人偷走了卡利村酋長的王冠，你需要使用旅途中收集到的 7 顆彩虹石來取回它。

一路上，你將穿越叢林、冰天雪地、甚至火山荒原，與恐龍、穴居人和其他史前敵人作戰。一路上，你可以為你的俱樂部升級，或者通過吃某些健康恢復物品來獲取射彈。在某些關卡中，你將乘坐石車，在嘗試到達終點時試圖跨越間隙並避開敵人。

該遊戲在原版平台遊戲/格鬥遊戲合作遊戲的基礎上進行了改進，添加了冒險和角色扮演遊戲元素，與第一款遊戲相比，創造了更具參與性的體驗。現在，您可以在關卡中收集硬幣來從提基村購買物品，例如恢復健康的肉類，甚至可以在家鄉改造小屋。遊戲還使用密碼系統來跟踪您的進度。遊戲還切換到俯視地圖，這樣你就可以漫游到你想要的任何級別，並返回到已完成的級別以賺取更多金錢或能力提升。

Demon's Crest (USA).name: 惡魔紋章
Demon's Crest (USA).original_desc:
The Demon's Crest consists of six magical stones that when combined will give the holder power to rule all. The inhabitants of the Demon Realm had long fought for possession of this infinite power until one gargoyle emerged victorious: the red demon known as Firebrand. At the end of his final battle, Firebrand was ambushed by his nemesis, Phalanx, and the stones are stolen.

Now, Firebrand must recover the stones before humans and demons fall under Phalanx's sinister rule. Breathe fire, claw walls, and hover across seven intense levels of the Demon Realm. Gain new transformations and abilities as you fight your way through Phalanx's forces. With three different endings to experience, twenty-five hidden items to discover, and six magical stones of cosmic power to control, can you save the realms from total anarchy?
Demon's Crest (USA).desc:
惡魔紋章由六塊魔法寶石組成，組合在一起後將賦予持有者統治一切的力量。魔界的居民為了擁有這種無限的力量而進行了長期的鬥爭，直到一隻石像鬼取得了勝利：被稱為火把的紅色惡魔。在最後一場戰鬥結束時，火布蘭遭到了他的宿敵方陣的伏擊，石頭被偷走了。

現在，火把必須在人類和惡魔落入方陣的邪惡統治之下之前收回這些石頭。噴吐火焰、爪牆，並在惡魔領域的七個激烈關卡中盤旋。在方陣的軍隊中殺出一條血路時，獲得新的轉變和能力。三種不同的結局可供體驗，二十五個隱藏物品可供發現，六塊具有宇宙力量的魔法石可供控制，您能將各個領域從徹底的無政府狀態中拯救出來嗎？

Alien 3 (USA) (Rev 1).name: 異形3
Alien 3 (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: Alien 3 on Super NES immerses you immediately after the end of the movie "Aliens". Ellen Ripley, the main character in the saga, is dormant cryogenically aboard the Sulaco Ship. An alien has infiltrated on board, decimating the crew and causing the ship to crash on the planet Fiorina 161. Help Ripley to survive and rescue the prisoners from the clutches of the aliens until help arrives.
Alien 3 (USA) (Rev 1).desc: Super NES 上的《異形 3》讓您在電影《異形》結束後立即沉浸其中。故事中的主角艾倫·雷普利（Ellen Ripley）在蘇拉科船上進行低溫休眠。一名外星人潛入船上，殺死了船員並導致飛船墜毀在 Fiorina 161 星球上。幫助 Ripley 生存，並將囚犯從外星人手中解救出來，直到救援到來。

Ken Griffey Jr.'s Winning Run (USA).name: 小肯·格里菲 (Ken Griffey Jr.) 的勝利之旅
Ken Griffey Jr.'s Winning Run (USA).original_desc:
Ken Griffey Jr.'s Winning Run is a licensed arcade baseball  game featuring MLB's own Ken Griffey Jr. Released in 1996, it contains all 28 MLB teams and logos from that time, with rosters containing fictitious names for the players (Ken Griffey Jr being the only real player in the game).

Next to exhibition games, there are different game modes to compete in. In the MLB Challenge, players start with a weak team and go against every major MLB club to go up the rankings. There is also a complete World Series, All-Star games and the MLB League. In the league modes up to eight players can choose a team and play a season of 26, 52 or 162 games. Between matches players can change the line-up and rotation, and trade away players.

Gameplay is fairly tradition, with fielding, pitching, batting and baserunning. Next to fastball and curveballs, there are six different pitches such as Super Fast, Screwball, Super Curve, Slider, Change Up and Knuckleball.
Ken Griffey Jr.'s Winning Run (USA).desc:
Ken Griffey Jr.'s Winning Run 是一款獲得許可的街機棒球遊戲，主角為 MLB 自己的 Ken Griffey Jr.，於 1996 年發布，包含當時所有 28 支 MLB 球隊和徽標，名單中包含球員的虛構姓名（Ken Griffey Jr. 是遊戲中唯一真實的球員）。

除了表演賽之外，還有不同的比賽模式可供競爭。在MLB挑戰賽中，玩家從弱隊開始，與各大MLB俱樂部對抗，以提升排名。還有完整的世界大賽、全明星賽和美國職業棒球大聯盟(MLB League)。在聯賽模式中，最多 8 名玩家可以選擇一支球隊並參加 26、52 或 162 場比賽的賽季。在比賽之間，球員可以改變陣容和輪換，並交換球員。

遊戲玩法相當傳統，有守備、投球、擊球和跑壘。除了快速球和曲線球之外，還有六種不同的投球方式，例如超級快速球、螺旋球、超級曲線球、滑塊球、變速球和指關節球。

Strike Gunner S.T.G (USA).name: 突擊砲手 S.T
Strike Gunner S.T.G (USA).original_desc:
Strike Gunner S.T.G. is a vertical-scrolling jet fighter adventure set in the far-off year of A.D. 2008. The player controls their fighter as the scene unfolds around them, as enemies of air, land, and sea continuously enter the screen in wave after wave of assault. The player(s) begins with a set number of lives, a number which can be added to with good play. Run out, and your mission is over - there are no saves!

Before each level, the player chooses one special weapon that can be utilized via an often-refilled meter, in addition to their normal guns. But choose wisely, you can only use one special weapon per round, and once used, it will be unavailable to you in later rounds! Play solo or with a human wingman.
Strike Gunner S.T.G (USA).desc:
突擊砲手 S.T.G.是一款以遙遠的公元 2008 年為背景的垂直捲軸噴氣式戰鬥機冒險遊戲。隨著周圍場景的展開，玩家控制自己的戰鬥機，空中、陸地和海上的敵人不斷進入屏幕，一波又一波的攻擊。玩家一開始就有一定的生命值，這個數字可以通過良好的遊戲來增加。用完，你的任務就結束了——沒有保存！

在每個級別之前，除了普通槍支之外，玩家還可以選擇一種特殊武器，可以通過經常重新填充的儀表來使用。但要明智地選擇，每輪只能使用一件特殊武器，一旦使用，後面的輪次將無法使用！單獨演奏或與人類僚機一起演奏。

Ultima - The False Prophet (USA).name: 創世紀:假先知
Ultima - The False Prophet (USA).original_desc: Several years after having restored Lord British to his rightful position as the monarch of Britannia, the Avatar is captured by demon-like creatures and placed on a sacrificial altar. His friends Iolo, Shamino and Dupre appear just in time to save him. In the Britannia castle, the Avatar learns that his abductors were gargoyles, a race of enigmatic creatures who have recently invaded Britannia and occupied the shrines of Virtue. As the Avatar embarks on a quest to liberate Britannia, he begins to gain insight into the gargoyles' true motives, and realizes that it is his duty to achieve peace and understanding between the two races.
Ultima - The False Prophet (USA).desc: 在恢復不列顛勳爵作為不列顛尼亞君主的合法地位幾年後，阿凡達被惡魔般的生物捕獲並放在祭壇上。他的朋友伊奧洛、沙米諾和杜普雷及時出現救了他。在不列顛尼亞城堡中，阿凡達得知綁架者是石像鬼，這是一種神秘生物，最近入侵了不列顛尼亞並佔領了美德神殿。當阿凡達開始尋求解放不列顛尼亞時，他開始洞察石像鬼的真正動機，並意識到他有責任在兩個種族之間實現和平與理解。

Arcana (USA).name: 阿卡納
Arcana (USA).original_desc:
In this game you play as a young boy named Rooks.  He's the only one that can save the world from the evil Galneon.  With the power of the cards he begins his adventure.

All of the people you fight with and against are displayed on cards.  They can have an elemental attribute or not.  Rooks is able to summon an elemental to aid him.  He can only summon one type at a time, and he must find them before being able to summon them.
Arcana (USA).desc:
在這個遊戲中，你扮演一個名叫魯克斯的小男孩。他是唯一能夠從邪惡的加尼翁手中拯救世界的人。憑藉紙牌的力量，他開始了他的冒險。

所有與你戰鬥和對抗的人都會顯示在卡片上。它們可以有元素屬性，也可以沒有。魯克斯能夠召喚一個元素來幫助他。他一次只能召喚一種，必須找到它們才能召喚。

Populous II - Trials of the Olympian God.key: Populous II - Trials of the Olympian Gods (Europe)
Populous II - Trials of the Olympian God.original_name: Populous II : Trials of the Olympian Gods
Populous II - Trials of the Olympian God.name: 人口眾多2:奧林匹斯諸神的試煉
Populous II - Trials of the Olympian God.original_desc:
Populous II continues the "god game" genre pioneered by Bullfrog's classic Populous.  In PII, you're an unproven immortal who must fight your way through an entire pantheon of Greek gods, each with his or her own strategy and attacks, and ultimately enter into a showdown with Zeus himself.

The gameplay mechanics are similar to Populous, but PII features a wider array of spells, digitized sound, and high-resolution graphics to give the spell effects extra punch.  Multiplayer is supported via serial link and dial-up.
Populous II - Trials of the Olympian God.desc:
Populous II延續了Bullfrog經典Populous開創的“上帝遊戲”類型。在《PII》中，你是一個未經證實的不朽者，必須在整個希臘眾神中殺出一條血路，每個神都有自己的策略和攻擊，並最終與宙斯本人攤牌。

遊戲機制與 Populous 類似，但 PII 具有更廣泛的法術、數字化聲音和高分辨率圖形，使法術效果更具衝擊力。通過串行鏈接和撥號支持多人遊戲。

Adventures of Batman & Robin, The (USA).name: 蝙蝠俠與羅賓歷險記
Adventures of Batman & Robin, The (USA).original_desc: Konami's game based on the 90s animated series starring the Caped Crusader sends him against his most famous enemies in a platforming/beat'em'up title. Each level sends Batman against one particular villain. Most levels present Batman with a large number of henchmen to take out and environmental dangers to avoid on his way to one or more boss battles. Besides kicks, throws and punches, Batman can use a variety of equipment against the enemies. Always available are Batarangs and the grappling hook. Before each mission, Batman can also select additional equipment, like knockout gas spray, throwing stars, smoke bombs and plastic explosives, all with limited ammunition. Special equipment required for certain levels include a flashlight, gas mask and X-ray goggles. If some necessary equipment is missing, it is always possible to return to the Batcave to change the gear and then restart the current level. Many of the situations and environments of the levels are based on episodes from the series and the game's graphics emulate the animation and drawing style of the show.
Adventures of Batman & Robin, The (USA).desc: Konami 的這款遊戲改編自 90 年代的動畫系列，由斗篷十字軍主演，讓他在平台跳躍/清版遊戲中對抗最著名的敵人。每個關卡都會讓蝙蝠俠對抗一個特定的惡棍。大多數關卡都讓蝙蝠俠在一場或多場頭目戰中需要消滅大量的追隨者，並避免環境危險。除了踢、投擲和拳打之外，蝙蝠俠還可以使用多種裝備來對抗敵人。蝙蝠鏢和抓鉤始終可用。在每次執行任務之前，蝙蝠俠還可以選擇額外的裝備，如致命毒氣噴霧、飛鏢、煙霧彈和塑料炸藥，所有這些裝備的彈藥都有限。某些級別所需的特殊裝備包括手電筒、防毒面具和 X 射線護目鏡。如果缺少一些必要的裝備，總是可以返回蝙蝠洞更換裝備，然後重新開始當前關卡。關卡中的許多場景和環境都是基於該系列的劇集，遊戲的圖形模仿了該劇的動畫和繪畫風格。

Go for it! Goemon 2 - The Strange Genera.key: Go for it! Goemon 2 - The Strange General McGuinness (Japan) (Translated)
Go for it! Goemon 2 - The Strange Genera.name: 盡力而為五右衛門2：加油，將軍魔吉斯
Go for it! Goemon 2 - The Strange Genera.original_desc: As you may have guessed from the number 2 in the title, this is the second SNES game in the popular blend of the adventure and jump and run genres which is the Goemon series. Again, you (and your partner, in 2 player mode) control Goemon, his friend Ebisu-Maru and, new to the bunch, robot Sasuke, through loads of action stages and villages. Another new feature comes with 3D boss fights, featuring the giant mech type robot called "Goemon Impact".
Go for it! Goemon 2 - The Strange Genera.desc: 正如您可能從標題中的數字 2 猜到的那樣，這是五右衛門系列中流行的冒險和跳躍和奔跑類型混合體中的第二款 SNES 遊戲。再次，你（和你的搭檔，在 2 人模式下）控制五右衛門、他的朋友惠比壽丸，以及新加入的機器人佐助，穿越大量的動作階段和村莊。另一個新功能是 3D Boss 戰鬥，其中包括名為“Goemon Impact”的巨型機甲型機器人。

Side Pocket (USA).name: 側袋
Side Pocket (USA).original_desc:
The main objective is to cross different USA cities and reach the predetermined scores to go ahead. But remember: you'll have only 16 balls and every error can be lethal!

The game also comes with modes for 2 players with two variants: 2P Pocket Game (the traditional mode) and 2P 9-Ball Game, where the premise is to sink 9 balls before the other player makes them first. If you prefer, test your target in Trick Game or even hear your favorite song in Jukebox.

After each stage completed (and some luck), a bonus stage will appear, as well as the chance to earn extra balls. You will only need a good target in the parquet block!
Side Pocket (USA).desc:
主要目標是穿越美國不同城市並達到預定分數才能繼續前進。但請記住：您只有 16 個球，每個錯誤都可能致命！

該遊戲還提供 2 名玩家的模式，有兩種變體：2P Pocket Game（傳統模式）和 2P 9-Ball Game，前提是在其他玩家先擊中 9 個球之前將其擊入。如果您願意，可以在 Trick Game 中測試您的目標，甚至在 Jukebox 中聆聽您最喜歡的歌曲。

每個階段完成後（以及一些運氣），將會出現一個獎勵階段，以及獲得額外球的機會。您只需要在鑲木地板塊中找到一個好的目標即可！

Shien's Revenge (USA).name: 希恩的複仇
Shien's Revenge (USA).original_desc:
Shien and Aska were swift ninjas fighting in a civil war. Having defeated hundreds of enemy soldiers, monsters suddenly appear and kidnap Aska. It is up to Shien to defeat them and rescue Aska from these creatures beyond the Time Gate.

Shien's Revenge is a first-person Operation Wolf-style shooter that puts the player in the role of Shien the ninja. Movement is automatically controlled by the game, which scrolls horizontally or vertically. The player must use his weapons, long-range shuriken (throwing stars) and a close-range dagger in order to defeat various enemy ninjas and creatures that appear on the screen. A set of candles indicate the player's life meter. Power-ups such as rapid fire and scrolls can be picked up by defeating enemies. The use of scrolls produces a powerful attack that damages everything on the screen. At the end of each area, the player encounters a boss who must be defeated through the depletion of its life meter.
Shien's Revenge (USA).desc:
詩恩和阿斯卡是內戰中的敏捷忍者。擊敗了數百名敵方士兵後，怪物突然出現並綁架了阿斯卡。希恩必須打敗他們，並從時間之門之外的這些生物手中救出阿斯卡。

《Shien's Revenge》是一款第一人稱狼行動風格射擊遊戲，玩家將扮演忍者 Shien 的角色。移動由遊戲自動控制，水平或垂直滾動。玩家必須使用他的武器、遠程手裡劍（飛鏢）和近距離匕首來擊敗屏幕上出現的各種敵方忍者和生物。一組蠟燭指示玩家的生命值。擊敗敵人即可獲得速射和捲軸等強化道具。使用捲軸會產生強大的攻擊，破壞屏幕上的一切。在每個區域的盡頭，玩家都會遇到一個 Boss，必須通過耗盡其生命值來擊敗它。

Total Carnage (USA).name: 全面屠殺
Total Carnage (USA).original_desc:
The war of 1999 left the country of Kookistan in shambles. Naturally, a dictator named General Akhboob took control of the beleagured nation and began creating an army of radioactive mutants. With a virtually impenetrable stronghold, a bunch of hostages, and a legion of mutants under his command, the evil despot will stop at nothing but world domination. Only two men have the courage and idealistic naivete to take on Akhboob and his forces: Captain Carnage and Major Mayhem, also known as the Doomsday Squad.

As Captain Carnage or Major Mayhem, it is up to you or you and a friend (in simultaneous action) to rescue the hostages while shooting hundreds of mutants bent on your destruction. As you walk and run forward, backward, left, right, and diagonally through 20 battlezones of nonstop action, you'll always have your machine gun by your side. Additional weapons which you can find along the way include grenade launchers, rocket launchers, plasma machine guns, flame throwers, spray-fire rifles, defensive blades, and an assortment of bombs.
Total Carnage (USA).desc:
1999 年的戰爭使庫基斯坦國家陷入一片混亂。自然而然，一位名叫阿赫布布將軍的獨裁者控制了這個陷入困境的國家，並開始創建一支放射性變種人軍隊。擁有幾乎堅不可摧的據點、一群人質和指揮下的一大批變種人，這位邪惡的暴君除了統治世界之外別無所求。只有兩個人有勇氣和理想主義天真來對抗阿赫布布和他的軍隊：屠殺隊長和大混亂，也被稱為末日小隊。

作為屠殺隊長或大混亂，你或你和一個朋友（同時行動）需要拯救人質，同時射殺數百名一心想要毀滅你的變種人。當你向前、向後、向左、向右、斜向行走、奔跑，穿過 20 個不間斷行動的戰場時，你的機槍將始終陪伴在你身邊。沿途你可以找到其他武器，包括榴彈發射器、火箭發射器、等離子機槍、火焰噴射器、噴火步槍、防禦刀片和各種炸彈。

Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, The (USA).key: Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, The (USA)
Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, The (USA).original_name: The Twisted Tales of Spike McFang
Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, The (USA).name: 斯派克·麥克方的扭曲故事
Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, The (USA).original_desc:
The Twisted Tales of Spike McFang is an action-rpg starring the titular hero, a young vampire prince who must rescue his parents and save the inhabitants of the Vladamasco Islands from the evil Von Hesler. But is it really his handiwork, or is there someone else controlling him? Unravel the mystery while traveling to various locales, fighting Von Hesler's henchmen and picking up (CPU-controlled) companions along the way.

Spike McFang has three main methods of attack: by striking out with his cape, throwing his hat like a boomerang, or using a magic card. Cards can also heal his health or give his companions extra strength. Spike can also devour the still-beating hearts of his vanquished foes (or the dropped tomatoes of his vanquished foes if you're playing the sanitized North American version) to regain health. There are a total of four different hats that Spike can purchase as upgrades in his battle against animated garlic bulbs, bomb-throwing cats, head-spinning plants and a plethora of other dangerous enemies.
Twisted Tales of Spike McFang, The (USA).desc:
《斯派克·麥克方的扭曲故事》是一款動作角色扮演遊戲，主角是一位年輕的吸血鬼王子，他必須拯救自己的父母，並從邪惡的馮·赫斯勒手中拯救弗拉達馬斯科群島的居民。但這真的是他的傑作，還是有人在操縱他？在前往不同地點的同時解開謎團，與馮·赫斯勒的追隨者戰鬥，並沿途結識（CPU 控制的）同伴。

斯派克·麥克方有三種主要的攻擊方式：用斗篷攻擊、像迴旋鏢一樣扔帽子或使用魔法卡。卡片還可以治愈他的健康或為他的同伴提供額外的力量。斯派克還可以吞噬被擊敗的敵人仍在跳動的心臟（或者如果你玩的是經過消毒的北美版本，則可以吞噬被擊敗的敵人掉落的西紅柿）以恢復生命值。斯派克總共可以購買四種不同的帽子作為升級，以對抗動畫大蒜、投擲炸彈的貓、令人頭暈的植物和大量其他危險的敵人。

WeaponLord (USA).name: 武器領主
WeaponLord (USA).original_desc: A barbarian battleground. Seven different warriors, eached armed with a unique weapon set forth on a fighting game quest where they will clash and conflict with one another in this fighting game from Namco. Their ultimate foe is the mysterious Demonlord. An early relative of the popular Soul Calibur series, the main claim to fame of this game is the weapon play. Blocking and combos are present along with special "frenzies" of increased attack and death combos. The backgrounds are all hand drawn and meticulously detailed. Each character carries their own storyline with them between arenas, jungles and firey mountains on a quest to oppose the Demonlord.
WeaponLord (USA).desc: 蠻族戰場。七名不同的戰士，每人都配備了獨特的武器，踏上格鬥遊戲任務，在這款來自 Namco 的格鬥遊戲中，他們將相互衝突和衝突。他們的終極敵人是神秘的惡魔領主。作為流行的《劍魂》系列的早期親戚，這款遊戲的主要出名之處在於武器玩法。格擋和連擊以及增加攻擊和死亡連擊的特殊“瘋狂”一起出現。背景全部是手繪的，細節非常細緻。每個角色都有自己的故事情節，在競技場、叢林和火山之間尋找對抗惡魔領主的任務。

Secret of Mana (USA).name: 瑪娜的秘密
Secret of Mana (USA).original_desc: In Secret of Mana, a young boy unknowingly unleashes ancient evil by pulling a legendary sword from its resting place and is cast out of his village. His only hope lies in reforging the Mana Sword and restoring balance by protecting the Mana seeds in eight sacred palaces. With loyal allies at his side, he must confront the growing threat and reseal the forces of darkness before peace is lost forever.
Secret of Mana (USA).desc: 在《聖劍傳說 瑪娜的秘密》中，一名小男孩從安放處拔出了一把傳奇之劍，在不知不覺中釋放了遠古邪惡，並被逐出村莊。他唯一的希望在於重鑄瑪那劍，並通過保護八個神聖宮殿中的瑪那種子來恢復平衡。在忠實盟友的陪伴下，他必鬚麵對日益增長的威脅並重新封印黑暗勢力，以免永遠失去和平。

Bahamut Lagoon (Japan) (Translated).name: 巴哈姆特潟湖
Bahamut Lagoon (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The Kingdom of Kahna is in Great Danger.

The evil Emperor Sauzer, obsessed by his world domination ideas, is preparing to invade the kingdom. The king sends his best troops of knights and wizards to face the enemy, but in vain - the kingdom is conquered by Sauzer, the king is murdered, and his lovely daughter is kidnapped. You were brave, Leader of the Dragon Squad, but now you will have to become strong. Remember the promise you gave the princess a long time ago: always to be at her side.

Supported by his friends and by his faithful dragons, you must now free the princess and the kingdom from the enemy's hands. If only the strongest of the dragons, Bahamut, could be awakened...
Bahamut Lagoon (Japan) (Translated).desc:
卡赫納王國正處於極度危險之中。

邪惡的索澤皇帝沉迷於他的世界統治思想，正準備入侵王國。國王派遣他最好的騎士和巫師部隊去面對敵人，但徒勞無功 - 王國被索澤征服，國王被謀殺，他可愛的女兒被綁架。你很勇敢，龍小隊的隊長，但現在你必須變得更強。記住你很久以前對公主的承諾：永遠陪伴在她身邊。

在他的朋友和忠實的龍的支持下，你現在必須將公主和王國從敵人手中解放出來。如果龍中最強的巴哈姆特能夠覺醒就好了……

WWF WrestleMania - The Arcade Game (USA).name: WWF 摔角狂熱：街機遊戲
WWF WrestleMania - The Arcade Game (USA).original_desc:
WWF Wrestlemania: The Arcade Game merges the personalities and action of the popular WWF TV show characters with a Mortal Kombat-style fighting game. This title features digitized graphics of 8 WWF superstars: Doink, Razor Ramon, Bret "Hit Man" Hart, Shawn Michaels, The Undertaker, Yokozuna, Bam Bam Bigelow, and Lex Luger.

Although it is a wrestling title, this game is structured a lot like a one-on-one fighter. It is very fast-paced, and features crazy special moves. Also, each match is divided into a series of rounds, much like a fighting game. Instead of each round ending in a KO, each round simply ends when you force the other wrestler(s) to fall by reducing their energy meter. Game modes include single player arcade mode, tournament mode, and vs mode for 1-on-1 multiplayer.
WWF WrestleMania - The Arcade Game (USA).desc:
WWF Wrestlemania：街機遊戲將流行的 WWF 電視節目角色的個性和動作與真人快打風格的格鬥遊戲融為一體。該遊戲採用了 8 位 WWF 超級明星的數字化圖形：Doink、Razor Ramon、Bret“Hit Man”Hart、Shawn Michaels、The Undertaker、Yokozuna、Bam Bam Bigelow 和 Lex Luger。

雖然這是一款摔跤遊戲，但這款遊戲的結構很像一對一的格鬥遊戲。它的節奏非常快，並且具有瘋狂的特殊動作。此外，每場比賽都分為一系列回合，就像格鬥遊戲一樣。每輪不是以 KO 結束，而是當你通過減少其他摔跤手的能量計迫使他們摔倒時，每輪就結束了。遊戲模式包括單人街機模式、錦標賽模式和一對一多人遊戲模式。

Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).key: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA)
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).original_name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).name: 三國演義II
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).original_desc: The sequel to Romance of the Three Kingdoms. The game concept is still the same, though they did improve a lot of features that one may consider 'disturbing' from RTK I (e.g. Generals dying easily due to disease, etc.). RTK can be said to be much more 'stable' where players no longer have to worry that much about time length in the game, as the game take a slower time rate to allow the players to build up their forces without much interference. The RTK II gameplay and interface is closely similar to Nobunaga's Ambition II.
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).desc: 《三國演義》的續集。遊戲概念仍然是相同的，儘管它們確實改進了許多人們可能認為 RTK I '令人不安' 的功能（例如將軍容易因疾病而死亡等）。RTK可以說更加“穩定”，玩家不再需要太擔心遊戲的時間長度，因為遊戲需要較慢的時間速率來讓玩家在沒有太多干擾的情況下建立自己的力量。RTK II 的遊戲玩法和界面與 Nobunaga 的 Ambition II 非常相似。

RoboCop versus The Terminator (USA).name: 機械戰警與終結者
RoboCop versus The Terminator (USA).original_desc:
In the future, human soldiers of John Conner's resistance force against the machines are fighting a losing war against Skynet and it's robot forces. Discovering that one of the foundation technologies for Skynet is the cybernetics technology used in the creation of Robocop. One of the resistances' soldiers, Flo is sent back in time before the Rise of the Machines to destroy Robocop and stop Skynet from being built. However Skynet learns of the time travel attempt and sends Terminators to stop Flo.

In the game you control Robocop who may move across the screen, jump, fire and exchange weapons. Robocop starts with the Auto-9 which has unlimited ammunition... other weapons may be more powerful but contain limited ammo. Beginning the game on a mission of law enforcement, you soon meet up with Flo and must engage in battle against Terminators, the forces of OCP and several obstacles
RoboCop versus The Terminator (USA).desc:
未來，約翰·康納領導的抵抗機器的人類士兵正在與天網及其機器人部隊進行一場必敗之戰。發現天網的基礎技術之一是用於創建機械戰警的控制論技術。弗洛是反抗軍士兵之一，被送回到機器崛起之前的時間，摧毀機械戰警並阻止天網的建造。然而，天網得知了時間旅行的企圖，並派終結者去阻止弗洛。

在遊戲中，你控制機械戰警，他可以在屏幕上移動、跳躍、射擊和交換武器。機械戰警從 Auto-9 開始，它擁有無限的彈藥……其他武器可能更強大，但彈藥有限。遊戲以執法任務開始，你很快就會遇到弗洛，並且必須與終結者、OCP 勢力和幾個障礙進行戰鬥

Amazing Spider-Man, The - Lethal Foes (J.name: 超凡蜘蛛俠：致命敵人
Amazing Spider-Man, The - Lethal Foes (J.original_desc: The Amazing Spider-Man: Lethal Foes is based on the Spider-Man cartoon of the time and pits Spider-Man against several of his old foes as well as an army of Spider-Slayers. Spider-Man can attack with a hand-to-hand combo or by shooting out pellets of webbing. He can crawl on any wall or ceiling and also swing along with his webbing strands if he has enough clearance. The story is told in dialogue scenes with the stage's boss as well as Spider-Man's allies at the end of each stage.
Amazing Spider-Man, The - Lethal Foes (J.desc: 《超凡蜘蛛俠：致命敵人》改編自當時的蜘蛛俠漫畫，蜘蛛俠將與他的幾個宿敵以及蜘蛛殺手大軍展開對決。蜘蛛俠可以通過徒手連擊或發射蜘蛛網進行攻擊。他可以在任何牆壁或天花板上爬行，如果有足夠的空間，他還可以沿著他的織帶擺動。這個故事是在每個階段結束時與舞台老闆以及蜘蛛俠盟友的對話場景中講述的。

Parodius (Europe).name: 顯示後
Parodius (Europe).original_desc:
This is mostly the parody of Gradius (Nemesis on some systems), with some flavor from other shoot-em-ups, like Twinbee. The series is available on numerous platforms.

The game is a right-to-left scrolling shoot-em-up. You can choose from 4 different flying creatures, with different weapons. You must finish 7 stages, each having a boss at the end. You may start at either one, but must complete every level to advance to the final stage.
Parodius (Europe).desc:
這主要是對 Gradius（某些系統上的 Nemesis）的模仿，帶有一些來自其他射擊遊戲（如 Twinbee）的味道。該系列可在多個平台上使用。

該遊戲是一款從右到左滾動的射擊遊戲。您可以從 4 種不同的飛行生物中進行選擇，並配備不同的武器。你必須完成 7 個階段，每個階段最後都有一個 Boss。您可以從任一級別開始，但必須完成每個級別才能進入最後階段。

SimCity 2000 - The Ultimate City Simulat.name: SimCity 2000：終極城市模擬器
SimCity 2000 - The Ultimate City Simulat.original_desc:
SimCity 2000 is the successor to the ground breaking city simulation game Sim City. You are once again the mayor, but this time you can fully customize the terrain before building your city. The graphics are isometric, whereas the original had graphics displayed in a top-down fashion.

This title adds numerous features over the original such as the ability of building "light" zones, subways, hospitals, colleges, zoos, and arcos which are actually cities in cities. You can now give names to places, and your city is surrounded by neighboring towns with which you can make trade. Finally, instead of the poll in the first game you now have the option of reading several newspapers to get an idea of your progress.
SimCity 2000 - The Ultimate City Simulat.desc:
SimCity 2000 是開創性的城市模擬遊戲 Sim City 的繼任者。您再次成為市長，但這一次您可以在建造城市之前完全自定義地形。圖形是等軸測的，而原始圖形以自上而下的方式顯示。

該遊戲比原作增加了許多功能，例如建造“光”區、地鐵、醫院、大學、動物園和拱廊的能力，這些實際上是城市中的城市。你現在可以給地方命名，你的城市周圍都是可以與之進行貿易的鄰近城鎮。最後，您現在可以選擇閱讀幾份報紙來了解您的進度，而不是第一款遊戲中的民意調查。

Pac-Man 2 - The New Adventures (USA).name: 吃豆人 2 : 新冒險
Pac-Man 2 - The New Adventures (USA).original_desc: Join Pac-Man in a side scrolling adventure where you must guide him through Pac-Land, solving puzzles and finding objects in order to defeat the evil Ghost Witch of Nentor. You don't control Pac-Man himself, as you must show him where to go and what to look for, while using the slingshot to knock over and find items or open doors and defeat bad guys before Pac-Man bumps into them. You can collect items you find along the paths from Pac-Man's house in the inventory and use them for a later day.
Pac-Man 2 - The New Adventures (USA).desc: 與吃豆人一起進行橫版捲軸冒險，您必須引導他穿越吃豆樂園，解決謎題並尋找物品，以擊敗邪惡的南托幽靈女巫。你無法控制吃豆人本身，因為你必須告訴他該去哪里以及尋找什麼，同時使用彈弓撞倒並找到物品或打開門並在吃豆人撞到壞人之前擊敗他們。您可以將沿著吃豆人的房子沿路找到的物品收集到庫存中，並在以後使用它們。

Rock N' Roll Racing (USA).name: 搖滾賽車
Rock N' Roll Racing (USA).original_desc:
Rock 'n Roll Racing is an arcade combat racing game. Combat plays a heavy role in the game, as each car has a frontal weapon, such as a laser or missile, and a drop weapon, such as spikes or mines. As you complete races, you get more money to upgrade your car.

The soundtrack features "Born to Be Wild," "Bad to the Bone," "The Peter Gunn Theme," "Highway Star" and "Paranoid."
Rock N' Roll Racing (USA).desc:
Rock 'n Roll Racing 是一款街機格鬥賽車遊戲。戰斗在遊戲中扮演著重要角色，因為每輛車都有正面武器，例如激光或導彈，以及掉落武器，例如尖刺或地雷。當你完成比賽時，你會得到更多的錢來升級你的車。

原聲帶包括《生來狂野》、《壞到骨子裡》、《彼得·岡恩主題曲》、《公路明星》和《偏執狂》。

Star Ocean (Japan) (Translated).name: 星海遊俠系列
Star Ocean (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: A young boy named Ratix lives in the town Clatos on a planet with medieval culture, together with his best friends Dorn and Milly. They belong to respectable families of warriors and healers, and excel in battles kills. One day, a letter from a neighbor town arrives. A strange disease has plagued the town and its inhabitants plead the healers of Clatos to help them. Milly's father decides to go, but he himself catches the disease. The young adventurers must save Milly's father and other people at all costs. But in the beginning of their journey, they discover a crashed space ship with people who belong to a much more advanced civilization. People from two different worlds must work together to solve the grand mystery...
Star Ocean (Japan) (Translated).desc: 一個名叫拉提克斯的小男孩與他最好的朋友多恩和米莉一起住在一個有著中世紀文化的星球上的克拉托斯小鎮。他們出身於受人尊敬的戰士和治療師家族，擅長戰鬥殺戮。有一天，一封來自鄰鎮的信到達。一種奇怪的疾病困擾著小鎮，居民們懇求克拉托斯的治療師來幫助他們。米莉的父親決定去，但他自己也染上了這種病。年輕的冒險家必須不惜一切代價拯救米莉的父親和其他人。但在旅程的開始，他們發現了一艘墜毀的太空飛船，裡面的人屬於更先進的文明。來自兩個不同世界的人們必須共同努力，解開這個巨大的謎團……

Bugs Bunny - Rabbit Rampage (USA).name: 兔八哥：兔子狂暴
Bugs Bunny - Rabbit Rampage (USA).original_desc:
A fiendish animator has gone crazy and has started painting Bugs Bunny into all sorts of messes across reused cartoon landscapes. Bugs is getting into trouble from all kinds of characters including Elmer Fudd, Marvin the Martian, Crusher the wrestler, Yosamite Sam, the three little pigs. Bugs will need to use his experience, wit, and arsenal of wacky ACME weapons in order to defeat the challenges of each location.

Bugs Bunny Rabbit Rampage is a side-scrolling platform game. The player, controlling Bugs Bunny, is able to jump (and squash), high-kick, throw cream pies and use ACME weapons. These weapons are scattered all over the landscape and include such cartoon favorites as bone-shaped dynamite sticks, anvils to drop on heads, Shrink Rays, portable holes and many more. Players will encounter a variety of familiar Looney Tunes characters as enemies and level bosses. At the end of each level (10 in all). players are given a rating based on their gameplay style, which includes how many of these ACME weapons they were willing to use.
Bugs Bunny - Rabbit Rampage (USA).desc:
一位邪惡的動畫師瘋了，開始在重複使用的卡通風景中把兔八哥畫得亂七八糟。巴格斯遇到了各種角色的麻煩，包括埃爾默·福德、火星人馬文、摔跤手克拉舍、優勝美地山姆和三隻小豬。巴格斯需要運用他的經驗、智慧和古怪的 ACME 武器來戰勝每個地點的挑戰。

Bugs Bunny Rabbit Rampage 是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲。控制兔八哥的玩家能夠跳躍（和擠壓）、高踢、投擲奶油餡餅和使用 ACME 武器。這些武器散佈在整個場景中，包括卡通人物最愛的骨狀炸藥棒、砸在頭上的鐵砧、收縮射線、便攜式洞等等。玩家將遇到各種熟悉的樂一通角色作為敵人和關卡老闆。在每個級別結束時（總共 10 個級別）。玩家會根據他們的遊戲風格進行評分，其中包括他們願意使用多少種 ACME 武器。

Star Fox (USA) (Rev 2).name: 星狐
Star Fox (USA) (Rev 2).original_desc: This is the first SNES title using the Super FX chip; you are flying ace Fox McCloud, who with his trusted wingmen and his powerful Arwing starfighter, must rid the Lylat System of the evil that surrounds it. Wave after wave of enemies will fly towards you, and with the advice of your wingmen, you must guide your way through each level and take down as many as you can.
Star Fox (USA) (Rev 2).desc: 這是第一款使用 Super FX 芯片的 SNES 遊戲；你是王牌飛行員福克斯·麥克勞德，他和他值得信賴的僚機和強大的阿翼星際戰鬥機必須清除萊拉特星系周圍的邪惡。一波又一波的敵人將向你飛來，在你的僚機的建議下，你必須引導你通過每個關卡並儘可能地擊倒敵人。

True Lies (USA).name: 真實的謊言
True Lies (USA).original_desc:
Take charge of gun toting Arnie in this top down omni-scrolling action shooter. Arnie takes on the terrorists using a variety of weapons in all the locations from the movie of the same name.
In each location you have a mission such as retrieve data or capture a terrorist.This usually involves searching around for your goal while dispatching enemies and trying to minimise civilian casualties. The emphasis is on action and weapons, in particular Arnold's favourites: flame thrower and the uzi. He also has a diving roll to help him dodge the enemies bullets and come back guns blazing..
True Lies (USA).desc:
在這款自上而下的全滾動動作射擊遊戲中，負責攜帶槍的阿尼。阿尼在同名電影的所有地點使用各種武器對抗恐怖分子。
在每個地點，你都有一個任務，例如檢索數據或捕獲恐怖分子。這通常涉及在消滅敵人的同時尋找你的目標，並儘量減少平民傷亡。重點是動作和武器，特別是阿諾德最喜歡的：火焰噴射器和烏茲衝鋒槍。他還有一個俯衝翻滾，可以幫助他躲避敵人的子彈，並以槍聲回擊。

Bonkers (USA).name: 瘋狂者
Bonkers (USA).original_desc:
The game is based on the Disney TV show of the same name. Bonkers is a bob-cat police officer who lives in "toondom", a cartoony land where people co-exist with various creatures from cartoon movies. 

One day, Bonkers and his partner Lucky hear about a shocking robbery: Hollywood's most valuable treasures - Sorcerer's Hat, Mermaid's Voice, and Magic Lamp - were stolen! Now it is up to Bonkers to capture the thieves and to take back the stolen treasures.

This is an action platform game. Bonkers can jump and dash, throwing enemies aside and even destroying some obstacles. Enemies can be killed by jumping on their heads. You can also collect various items such as bombs to throw at the enemies, cakes to refill your health, or hyper juice to make you dash continuously.

Besides the common license, this game is totally different from the Genesis game  Bonkers.
Bonkers (USA).desc:
該遊戲改編自迪士尼同名電視節目。邦克斯是一名山貓警官，生活在“卡通世界”，這是一片卡通土地，人們與卡通電影中的各種生物共存。

有一天，邦克斯和他的搭檔幸運聽說了一起令人震驚的搶劫案：好萊塢最珍貴的寶藏——巫師帽、美人魚之聲和神燈——被盜了！現在，邦克斯需要抓捕盜賊並奪回被盜的寶藏。

這是一款動作平台遊戲。瘋狂者可以跳躍和衝刺，將敵人扔到一邊，甚至摧毀一些障礙物。跳到敵人的頭上可以殺死他們。您還可以收集各種物品，例如向敵人投擲炸彈、補充生命值的蛋糕或讓您不斷衝刺的超級果汁。

除了通用許可外，這款遊戲與 Genesis 遊戲 Bonkers 完全不同。

Super Mario World (USA).name: 超級瑪利歐3D樂園
Super Mario World (USA).original_desc:
Once again, the evil Bowser has captured Princess Peach (while on a holiday on Yoshi's Island), and it's up to Mario to save her. To aid him in his quest, Mario must use the flying ability of the feather to get him to places hard to reach. But what's even more important is his new friend, the dinosaur Yoshi, who Mario can ride through each level and eat the enemies.

Over 90 levels are on offer, with plenty of Bowser's evil koopas and new characters around each level. Apart from saving Peach, you can also save some of Yoshi's friends, other dinosaurs that each have a special attack. Each level also contains a set of extra items to collect, including dinosaur coins, and break the tape at the end of each level to collect stars, that allow you to open up the bonus games.
Super Mario World (USA).desc:
邪惡的庫巴再次俘獲了桃子公主（當時她正在耀西島度假），馬里奧必須拯救她。為了幫助他完成任務，馬里奧必須利用羽毛的飛行能力把他帶到難以到達的地方。但更重要的是他的新朋友恐龍耀西，馬里奧可以騎著它穿過每個關卡並吃掉敵人。

提供超過 90 個關卡，每個關卡都有大量 Bowser 的邪惡庫帕和新角色。除了拯救桃子之外，你還可以拯救耀西的一些朋友，以及其他都有特殊攻擊力的恐龍。每個關卡還包含一組額外的物品可供收集，包括恐龍硬幣，並在每個關卡結束時打破膠帶收集星星，以便您打開獎勵遊戲。

Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals (USA).key: Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals (USA)
Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals (USA).original_name: Lufia II : Rise of the Sinistrals
Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals (USA).name: 盧菲亞II:辛尼斯特拉的崛起
Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals (USA).original_desc:
Lufia II is an RPG with many puzzle elements thrown in. In this game, the prequel to Lufia I, you are Maxim, a monster hunter. During your journey, you will find new party members, explore and conquer various dungeons, and solve many puzzles. 
Lufia II was an innovative game in many regards. It made extensive use of puzzles in its dungeon layouts. It also featured "Capsule Monsters" which would fight alongside your party in battle. They would evolve when fed weapons, armor, or special fruits. You could also gamble away your money in minigames at the casinos found in various towns.
Lufia II - Rise of the Sinistrals (USA).desc:
《Lufia II》是一款融入了許多解謎元素的角色扮演遊戲。在這款遊戲中，《Lufia I》的前傳，你將扮演怪物獵人馬克西姆。在你的旅程中，你會遇到新的隊友，探索並征服各種地下城，並解決許多謎題。
《Lufia II》在很多方面都是一款創新遊戲。它在地牢佈局中廣泛使用了謎題。它還具有“膠囊怪物”，可以在戰鬥中與你的隊伍並肩作戰。當餵食武器、盔甲或特殊水果時，它們會進化。您還可以在各個城鎮的賭場中玩迷你游戲，把錢輸光。

Spider-Man - Venom - Maximum Carnage (US.name: 蜘蛛俠與毒液：最大屠殺
Spider-Man - Venom - Maximum Carnage (US.original_desc:
Loosely based on the comic book series, the story opens as Carnage breaks out of the insane asylum and wreaks mayhem. Spiderman immediately acknowledges the new job at hand and sets out to stop him.

You start off with Spidey but in certain parts you get to choose between him and Venom, which takes you through an alternate routes. The gameplay is your standard beat-em-up, the regular punching and jump-kicking, with the addition of the all important webbing - ie web swinging, web shield etc.
Spider-Man - Venom - Maximum Carnage (US.desc:
故事大致以漫畫系列為基礎，故事以屠殺從瘋人院衝出並造成混亂開始。蜘蛛俠立即承認了手頭的新工作並開始阻止他。

你從蜘蛛俠開始，但在某些部分你可以在他和毒液之間做出選擇，這會帶你走不同的路線。遊戲玩法是標準的格鬥遊戲，常規的拳擊和跳踢，還添加了所有重要的織帶 - 即織網擺動、織網防護等。

Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.key: Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Past (USA)
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.original_name: The Legend of Zelda : A Link to the Past
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.name: 薩爾達傳說 智慧的再現
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.original_desc: Venture back to Hyrule and an age of magic and heroes. The predecessors of Link and Zelda face monsters on the march when a menacing magician takes over the kingdom. Only you can prevent his evil plot from shattering the land of Hyrule. In your quest, you'll venture into twisting mazes, dungeons, palaces and shadowy forests. Test your mettle with mighty swords and magical weapons. Or heft a boulder and hurl it at your enemies. If the going gets tough, dive into a river - you can swim to escape! Learn the powerful spells, locate magical artifacts and solve the mysteries of the evil magician and the hidden realm of Hyrule.
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.desc: 冒險回到海拉爾，回到魔法和英雄的時代。當一位來勢洶洶的魔法師接管了王國時，林克和塞爾達的前輩們在行軍中面臨著怪物。只有你才能阻止他的邪惡陰謀破壞海拉爾大地。在你的探索中，你將冒險進入扭曲的迷宮、地牢、宮殿和陰暗的森林。用強大的劍和魔法武器測試你的勇氣。或者舉起一塊巨石並向敵人投擲。如果情況變得艱難，跳入河中 - 您可以游泳逃脫！學習強大的法術，找到魔法文物並解開邪惡魔法師和海拉魯隱藏國度的謎團。

Super Turrican 2 (USA).name: 超級颶風2
Super Turrican 2 (USA).original_desc:
Super Turrican is back, and once again the USS Freedom Forces have to prevent the evil Machine from harming innocent civilizations.
This requires the player to jump and shoot his way through large levels filled with lots of enemies. To get rid of all the enemies, several different weapons can be used, most of which are already familiar to players from previous episodes: a Laser, a Spread-shot, and a(improved) Rebound. There is also the option to go into "wheel-mode" for a limited time to become invincible, lay mines and shoot rockets. The Flamethrower is new to the series as well as the Rope, which can be used to climb walls, cling to platforms or pick up out-of-reach items. Much like in side-scrolling shooters, you can now pick up homing missiles as secondary weapons. The biggest difference to previous Turrican-games however, is the fact that in Super Turrican 2 almost half of the levels are strictly linear and don't feature any large secret areas.
Super Turrican 2 (USA).desc:
超級颶風回來了，美國自由軍必須再次阻止邪惡機器傷害無辜的文明。
這需要玩家跳躍並射擊，穿過充滿大量敵人的大關卡。為了消滅所有敵人，可以使用幾種不同的武器，其中大多數武器對於前幾集的玩家來說已經很熟悉了：激光、散佈射擊和（改進的）反彈。還可以選擇在有限的時間內進入“車輪模式”，以變得無敵、埋雷和發射火箭。火焰噴射器和繩索都是該系列的新成員，可以用來爬牆、攀爬平台或撿起夠不到的物品。就像橫向捲軸射擊遊戲一樣，你現在可以拾取尋的導彈作為輔助武器。然而，與之前的 Turrican 遊戲最大的區別在於，在 Super Turrican 2 中，幾乎一半的關卡都是嚴格線性的，並且沒有任何大型秘密區域。

Ultima - The Black Gate (USA).name: 創世紀:黑門
Ultima - The Black Gate (USA).original_desc:
The Avatar is once again summoned to the land of Britannia, and this time he has to investigate ritual murders that have occurred in the town of Trinsic. Meanwhile, a new philosophical/social doctrine is spreading through Britannia, promoted by the mysterious Fellowship...

The story of this version of Ultima VII is essentially the same as in the original PC version. However, the dialogues have been greatly reduced and/or simplified. This applies also to the size of the game's cities and other locations, the amount of items to pick up, interior details, etc.

Combat also underwent significant changes. The battles in this version are action-based; the player has to click on the enemy repeatedly to win. Unlike the PC version with its party management, the Avatar is traveling and fighting solo in this release.
Ultima - The Black Gate (USA).desc:
阿凡達再次被召喚到不列顛大陸，這一次他必須調查特林西克鎮發生的儀式謀殺案。與此同時，一種新的哲學/社會學說正在不列顛尼亞傳播，由神秘的團契推動……

這個版本的《創世紀 VII》的故事與原版 PC 版本基本相同。然而，對話已大大減少和/或簡化。這也適用於遊戲城市和其他地點的大小、拾取物品的數量、內部細節等。

戰鬥也發生了重大變化。這個版本中的戰鬥是基於動作的；玩家必須反复點擊敵人才能獲勝。與 PC 版本的隊伍管理不同，阿凡達在此版本中獨自旅行和戰鬥。

Rockman & Forte (Japan) (Translated).name: 洛克人與福爾特
Rockman & Forte (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The mighty robot King has taken over Dr. Wily's base, invaded the Robot Museum, and stolen 100 CDs containing secret robot plans, hoping to create the ultimate unstoppable army of robots! And to make matters worse, he's sent 8 robot masters to prove his new-found power!

Mega Man is the only one who can stop him...or so he thought! Bass, Dr. Wily's greatest creation and Mega Man's sworn rival, is actually fighting ALONGSIDE Mega Man for once! Of course, it's only to prove that he's the strongest robot ever made, and he'll do it by smashing King's army of mechanical maniacs!

Now, Mega Man and Bass are heading out to get back all of the CD's that King stole. Run, jump, slide, dash, and blast your way through to destroy this new menace!
Rockman & Forte (Japan) (Translated).desc:
強大的機器人國王占領了威利博士的基地，入侵了機器人博物館，並偷走了 100 張包含秘密機器人計劃的 CD，希望打造出終極不可阻擋的機器人大軍！更糟糕的是，他還派出了 8 名機器人大師來證明他新發現的力量！

洛克人是唯一能阻止他的人……至少他是這麼認為的！威利博士最偉大的創造物和洛克人的死敵巴斯，實際上正在與洛克人並肩作戰一次！當然，這只是為了證明他是有史以來最強大的機器人，他會通過粉碎國王的機械狂人軍隊來做到這一點！

現在，洛克人和巴斯正出發去取回金偷走的所有 CD。奔跑、跳躍、滑行、衝刺和爆破，消滅這個新的威脅！

Monopoly (USA) (Rev 1).name: 壟斷
Monopoly (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: This time, a Monopoly game on your computer, as good as it knows to be in your reality. Every move of yours can be in 3D animation, or off if you don't want to see animations. There can be up to 6 players at once, and it can be played over the Internet. Music is in midi format, and the sound quality is at the wav format. Roll, spin, and don't miss to give us a grin.
Monopoly (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 這一次，您電腦上的大富翁遊戲就像您現實中的一樣好。您的每一個動作都可以採用 3D 動畫，如果您不想看到動畫，也可以將其關閉。一次最多可有 6 名玩家同時玩，並且可以通過互聯網進行遊戲。音樂為midi格式，音質為wav格式。滾動、旋轉，不要錯過給我們一個微笑。

Spindizzy Worlds (USA).name: 旋轉世界
Spindizzy Worlds (USA).original_desc:
On it's most basic level, Spindizzy Worlds is, like its predecessor, similar to Marble Madness. Controlling GERALD, you must move through the isometrically viewed landscape (largely flick-screen on the ST). There are two skill levels; the harder one features more of the precarious ledges and falls of Spindizzy. Each one takes you to a different matrix of levels, which can be played in different orders and each consist of 10 screens, with a bonus level at the end.

You have limited energy, which can be recharged by collecting crystals. Fuel is limited, and is reduced by contact with hazards - generating a replacement GERALD takes time. There are many gates which are opened by running into spaces of the same colour. There are also aliens to avoid, and most movement is along thin slippery ledges with heavily inertia-based controls.
Spindizzy Worlds (USA).desc:
在最基本的層面上，《Spidizzy Worlds》與其前身一樣，與《Marble Madness》類似。控制 GERALD，你必須在等距視圖中移動（在 ST 上主要是輕彈屏幕）。有兩個技能級別；難度越大，斯賓迪茲 (Spidizzy) 的危險壁架和墜落就越多。每個關卡都會帶您進入不同的關卡矩陣，可以按不同的順序進行遊戲，每個關卡由 10 個屏幕組成，最後還有一個獎勵關卡。

你的能量有限，可以通過收集水晶來補充。燃料有限，並且會因接觸危險而減少 - 生成替代 GERALD 需要時間。有許多門，通過進入相同顏色的空間來打開。還有需要躲避的外星人，大多數移動都是沿著薄滑的壁架進行，並具有嚴重基於慣性的控制。

Alien vs Predator (USA).name: 外星人大戰鐵血戰士
Alien vs Predator (USA).original_desc: Based on the Alien VS Predator comic book series. During the 25th century, mankind has colonized many planets. On one of these, New Shanghai, strange creatures have been discovered. These Aliens cause much havoc. New Shanghai initiates a distress call to other planets in the galaxy. A cloaked ship belonging to hunting creatures known as Predators intercepts the message. The Predators on board decide that these strange Alien creatures might make worthy trophies for the collection. The player takes the role of one of the Predators.
Alien vs Predator (USA).desc: 改編自《異形大戰鐵血戰士》漫畫系列。25世紀，人類已經殖民了許多星球。其中之一，新上海，發現了奇怪的生物。這些外星人造成了很大的破壞。新上海向銀河係其他行星發出求救信號。一艘屬於捕食者的狩獵生物的隱形船攔截了這條消息。船上的掠奪者認為這些奇怪的外星生物可能會成為有價值的收藏品。玩家扮演掠食者之一的角色。

Urban Strike (USA).name: 城市罷工
Urban Strike (USA).original_desc:
Urban Strike is the third  in EA's long running series of helicopter action games.  An evil genius named H. R. Malone has started a cult and managed to gather millions of followers.  Malone is using his influence and wealth to build a super weapon with which he will overthrow the government.  You will once again suit up and take control of various types of helicopters to stop Malone's evil scheme.

Urban Strike is the first, and only, game in the Strike series to feature non-vehicular combat.  In some levels you will leave your helicopter and proceed on foot.
Urban Strike (USA).desc:
《Urban Strike》是 EA 長期推出的直升機動作遊戲系列中的第三款。一個名叫 H. R. Malone 的邪惡天才創立了一個邪教組織，並成功聚集了數百萬追隨者。馬龍正在利用他的影響力和財富打造一個超級武器，用它來推翻政府。你將再次穿上戰衣並控制各種類型的直升機來阻止馬龍的邪惡計劃。

《Urban Strike》是《Strike》系列中第一款也是唯一一款以非載具戰鬥為特色的遊戲。在某些關卡中，您將離開直升機併步行前進。

Kirby's Avalanche (USA).name: 卡比的雪崩
Kirby's Avalanche (USA).original_desc:
The First Annual Dream Land's Avalanche Competition is about to get under way, and as Kirby and a host of characters from the Kirby series, you can join the tournament and become Avalanche king.

Avalanche is similar to Puyo Puyo, and has you stacking colored blobs similar in a way to Tetris. When a certain amount of one color is stacked, an explosion occurs and the screen clears of those blobs, which then appear in the other players screen (either the CPU or a second player). When your screen is cleared before the other player, you move onto the next round, and so on until the final boss. The winner of that match is then crowned the Avalanche king.
Kirby's Avalanche (USA).desc:
首屆年度夢幻之地雪崩大賽即將拉開帷幕，你可以扮演卡比和卡比系列中的眾多角色，參加比賽並成為雪崩之王。

Avalanche 與 Puyo Puyo 類似，讓你以類似於俄羅斯方塊的方式堆疊彩色斑點。當堆疊一定數量的一種顏色時，就會發生爆炸，屏幕上的這些斑點就會消失，然後出現在其他玩家的屏幕上（CPU 或第二個玩家）。當您的屏幕在其他玩家之前被清除時，您將進入下一輪，依此類推，直到最終的老闆。那場比賽的獲勝者將被加冕為雪崩國王。

Super Tennis (USA).name: 超級網球
Super Tennis (USA).original_desc:
The world circuit of tennis awaits you. Select from 20 male and female players, each with their own style of game play (strengths and weaknesses) and play singles, doubles either against or with a human opponent or a CPU controlled player(s) on all the major surfaces (clay, grass & hardcourt).

The circuit mode is the meat of the game. Here, using a password save system, you play a selection of tournaments all around the world. The more games you play and win, the more points you receive. These points go towards your rank in the world tour rankings. There are 4 major tournaments (as in real life) and many minor tournaments to play.
Super Tennis (USA).desc:
網球世界巡迴賽等待著您。從 20 名男性和女性玩家中進行選擇，每個人都有自己的遊戲風格（優勢和劣勢），並在所有主要場地（紅土、草地和硬地）上與真人對手或 CPU 控制的玩家進行單打、雙打。

電路模式是遊戲的核心。在這裡，使用密碼保存系統，您可以參加世界各地的精選錦標賽。您玩並贏得的遊戲越多，您獲得的積分就越多。這些積分將影響您在世界巡迴賽排名中的排名。有 4 場大型錦標賽（如現實生活中一樣）和許多小型錦標賽可供參加。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV - Turtle.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV - Turtles in Time (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV - Turtle.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV : Turtles in Time
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV - Turtle.name: 忍者神龜 IV : 時之龜
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV - Turtle.original_desc:
Doesn't this Shredder dude ever take a break? Now he's gone and kidnapped Channel 6's own reporter babe April O' Neill again, and just as the Ninja Turtles were about to kick his butt, he tore open some kinda time portal thingy and flung them back into the past!

Now Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello, and Michaelangelo have to fight their way through time and tons of Foot Soldiers, mutant wackos, and more in order to save April and slam Shredder's butt all the way to Dimension X! Go, Turtles! Kick some shell and save April!
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IV - Turtle.desc:
這個碎紙機傢伙從來沒有休息過嗎？現在他又走了，又綁架了第六頻道的記者寶貝艾普麗爾·奧尼爾，就在忍者神龜準備踢他的屁股時，他撕開了某種時間之門的東西，把他們扔回了過去！

現在，萊昂納多、拉斐爾、多納泰羅和米開朗基羅必須在時間和大量步兵、變種瘋子等中奮力拼搏，才能拯救艾普麗爾，並一路猛擊施萊德的屁股，直達 X 維度！走吧，海龜們！踢掉一些殼並拯救四月！

Metal Marines (USA).name: 金屬陸戰隊
Metal Marines (USA).original_desc:
The Antimatter Cold War has left Earth ruined as the stockpiled AM weapons of various nations were triggered in a chain effect, vaporizing large portions of the Earth. The once great continents have been drastically changed into thousands of tiny islands and various cities have washed into the oceans.  During this turmoil,  Zorgeuf the Great rushes to conquer the bewildered world along with a troop of commanders and declares the Earth Empire. The only hope to defeat him lies from without Earth, as the Colonial Forces send a command carrier from the major orbital base. With so many armies gone, the ground infantry unit has been replaced by the Metal Marine, a fifty foot armored robot that can be sent into battle for attack or defense. From their respective Command Center, each side in the conflict will need to direct the placement of facilities on the ground to defend against enemy attack, manage resources and successfully strike the enemy.

Metal Marines is an isometric strategy game. Controlling one side of a conflict, the player must wage a campaign across several islands to defeat Zorgeuf and his lieutenants. The player controls logistics of the base to ensure that there are the necessary assets to wage war. On each map, the player places three underground command bases, if all of these are destroyed the battle is lost.  The player must manage the resources of their money to construct new buildings or upgrade existing facilities on the map. Different buildings include Energy Plants, Factories, Economic Centers, Radar systems, Anti-Aircraft missiles, fake buildings and fake HQ bases, mine fields, gun pods, missile launchers, metal marine hangers and even ICBMs.  At any time, the player may order an attack and choose which assets to fire at the opponent. Missiles, Metal Marines carriers and ICBMs all use different levels of fuel. Metal Marines once deployed in an area will automatically fire rifles at nearby targets or engage even closer targets in melee attacks. Gunpods, while stationary, will also fire on nearby enemies. Metal Marines are largely autonomous but can be manually controlled to a minor degree (directional) by the player.
Metal Marines (USA).desc:
反物質冷戰使地球遭到毀滅，因為各國儲備的AM武器被觸發連鎖效應，蒸發了地球的大部分地區。曾經偉大的大陸已經徹底變成了成千上萬的小島嶼，各個城市被沖入海洋。在這場動亂中，佐爾格夫大帝帶著一隊指揮官急忙征服了迷茫的世界，並宣佈建立地球帝國。擊敗他的唯一希望來自於地球以外的地方，因為殖民軍從主要軌道基地派遣了一艘指揮航空母艦。隨著如此多的軍隊消失，地面步兵部隊已被金屬陸戰隊所取代，這是一種五十英尺的裝甲機器人，可以被派往戰鬥中進行攻擊或防禦。衝突各方需要從各自的指揮中心指揮地面設施的部署，以防禦敵人的攻擊、管理資源並成功打擊敵人。

《金屬海軍陸戰隊》是一款等距策略遊戲。控制衝突的一方，玩家必須在多個島嶼上發起一場戰役，以擊敗佐爾格夫和他的副官。玩家控制基地的後勤，以確保有發動戰爭所需的資產。在每張地圖上，玩家放置三個地下指揮基地，如果所有這些都被摧毀，則戰鬥失敗。玩家必須管理他們的金錢資源來建造新建築物或升級地圖上的現有設施。不同的建築物包括能源廠、工廠、經濟中心、雷達系統、防空導彈、假建築物和假總部基地、雷區、炮艙、導彈發射器、金屬海洋吊架甚至洲際彈道導彈。玩家可以隨時下令發起攻擊並選擇向對手開火的資產。導彈、金屬陸戰隊航母和洲際彈道導彈都使用不同級別的燃料。金屬陸戰隊一旦部署在某個區域，就會自動向附近的目標開槍，或者在近戰攻擊中與更近的目標交戰。槍架在靜止時也會向附近的敵人開火。金屬陸戰隊員在很大程度上是自主的，但可以由玩家在較小程度上手動控制（定向）。

Whirlo (Europe).name: 惠羅
Whirlo (Europe).original_desc:
A platformer title starring Valkyrie's lizard friend Xandra. In the game, which plays as a prequel of the Valkyrie games, you control Xandra as he leaves his enchanted forest in order to get help for his family. This will eventually lead him to meet up with our beloved Valkyrie and mark the beginning of their adventures.

Xandra has all the abilities of a standard platformer character, which allow him to jump around and navigate the many obstacles found in the game. Additionally he's armed with a pitchfork which he can use to impale his enemies and stick to some surfaces. Collecting coins allow him to purchase extra lives, but there are no added weapons or spells as in the Valkyrie games.
Whirlo (Europe).desc:
由 Valkyrie 的蜥蜴朋友 Xandra 主演的平台遊戲。遊戲是《瓦爾基里》系列遊戲的前傳，在這款遊戲中，你將控制 Xandra 離開他的魔法森林，為他的家人尋求幫助。這最終將導致他與我們心愛的瓦爾基里會面，並標誌著他們冒險的開始。

Xandra 擁有標準平台遊戲角色的所有能力，這使他能夠跳躍並穿越遊戲中發現的許多障礙。此外，他還配備了一把乾草叉，可以用來刺穿敵人並粘在某些表面上。收集硬幣可以讓他購買額外的生命，但沒有像《瓦爾基里》遊戲中那樣添加武器或法術。

Fire Emblem - Thracia 776 (Japan) (Trans.name: 火焰之纹章 多拉基亚776
Fire Emblem - Thracia 776 (Japan) (Trans.original_desc:
Thracia 776 continues the Fire Emblem story with a midquel or a "meanwhile" setting. The events transpire during  Fire Emblem: Seisen no Keifu and the game contains many of the same characters from that game, while featuring cameos of many more. 

At its most simple the story is of Prince Leaf of Lenster's struggle to free his native land from two forces, the Grandbell Empire and the Loptus religion.

Features introduced into this part of the series include fog of war and night maps with limited vision, this requires characters to use torches and wands to light their way. Also the capture command which allowed enemies to be subdued and their weapons taken.
Fire Emblem - Thracia 776 (Japan) (Trans.desc:
《Thracia 776》以中傳或“同時”為背景繼續《火焰之紋章》的故事。這些事件發生在《火焰紋章：聖戰紀風》期間，遊戲中包含許多與該遊戲相同的角色，同時還有更多角色客串。

最簡單的故事是倫斯特的利夫王子為了將自己的祖國從格蘭貝爾帝國和洛普圖斯宗教這兩種勢力手中解放出來而奮鬥的故事。

該系列的這一部分引入的功能包括戰爭迷霧和視野有限的夜間地圖，這需要角色使用火把和魔杖照亮他們的道路。還有捕獲命令，可以製服敵人並奪取他們的武器。

Dragon Quest VI (Translated).name: 勇者鬥惡龍系列
Dragon Quest VI (Translated).original_desc:
You and two of your friends decide to attack the Archenemy - the evil Mudo - in his castle. But as you reach his throne, he attacks you and send the three friends into three different places...

Was this just a dream? You have just fallen out of your bed dreaming! It's time to go to the village elder, to get a seemingly simple assignment - to sell some goods at a bazaar in the nearest town. But soon the hero will discover his dream was not so far away from reality...

"Dragon Quest VI" is the last SNES game of the Dragon Quest series (called "Dragon Warrior" in US). It is a party RPG with turn-based combat and battles viewed from 1st person perspective. Not much has changed since the NES days of Dragon Quest - gameplay style, setting, and even menu layout seem almost identical to those of the early classics. Like its immediate predecessor  Dragon Quest V, this game was never released outside Japan.
Dragon Quest VI (Translated).desc:
你和你的兩個朋友決定攻擊大敵——邪惡的穆多——在他的城堡裡。但當你登上他的王座時，他攻擊了你，並將三個朋友送到了三個不同的地方......

這只是一個夢嗎？你剛剛從床上掉下來做夢！是時候去找村里的長老了，接受一項看似簡單的任務——在最近城鎮的集市上賣一些商品。但很快英雄就會發現他的夢想離現實並不遙遠……

《勇者鬥惡龍VI》是《勇者鬥惡龍》系列的最後一款SNES遊戲（美國稱為“勇者鬥惡龍”）。這是一款派對角色扮演遊戲，具有回合製戰鬥和第一人稱視角的戰鬥。自《勇者鬥惡龍》的 NES 時代以來，並沒有太大變化 - 遊戲風格、設置，甚至菜單佈局似乎與早期經典遊戲幾乎相同。與前作《勇者鬥惡龍 V》一樣，這款遊戲從未在日本以外地區發行。

Tetris & Dr. Mario (USA).name: 俄羅斯方塊和馬里奧博士
Tetris & Dr. Mario (USA).original_desc:
Two of the most popular puzzle games return, but now together in an exclusive compilation for SNES. The games have a slight graphical update when compared with the original Game Boy and NES games, but the gameplay remains totally faithful to the games released for both platforms.

In Tetris, the main objective is to pile blocks that will fall down continuously, in order to create a row or "line" without spaces. For this collection, the game comes with two bonus options: 2 PLAYER GAME (absent in the NES version) and VS. COM (absent in both versions), with 3 CPU opponents available, each one representing a difficulty level (EASY, MEDIUM, and HARD, respectively).

In Dr. Mario, the objective is to eliminate all the viruses contained in a big bottle. Dr. Mario (situated in the upper-right side of the screen) will throw capsules with 6 different color combinations (Red-Red, Red-Blue, Yellow-Yellow, Red-Yellow, Blue-Blue and Blue-Yellow) in order to line up at least four viruses or capsules of the same color horizontally or vertically and to make them disappear. In this compilation, the game comes with a bonus option: VS. COM, where you'll face the CPU players: Blue Virus (EASY), Yellow Virus (MEDIUM), and Red Virus (HARD).

For competitive players in both games, there is Mixed Match, where you and a friend can play Tetris and Dr. Mario like a tournament! Adjust the handicap levels, play time, music, and other settings to balance your different skills. The game order is: TETRIS B-TYPE (clear a certain amount of lines), DR. MARIO (disinfect a predetermined number of viruses) and TETRIS A-TYPE (clear lines until the time expires). At the end of the time limit, the player with the highest score is the winner.
Tetris & Dr. Mario (USA).desc:
兩款最受歡迎的益智遊戲回歸，但現在一起為 SNES 獨家合輯。與原版 Game Boy 和 NES 遊戲相比，這些遊戲的圖形略有更新，但遊戲玩法仍然完全忠實於這兩個平台發布的遊戲。

在《俄羅斯方塊》中，主要目標是堆積不斷掉落的方塊，以創建沒有空格的行或“線”。對於這個系列，遊戲有兩個獎勵選項：2 人遊戲（NES 版本中沒有）和 VS。COM（兩個版本中均沒有），有 3 個 CPU 對手可用，每個對手代表一個難度級別（分別為 EASY、MEDIUM 和 HARD）。

在《馬里奧博士》中，目標是消滅一個大瓶子裡的所有病毒。馬里奧博士（位於屏幕右上角）將拋出6種不同顏色組合（紅-紅、紅-藍、黃-黃、紅-黃、藍-藍和藍-黃）的膠囊，以便將至少四個相同顏色的病毒或膠囊水平或垂直排列起來並使它們消失。在這個合輯中，遊戲附帶了一個獎勵選項：VS。COM，您將在這裡面對 CPU 玩家：藍色病毒（EASY）、黃色病毒（MEDIUM）和紅色病毒（HARD）。

對於這兩款遊戲中的競技玩家來說，還有混合比賽，您和朋友可以像錦標賽一樣玩俄羅斯方塊和馬里奧博士！調整障礙級別、遊戲時間、音樂和其他設置以平衡您的不同技能。遊戲順序為：TETRIS B-TYPE（清除一定數量的線）、DR. MARIO（消滅預定數量的病毒）和TETRIS A-TYPE（清除線路直到時間到期）。時間限制結束時，得分最高的玩家獲勝。

Lucky Luke (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es).name: 幸運盧克
Lucky Luke (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es).original_desc:
Based on the famous comics series about good cowboy Lucky Luke.

In the game you as Lucky Luke have to arrest four Dalton brothers – Averell, William, Jack, and Joe. On your mission you will progress from level to level shooting bad cowboys, jail-breakers, and bad Indians with your revolver; collecting bullets, dynamites, sheriff stars, and other useful items; running, jumping, ducking, and climbing. The locations vary from Forts, Towns, and Jails to Mines, Train, and Saloon with Ghosts. On every level you have to complete different submissions to progress – either to free a Bank Director, or to collect Three Nuggets for Miner to obtain a Nitroglycerine, or to build a Totem for Apaches, etc. At the end of some levels you confront the big boss, it is often the one of Daltons.

Different arcade sequences between levels allow you to chase the Dalton brothers or train riding your faithful horse Jolly; to run away from Tornado; and to ride on the raft. 

Bonus level arcade sequences represent your wrestling challenge with Jolly, bottles shooting, or revolver's barrel roulette.

To access the one of the three certain parts of the game you may enter password.

The game was made in French/English/German/Spanish.
Lucky Luke (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es).desc:
改編自關於好牛仔幸運盧克的著名漫畫系列。

在遊戲中，你作為幸運盧克必須逮捕道爾頓四兄弟——艾夫里爾、威廉、傑克和喬。在你的任務中，你將不斷進步，用你的左輪手槍射擊壞牛仔、越獄者和壞印第安人；收集子彈、炸藥、警長星和其他有用的物品；奔跑、跳躍、躲避和攀爬。地點多種多樣，從堡壘、城鎮和監獄到礦井、火車和有幽靈的酒吧。在每個關卡中，你都必須完成不同的提交才能取得進展——要么釋放銀行董事，要么為礦工收集三塊金塊以獲得硝化甘油，或者為阿帕奇建造一個圖騰，等等。在某些關卡結束時，你面對的大老闆通常是道爾頓。

關卡之間的不同街機序列讓你可以追逐道爾頓兄弟，或者騎著你忠實的馬喬利訓練；逃離龍捲風；並乘坐木筏。

獎勵關卡街機序列代表了您與 Jolly、瓶子射擊或左輪槍管輪盤賭的摔跤挑戰。

要訪問遊戲的三個特定部分之一，您可以輸入密碼。

該遊戲是用法語/英語/德語/西班牙語製作的。

Flashback - The Quest for Identity (USA).name: 閃回:尋找身份
Flashback - The Quest for Identity (USA).original_desc:
The year is 2142. You play as Conrad B. Hart, a man who has lost his memory. After barely escaping from hostile aliens, Conrad's bike crashes on an unknown planet. Conrad finds himself in the jungle, and from now on his quest for survival and his lost identity begins.

"Flashback" is a platform action adventure. You navigate Conrad over the platforms, performing various moves. You can simply jump or do a longer run-and-jump, run, climb, hang off ledges, and pick up objects lying on the ground. To defend yourself, you shoot enemies with your gun and also use various objects (such as stones) to harm or to distract them.
Flashback - The Quest for Identity (USA).desc:
時間是 2142 年。你扮演 Conrad B. Hart，一個失去記憶的人。康拉德的自行車險些逃離敵對的外星人後，在一個未知的星球上墜毀。康拉德發現自己身處叢林，從現在開始，他開始尋求生存和失去的身份。

《閃回》是一款平台動作冒險遊戲。你在平台上導航康拉德，執行各種動作。你可以簡單地跳躍或進行更長的跑跳、奔跑、攀爬、懸掛在壁架上以及撿起地上的物體。為了保護自己，你可以用槍射擊敵人，也可以使用各種物體（例如石頭）來傷害或分散他們的注意力。

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie.key: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie (USA)
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie.original_name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Movie
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie.name: 強大的嗎啡恐龍戰隊：電影
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie.original_desc:
This game is loosely based off of the movie of the same name, where the player can take control of either the Yellow, Black, Pink, Blue, Red or White Ranger in a side-scrolling beat-em-up in an attempt to stop the evil Ivan Ooze who is trying to control the universe.

There are six different levels to play in each with their own standard obstacles and enemies, mid-level bosses and of course end bosses that range from Mordant, Lord Zedd to Ivan Ooze himself.
