There are no weapons that can be used, instead the player must rely on kicks and punches to dispatch enemies and pick up health items left behind.

Additionally, the Yellow, Black, Pink Rangers are extremely fast and can jump into higher areas but are more weaker than Blue, Red, White Rangers who are much stronger, but lack the speed and jumping abilities of the other Rangers.  Players can refill their health by picking up heart icons and power icons to increase their morphing meter.  Once filled, the morphing meter will increase the Rangers power, attack capabilities, speed and jumping abilities.
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie.desc:
這款遊戲大致改編自同名電影，玩家可以在橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲中控制黃色、黑色、粉色、藍色、紅色或白色遊俠，試圖阻止試圖控制宇宙的邪惡伊万·軟泥。

有六個不同的關卡可供遊玩，每個關卡都有自己的標準障礙和敵人、中級 Boss，當然還有終端 Boss，從 Mordant、Lord Zedd 到 Ivan Ooze 本人。沒有可以使用的武器，玩家必須依靠拳打腳踢來消滅敵人並拾取留下的生命物品。

此外，黃、黑、粉紅遊騎兵速度極快，可以跳到更高的區域，但比藍、紅、白遊騎兵更弱，藍、紅、白遊騎兵更強，但缺乏其他遊騎兵的速度和跳躍能力。玩家可以通過拾取心形圖標和力量圖標來補充生命值，以增加變形計。一旦充滿，變形計將增加遊騎兵的力量、攻擊能力、速度和跳躍能力。

Syndicate (USA).name: 辛迪加
Syndicate (USA).original_desc: In Syndicate you play as a ruthless field commander in a dystopian future where mega-corporations rule the world. With a team of four cyber-enhanced agents, you carry out real-time missions to assassinate enemies, capture targets, or take control of territories. Money earned from conquered regions funds your research, weapon upgrades, and agent enhancements. There is no diplomacy – only power, control, and firepower.
Syndicate (USA).desc: 在《辛迪加》中，你在反烏托邦的未來中扮演一名無情的戰地指揮官，那裡的巨型企業統治著世界。與四名網絡增強特工組成的團隊一起，您可以執行暗殺敵人、捕獲目標或控制領土的實時任務。從被征服的地區賺取的金錢可以資助你的研究、武器升級和特工增強。沒有外交——只有權力、控制和火力。

King Arthur's World (USA).name: 亞瑟王的世界
King Arthur's World (USA).original_desc:
This is a 2D side scrolling strategy game.  You take the role of King Arthur and lead your army into battle against evil.  You'll travel to many worlds including fighting dark knights, underworld orcs, and cloud giants.  One of the few games that is Super NES Mouse capable.

You are given a certain amount of troops each level.  Passwords are used to save your progress between levels.  The levels have enemies you must thwart, traps you should avoid, and gold to be won.
King Arthur's World (USA).desc:
這是一款2D橫向捲軸策略遊戲。你扮演亞瑟王的角色，帶領你的軍隊與邪惡勢力作戰。你將前往許多世界，包括與黑闇騎士、地下獸人和雲巨人戰鬥。少數支持 Super NES 鼠標的遊戲之一。

每個級別都會給你一定數量的軍隊。密碼用於保存您在關卡之間的進度。這些關卡有你必須阻止的敵人、你應該避免的陷阱以及你要贏得的金幣。

Jungle Book, The (USA).name: 叢林之書
Jungle Book, The (USA).original_desc:
Based on the famous animated movie, Walt Disney's The Jungle Book is a platform game where you control Mowgli, the boy who was raised by wild animals deep in the jungles. Your goal is to find the human village so you may you join your kin once again. 

Mowgli is an athletic individual, and can jump, run, swing on vines or climb them without any problems. Most of the animals he comes upon, however, are inexplicably hostile, so he must defend himself with a variety of thrown weapons, such as bananas and boomerangs. 

To complete each level, Mowgli must collect a number of crystals (how many - it depends on the difficulty levels) within a time limit. A compass in the corner of the screen helps him by showing the direction where the nearest crystal is.
Jungle Book, The (USA).desc:
改編自著名動畫電影，華特迪士尼的《叢林之書》是一款平台遊戲，您可以在其中控制莫格利，一個在叢林深處由野生動物撫養長大的男孩。你的目標是找到人類村莊，以便再次與你的親人團聚。

莫格利是一個運動型的人，可以毫無問題地跳躍、奔跑、在藤蔓上盪鞦韆或攀爬。然而，他遇到的大多數動物都具有莫名的敵意，因此他必須使用各種投擲武器來保護自己，例如香蕉和迴旋鏢。

為了完成每個關卡，莫格利必須在規定的時間內收集一定數量的水晶（多少 - 這取決於難度級別）。屏幕一角的指南針可以幫助他顯示最近的水晶所在的方向。

Rendering Ranger R2 (Japan) (En).name: 渲染遊俠 R2
Rendering Ranger R2 (Japan) (En).original_desc: Multidirectionally scrolling action shooter. The main character runs through science fiction scenarios blasting away everything that moves. Starting with only a single shot,  5 different upgradable weapon systems can be collected as extras. Upon death, the last activated system loses one increment of its current upgrade status, but can be refueled by additional extras collected. Every weapon has also a massive 'smart' bomb feature, wiping out mostly everything on screen at once if invoked. There are also some R-Type style space shooter levels thrown in for good measurement. Very arcady with tons of action. Several boss monsters per level. Level progress is saved via password feature.
Rendering Ranger R2 (Japan) (En).desc: 多向滾動動作射擊遊戲。主角在科幻場景中奔跑，炸毀一切移動的東西。從一次射擊開始，可以收集 5 種不同的可升級武器系統作為額外武器。死亡後，最後激活的系統會失去當前升級狀態的一個增量，但可以通過收集的額外額外內容來補充能量。每種武器還具有巨大的“智能”炸彈功能，一旦調用，就會立即消滅屏幕上的所有內容。為了便於測量，還添加了一些 R 型太空射擊遊戲關卡。非常Arcady，有大量的動作。每個級別有幾個頭目怪物。關卡進度通過密碼功能保存。

Mickey Mania - The Timeless Adventures o.key: Mickey Mania - The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse (USA)
Mickey Mania - The Timeless Adventures o.original_name: Mickey Mania : The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse
Mickey Mania - The Timeless Adventures o.name: 米奇狂熱：米老鼠的永恆冒險
Mickey Mania - The Timeless Adventures o.original_desc:
Mickey Mouse gets a chance to go down memory lane and walk through the timeless adventures he has lived. Mickey Mania is a platformer where all the levels are based on Mickey's most famous cartoons. The levels range about 75 years, starting off with "Steamboat Willie" and going all the way to "The Prince and the Pauper".

The gameplay consists mostly of jumping and marble throwing at enemies, with an occasional puzzle element.
Mickey Mania - The Timeless Adventures o.desc:
米奇老鼠有機會沿著記憶的軌跡，走過他經歷過的永恆的冒險。Mickey Mania 是一款平台遊戲，所有關卡均以米奇最著名的卡通片為基礎。關卡範圍約為 75 年，從《威利汽船》開始，一直到《王子與乞丐》。

遊戲玩法主要包括跳躍和向敵人投擲彈珠，偶爾還有解謎元素。

Aero Fighters (USA).name: 航空戰鬥機
Aero Fighters (USA).original_desc: The world's hope hinges on your combat skills and sheer determination as an "aero fighter". Defend the world from unknown alien forces that are attempting to take over the world. You must extract these unknown forces before they can execute their plot for dominance. After conquering the unknown forces, the battle continues into space where the "controlling intellect" dictated the take-over attempt. You must seek and destroy this evil force to prevent it from seizing other worlds.
Aero Fighters (USA).desc: 世界的希望取決於你作為“航空戰士”的戰鬥技巧和堅定決心。保衛世界免受試圖佔領世界的未知外星勢力的侵害。你必須在這些未知勢力執行他們的統治陰謀之前將其消滅。征服未知力量後，戰鬥繼續進入太空，“控制智力”決定了接管嘗試。你必須尋找並摧毀這股邪惡力量，防止它佔領其他世界。

Lufia & the Fortress of Doom (USA).name: 露菲亞與末日要塞
Lufia & the Fortress of Doom (USA).original_desc:
The hero Maxim and his group defeat the Sinistrals on Mt. Doom (as portrayed in Lufia II), and all is peaceful.  With such a great peace, the defense forces of the world become lax.  One hundred years later attacks begin taking place, supposedly by the Sinistrals.  It's up to the descendant of the hero, and his childhood friend Lufia, to form a new band of champions to save the world.
     Gameplay is fairly standard for RPGs, with turn-based battling by way of a menu of icons, and random battles.  There's also a higher-than-normal emphasis on puzzles within dungeons.
Lufia & the Fortress of Doom (USA).desc:
英雄馬克西姆和他的團隊在末日山上擊敗了西尼斯特拉人（如《盧菲亞 II》中所描繪的那樣），一切歸於平靜。有了這麼大的和平，世界的防禦力量就變得鬆懈了。一百年後，襲擊開始發生，據稱是由西尼斯特拉人發起的。英雄的後裔和他兒時的朋友露菲亞將組建一支新的冠軍隊伍來拯救世界。
遊戲玩法對於角色扮演遊戲來說是相當標準的，通過圖標菜單進行回合製戰鬥，以及隨機戰鬥。地下城中的謎題也比平常更加受到重視。

Fatal Fury 2 (USA).name: 餓狼傳說2
Fatal Fury 2 (USA).original_desc:
It's time for 20 megs of non-stop action, with another super-hot arcade game for your Super Nintendo. Rejoin the brothers Andy and Terry Bogard, with their friend Joe Higashi as they discover that FATAL FURY was just a warm up! Now they must face the meanest, most dangerous fighters ever assembled!

Choose from among 8 fierce opponents: from Big Bear - the savage unmasked wrestler to Mai Shiranui-the female beauty with mystical arts of the Ninja. Battle through Thailand, Spain, Australia and many other locations. Feature packed, and filled with all the hard-hitting action you'd expect from Takara's Fighting Series. Unique 3D movements enable you to move and fight both in foreground and background - in way NO other street fighting game can. This game rocks with huge, blazing arcade style graphics and faster animation that ever before! The question is - are you up to a new challenge?
Fatal Fury 2 (USA).desc:
是時候體驗 20 兆的不間斷動作了，為您的超級任天堂帶來另一款超熱門街機遊戲。重新加入安迪·博加德和特里·博加德兄弟以及他們的朋友東喬，他們發現《餓狼傳說》只是熱身而已！現在他們必鬚麵對有史以來最卑鄙、最危險的戰士！

從 8 名兇猛的對手中進行選擇：從野蠻的裸露摔跤手大熊到具有忍者神秘藝術的女性美女不知火舞。穿越泰國、西班牙、澳大利亞和許多其他地點。功能豐富，充滿了您在 Takara 的格鬥系列中所期待的所有猛烈動作。獨特的 3D 動作使您能夠在前景和背景中移動和戰鬥 - 這是其他街頭格鬥遊戲無法做到的。這款遊戲擁有巨大、絢麗的街機風格圖形和前所未有的更快動畫！問題是——你準備好迎接新的挑戰了嗎？

Goof Troop (USA).name: 穿幫隊
Goof Troop (USA).original_desc:
Goofy and his son Max were enjoying a peaceful day of fishing, when Keelhaul Pete absconds with Pete and PJ. 

Now it's up to Goofy and Max to travel to Spoonerville Island and venture through the jungle to rescue their friends. As either character, you'll take on an army of surly swashbucklers as you dodge exploding cannon balls and search dank dungeons on your way to the final showdown with Keelhaul Pete.

Along the way, you'll have to dig for treasure and solve puzzles to find the keys that will allow you to enter the pirate's hideout and face Pete.
Goof Troop (USA).desc:
高飛和他的兒子麥克斯正在享受平靜的釣魚日，這時基爾哈爾·皮特帶著皮特和 PJ 潛逃了。

現在，高飛和麥克斯要前往斯普納維爾島，冒險穿越叢林，營救他們的朋友。作為任一角色，你都將面對一支乖戾的虛張聲勢的軍隊，躲避爆炸的砲彈並蒐索潮濕的地牢，與 Keelhaul Pete 進行最後的對決。

一路上，你必須挖掘寶藏並解決謎題，找到鑰匙，從而進入海盜的藏身處並面對皮特。

Ys III - Wanderers from Ys (USA).name: 伊蘇 III : 伊甦的流浪者
Ys III - Wanderers from Ys (USA).original_desc:
Adol's long time friend, Dogi wishes to return to his home town of Redmont after hearing about strange disturbances that are happening there.  Always looking for an adventure, Adol joins him and soon finds out the cause of this new evil.

Ys III breaks away from the "bumping into enemies" battle system of the first two games and allows Adol to control his sword in a variety of directions.  As well as changing the battle system, the game is now side scrolling instead of the previous games top-down view. Adol also now has the ability to jump.  Not new to the series is the use of magical rings which give Adol different powering up abilities such as healing and shielding.  The game also uses various key items found along the way to solve minor puzzles and progress the story.
Ys III - Wanderers from Ys (USA).desc:
阿道爾的老朋友多吉在聽說雷蒙特的家鄉發生了奇怪的騷亂後，希望回到他的家鄉。一直在尋找冒險的阿多爾加入了他的行列，很快就發現了這種新邪惡的原因。

《伊蘇3》擺脫了前兩作“撞到敵人”的戰鬥系統，讓阿特魯可以向多個方向控制他的劍。除了改變戰鬥系統之外，遊戲現在是橫向滾動的，而不是之前遊戲的自上而下的視圖。阿杜爾現在也有了跳躍的能力。該系列並不新鮮的是魔法戒指的使用，它賦予阿道爾不同的能力，例如治療和屏蔽。遊戲還使用沿途發現的各種關鍵物品來解決小謎題並推動故事發展。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournament Fighters (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles : Tournament Fighters
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.name: 忍者神龜：錦標賽戰士
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.original_desc:
The game features the original 4 turtles from the previous games in the series, as well as other fighters.

The game is very much in the tradition of the Mortal Kombat or Street Fighter series, pitting you against opponents one at a time. Some fighters (besides the turtles) will be familiar, such as the Rat King, or even Shredder (now called "Cyber-Shredder" here).

Though even people familiar with the turtles will see differences in them. They can now, for example, do moves involving projectiles, such as "fireballs".

The game's modes include a story mode, where you can only pick one of the turtles and go on fighting opponents in order to rescue April and Splinter, and a tournament mode, where you fight only for the fame and money.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tournamen.desc:
該遊戲以該系列前作中的 4 只海龜以及其他戰士為特色。

這款遊戲非常繼承《真人快打》或《街頭霸王》系列的傳統，讓你一次與一個對手對抗。有些戰士（除了海龜）會很熟悉，例如鼠王，甚至粉碎機（現在在這裡稱為“網絡粉碎機”）。

儘管即使是熟悉海龜的人也會看到它們的差異。例如，他們現在可以進行涉及投射物的動作，例如“火球”。

遊戲的模式包括故事模式和錦標賽模式，在故事模式中，你只能選擇一隻烏龜並繼續與對手戰鬥，以營救艾普麗爾和斯普林特，在錦標賽模式中，你只為名譽和金錢而戰。

Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems (.key: Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems (USA)
Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems (.original_name: Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems
Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems (.name: 寶石戰爭中的漫威超級英雄
Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems (.original_desc:
Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems is a side-scrolling platformer/beat 'em up based on the Infinity Gauntlet storyline from the comics.  Adam Warlock calls on the heroes to recover the 6 Infinity Gems before they are used for evil.

You may choose ones of five heroes: Spider-Man, Hulk, Captain America, Iron Man and Wolverine.  Each one has different stats and abilities.  (i.e. Spider-Man is agile. Hulk is strong, Iron Man can double-jump with his rocket boots, etc.)  Initially you can choose a training area in Avenger headquarters or four levels.  As you complete levels, most open up.  Each hero can be equipped with gems to boost their abilities in each section.  These must be obtained by finding them in the levels.

Gameplay is fairly similar to X-Men-Mutant Apocalypse.  Combat is all on a 2D plane.  Each hero has basic jumps and attacks and special moves that can be executed with button combinations like quarter-rolls.  Enemies include various villains from the Marvel Universe and evil doubles of various Marvel heroes.
Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems (.desc:
Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems 是一款基於漫畫《無限手套》故事情節的橫向捲軸平台遊戲/清版遊戲。術士亞當號召英雄們在 6 顆無限寶石被用於邪惡之前收回它們。

您可以從五位英雄中選擇一位：蜘蛛俠、綠巨人、美國隊長、鋼鐵俠和金剛狼。每個人都有不同的統計數據和能力。（即蜘蛛俠敏捷。綠巨人強大，鋼鐵俠可以用火箭靴進行二段跳等）最初你可以選擇復仇者總部的訓練區域或四個級別。當你完成關卡時，大多數都會開放。每個英雄都可以配備寶石來增強他們在每個部分的能力。這些必須通過在關卡中找到它們來獲得。

遊戲玩法與《X戰警：變種人啟示錄》非常相似。戰斗全部在 2D 平面上進行。每個英雄都有基本的跳躍和攻擊以及特殊動作，可以通過四分之一滾動等按鈕組合來執行。敵人包括漫威宇宙中的各種惡棍和各種漫威英雄的邪惡替身。

Daffy Duck - The Marvin Missions (USA).name: 達菲鴨：馬文任務
Daffy Duck - The Marvin Missions (USA).original_desc:
Based on Chuck Jones' Looney Tunes character, Daffy Duck, Daffy Duck: The Marvin Missions sees Daffy in his quirky "Duck Dodgers" spin-off persona, also known as "Duck Dodgers in the 24th and 1/2 Century!".

In this game, Duck Dodgers sets out to stop Marvin the Martian from performing various notorious deeds, including destroying his beloved home-planet, Earth. There seems to be only one way to stop Marvin - and that's to destroy all five of his deadly machines!

Gameplay-wise, this is a standard platforming affair. However, you can also shoot at your enemies using an array of weapons, fly around with your jet-pack and defend enemy fire with your shield.
Daffy Duck - The Marvin Missions (USA).desc:
《達菲鴨：馬文任務》以查克·瓊斯 (Chuck Jones) 的樂一通 (Looney Tunes) 角色達菲鴨 (Daffy Duck) 為藍本，在《達菲鴨：馬文任務》中，達菲以他古怪的“鴨子道奇隊”衍生角色，也被稱為“24 和 1/2 世紀的鴨子道奇隊！”。

在這款遊戲中，Duck Dodgers 著手阻止火星人馬文做出各種臭名昭著的行為，包括摧毀他心愛的家園地球。似乎只有一種方法可以阻止馬文——那就是摧毀他所有的五台致命機器！

從遊戲玩法來看，這是一個標準的平台遊戲。然而，你也可以使用一系列武器向敵人射擊，使用噴氣背包飛行，並使用盾牌防禦敵人的火力。

Super Mario Kart (USA).name: 瑪利歐賽車8
Super Mario Kart (USA).original_desc:
A collection of Super Mario characters, including Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Peach, Bowser and Donkey Kong Jr., are out to win the Super Mario Kart championship. Using Mode 7 scaling, the first true kart game on the SNES has you collecting coins to boost your speed while using shells and bananas to stop others on the track. 

There are 4 cups in all to race for, Mushroom Cup, Flower Cup, Star Cup and Special Cup, each with a selection of tracks to race on (based in Bowser's Castle, Super Mario World and more). Plus, a 2 player battle mode is on offer, where the first to pop the three balloons wins.
Super Mario Kart (USA).desc:
包括馬里奧、路易吉、耀西、桃子、庫巴和小金剛在內的一系列超級馬里奧角色將爭奪超級馬里奧卡丁車冠軍。使用模式 7 縮放，SNES 上的第一款真正的卡丁車遊戲讓你收集硬幣來提高你的速度，同時使用貝殼和香蕉來阻止賽道上的其他人。

總共有 4 個杯子可供爭奪：蘑菇杯、花朵杯、星星杯和特別杯，每個杯子都有一系列可供比賽的賽道（以庫巴城堡、超級馬里奧世界等為背景）。另外，還提供 2 人戰鬥模式，第一個戳破三個氣球的人獲勝。

P.T.O. - Pacific Theater of Operations (.name: 取力器：太平洋戰區
P.T.O. - Pacific Theater of Operations (.original_desc: P.T.O is another military sim from KOEI.  In this game you can choose to be either Japan or the Allies.  By managing your fleets and ordering new warships you can control many different sides of the conflict.  (ship development, Base defense, Fleet arrangement, Direct battle control, Economic decisions)  There are many different options of play in PTO, you can choose to play from one of many different famous battles or you can play the campaign.  You can control one side or both.  There are also limited controls on victory conditions.
P.T.O. - Pacific Theater of Operations (.desc: P.T.O 是 KOEI 的另一款軍事模擬遊戲。在這個遊戲中你可以選擇是日本還是同盟國。通過管理你的艦隊和訂購新戰艦，你可以控制衝突的許多不同方面。（艦船開發、基地防禦、艦隊佈置、直接戰鬥控制、經濟決策） PTO中有許多不同的玩法選項，您可以選擇從許多不同的著名戰役之一進行遊戲，也可以進行戰役。您可以控制一側或兩側。對勝利條件的控制也有限。

Jikkyou Oshaberi Parodius (Japan).name: 實時聊天模仿雨
Jikkyou Oshaberi Parodius (Japan).original_desc:
The third in the Paroidus series, it's the same gameplay and zaniness that substantiated the first two games. Gameplay itself is a copy (a parody rather) of Konami's famous Gradius series in that the screen scrolls from left to right (most times) and you maneuver around the screen destroying waves of enemies and avoiding obstacles. Unlike previous Parodius titles, this game contains a difficulty adjustment option, allowing the player to make things easier... or harder. Also unique to this parodius title is a bit of japanese digital voice that shouts out various things at you while you play. Survival throughout the level earns you a boss fight, which frequently includes some of the strangest characters in the game. Make no mistake, this *is* Gradius,  but with all sorts of strange graphics, music and references to other Konami games... So in other words, it's Parodius!

There are now more power-ups than ever including the standard power-up (red, used to upgrade weapons), the shield power-up (blue) and a variety of different coloured bells. Green Bells will make you huge on the screen, Yellow Bells are worth points (points in turn are worth extra lives),  Blue Bells are "big bombs" that clear the screen of enemies/shots and can be saved until you need them, White Bells will give your character a megaphone that will shout out japanese phrases, the characters of the phrases themselves can be used to damage enemies (the power of words!), The Red Bell stockpiles you with three point-defense lasers... only one of which can be activated at a time and disappear after a short while. Finally the purple bell will clear the screen of all but the strongest enemies... and will turn them into power-ups.

This time around there are 16 different characters to chose from and the power-ups and weapons that they use are more unique than ever. Several familiar "faces" return and they've brought along friends to share in the party:
Vic Viper: The "gradius ship" appears once again in this gradius parody, equipped with it's traditional gradius weapons
2. Lord British: The "other" Gradius ship and arguably the more famous of the two. Lord British has weapons similar to Vic but quite different also.Missiles and shields work differently for instance. And Lord British uses a Ripple gun instead of a double shot.
3. Pentaro: It just wouldn't be a Parodius game if Pentaro wasn't involved. Originally from Konami's Penguin Adventure, Pentaro retains the same abilities from previous Parodius games... however his Potion weapon may now hit multiple enemies and his normal weapon shots explode against obstacles
4. Hanako: Also from Penguin Adventure, Hanako the penguin is Pentaro's girlfriend. While Pentaro is blue, she is the red penguin. She plays nearly identical to Pentaro with the exception of her S. Bomb weapon
5. Twinbee: Twinbee, from the Twinbee games is another returning Parodius star. Unfortunately he hasn't been upgraded since previous games, so his weapons are nearly identical; Punching Glove Rocket and all...
6. Winbee: Winbee, also from Twinbee is red and has moves identical to Twinbee, except for one difference... when she has 3 Options available, she can power them up to harm enemies that touch them.
7. Tako: Again, it just wouldn't be a parodius game without a flying octopus. And here he is, still wearing a baseball cap, but otherwise unchanged from previous Parodius games.
8. Belial: A yellow female octopus with a bow in her hair, she is identical to Tako with the exception of her Missile and Double weapons... which are instead identical to the Vic Viper.
9. Soitsu: A stickman (now green) surfing aboard a paper airplane, Soitsu plays similar to Koitsu from the previous game, aside from his colour. His laser weapon is able to charge up to deliver more power and he drops little stickmen onto the ground which occasionally dance around rather than attacking. Additionally he has an "upgrade power" (S. Power) that make all his other abilities stronger
10. Doitsu: Similar to Soitsu but with a Double Laser ability. He is an orange stickman riding on a paper airplane and no "upgrade" power, using normal options instead
11. Upa: Upa aka The Flying Baby is back from the previous Parodius game (as well as his original game, Bokutte Upa) and plays nearly the same. Instead of a shield, he has a Mega Crush power that damages all on-screen enemies... and also has an "Upgrade Power" in the form of Grade Up that makes his other abilities stronger.
12. Rupa: Another flying baby (presumably also from Bokutte Upa), Rupa plays similar tot Upa but with a Multi Spread gun which fires missiles in multiple directions (with each upgrade) and a S.Vulcan gun which automatically aims towards enemies.
13. Mike: A cute little kitten who happens to to have a very powerful wave weapon which can travel through obstacles and enemies. Additionally he has a multiple bomb ability which requires his "upgrade ability" (Grade Up) to get really powerful
14. Rani: Another cute kitten (this one rolled onto his bottom facing forward) with very power weaponry. Some of the highlights include a Reflect weapon wherein the shots bounce off of obstacles. Another is the S laser which travels forward but then homes in Up or Down to hit the enemy. And finally, Rani's missile weapon is two homing bells. Rani also has an "upgrade ability" in the form of Grade Up, however it only upgrades the Reflect Shot.
15. Memim: One of the fairy characters, Memim is a female flying girl with standard female bikini clothing. She carries some unique missile weapons however, whose direction is determined by Memim's current location on the screen when fired.
16. Sue: The other fairy with tight clothing, Sue is unique in that her weapons are upgraded/displayed in a different order from everybody else's in the game. For instance her Option is the 4th weapon on the list rather than the 6th... requiring less power-ups to activate it. However aside from that... all of her weapons are the exact same as the Vic Viper's.

Flintstones, The - The Treasure of Sierr.key: Flintstones, The - The Treasure of Sierra Madrock (USA)
Flintstones, The - The Treasure of Sierr.original_name: The Flintstones : The Treasure of Sierra Madrock
Flintstones, The - The Treasure of Sierr.name: 摩登原始人:馬德羅克山脈的寶藏
Flintstones, The - The Treasure of Sierr.original_desc:
The Great Poobah has retired and is looking for a successor. Since there are so many candidates, it is decided that the person who finds the Great Treasure of Sierra Madrock will become the new Great Poobah.
The player takes control over Fred and Barney who also participate in the treasure hunt in order to make Fred the New Great Poobah.

The Flintstones: The Treasure of Sierra Madrock is a side-scrolling platformer that includes several board game elements. On a world map, Fred and Barney  throw dices to determine how many fields they can move. 

There are different fields that hold different challenges.

Most fields require you to finish a side-scrolling platforming level. Fred and Barney can jump, club their enemies and climb trees or stone pillars. Holding down the jump button lets them hover in the air for a short moment. Throughout the levels, different power-ups and items can be found: clamps are used as money, apples replenish some health, 100 stars grant an extra life to Barney or Fred and an empty Heart frame increases their life bar.

On fields marked with a skull, a boss has to be defeated. 

Heart fields hold bonus games in which you have to collect as many items as possible within the time limit.

At amusement parks, several mini-games can be played to win items or extra lives. Mini-games include: Memory; Balls O' Fun", where you can win items by throwing a ball at them; a mini-game in which you have to stop monkeys from climbing down trees and stealing your items by hitting them with coconuts and others.

In Cafes you can buy food to replenish your health.

In stadiums you can participate in special challenges (3D cart races for example), in order to gain new abilities such as double jumps.

While stadiums, cafes and amusement parks can be revisited, all other levels only need to be finished once.

Fred and Barney are not the only characters that move about the playing field. You will also run into their wives Betty and Thelma as well as other characters that are also looking for the treasure. When Fred or Barney encounter their wives, they are dragged a few fields back. Other characters give them useful items if you can beat them at a challenge (usually a race).

Other notable features are a password system and a competitive 2-player mode.
Flintstones, The - The Treasure of Sierr.desc:
大普巴已經退休，正在尋找繼任者。由於候選者眾多，因此決定，找到馬德羅克山脈大寶藏的人將成為新的大普巴。
玩家控制弗雷德和巴尼，他們也參與尋寶活動，以使弗雷德成為新大普巴。

《摩登原始人：馬德洛克山脈的寶藏》是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，包含多個棋盤遊戲元素。在世界地圖上，弗雷德和巴尼擲骰子來決定他們可以移動多少塊土地。

不同的領域面臨著不同的挑戰。

大多數領域都要求您完成橫向捲軸平台關卡。弗雷德和巴尼可以跳躍、用棍棒攻擊敵人、爬樹或石柱。按住跳躍按鈕可以讓他們在空中懸停一小會兒。在整個關卡中，可以找到不同的能量提升和物品：夾子用作金錢，蘋果補充一些生命值，100 顆星星為巴尼或弗雷德提供額外的生命，空的心框增加了他們的生命條。

在標有頭骨的場地上，必須擊敗 Boss。

心田有獎勵遊戲，您必須在限定時間內收集盡可能多的物品。

在遊樂園裡，可以玩一些迷你游戲來贏得物品或額外的生命。小遊戲包括： 記憶； Balls O' Fun”，您可以通過向猴子扔球來贏得物品；在這款迷你游戲中，您必須用椰子等擊打猴子來阻止猴子爬下樹並偷走您的物品。

在咖啡館你可以購買食物來補充你的健康。

在體育場內，您可以參加特殊挑戰（例如 3D 賽車比賽），以獲得雙跳等新能力。

雖然體育場、咖啡館和遊樂園可以重新訪問，但所有其他級別只需要完成一次。

弗雷德和巴尼並不是唯一在賽場上移動的角色。您還會遇到他們的妻子貝蒂和塞爾瑪以及其他也在尋找寶藏的角色。當弗雷德或巴尼遇到他們的妻子時，他們被拖回幾田地。如果你能在挑戰（通常是比賽）中擊敗其他角色，他們就會給他們有用的物品。

其他值得注意的功能包括密碼系統和競爭性 2 人遊戲模式。

Tetris 2 (USA) (Rev 1).name: 俄羅斯方塊2
Tetris 2 (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: Unlike the original Tetris, Tetris 2 has you clearing the field of blocks in a different way. Each play field starts with different colored dots (in this case black, gray and white), with one of each color flashing. The blocks are made up of the same three colors, and by matching blocks of the same color over the top or to the side of the dot will clear the dot and those blocks from the screen. If you clear a flashing dot, all the corresponding dots of the same color will be cleared. To complete the round just clear the dots, not the blocks themselves.
Tetris 2 (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 與原版俄羅斯方塊不同，俄羅斯方塊 2 讓您以不同的方式清除方塊。每個遊戲區域都以不同顏色的點（在本例中為黑色、灰色和白色）開始，每種顏色中的一個會閃爍。這些塊由相同的三種顏色組成，通過將相同顏色的塊匹配到點的頂部或側面，可以清除屏幕上的點和這些塊。如果清除一個閃爍的點，則所有相應的相同顏色的點都將被清除。要完成這一輪，只需清除點，而不是塊本身。

Space Megaforce (USA).name: 太空巨力
Space Megaforce (USA).original_desc:
Compile's Aleste series lands on the SNES with the appropriately named Super Aleste. Taking the role of a lone starfighter pilot, you are tasked with destroying an evil alien armada in standard 2D shooter fashion. And while you may be alone, you certainly won't be underpowered, with eight different types of weapons, each having six power-up levels for a grand total of 48 firing modes (not counting bomb power-ups) Super Aleste boasts one of the largest arsenals in 2D shooter history.

Gameplay is single-player only with 3 difficulty levels. Also included is a short campaign with different levels that plays mostly like a "survival" mode with the objective being to outlast the time limit and rack the most points.
Space Megaforce (USA).desc:
Compile 的 Aleste 系列登陸 SNES，並命名為 Super Aleste。扮演一名孤獨的星際戰鬥機飛行員，您的任務是以標準 2D 射擊遊戲的方式摧毀邪惡的外星艦隊。雖然你可能獨自一人，但你肯定不會動力不足，擁有八種不同類型的武器，每種武器都有六個強化級別，總共 48 種射擊模式（不包括炸彈強化）Super Aleste 擁有 2D 射擊遊戲歷史上最大的武器庫之一。

遊戲玩法僅為單人遊戲，有 3 個難度級別。還包括一個具有不同級別的簡短活動，其玩法主要類似於“生存”模式，其目標是在時間限制內堅持下去並獲得最多分數。

S.O.S - Sink or Swim (USA).name: S.O.S：沉沒或游泳
S.O.S - Sink or Swim (USA).original_desc:
Your name is Kevin Codner – rescue mariner extraordinaire, answering the distress call of a sinking cruise liner, the SS Lucifer. You set off in your little submarine and board the ship where a horde of passengers desperately need your keen oversight and "shipsmarts".

In 60 levels you have to rescue as many passengers (dubbed the Dim Passengers) as possible. At the beginning the passengers fall through a tube in the level. Similar to Lemmings you have to find a way for the passengers to the exit of the level. In order to do so, you must blast hindrances such cargo boxes and bulkheads with bombs or, when no bombs are left, reposition the boxes with a crane. There are also conveyor belts in the levels. If the belt moves in the wrong way, the passengers either can't use it or may even be transported to their dooms, being dropped off into water, fire or steam jets. You can usually choose the direction of the belts by pulling a lever.
S.O.S - Sink or Swim (USA).desc:
你的名字叫凱文·科德納 (Kevin Codner)，一位傑出的救援水手，正在響應一艘正在沉沒的遊輪 SS Lucifer 的求救信號。你乘坐你的小型潛艇出發，登上船上，一群乘客迫切需要你敏銳的監督和“船舶智能”。

在 60 個關卡中，您必須營救盡可能多的乘客（稱為昏暗乘客）。一開始，乘客會從層中的管道中掉下來。與旅鼠類似，你必須找到讓乘客到達關卡出口的方法。為此，您必須用炸彈炸毀貨箱和艙壁等障礙物，或者在沒有炸彈時，用起重機重新放置箱子。關卡中還設有傳送帶。如果安全帶以錯誤的方式移動，乘客要么無法使用它，要么甚至可能被扔進水、火或蒸汽噴射器中，走向滅亡。您通常可以通過拉動控制桿來選擇安全帶的方向。

Super Bomberman 2 (USA).name: 超級炸彈人2
Super Bomberman 2 (USA).original_desc:
This is the second game in the Bomberman series for the Super Nintendo.  This game is much like the first in gameplay but has new levels and a new story to play though.

The graphics are slightly different from the first game but in general the game holds most of the same style as the first.  There are a few new features such as colour coded bomb blasts and a few different powerups but other than that the second game is the same as the first.
Super Bomberman 2 (USA).desc:
這是超級任天堂的炸彈人系列的第二款遊戲。這款遊戲的玩法與第一款非常相似，但有新的關卡和新的故事可供玩。

圖形與第一款遊戲略有不同，但總的來說，遊戲與第一款遊戲的風格大部分相同。有一些新功能，例如顏色編碼的炸彈爆炸和一些不同的能量提升，但除此之外，第二個遊戲與第一個遊戲相同。

Humans, The (Europe).name: 人類
Humans, The (Europe).original_desc:
Your job in this action puzzler is to help prehistoric man to evolve by helping them discover tools, the wheel, weapons, or even fire. Each level in the game will have a given task to help in this, and you are allotted a number of characters who must accomplish the task. The player can switch from person to person while moving the characters around each scrolling puzzle, and teamwork is essential to success.  

Tasks can include finding objects (like a spear) on the screen, or trying to reach a specific destination which may require the use of objects you have discovered so far. Each level has a time limit, when time runs out the level can be restarted.
Humans, The (Europe).desc:
在這款動作益智遊戲中，你的任務是幫助史前人類發現工具、輪子、武器，甚至火，從而幫助他們進化。遊戲中的每個級別都會有一個給定的任務來幫助完成此任務，並且您會被分配一些必須完成該任務的角色。玩家可以在每個滾動謎題中移動角色的同時從一個人切換到另一個人，團隊合作對於成功至關重要。

任務可以包括在屏幕上尋找物體（如矛），或者嘗試到達可能需要使用您迄今為止發現的物體的特定目的地。每個關卡都有時間限制，時間耗儘後可以重新開始關卡。

Pocky & Rocky 2 (USA).name: 百奇與洛奇 2
Pocky & Rocky 2 (USA).original_desc:
The sequel to Pocky & Rocky brings back the cooperative shooter action to the SNES with enhanced gameplay mechanics. Princess Luna has been kidnapped by a gang of evil demons and its up to Shinto priestess Pocky and her raccoon buddy Rocky to rescue her.

As in the previous game, the gameplay involves taking control of either character to clear stage after stage of enemies in classic top-down shooter manner by blasting them with your magic cards or other collectable unique powers. New for the sequel is the ability to play with optional AI-controlled partners that add team-up special moves required to beat certain bosses as well as unique abilities that take the game in different directions (opening locks, or digging to get to the underworld sections of each stage for instance).
Pocky & Rocky 2 (USA).desc:
《Pocky & Rocky》的續作將合作射擊遊戲帶回了 SNES，並增強了遊戲機制。露娜公主被一群邪惡的惡魔綁架，神道教女祭司波基和她的浣熊夥伴洛基必須拯救她。

與前一款遊戲一樣，遊戲玩法包括控制任一角色，以經典的自上而下的射擊遊戲方式，用魔法卡或其他可收集的獨特力量爆破敵人，從而清除階段又階段的敵人。續作的新功能是能夠與可選的人工智能控制的伙伴一起玩，這些夥伴增加了擊敗某些老闆所需的團隊特殊動作，以及將游戲帶向不同方向的獨特能力（例如打開鎖，或挖掘以到達每個階段的地下世界部分）。

X-Men - Mutant Apocalypse (USA).name: X戰警:變種人啟示錄
X-Men - Mutant Apocalypse (USA).original_desc:
Because of a rise of anti-mutant activity in Genosha, Professor Xavier uses Cerebro to scan the island nation and discovers Apocalypse's presence there. Genosha's government is apparently using Apocalypse to bring their mutant population under control. However, Xavier suspects Apocalypse to follow his own plans and sends five X-Men, Cyclops, Wolverine, Psylocke, Beast and Gambit, to investigate.

X-Men: Mutant Apocalypse combines the gameplay of a side-scrolling brawler like Final Fight with elements of a platformer, that is, players have to fight various enemies and survive the occasional jumping-puzzle. Most levels also feature mid- and end-bosses in form of robots, monsters or known Super-Villains.

Each character has unique abilities and special moves: Cyclops uses his Optic Blast to attack enemies from a distance, Wolverine can climb walls, Psylocke is very agile and the best jumper of the team, Beast can cling to the ceiling while Gambit throws explosive cards at his enemies. Special moves are quite similar to those found in Street Fighter II (Wolverine has a Dragon-Punch-style attack and Gambit's Double Kick is virtually identical to M. Bison's Scissors Kick), and require similar button combinations.

While most stages are unique for each character, some can be played with any of the X-Men. Progress is saved via password.
X-Men - Mutant Apocalypse (USA).desc:
由於基諾沙反變種人活動的興起，澤維爾教授使用 Cerebro 掃描這個島國並發現了天啟的存在。基諾沙政府顯然正在利用天啟來控制他們的變異人口。然而，澤維爾懷疑天啟正在遵循他自己的計劃，並派出五名 X 戰警、獨眼巨人、金剛狼、靈蝶、野獸和智謀前去調查。

《X戰警：變種人啟示錄》將橫版捲軸格鬥遊戲（如《最終之戰》）的遊戲玩法與平台遊戲的元素相結合，也就是說，玩家必須與各種敵人作戰，並在偶爾的跳躍謎題中生存下來。大多數關卡還設有機器人、怪物或已知超級惡棍形式的中端和最終首領。

每個角色都有獨特的能力和特殊動作：鐳射眼使用他的光學爆炸從遠處攻擊敵人，金剛狼可以爬牆，靈蝶非常敏捷，是團隊中最好的跳投者，野獸可以緊貼天花板，而智謀則向敵人投擲爆炸牌。特殊動作與《街頭霸王 II》中的動作非常相似（金剛狼具有龍拳式攻擊，而開局的雙踢幾乎與 M. Bison 的剪刀踢相同），並且需要類似的按鈕組合。

雖然大多數關卡對於每個角色來說都是獨一無二的，但有些關卡可以與任何 X 戰警一起玩。進度通過密碼保存。

ActRaiser 2 (USA).name: 激戰2
ActRaiser 2 (USA).original_desc:
Players control "The Master," a god-like spirit sent down from the heavens, and fight to eradicate evil from the land. This sequel to ActRaiser focuses entirely on the side-scrolling action of the original, and has 14 levels with new monsters, new abilities, and new super powers.

You still control a "Cloud Palace" across a zoomable map of the world, choosing your next area of battle. In addition, many of the sound effects from the original game make their reappearance, as well as some hidden RPG elements. 

Changes from the original ActRaiser include the elimination of the village-building mode, a move from a battery-save to password-save system, and a new musical score.
ActRaiser 2 (USA).desc:
玩家操控從天而降的神靈“Master”，為剷除大地上的邪惡而戰。ActRaiser 的這款續作完全專注於原作的橫向捲軸動作，共有 14 個關卡，其中包含新怪物、新能力和新超能力。

你仍然可以在可縮放的世界地圖上控制“雲宮”，選擇你的下一個戰鬥區域。此外，許多原作的音效也得以重現，還有一些隱藏的RPG元素。

與原版 ActRaiser 相比的變化包括取消村莊建設模式、從省電系統改為密碼保存系統，以及新的樂譜。

Arkanoid - Doh It Again (USA).name: 打磚塊 : 再做一次
Arkanoid - Doh It Again (USA).original_desc: A sequel to the arcade game Arkanoid. Use your paddle to move the ball around and hit bricks to clear the level. Once all the bricks are gone in the current level, you go on to the next level. Power-ups, like lasers and paddle lengthening will help you during the levels. Unlike the arcade version, the sequel has boss battles and somewhat of a storyline.
Arkanoid - Doh It Again (USA).desc: 街機遊戲打磚塊的續集。使用槳移動球並擊打磚塊以清除水平。一旦當前關卡中的所有磚塊都消失了，您就可以進入下一個關卡。激光和槳加長等能量提升將在關卡中為您提供幫助。與街機版不同的是，續集有 Boss 戰和一些故事情節。

Go for it! Goemon 3 - The Mecha Leg Hold.key: Go for it! Goemon 3 - The Mecha Leg Hold of Jurokube Shishi (Japan) (Translated)
Go for it! Goemon 3 - The Mecha Leg Hold.original_name: Go for it! Goemon 3 - The Mecha Leg Hold of Jurokube Shishi (Japan) (Translated)
Go for it! Goemon 3 - The Mecha Leg Hold.name: 大膽試試吧！五右衛門 3 - 十六部獅子的機甲腿

Radical Rex (USA).name: 激進霸王龍
Radical Rex (USA).original_desc: Radical Rex is a fire-breathing Tyrannosaurus on a skateboard who has to save the dinosaur race under the spell of an evil creature. The game consists of 10 levels set in the prehistoric age. Radical Rex can use a skateboard or glide down hills, jump, kick and breath fire. Tougher enemies need multiple hits and when burnt Rex needs to kick them once more to destroy them or use his scream (hits everything on the screen). While playing Rex collects eggs, health, power-ups for his fire breath and scream refills. Checkpoints are shown as torches that need to be charged with fire. After each level, there is a Bomberman-like sequence to earn an extra continue. Enemies include flies, turtles, toads and all kinds of dinosaurs.
Radical Rex (USA).desc: 激進霸王龍是一隻騎在滑板上的噴火暴龍，他必須在邪惡生物的咒語下拯救恐龍種族。該遊戲由 10 個以史前時代為背景的關卡組成。激進霸王龍可以使用滑板或滑下山坡、跳躍、踢腿和噴火。更強悍的敵人需要多次攻擊，當被燒傷時，雷克斯需要再次踢他們來消滅他們，或者使用他的尖叫聲（擊中屏幕上的所有東西）。在玩耍時，雷克斯會收集雞蛋、生命值、能量，以補充他的火焰呼吸和尖叫。檢查站顯示為需要點燃的火把。每個關卡之後，都會有一個類似炸彈人的序列來贏得額外的繼續。天敵包括蒼蠅、烏龜、蟾蜍和各種恐龍。

Live A Live (Japan) (Translated).name: 活著
Live A Live (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
In "Live a Live", you control seven main characters and play through seven different stories set in seven different time periods: prehistoric age, medieval Europe, feudal Japan, a futuristic world with robots and weird machines, etc. Those stories appear to have no common points, yet after completing all of them, you'll see they are in fact connected - the worlds of all those characters are threatened by the same ultimate evil force.

The combat features many innovations compared to traditional console RPGs: your position on the battle field is important, and certain techniques can be used only from certain positions, and enemy attacks also affect only specific parts of the field. Out of the seven chapters, some have more battle-oriented gameplay, while others are more devoted to puzzle-solving and information-gathering.

The game is one of the least known Squaresoft products, and was never released outside of Japan.
Live A Live (Japan) (Translated).desc:
在《Live a Live》中，你控制七個主要角色，體驗七個不同時間段的七個不同故事：史前時代、中世紀歐洲、封建日本、機器人和怪異機器的未來世界等等。這些故事看似沒有共同點，但在完成所有故事後，你會發現它們實際上是相互聯繫的 - 所有這些角色的世界都受到同一個終極邪惡力量的威脅。

與傳統主機角色扮演遊戲相比，戰鬥具有許多創新：你在戰場上的位置很重要，某些技術只能在特定位置使用，敵人的攻擊也只影響戰場的特定部分。在七個章節中，有些章節的遊戲玩法更加以戰鬥為導向，而另一些章節則更致力於解謎和信息收集。

該遊戲是 Squaresoft 最不知名的產品之一，並且從未在日本以外地區發行。

Populous (USA).name: 人口眾多
Populous (USA).original_desc:
You play a god, gaming against other gods in a celestial game of conquest.  To win, you must help your chosen people take over the world and wipe out the vermin who worship that other god.

Each god starts out with a single human, dumped into the middle of the wilderness.  Sometimes there is inhabitable land in sight, sometimes not.  To get win, you must change the landscape, creating flat land for your followers to build on.  The more followers you have you have, the more powerful you will be, so take care of them. Build as fast as you can, because the other god is doing the same.
Populous (USA).desc:
你扮演一個神，在一場天界的征服遊戲中與其他神進行遊戲。為了獲勝，你必須幫助你所選擇的人民接管世界並消滅崇拜另一個神的害蟲。

每個神一開始都有一個人類，被扔到荒野中央。有時可以看到適合居住的土地，有時則看不到。為了獲得勝利，你必須改變景觀，為你的追隨者創造平坦的土地來建造。你擁有的追隨者越多，你的力量就越強大，所以要照顧好他們。盡可能快地建造，因為另一個神也在做同樣的事情。

Trials of Mana (World) (Rev 1) (Collecti.name: 政權傳奇3
Trials of Mana (World) (Rev 1) (Collecti.original_desc:
Long ago, an era of peace was built upon eight Mana Stones that sealed away the world's ancient God-Beasts. Now, that peace is fading as rival kingdoms and dark powers move to claim this force for their own.
The story is defined by your choice of three heroes from a cast of six unique characters: Duran the swordsman, Angela the magician, Kevin the beastman, Charlotte the cleric, Hawkeye the thief, and Riesz the Amazon. The hero you select first determines which of three main storylines unfolds.
An action-oriented role-playing game, Seiken Densetsu 3 features a real-time 'Motion Battle' system. Characters evolve through a deep 'Class Change' system, where players choose a path of 'Light' or 'Dark' to unlock advanced classes with entirely new abilities, strengths, and spells.
Trials of Mana (World) (Rev 1) (Collecti.desc:
很久以前，八顆魔石封印了世界上古神獸，建立了一個和平的時代。現在，隨著敵對王國和黑暗勢力將這股力量據為己有，這種和平正在逐漸消失。
這個故事是由你從六個獨特角色中選擇三個英雄來定義的：劍客杜蘭、魔術師安吉拉、獸人凱文、牧師夏洛特、小偷鷹眼和亞馬遜人里斯。您首先選擇的英雄決定了三個主要故事情節中的哪一個展開。
《聖劍傳說 3》是一款以動作為導向的角色扮演遊戲，具有實時“動作戰鬥”系統。角色通過深刻的“職業變更”系統進化，玩家選擇“光明”或“黑暗”路徑來解鎖具有全新能力、力量和咒語的高級職業。

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers (USA).name: 強大的嗎啡恐龍戰隊
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers (USA).original_desc:
This is a one-on-one fighting game for one or two players. 

Single players pick a Ranger (Red, Pink, Blue, Yellow, Black, or the unlockable Green) and take him or her through a series of battles against Rita's monsters. After one normal battle, the monster grows very large, and then it is time to take out the MegaZord.
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers (USA).desc:
這是一場適合一兩個玩家的一對一格鬥遊戲。

單人玩家選擇一名遊俠（紅色、粉色、藍色、黃色、黑色或可解鎖的綠色）並帶領他或她與麗塔的怪物進行一系列戰鬥。經過一場正常的戰鬥後，怪物變得非常大，然後是時候幹掉 MegaZord 了。

Out of This World (USA).name: 走出這個世界
Out of This World (USA).original_desc:
You play Lester, a young physics professor, who suddenly finds himself in a strange alien world after a lightning struck during his particle experiment. Now he must fight for his life, first with his bare hands, then with a gun he finds. But what gives him courage is that he is not alone. One of the aliens, who together with him escapes from the prison, helps him on his dangerous quest. Friendship can overcome all the obstacles.

Out of This World is an action adventure game, where the adventuring element is concealed behind what looks like a typical platform shooter. The gameplay is based mainly on physical and environmental puzzles. There is no on-screen interface, and no in-game dialogue. Each enemy requires a different strategy, and often there is only one way to solve the problem. Typically, enemies will be defeated through the use of a gun you find near the beginning of the game; the gun can be used to create a shield from behind which you can safely fire. 

The game is divided into levels, each one of which can be accessed by typing a code you learn after having completed the level. If you die (which is often) you restart the level anew. The game features vector graphics and animated cut scenes.
Out of This World (USA).desc:
你扮演萊斯特，一位年輕的物理學教授，在粒子實驗中被閃電擊中後，他突然發現自己身處一個陌生的外星世界。現在他必須為自己的生命而戰，首先是赤手空拳，然後是用他找到的槍。但給他勇氣的是他並不孤單。其中一名外星人與他一起逃出了監獄，幫助他完成了危險的任務。友誼可以克服一切障礙。

《Out of This World》是一款動作冒險遊戲，冒險元素隱藏在看似典型的平台射擊遊戲背後。遊戲玩法主要基於物理和環境謎題。沒有屏幕界面，也沒有遊戲內對話。每個敵人都需要不同的策略，而且通常只有一種方法可以解決問題。通常，敵人會通過使用你在遊戲開始時找到的槍來擊敗；這把槍可以用來製造一個盾牌，你可以從後面安全地開火。

遊戲分為多個級別，每個級別都可以通過輸入完成級別後學到的代碼來訪問。如果你死了（這種情況很常見），你就會重新開始關卡。該遊戲具有矢量圖形和動畫過場動畫。

Top Gear (USA).name: 頂級裝備
Top Gear (USA).original_desc:
In the first of three released games for Super NES, players can choose among 4 different cars, each one with different attributes (maximum speed, fuel consumption, boost power and tire grip) to face 32 challenging courses situated in several places around the world as Brazil, USA, France, Japan etc.

In more longer tracks, players will find a Pit Stop section, where they can enter to replenish the fuel meter (total or partially). The game has a split-screen display for 1 or 2 players. In 1-Player mode, you'll dispute the races against the computer, that has a slightly bigger speed than yours, helping to give a lot more of competitiveness. A password system was included, being possible to stop a current game and resume it later.

Through the game, players will find several obstacles scattered by the courses, like rows of iron plates or even lots of stones. In order to qualify for the next circuit, it's required to complete it at least in the 5th position, or else the game is over.
Top Gear (USA).desc: 超級任天堂（日版名：スーパーファミコン，Super Famicom，英文版名：Super Nintendo Entertainment System，簡稱超任；日版簡稱SFC；歐美版簡稱Super Nintendo、SNES）是由遊戲公司任天堂繼紅白機後開發的16位元家用遊戲機。超級任天堂於1990年11月21日在日本開始發售，北美於1991年8月13日發售，歐洲於1992年4月11日發售。手把改進之處在於第一次加入了肩部按鍵L/R，並形成了ABXY四個按鍵的手把布局。超級任天堂全球累計銷量為4910萬台。超級任天堂的下一代產品為任天堂64。

Death and Return of Superman, The (USA).key: Death and Return of Superman, The (USA) (Rev 1)
Death and Return of Superman, The (USA).original_name: The Death and Return of Superman
Death and Return of Superman, The (USA).name: 超人之死與歸來
Death and Return of Superman, The (USA).original_desc:
"Doomsday" is here and only Superman can stop him. Unfortunately in doing so he gets killed himself. Now four other characters emerge, each claiming to be the real hero. The story starts you off with Superman, then Steel, the Eradicator, the Cyborg, and Superboy. Each character has slightly varied moves so different strategies apply when playing as them.

The gameplay is basically that of a standard beat-em-up, with the punches, throws and specials moves.
Death and Return of Superman, The (USA).desc:
“世界末日”來了，只有超人才能阻止他。不幸的是，他這樣做時自己也被殺了。現在另外四個角色出現了，每個角色都聲稱自己是真正的英雄。故事從超人開始，然後是鋼鐵俠、消滅者、機器人和超級小子。每個角色的動作都略有不同，因此在扮演他們時會應用不同的策略。

遊戲玩法基本上是標準的格鬥遊戲，有拳擊、投擲和特殊動作。

Super Bomberman 3 (Europe).name: 超級炸彈人3
Super Bomberman 3 (Europe).original_desc:
The third bomberman game in the SNES series.  This game was an overhaul of the entire system of bombermans from before.  Again there are new levels and a new story but there are also a lot of new features.

Super Bomberman 3 adds in 5 player support using a multitap and the extra controller slot.  The "revenge" or "miso bomber" feature was introduced in this game.  That is when a player dies they can still throw bombs in from the sidelines in an attempt to swap places with a player that is still alive.  Many new powerups were added in this game including the Kangaroo which in addition to giving a player and extra hit allowed them to have some extra ablity including jumping, laying rows of bombs, and high speed running.

Players are also not limited to the traditional Bomberman.  There is a wide selection of different characters that the player can choose from.
Super Bomberman 3 (Europe).desc:
SNES 系列的第三款炸彈人遊戲。這場比賽是對之前整個炸彈人系統的徹底改造。再次有新的關卡和新的故事，但也有很多新功能。

Super Bomberman 3 使用多次點擊和額外的控制器插槽添加了 5 名玩家支持。該遊戲引入了“復仇”或“味噌轟炸機”功能。也就是說，當玩家死亡時，他們仍然可以從場邊扔炸彈，試圖與還活著的玩家交換位置。這款遊戲中添加了許多新的能力，包括袋鼠，它除了給玩家帶來額外的打擊之外，還讓他們擁有一些額外的能力，包括跳躍、放置炸彈和高速奔跑。

玩家也不局限於傳統的炸彈人。有多種不同的角色可供玩家選擇。

Dragon Ball Z - Hyper Dimension (Japan).name: 龍珠Z : 超次元
Dragon Ball Z - Hyper Dimension (Japan).original_desc:
Dragon Ball Z: Hyper Dimension is a fighting game based on the Dragon Ball Z series. Players select one of ten fighters: Freeza, Gotenks, Kid Buu, Majin Buu, Majin Vegeta, Perfect Cell, Piccolo, Son Goku, Ultimate Gohan and Vegetto.

Hyper Dimension includes a Story Mode, which starts in the Freeza saga and ends in the Buu saga. In this mode you have to fight one on one against several enemies.

In addition to the Story Mode, this game also contains a Versus Mode, Tournament Mode and Practice Mode.
Dragon Ball Z - Hyper Dimension (Japan).desc:
《龍珠Z：超維度》是一款基於《龍珠Z》系列的格鬥遊戲。玩家從十名戰士中選擇一名：弗利薩、悟天克斯、小佈歐、魔人佈歐、魔人貝吉塔、完美細胞、短笛、孫悟空、終極悟飯和貝吉特。

超維度包括故事模式，以弗利薩傳奇開始，以佈歐傳奇結束。在這種模式下，你必須與多個敵人進行一對一的戰鬥。

除了故事模式外，遊戲還包含對戰模式、錦標賽模式和練習模式。

Kirby Super Star (USA).name: 任天堂明星大亂鬥 for 3DS/Wii U
Kirby Super Star (USA).original_desc:
The game is actually a set of seven main games: Spring Breeze, Dynablade, Gourmet Race, The Great Cave Offensive are unlocked at first, and later Metaknight's Revenge, Milky Way Wishes and The Arena become available, as well as a couple of minor minigames.
These are all typical Kirby platformers, each one with its own set of levels and different gameplay. In most of them you can consume monsters and learn their special abilities, but in Milky Way Wishes abilities are instead collected in a manner similar to Metroid. Offensive Cave features levels with various obstacles, hidden treasures and some elementary lever-pulling kind of puzzle solving. Metaknight's Revenge is the only game on the cartridge with a (fairly strict) timer. The Arena is a "boss rush" mode, asking players to defeat every boss in the game with limited health refills and on one life.
Kirby Super Star is best known for its two-player cooperative play option, which has given it a reputation as a party game.
Kirby Super Star (USA).desc:
該遊戲實際上是一套七款主要遊戲：Spring Breeze、Dynablade、Gourmet Race、The Great Cave Offencing 首先解鎖，隨後推出 Metaknight's Revenge、Milky Way Wishes 和 The Arena，以及一些小遊戲。
這些都是典型的《星之卡比》平台遊戲，每個遊戲都有自己的一套關卡和不同的遊戲玩法。在大多數遊戲中，你可以消耗怪物並學習它們的特殊能力，但在《銀河願望》中，能力的收集方式與《銀河戰士》類似。進攻性洞穴的關卡設有各種障礙、隱藏的寶藏和一些基本的拉桿解謎方式。《Metaknight's Revenge》是卡帶上唯一一款具有（相當嚴格）計時器的遊戲。競技場是一種“bossrush”模式，要求玩家在生命有限的情況下擊敗遊戲中的每一個boss。
《星之卡比超級明星》以其兩人合作遊戲選項而聞名，這使其享有派對遊戲的美譽。

Donkey Kong Country 2 - Diddy's Kong Que.key: Donkey Kong Country 2 - Diddy's Kong Quest (USA) (En,Fr) (Rev 1)
Donkey Kong Country 2 - Diddy's Kong Que.original_name: Donkey Kong Country 2 : Diddy's Kong Quest
Donkey Kong Country 2 - Diddy's Kong Que.name: 大金剛國度 2 : 迪迪金剛任務
Donkey Kong Country 2 - Diddy's Kong Que.original_desc:
Donkey Kong has been kong-napped by the nasty K.Rool and the Kremlings, and it is up to Diddy Kong and his girl-friend Dixie Kong to save him.

All the familiar enemies and helpful friends return, along with some new characters, including the wise Wrinkly Kong who will teach you some important lessons in gameplay. Again the emphasis is on banana collecting, where as every 100 bananas makes one extra life. Apart from beating K. Rool and rescuing Donkey Kong, there are extra missions that can be completed. Collect enough K. Rool Krem Coins to open up the routes to the Lost World, while every level has a hidden Hero Coin to collect.
Donkey Kong Country 2 - Diddy's Kong Que.desc:
大金剛被可惡的 K.Rool 和克里姆林一家打昏了，迪迪·孔和他的女朋友迪克西·孔必須拯救他。

所有熟悉的敵人和樂於助人的朋友都回來了，還有一些新角色，包括聰明的皺紋金剛，他會教你一些重要的遊戲課程。再次強調的是香蕉收集，每 100 根香蕉就可以多一條生命。除了擊敗K. Rool和拯救大金剛之外，還有額外的任務可以完成。收集足夠的 K. Rool Krem 硬幣來打開通往失落世界的路線，而每個級別都有隱藏的英雄硬幣可供收集。

Mega Man X3 (USA).name: 洛克人2 威利博士之謎
Mega Man X3 (USA).original_desc: A Reploid scientist named Dr. Doppler begins creation of a new city for Reploids, which will bring a new era of peace to the Reploids and humans. But something goes terribly wrong, and now Mavericks have begun to appear everywhere! It's up to X and Zero to find out who is behind this Maverick revolt and bring them down for good!
Mega Man X3 (USA).desc: 一位名叫多普勒博士的機器人科學家開始為機器人創建一座新城市，這將為機器人和人類帶來一個和平的新時代。但事情出了嚴重的問題，現在小牛隊已經開始到處出現了！X 和零有責任找出這場特立獨行叛亂的幕後黑手，並永遠打倒他們！

Uniracers (USA).name: 單人賽車手
Uniracers (USA).original_desc:
What do you get if you cross Sonic the Hedgehog with Tony Hawk's Pro Skater?

It might seem an odd combination, but it describes Uniracers perfectly. One of the more successful releases of the Super Nintendo's twilight era, Uniracers mixes platform-based high-speed racing, with crazy stunts and tricks.

The basic idea in most levels of the game is simple. Get your unicycle from A to B as quickly as possible, and finish ahead of your opponent. It's like Sonic, but with none of those pesky enemies, pointless power-ups and frustrating obstructions. In fact it doesn't sound like much of a game at all...

Here's the key, though. Tricks performed and landed during the race increase your speed. The better the trick, the greater your increase in speed will be.

Also, some levels are set in areas designed solely for stunts. Such levels require you to earn as many style points as possible, by doing tricks. These levels are against the clock, and a set points score, rather than an opponent.

Unicycles are stupid and difficult, and yet fun, once you get the hang of them. Much the same could be said about Uniracers...
Uniracers (USA).desc:
如果你將刺猬索尼克與托尼霍克的職業滑板手交叉，你會得到什麼？

這似乎是一個奇怪的組合，但它完美地描述了 Uniracers。《Uniracers》是超級任天堂暮光時代最成功的遊戲之一，它將基於平台的高速賽車與瘋狂的特技和技巧融為一體。

遊戲大多數關卡的基本理念都很簡單。盡快讓你的獨輪車從 A 點到達 B 點，並領先於對手完成比賽。它就像索尼克，但沒有那些討厭的敵人、毫無意義的能力提升和令人沮喪的障礙。事實上，這聽起來根本不像一個遊戲......

不過，關鍵是在這裡。比賽期間表演和落地的技巧會提高你的速度。技巧越好，你的速度提升就越大。

此外，某些關卡設置在專為特技設計的區域中。這些級別要求您通過表演技巧來獲得盡可能多的風格積分。這些級別是爭分奪秒的，並且是定點得分，而不是對手。

獨輪車既愚蠢又困難，但一旦你掌握了它們的竅門，就會很有趣。Uniracers 也是如此……

Street Fighter Alpha 2 (USA).name: 快打旋風ZERO
Street Fighter Alpha 2 (USA).original_desc:
Another Street Fighter sequel (this time for Street Fighter Alpha) adds even more to the classic fighting series.

New characters in this version include Gen (a wise kung-fu master), Rolento (who you may remember from another Capcom classic, Final Fight) and Sakura, a young school girl who follows her hero Ryu so close, she has the same type of moves. Dhalsim and Zangief also return to the fight with some news moves.

The other major difference is the loss of chain-combos and the gain of a custom combo system. Once you reach the required level (which is 1 at the least) you can execute a custom combo by combining any of the buttons (which there are 6 in total) or any of the special attacks (fireballs, etc.)
Street Fighter Alpha 2 (USA).desc:
另一款《街頭霸王》續作（這次是《街頭霸王阿爾法》）為經典格鬥系列增添了更多內容。

此版本中的新角色包括 Gen（一位睿智的功夫大師）、Rolento（您可能還記得在另一部 Capcom 經典作品《Final Fight》中看到的角色）和 Sakura，一位年輕的女學生，她非常接近她的英雄 Ryu，她的動作類型與她相同。達爾西姆和讚吉夫也帶著一些新聞舉動重返戰鬥。

另一個主要區別是連鎖組合的損失和自定義組合系統的增益。一旦達到所需級別（至少 1 級），您就可以通過組合任何按鈕（總共 6 個）或任何特殊攻擊（火球等）來執行自定義組合。

X-Kaliber 2097 (USA).name: X 口徑 2097
X-Kaliber 2097 (USA).original_desc:
The game takes place in the year 2097 A.D. in NEO N.Y. The city is run down and controlled by a warlord named Raptor. Raptor has unleashed an army of ruthless, mutating Morphs upon the city to enforce his brand of order. Only two special forces agents, Slash and Alix do not submit to Raptor's will. Raptor decides to hatch a plan to kidnap Alix, so Slash, and more importantly his magic X-Kaliber sword, will come to him in an attempt to try and rescue her.

The game consists of two modes. The first modes gameplay consists of side-scrolling action. The player can jump and swing a sword at enemies. The player can also deflect projectiles with the sword. The game also features one on one boss fights that are set up similar to a fighting game. The second mode is a two player duel that is set up like the one on one boss fights but is between two human controlled players.
X-Kaliber 2097 (USA).desc:
遊戲發生在公元 2097 年的新紐約州。這座城市被一個名叫猛禽的軍閥所摧毀和控制。猛禽向城市釋放了一支殘酷的變異大軍，以執行他的秩序。只有兩名特種部隊特工，斯萊什和阿利克斯不服從猛禽的意志。猛禽決定制定綁架阿利克斯的計劃，因此斯萊什，更重要的是他的魔法 X-口徑劍，將會來到他身邊，試圖營救她。

遊戲由兩種模式組成。第一種模式的遊戲玩法包括橫向捲軸動作。玩家可以跳躍並向敵人揮劍。玩家還可以用劍偏轉射彈。該遊戲還具有類似於格鬥遊戲的一對一的老闆打鬥功能。第二種模式是兩人決鬥，其設置類似於一對一的老闆戰鬥，但在兩個人類控制的玩家之間進行。

Jurassic Park (USA) (Rev 1).name: 侏羅紀公園
Jurassic Park (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: In Jurassic Park, you control Alan Grant as he navigates the park, starting with a taser that can later be upgraded to weapons like bolas, grenades, or tranquilizer darts. Grant can only carry two weapons at a time. You hunt dinosaurs and explore the park, where frantic movements can make the dinosaurs more aggressive, while slower actions help you avoid attacks. As you traverse jungles, hills, and buildings, you collect useful items like batteries, ID cards, or night vision goggles to progress. Entering buildings switches the view from top-down to a 3D perspective. In the dark corridors and rooms, you search for generators, terminals, and exits while defending yourself against aggressive dinosaurs.
Jurassic Park (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 在《侏羅紀公園》中，你控制艾倫·格蘭特在公園中穿行，一開始使用泰瑟槍，隨後可以升級為流彈、手榴彈或鎮靜飛鏢等武器。格蘭特一次只能攜帶兩把武器。你狩獵恐龍並探索公園，瘋狂的動作可以讓恐龍變得更具攻擊性，而緩慢的動作可以幫助你避免攻擊。當你穿越叢林、山丘和建築物時，你可以收集電池、身份證或夜視鏡等有用的物品來前進。進入建築物後，視圖會從自上而下切換到 3D 視角。在黑暗的走廊和房間裡，你尋找發電機、終端和出口，同時保護自己免受侵略性恐龍的侵害。

Axelay (USA).name: 阿克塞萊
Axelay (USA).original_desc:
This planet was once a quiet, peaceful place to live, until...they came...

An unknown alien race came to this planet and promptly laid waste to it. The remaining defense force has been sent out to try and defeat them. One lucky person gets to fly the latest line of defense ships made: the AX-77 Axelay. However, these ships are still in the prototype stage, and as such, only one exists.

So get out there and head to the alien's homeworld. With some luck, you may just be able to take them out at the source...
Axelay (USA).desc:
這個星球曾經是一個安靜、祥和的居住地，直到……他們來到……

一個未知的外星種族來到了這個星球，並迅速將其夷為平地。剩下的防禦力量已經被派出去試圖擊敗他們。一位幸運者能夠駕駛最新製造的防線艦艇：AX-77 Axelay。然而，這些艦艇仍處於原型階段，因此只有一艘存在。

因此，走出去，前往外星人的家園吧。如果運氣好的話，你也許能夠從源頭把它們消滅掉……

Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts (USA).name: 超級食屍鬼與幽靈
Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts (USA).original_desc:
4 years after Arthur saved Princess PrinPrin from the evil demon Loki, a wonderful celebration is about to take place! Arthur and the Princess are engaged, and the wedding is to take place at last! Thousands from around the kingdom have come to witness this joyous event!

But somewhere in the darkness of the forest lurks a horrible evil...

Arthur and PrinPrin are spending a quiet moment locked in embrace, when she is suddenly snatched away by a huge demon! As her screams echo through the night, Arthur rushes from the castle, and pursues the demon to the graveyard, where he is greeted by hundreds of horrible ghouls and monsters!

Now, this time, they've gone too far...Arthur is ready for them...
Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts (USA).desc:
亞瑟從邪惡的惡魔洛基手中救出普林普林公主四年後，一場精彩的慶祝活動即將舉行！亞瑟和公主訂婚了，婚禮終於要舉行了！全國各地數千人齊聚一堂，共同見證這一喜慶盛事！

但在森林的黑暗中某處潛伏著可怕的邪惡……

亞瑟和普林普林正擁抱在一起度過一段安靜的時光，突然她被一個巨大的惡魔抓走了！當她的尖叫聲響徹夜空時，亞瑟從城堡中衝出，追擊惡魔到了墓地，迎接他的是數百隻可怕的食屍鬼和怪物！

現在，這一次，他們走得太遠了……亞瑟已經為他們做好了準備……

WWF Royal Rumble (USA).name: 世界自然基金會皇家隆隆聲
WWF Royal Rumble (USA).original_desc: Control one of twelve World Wrestling Federation stars in a "no holds barred brawl" -- in other words, do whatever moves you want, from choke holds, piledrivers, and even chair slams, until your opponent is knocked out. You can even go outside the ring if you like. Several modes of play are available, including one-on-one, tag team (two-on-two), and three-on-three tag team. You can play as the following WWF wresters: Bret Hart, Razor Ramon, Randy Savage, Shawn Michaels, The Undertaker, Tatanka, Mr. Perfect, Crush, Ric Flair, Yokozuna, Ted Dibiase, and Lex Luger.
WWF Royal Rumble (USA).desc: 控制世界摔跤聯盟十二名明星中的一位進行“無限制的鬥毆”——換句話說，你可以做任何你想做的動作，從掐脖子、打樁機，甚至猛擊椅子，直到你的對手被擊倒。如果你願意，你甚至可以走出擂台。有多種比賽模式可供選擇，包括一對一、雙打（二對二）和三對三雙打。您可以扮演以下 WWF 摔跤手：Bret Hart、Razor Ramon、Randy Savage、Shawn Michaels、The Undertaker、Tatanka、Mr. Perfect、Crush、Ric Flair、Yokozuna、Ted Dibiase 和 Lex Luger。

Super Off Road (USA).name: One More Time (Super Junior日文單曲)
Super Off Road (USA).original_desc:
Enter the world of off-road racing as 4 vehicles will face each other, on a series of tracks which are based around flipped and reversed versions of a core selection. Fame, glory and bikini clad women await your victories and the taste of dirt awaits if you fail. Let a computer car beat you and you lose one of your 3 credits.

Successful races bring more money, which can be used to soup up their machine. Boosts to top speed, grip and acceleration can be purchased, and your nitro boost must be kept topped up. If you are desperate for upgrades, you can buy into your spare credits

Only your off-road driving abilities will be enough to pull you to first place in these races. Play alone or with up to 3 other players (depending on the version)  in this conversion of a classic arcade game.
Super Off Road (USA).desc:
進入越野賽車世界，4 輛車將在一系列基於核心選擇的翻轉和反轉版本的賽道上相互對峙。名譽、榮耀和穿著比基尼的女人等待著你的勝利，如果你失敗了，泥土的味道也在等待著你。如果一輛電腦汽車打敗了你，你就會失去 3 個學分中的一個。

成功的比賽會帶來更多的錢，可以用來升級他們的機器。可以購買最高速度、抓地力和加速度的增強劑，並且您的硝基增強劑必須保持充足。如果您迫切需要升級，可以購買備用積分

只有您的越野駕駛能力才足以讓您在這些比賽中獲得第一名。在這個經典街機遊戲的轉換中，您可以單獨玩，也可以與最多 3 名其他玩家（取決於版本）一起玩。

Sonic Blast Man (USA).name: 索尼克X-Treme
Sonic Blast Man (USA).original_desc: You take on the role of Sonic Blast Man, a superhero, in this side-scrolling shooter, fighting against various forms of evil. While you have the typical punch, jump, and kick moves, the Sonic Blast Man also has two special power moves: Dynamite Punch and Screw Bomb. You travel through five different stages and fight enemies ranging from local ruffians to robots and even aliens from outer space.
Sonic Blast Man (USA).desc: 在這款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲中，您將扮演超級英雄 Sonic Blast Man，與各種形式的邪惡勢力作戰。雖然你有典型的拳擊、跳躍和踢腿動作，但音速爆破人還有兩種特殊的力量動作：炸藥拳擊和螺旋炸彈。你穿越五個不同的階段，與從當地惡棍到機器人甚至來自外太空的外星人等敵人作戰。

King of Dragons (USA).name: 龍王
King of Dragons (USA).original_desc: The King of Dragons is a fantasy themed side-scrolling beat'em up. There are five different characters to choose from: a fighter, a cleric, an elf, a wizard and a dwarf. All characters have different strengths and weaknesses in speed, attack power and magic. After choosing an appropriate character, the player has to fight his way through numerous short levels guarded by an equally high number of bosses; gaining better weapons and shields/magic in the process.
King of Dragons (USA).desc: 《龍之王》是一款奇幻主題的橫向捲軸清版遊戲。有五種不同的角色可供選擇：戰士、牧師、精靈、巫師和矮人。所有角色在速度、攻擊力和魔法方面都有不同的優勢和劣勢。選擇合適的角色後，玩家必須在眾多由同等數量的 Boss 守護的短關卡中殺出一條血路。在此過程中獲得更好的武器和盾牌/魔法。

Dragon Quest I & II (Japan) (Translated).name: 勇者鬥惡龍系列
Dragon Quest I & II (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
This is a remake of two classic NES RPGs - an exclusively Japanese release of the two first Dragon Quest titles on one cartridge.

In Dragon Quest (known as Dragon Warrior in the US), you play as the descendant of the legendary warrior Erdrick, and your goal is to recover the magical Ball of Light from Erdrick's and the humanity's arch-enemy, the Dragon Lord. In Dragon Quest II, you assume the role of the descendant of the hero of the first game, and must join forces with two other characters in order to defeat a demon lord who destroyed a nearby city and killed its inhabitants. 

Both RPGs feature random battles and turn-based combat viewed from first-person perspective. In Dragon Quest you fight alone, while in the sequel two other characters can join your party, and you also fight against multiple enemies at once.

The remake includes updated graphics (although they still retain the original NES look), sound of SNES quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world. Certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as "Stairs") are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items.
Dragon Quest I & II (Japan) (Translated).desc:
這是兩款經典 NES RPG 的重製版 - 前兩款《勇者鬥惡龍》系列遊戲在一個卡帶上的日本獨家發行。

在《勇者鬥惡龍》（美國稱為《勇者鬥惡龍》）中，你扮演傳奇戰士艾德里克的後裔，你的目標是從艾德里克和人類的宿敵龍王手中奪回神奇的光球。在《勇者鬥惡龍 II》中，你扮演第一款遊戲中英雄的後裔，必須與另外兩個角色聯手，才能擊敗摧毀了附近城市並殺死其居民的惡魔領主。

這兩款角色扮演遊戲都以第一人稱視角呈現隨機戰鬥和回合製戰鬥。在勇者鬥惡龍中，你獨自戰鬥，而在續集中，另外兩個角色可以加入你的隊伍，你也可以同時對抗多個敵人。

重製版包括更新的圖形（儘管它們仍然保留原來的 NES 外觀）、SNES 品質的聲音以及遊戲玩法和遊戲世界的一些變化。某些位置較大，省略了某些菜單命令（例如“樓梯”），並且項目種類較多。

Clue (USA).name: 線索
Clue (USA).original_desc:
Who killed Mr. Boddy? Was it Colonel Mustard, in the Kitchen, with the Lead Pipe? All the deductive fun of the classic mystery game comes to life with hundreds of animated vignettes, crisp graphics, bright colors, and refined sound effects and music of advanced 16-bit technology. Playing alone or with up to five human or computer opponents, you'll solve a new CLUEÂ® mystery every time you play, as you choose one of five "ranks" and work up from Amateur to Detective.

So enter Mr. Boddy's mansion and start collecting evidence from the animated vignettes that show Suspects skulking through Rooms and leaving fingerprints on Weapons. When you've collected enough clues, make your Accusation of Whodunit? Where? With which Weapon? If you're right, you'll see the murder reenacted before your very eyes!
Clue (USA).desc:
誰殺了博迪先生？是廚房裡拿著鉛管的芥末上校嗎？數百個動畫片段、清晰的圖形、明亮的色彩以及採用先進 16 位技術的精緻音效和音樂，讓經典神秘遊戲的所有演繹樂趣變得栩栩如生。單獨玩或與最多五個人類或計算機對手一起玩，每次玩時，您都會解開一個新的 CLUE® 謎團，因為您可以選擇五個“等級”之一，並從業餘到偵探。

因此，進入博迪先生的豪宅，開始從動畫小片段中收集證據，這些小片段顯示嫌疑人潛入房間並在武器上留下指紋。當你收集到足夠的線索後，開始對偵探的指控嗎？在哪裡？用什麼武器？如果你是對的，你會親眼目睹謀殺案重演！

Super R-Type (USA).name: 超級R型
Super R-Type (USA).original_desc:
A Galactic Battle Begins! The BYDO Empire of mutant extra-terrestrials is back with evil intent and awesome power. You'll feel the heat of their attack as never before with the extra powerful graphics and unbelievable realism of the Super NES. Now the evil Empire is poised to launch a new attack on Earth. Only the revolutionary R-9 stands between these monsters and doom.

Are they invincible? You'll need lightning reflexes, intuitive moves and a big dose of cosmic luck to hold your own! "R" you ready? The mutants "R" ready for you!
Super R-Type (USA).desc:
銀河大戰開始！變異外星人的 BYDO 帝國帶著邪惡的意圖和可怕的力量回來了。憑藉 Super NES 超強大的圖形和令人難以置信的真實感，您將感受到他們前所未有的攻擊熱度。現在邪惡帝國準備對地球發動新的攻擊。只有革命性的 R-9 才能阻止這些怪物和厄運。

他們是無敵的嗎？你需要閃電般的反應、直覺的動作和大量的宇宙運氣來保持自己的地位！“R”你準備好了嗎？變種人“R”已經為你準備好了！

Wild Snake (USA).name: 野生蛇
Wild Snake (USA).original_desc:
WildSnake is a puzzle game in which the player must manage falling snakes in a  confined space and keep the snakes from reaching the top of the space. Snakes fall and slither until they reach a resting spot on the floor of the space. A snake will destroy any other snakes of the same color and pattern that it touches with its head on the way down, which often has the chain effect of loosening the pile of snakes so that all the snakes slither into new positions, possibly eliminating even more snakes.

The game is played against a selection of backgrounds including desert, forest, water, or grass. Further, there are 7 game grids including the standard grid (a tall rectangle), X, plus, flask, Diabolo (an hourglass pattern), T-square, and obstacle (with a number of intermediate blocks).

The player starts out as a nestling and earns higher and higher distinctions taken from the snake realm (garter snake, water snake, boa, mambo, python, king cobra, etc.) as more snakes are cleared. Also, as the level increases. more types of snake patterns must be handled. Sometimes, there is a flashing red snake that eliminates the first snake it touches. Further, there is occasionally an unstoppable snake that barrels down to the bottom of the space, eliminating all snakes in its path.

The game can be played with 1 or 2 players in either easy, normal or hard mode. In the single player mode, the player can choose whether the preview showing the next snake will be shown. In 2-player mode, there is always a preview window. In fact, there is a queue of 3 snakes between the 2 player spaces from which the next snake is drawn. As a bonus during competition, multiple snake eliminations by one player result in obstacles appearing in the space of the opposing player.
Wild Snake (USA).desc:
WildSnake 是一款益智遊戲，玩家必須在有限的空間內管理掉落的蛇，並防止蛇到達空間的頂部。蛇掉落並滑行，直到到達空間地板上的休息點。一條蛇在下降過程中會消滅它用頭接觸到的任何其他顏色和圖案相同的蛇，這通常會產生連鎖效應，鬆開蛇堆，使所有蛇滑入新的位置，可能會消滅更多的蛇。

該遊戲的背景包括沙漠、森林、水域或草地。此外，還有7個遊戲網格，包括標準網格（一個高長方形）、X、plus、flask、空竹（沙漏圖案）、丁字尺和障礙物（帶有多個中間塊）。

玩家從雛鳥開始，隨著越來越多的蛇被清除，從蛇界（襪帶蛇、水蛇、蟒蛇、曼波蛇、蟒蛇、眼鏡王蛇等）獲得越來越高的榮譽。而且，隨著等級的提高。必須處理更多類型的蛇紋圖案。有時，會有一條閃爍的紅蛇消除它接觸到的第一條蛇。此外，偶爾會有一條勢不可擋的蛇猛衝到空間底部，消滅其路徑上的所有蛇。

該遊戲可以由 1 名或 2 名玩家以簡單、普通或困難模式進行。在單人遊戲模式下，玩家可以選擇是否顯示下一條蛇的預覽。在 2 人模式下，始終有一個預覽窗口。事實上，在 2 個玩家空間之間有一個 3 條蛇的隊列，從中抽取下一條蛇。作為比賽期間的獎勵，一名玩家多次消滅蛇會導致對方玩家的空間出現障礙物。

King of the Monsters (USA).name: 怪獸之王
King of the Monsters (USA).original_desc:
King of the Monsters is a two player (or one player vs. computer) fighting game, in which the players take control of two gargantuan monsters (like Godzillas) and battle it out in different city locations.

The city gets gradually destroyed as the two creatures fight it out. The players can also interact with the scenery by picking up boats and such, to use as weapons against the other player.
King of the Monsters (USA).desc:
《怪物之王》是一款兩人（或單人對電腦）格鬥遊戲，玩家控制兩個巨大的怪物（如哥斯拉）並在不同的城市地點進行戰鬥。

隨著這兩種生物的戰鬥，這座城市逐漸被摧毀。玩家還可以通過拾取船隻等與場景互動，將其用作對抗其他玩家的武器。

Gradius III (USA).name: 步驟3
Gradius III (USA).original_desc: Gradius III is the third game in Konami's long-running space shooter series, which also includes Life Force and Nemesis. As with most Gradius titles, you control the highly advanced Vic Viper space fighter against hordes of foes. Weapons can be selected from pre-arranged loadouts or you can create your own custom loadout. The game can be played by a single player, or by two players in alternating turns. The game offers three levels of difficulty.
Gradius III (USA).desc: 《Gradius III》是 Konami 長期運行的太空射擊遊戲系列的第三款遊戲，該系列還包括《Life Force》和《Nemesis》。與大多數 Gradius 遊戲一樣，您可以控制高度先進的 Vic Viper 太空戰鬥機來對抗成群的敵人。可以從預先安排的裝載中選擇武器，也可以創建自己的自定義裝載。該遊戲可以由一個玩家玩，也可以由兩個玩家輪流玩。該遊戲提供三個難度級別。

Contra III - The Alien Wars (USA).name: 魂斗羅 III : 外星人戰爭
Contra III - The Alien Wars (USA).original_desc:
It's time for revenge...

The hideous Red Falcon, thought to have been destroyed long ago by the Earth's greatest commandos, Mad Dog and Scorpian, has risen again, this time pissed off and thirsty for revenge. His armies are marching through the cities, across the lands, and with the intention of exterminating the human race like a bad case of fleas. Two new commandos, Jimbo and Sully, have come forth now to kick Red Falcon's ass and save what remains of the world from his hideous plans!

The Alien Wars begin!!!
Contra III - The Alien Wars (USA).desc:
是時候報仇了……

可怕的紅隼，被認為很久以前就被地球上最偉大的突擊隊瘋狗和天蠍座摧毀了，現在又復活了，這一次它憤怒並渴望復仇。他的軍隊正在穿越城市、穿越土地，目的是像消滅跳蚤一樣消滅人類。兩名新突擊隊員金博和蘇利現在出現了，他們要踢紅隼的屁股，並從他的可怕計劃中拯救世界上剩下的一切！

外星人戰爭開始了！ ！ ！

Kirby's Dream Land 3 (USA).name: 卡比的夢幻之地3
Kirby's Dream Land 3 (USA).original_desc:
That mean old King Dedede is at it again! He's causing his mischief and Dreamland's in trouble! Kirby, the resident hero of Dreamland, sets out to teach Dedede a lesson, this time with the help of many of his good friends!

But wait! Something's wrong! Dedede doesn't seem to be himself...

Looks like Kirby has to stop Dedede and find out what is wrong with him! It almost seems like something's controlling him...
Kirby's Dream Land 3 (USA).desc:
意思是帝帝帝老王又來搞事了！他在搞惡作劇，夢境有麻煩了！卡比是夢境之地的常駐英雄，他在許多好朋友的幫助下開始給迪迪迪上一課！

但是等等！出事了！迪迪迪好像不是他自己……

看來卡比必須阻止帝帝帝，找出他到底出了什麼問題！似乎有什麼東西在控制著他……

Go for it! Goemon - The Twinkling Journe.key: Go for it! Goemon - The Twinkling Journey - The Reason I became a Dancer (Japan) (Translated)
Go for it! Goemon - The Twinkling Journe.original_name: Ganbare Goemon Kirakira Douchuu : Boku ga Dancer ni Natta Wake
Go for it! Goemon - The Twinkling Journe.name: 盡力而為 五右衛門 Kirakira Dochuu：為什麼我會成為一名 Danser
Go for it! Goemon - The Twinkling Journe.original_desc:
Fourth title in the Ganbare Goemon series of platform/adventure games which cast you as the heroic Goemon and his gang of wacky adventurers as he fights evil all over Japan. This sequel however, takes the action to outer space as the gang attempts to rescue Goemon Impact (Goemon's giant mecha) from a strange planet.

The game is based around a stage-select hub from which you select which character you want to play as and then attempt to clear the game's many side scrolling stages in standard action platformer fashion, navigating the obstacles and defeating all enemies you run into with your weapons. Since each one of Goemon's allies got stranded on a different planet, you must take control of each one of them in order to clear the stages and recover the special ability unique to each character that must be later put to use to release Goemon Impact. As in other games of the series there are also loads of mini-games and unique gameplay sequences triggered in boss fights, bonus stages and special situations. These involve shooter sequences, racing & sport games and other assorted diversions.
Go for it! Goemon - The Twinkling Journe.desc:
Ganbare 五右衛門系列平台/冒險遊戲的第四款遊戲，您將扮演英雄五右衛門和他的一群古怪的冒險家，與日本各地的邪惡勢力作戰。然而，這部續集將故事情節帶到了外太空，夥伴們試圖從一個陌生的星球上營救五右衛門衝擊（五右衛門的巨型機甲）。

該遊戲基於一個階段選擇中心，您可以從中選擇您想要扮演的角色，然後嘗試以標準動作平台遊戲的方式清除遊戲的許多橫向滾動階段，穿越障礙並用武器擊敗您遇到的所有敵人。由於五右衛門的每一位盟友都被困在不同的星球上，因此您必須控制他們中的每一位，以便清除關卡並恢復每個角色獨有的特殊能力，稍後必須使用這些能力來釋放五右衛門衝擊。與該系列的其他遊戲一樣，也有大量的迷你游戲和在 Boss 戰鬥、獎勵階段和特殊情況下觸發的獨特遊戲序列。其中包括射擊遊戲、賽車和體育遊戲以及其他各種娛樂活動。

Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.key: Best of the Best - Championship Karate (USA)
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.original_name: Best of the Best : Championship Karate
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.name: 最佳中的最佳：空手道錦標賽
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.original_desc:
Best of the Best Championship Karate is a realistic fighting game.
After you choose your fighter for his parameters (strength, stamina and resistance), you can choose from 55 different moves.
You can now train your fighter at a gym before the real fights.
To master the game, one must alternate training and fights, as training improves stamina, strength and resistance.
Be careful, loosing a fight reduces those parameters, so you have to be ready before getting on the ring !
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.desc:
最佳冠軍空手道是一款逼真的格鬥遊戲。
根據戰士的參數（力量、耐力和抵抗力）選擇戰士後，您可以從 55 種不同的動作中進行選擇。
現在，您可以在真正的戰鬥之前在健身房訓練您的拳擊手。
為了掌握這項運動，必須交替訓練和戰鬥，因為訓練可以提高耐力、力量和抵抗力。
小心，輸掉一場比賽會降低這些參數，所以你必須在上擂台之前做好準備！

Tetris Attack (USA) (En,Ja).name: 俄羅斯方塊攻擊
Tetris Attack (USA) (En,Ja).original_desc: Tetris Attack throws Yoshi's Island into turmoil – King Bowser has cast a dark spell, turning nearly all its inhabitants into mindless servants. Only Yoshi has escaped, and he must set out to rescue his friends and defeat Bowser. The game blends fast-paced puzzle action with colorful Yoshi's Island charm, as you swap blocks to create rows, trigger combos, and unleash massive garbage blocks on your opponents. Alongside the story mode, you'll find two-player battles, endless play, time trials, and tricky puzzles. Beneath its Western name lies the Japanese original Panel de Pon – now starring Yoshi and his vibrant island crew.
Tetris Attack (USA) (En,Ja).desc: 俄羅斯方塊襲擊讓耀西島陷入混亂——庫巴國王施展了黑暗咒語，幾乎將所有居民變成了無意識的僕人。只有耀西逃脫了，他必須出發去營救他的朋友並擊敗庫巴。該遊戲將快節奏的解謎動作與色彩繽紛的耀西島魅力融為一體，您可以交換方塊來創建行，觸發連擊並向對手釋放大量垃圾方塊。除了故事模式外，你還會發現兩人戰鬥、無盡的遊戲、計時賽和棘手的謎題。在它的西方名字下面隱藏著日本原創的“Panel de Pon”——現在由 Yoshi 和他充滿活力的島上船員主演。

R-Type III (USA).name: R-Type III
R-Type III (USA).original_desc: UNDER A NEW BYDO THREAT, EARTH RETALIATES It was believed on Earth that the deadly BYDO Empire had been destroyed--but now they've returned, as nasty as ever. Their ships and armies are more powerful than before, and Earth will surely be conquered unless the new R-90 ship can destroy them. Powered with engines that launch it into different dimensions, and armed with the Round, Shadow, and Cyclone Forces, R-90 has what it takes to wipe out the BYDO threat. Then, the BYDO mother ship must be found and destroyed to entirely erase the species from our galaxy.
R-Type III (USA).desc: 在新的 BYDO 威脅下，地球進行報復 地球上人們相信致命的 BYDO 帝國已經被摧毀，但現在他們又捲土重來，一如既往地邪惡。他們的船隻和軍隊比以前更強大，除非新的 R-90 船隻能夠摧毀他們，否則地球肯定會被征服。R-90 配備了可發射到不同維度的發動機，並配備了圓形、暗影和旋風部隊，R-90 擁有消滅 BYDO 威脅所需的一切。然後，必須找到並摧毀 BYDO 母艦，以徹底消除我們銀河系中的物種。

Pop'n TwinBee - Rainbow Bell Adventures.name: Pop'n TwinBee : 彩虹貝爾歷險記
Pop'n TwinBee - Rainbow Bell Adventures.original_desc:
You play as either Twinbee, Gwinbee or Winbee. Cooperative play is also available. In this mode the second player takes control over one of the two characters left. Either way your task is to find and defeat the evil Dr. Warmon who tries to enslave the islands of Dunburi.

To deal with the many villains Dr. Warmon throws at you, you need to collect colored bells. Depending on the color of the bell you can use different attacks like a laser (blue bells) or a lash (orange bells). But even without the bells you're not defenseless. Your standard-attacks include a shock wave and the ability to fly.
Pop'n TwinBee - Rainbow Bell Adventures.desc:
您可以扮演 Twinbee、Gwinbee 或 Winbee。也可以合作遊戲。在這種模式下，第二個玩家控制剩下的兩個角色之一。無論哪種方式，你的任務都是找到並擊敗試圖奴役敦布里群島的邪惡沃蒙博士。

為了對付沃蒙博士向你扔來的眾多惡棍，你需要收集彩色鈴鐺。根據鈴鐺的顏色，您可以使用不同的攻擊，例如激光（藍色鈴鐺）或鞭打（橙色鈴鐺）。但即使沒有鈴聲，你也並非毫無防備。你的標準攻擊包括衝擊波和飛行能力。

ActRaiser (USA).name: 行動發起人
ActRaiser (USA).original_desc: ActRaiser was one of the early SNES games, drawing upon the success of side-scrolling platform action titles and the building model of Sim City. You play "The Master", and must save the world from evil. First you purge the land by sending your spirit into a warrior with a big sword and magic powers. This side scrolling portion puts you in many different locales, from swamps and forests, to pyramids and snowy mountaintops. As you eliminate evil from different parts of the land, you allow villagers to return and build their towns. You then control an angel who helps guide the villagers in their town building, and can send down miracles to aid them in their needs.
ActRaiser (USA).desc: ActRaiser 是早期的 SNES 遊戲之一，借鑒了橫向捲軸平台動作遊戲的成功和模擬城市的建築模型。你扮演“大師”，必須將世界從邪惡中拯救出來。首先，你將你的靈魂傳送到一個擁有大劍和魔法力量的戰士身上，以淨化這片土地。這個橫向滾動部分將帶您進入許多不同的地點，從沼澤和森林，到金字塔和白雪皚皚的山頂。當你消除了土地上不同地區的邪惡時，你允許村民返回並建造他們的城鎮。然後，你控制一個天使，幫助引導村民建設城鎮，並可以降下奇蹟來幫助他們滿足他們的需要。

Sonic Blast Man II (USA).name: 索尼克爆破人 II
Sonic Blast Man II (USA).original_desc:
Heavy Blast Man is once again trying to take over the Earth.  People are being turned into hideous monsters and being made to serve him. Sonic Blast Man returns along with some new friends, Sonia and Captain Choyear. Together, they battle Heavy Blast Man and his minions to save the Earth from destruction.

You control one of three characters in this side-scroller, as you fight your way through various levels filled with enemies and bosses. Beat them up with the basic punches and kicks or use your super moves to get out of tight spots.
Sonic Blast Man II (USA).desc:
重型爆炸人再次試圖佔領地球。人們被變成可怕的怪物並被迫為他服務。索尼克爆破人與一些新朋友索尼婭和喬伊爾隊長一起回歸。他們一起與重爆人和他的爪牙作戰，拯救地球免遭毀滅。

你可以控制這款橫向捲軸遊戲中的三個角色之一，在充滿敵人和頭目的各個關卡中殺出一條血路。用基本的拳打腳踢打敗他們，或者使用你的超級動作擺脫困境。

Jungle Strike (USA).name: 叢林突擊
Jungle Strike (USA).original_desc:
Some time after Operation Desert Strike, Ibn Kilbaba, son of Kilbaba S.R, threatens to annihilate America. After his father was killed, the people who were under his control, sent his son running off, along with his father's money and nuclear weapons program. Kilbaba, more ruthless than his father, longs for revenge of his father's death and decides to shed the blood of those who killed him, the Americans. Already armed, Kilbaba hires Carlos Ortega to help him set up his Nuclear Weapons program, deep in South America. Carlos Ortega, the world's most notorious druglord, also yearns to seek revenge. With his own private army, armed with the most hi-tech weapons, he's ready to fight America at all costs. 

Because of this threat, you're hired again to battle these two characters, following their paths in the jungles of South America. Armed with the Commache, numerous other vehicles, and destructive weapons, you must take out their private army. Blow up the enemy with your hellfires, hydras, chain guns. Use the watercraft to launch mines at enemy ships. Pull off a drive-by on the enemy with guns on the side. Take out the evil duo and forever rid this threat.....in the jungle!
Jungle Strike (USA).desc:
沙漠襲擊行動後不久，基爾巴巴 S.R. 之子伊本·基爾巴巴 (Ibn Kilbaba) 威脅要消滅美國。他的父親被殺後，他控制下的人把他的兒子連同他父親的金錢和核武器計劃一起送走了。基爾巴巴比他的父親更加殘忍，他渴望為父親報仇，並決定讓殺害他的美國人流盡鮮血。基爾巴巴已經武裝起來，聘請卡洛斯·奧爾特加幫助他在南美洲深處建立核武器計劃。世界上最臭名昭著的毒梟卡洛斯·奧爾特加也渴望復仇。他擁有自己的私人軍隊，配備了最高科技的武器，準備不惜一切代價與美國作戰。

由於這種威脅，你再次受僱與這兩個角色戰鬥，追隨他們在南美洲叢林中的足跡。裝備著 Commache、眾多其他車輛和破壞性武器，你必須消滅他們的私人軍隊。用你的地獄之火、九頭蛇、鏈槍炸毀敵人。使用船隻向敵艦發射水雷。用側面的槍對敵人進行突襲。消滅這對邪惡二人組並永遠消除這個威脅......在叢林中！
